[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde ka pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D94}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya b+ha dra kalpi ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_
[\[1b.2\]]sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/_dbyar 
[\[1b.3\]]gnas par bzhugs bzhugs nas/_dbyar zla gsum 'das pa dang /_chos gos mdzad do/_/chos gos mdzad nas/_chos gos mnabs te/_lhung bzed thogs nas/_
[\[1b.4\]]yangs pa can gyi grong khyer ga la ba der/_dge slong 'bum dang yang thabs cig_/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu snyed dang yang thabs cig tu gshegs te/_byon nas 
[\[1b.5\]]tshal chen por gshegs pa dang /_nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de yang nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa las/_
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te/_dge slong gi 'khor dang /_dge slong ma'i 'khor dang /_dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam 
[\[2a.2\]]mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor dag dang lhan cig tu stan bting ba la 'dug go/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang snang ba thob pa/_gzungs thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_
[\[2a.3\]]tshig gzung bar 'os pa/_tshul 'chos pa med pa/_shes kyi khe dang /_chags sems dang bral ba/_zang zing med par chos ston pa/_chos zab mo la bzod pa'i pha rol tu son pa/_mi 'jigs pa thob pa/_bdud kyi las las yang dag 
[\[2a.4\]]par 'das pa/_las kyi sgrib pa spangs pa/_chos kyi rang bzhin la the tshom med pa thob pa/_bskal pa grangs med par smon lam shin tu bsags pa/_bzhin 'dzum pa/_gsong por smra ba/_khro gnyer med pa/_tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 
[\[2a.5\]]smra ba/_sems zil gyis mi non pa/_spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/_mnyam pa nyid la bzod pa thob pa/_'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon cing mi 'jigs pa thob pa/_tshig gcig gis bskal pa bye ba char phyin pa ston pa la mkhas pa/_chos 
[\[2a.6\]]thams cad la sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_rmi lam dang /_brag ca dang mtshungs par mos pa/_shes pa mi 'jigs pa tshad med pa/_sems can gyi sems kyi rgyu ba phra mo'i tshul dang /_spyod pa sna tshogs shes pa la mos pa/_dge ba rgya che ba/_
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]sems thogs pa med pa/_lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing bzod pa dang ldan pa/_dge ba ji lta ba bzhin du rlabs che ba/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa mtha' yas par smon lam rab tu bzung ba/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 
[\[2b.2\]]'dzin rtag par rgyun du mngon du gyur pa/_sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa la mkhas pa/_lta ba tha dad pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa la mkhas pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pa brgya 
[\[2b.3\]]stong bsgrub pa la mkhas pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_'brug sgra dang /_dge ba brgya stong gi me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i blo dang /_bsgrub 
[\[2b.4\]]pa mtha' yas pa'i blo can glog gis rab tu brgyan pa'i sgra dbyangs dang /_chags pa med pa'i mtha' dang ldan pa'i blo can dang /_rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po dang /_'thun pa dang mi 'thun pa mthong bar gyur pa dang /_gser stug po bsags pa'i 'od gzi brjid 
[\[2b.5\]]kyi rgyal po dang /_dpag tshad brgyar rnam par lta zhing 'gro ba dang /_spobs pa brtsegs pa dang /_ye shes phung po dang /_mthong ba don yod dang /_bzang skyong la sogs pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa brgyad po gang spos kyi glang po dang /_rin chen mtha' yas mdzod 
[\[2b.6\]]dang /_shes rab brtsegs pa dang /_mchod pa bkod pa dang /_seng ge rnam par sgrogs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang /_blo'i bkod pas legs par brgyan pa la gnas pa dang /_seng ge'i stabs kyis 'gro ba dang /_spobs pa mtha' yas par bsgrub pa la 
[\[2b.7\]]'jigs pa med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang dag rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_dbang sgyur dang /_tshangs pa chen 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]po dang /_klu'i bdag po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dang /_lha ma yin gyi bdag po dang /_nam mkha' lding gi bdag po dang /_mi 'am ci'i bdag po dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po dang /_dri za'i bdag po dang /_de dag thams cad bcom ldan 
[\[3a.2\]]'das ga la ba der dong ste/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog sil mas gtor nas 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos nyin zhag bdun zas bcad de 'chag cing 'greng la 'dug bzhin du glos ma phab par rmugs pa dang /_
[\[3a.3\]]gnyid med par mngon par brtson par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos gang rdzogs par bgyis na sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang spyod pa 
[\[3a.4\]]'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa'i bka' la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_phyin ci log tu ston pa las mi ston par 'gyur ba dang /_sgra ji lta ba bzhin du bden pa shes pa la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[3a.5\]]la sgrib pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_'di lta ste sangs rgyas dang 'grogs pa 'thob cing mthong ba dang /_chos kyis nges pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten gyi chos la yang spyod la 'jig rten pas kyang mi gos par 'gyur ba dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas 
[\[3a.6\]]kyang de der skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos la spyod kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis par nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la spyod kyang theg pa de dag gis 
[\[3a.7\]]nges par mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la sems nag nog ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_khams sna tshogs la yang 'jug la thams cad kyi rjes su yang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_zhu ba dang /_spobs pa'i bsam pa la zil gyis non 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa mtha' yas pa rab tu 'dzin cing shes rab ma lus par 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid la sems can gyi 'du shes la yang mi gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_chos kyang ston la/_
[\[3b.2\]]dmigs pa la yang mi gnas pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa yang smra la/_nye bar zhi ba gang yang mi dmigs par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub kyi phyir yang spyod la mi gnas par yang 'gyur ba dang /_mchis pa dang /_ma mchis pa yongs su spangs kyang rgya chen po la mos par 
[\[3b.3\]]'gyur bar bgyid pa dag_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ma 'tshal bzhin du ni mi zhu na/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/lha mi gnod 
[\[3b.4\]]sbyin dri za 'khor mang po/_/mtha' yas ji ltar mos bzhin tshogs lags pas/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa gang /_/'jig rten dag gi mgon po 'od mdzad pa/_/smra ba'i zla ba la ni zhu lags na/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bdag la lung bstan gsol/_/
[\[3b.5\]]byang chub spyod mchog yon tan thos nas ni/_/skye bo phal chen 'dun gyur byang chub brtson/_/byang chub yon tan mchog la dad bskyed nas/_/yon tan kun mthar phyin la zhu lags na/_/grags pa mtha' yas bdag gi sems mkhyen tam/_/rgyal ba ma gtogs dpang 
[\[3b.6\]]gzhan bdag la med/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan lha mi shin tu skom/_/stobs bcu'i spyod pa rnam par phye ste gsungs/_/yon tan mchog spyod byang chub yon tan byung /_/grags mdzes tshul chen khyod kyi mkhyen spyod gsungs/_/ji nas ye shes 'od zer 'phro bgyid cing /_/
[\[3b.7\]]nag po'i rtsa lag dpung bcas 'joms bgyid la/_/ji nas stong gsum myur du g.yo bgyid pa/_/de 'dra'i byang chub spyod pa bde gshegs gsungs/_/ji nas mtshan gyi me tog rgyas 'gyur zhing /_/ji nas mtha' yas dbyangs ldan 'gyur ba dang /_/ji nas ri rab 'dra 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]ba'i ting 'dzin 'gyur/_/de 'dra'i byang chub sems spyod bshad du gsol/_/mnyam med mtshungs med g.yo med tshul 'chos med/_/nga bral dgra bcom dri gsum dri bral ba/_/dge sbyong mchog ste mkhas pa'i tshogs kyis bstod/_/khyod la mi 
[\[4a.2\]]mchog dag gi spyod pa zhu/_/rtogs blo brtan po dran ldan me tog gsung /_/'khrul med legs spyad spyod mnga' smra ba'i mchog_/dri bsal skyes bzang khyu mchog phan mdzad pa/_/ci nas rgyal 'gyur de ltar bdag la gsungs/_/khyod las nyin mtshan dag tu 
[\[4a.3\]]'di dag gis/_/mnyan nas byang chub spyod pa yang dag la/_/yid la byed pa gzhan med bde ba yis/_/spyod pa 'di la mchog tu spyod par 'gyur/_/ji nas ting 'dzin ldan zhing gzungs ldan dang /_/ji nas blo dang shes rab spobs ldan dang /_/phyogs 
[\[4a.4\]]mtha' yas par sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_/tshul dang tshul min dri ba 'dri ba dang /_/ji ltar ye shes mtshungs med 'gyur ba dang /_/dge ba sgo brgya dag ni bsgrub pa dang /_/'chad pa la ni 'khrul pa med 'gyur ba/_/stobs bcu'i spyod pa khyod la zhu lags so/_/
[\[4a.5\]]srid pa'i bde la chags te'ang mi zhu'o/_/yul gyis bsgyur slad du yang mi zhu'o/_/rgyal ba'i bdud rtsi la ni bdag legs 'dun/_/stobs bcu'i spyod pa bdag la myur du gsungs/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[4a.6\]]mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po legs so legs so/_/chos thams cad kyi tshul la nges par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de dang ldan na yon tan de dag 'thob 
[\[4a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]'jug pa mkhas pa yang rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po chos thams cad kyi tshul la nges par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/_
[\[4b.2\]]'di lta ste ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa nyid do/_/ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du smra ba nyid do/_/lus dag par byed do/_/ngag dag par byed do/_/sems dag par byed do/_/phan par 'dod pa nyid do/_/byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa nyid do/_/snying rje nyid mi spong ba'o/_/
[\[4b.3\]]'dod pa dag la don du mi gnyer ba nyid do/_/chos don du gnyer ba nyid do/_/dad pa chud za bar mi byed pa'o/_/rang gis dam bcas pa kun tu spyod pa nyid do/_/nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa'o/_/sems can sgrol ba'o/_/cang shes kyi las can no/_/lus la mi brkam 
[\[4b.4\]]pa nyid do/_/sems rgyu ba med pa nyid do/_/sdug bsngal dang ldan pa rnams la tshim par byed pa nyid do/_/bde ba dang ldan pa rnams la gzengs stod pa'o/_/bag med pa rnams la 'doms pa'o/_/brtson pa rnams la 'chos pa'o/_/chos la 'gyod pa dag sel ba nyid 
[\[4b.5\]]do/_/sems can gyi 'du shes la mi gnas pa'o/_/dngos po'i 'du shes kyis rtog pa med pa'o/_/'dzin pa yongs su gcod pa'o/_/mtshan ma rnam par 'jig pa nyid do/_/mnyam par gzhag pa la g.yo ba med pa'o/_/rtag tu ye shes 'tshol ba'o/_/'jig rten pa'i 
[\[4b.6\]]gtam rnam par spong ba nyid do/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam 'tshol ba nyid do/_/dran pa nyams pa med pa nyid do/_/chos rnams la brjod pa med pa nyid do/_/ji ltar bya ba bzhin du 'jug pa'o/_/spyod pa sgrub pa'o/_/'jig rten shes pa nyid do/_/las la mngon par 
[\[4b.7\]]yid ches pa nyid do/_/ma dad pa yongs su spong ba nyid do/_/mos pa mang ba nyid do/_/sangs rgyas yid la byed pa'o/_/'phel ba ston pa'o/_/bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba nyid do/_/sangs rgyas la gsol ba 'debs pa nyid do/_/sbyin gnas la phyag 'tshal ba nyid 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]do/_/bsngags pa brjod pa nyid do/_/nga rgyal med pa nyid do/_/dge ba'i rtsa bas ngoms pa med pa nyid do/_/sbyor bas rtag tu mngon par brtson pa'o/_/bsgrub pa mi spong zhing rdzogs par byed pa nyid do/_/rgyu rkyen gyi las bya ba la 'jig rten na rgya che ba'o/_/bcas 
[\[5a.2\]]pa mi 'dral ba'o/_/gzhi gcig tu mi 'jog pa nyid do/_/'di kho na bden no zhes mngon par zhen pa med pa'o/_/'dod pa'i khams la khyim mo zhes brjod pa mi 'jug pa'o/_/gzugs kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa med pa'o/_/gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin 
[\[5a.3\]]pa'o/_/ji ltar mngon par 'du byed pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par yid ches pa nyid do/_/yo byad la bgo bsha' byed cing sems mnyam pa nyid do/_/sems can thams cad la g.yos mi ston pa nyid do/_/sangs rgyas rnams la mi slu ba nyid do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[5a.4\]]la rnam par tho mi 'tshams pa'o/_/bstan pa la ngan du mi brjod pa nyid do/_/rigs pa dang ldan pa dang rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa la zhe sdang med pa'o/_/pha rol gyi sde rnyed pa la mi gnas pa'o/_/bsam pa rdzogs par bya ba mi spong ba'o/_/nga rgyal spong ba'o/_/
[\[5a.5\]]khong khro ba spong ba'o/_/gti mug yang dag par 'joms pa'o/_/rnyed pa la kun tu mi spyod pa'o/_/ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa'o/_/shes kyi khe spong ba'o/_/ma rnyed pa la mi dga' ba med pa'o/_/rnyed pas khengs pa med pa'o/_/ci rnyed pa la bgo bsha'i ngang tshul can 
[\[5a.6\]]nyid do/_/[{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par mi byed pa nyid do/_/mi snyan par zer ba dang du len pa nyid do/_/tshig bsrung ba'o/_/blo gsal bar byed pa'o/_/rigs pa dang ldan pa la skul ma 'debs pa'o/_/rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa la mi rten pa'o/_/phyir zhing 'dri ba'o/_/nang du yang 
[\[5a.7\]]dag 'jog mi spong ba'o/_/dgon pa yongs su mi gtong ba'o/_/rtag tu sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas pa'o/_/stong pa nyid la mos pa'o/_/dngos pos yongs su tshim pa ma yin pa'o/_/phung po la mi gnas pa'o/_/khams rnams 'dul ba'o/_/skye mched la mi 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]dmigs pa nyid do/_/yul la mi ston pa'o/_/phyin ci log spong ba'o/_/sems brtan por bsgrub pa'o/_/'phags pa'i gnas pa'o/_/sems la brkam chags med pa nyid do/_/sbyin gnas kyi sa thob pa nyid do/_/mngon par 'du byed pa shin tu sbyangs pa'o/_/
[\[5b.2\]]sbyin pas rnam par smin pa mi len pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyis mi snyems pa nyid do/_/bzod pas rtog pa med pa'o/_/brtson 'grus chud za ba med pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyis skye ba med pa'o/_/shes rab kyis chud za ba med pa'o/_/sa la 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[5b.3\]]mnyam pa nyid do/_/rang gi yon tan gyis snyems pa med pa nyid do/_/gzhan gyi yon tan la sun mi 'byin pa'o/_/'khor ba la mi gnas pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa la mi dmigs pa nyid do/_/thar pa la dbang du gyur pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa la ma chags 
[\[5b.4\]]pa'o/_/des pa la gnas pa'o/_/bzhin 'dzum pa'o/_/khro gnyer dang bral ba nyid do/_/gsong por smra ba nyid do/_/'os pa'i shes rab dang ldan pas gsar bu dang /_bar ma dang /_rgan rabs la bkur sti byed pa'o/_/rnam par 'tshe ba med pa nyid do/_/
[\[5b.5\]]rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'o/_/zhi ba la bsngags pa rjod pa'o/_/tshogs pa la mngon par brtson pa'o/_/mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa nyid do/_/gzungs 'tshol ba'o/_/sems can rnams la ni ma la sri zhu che ba lta bu'o/_/mdzangs pa la ni pha la sri 
[\[5b.6\]]zhu che ba lta bu'o/_/bla ma rnams la ni mkhan po la sri zhu che ba lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni sangs rgyas la gus pa lta bu'o/_/bsgrub pa rdzogs par byed pa nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti byed pa'o/_/dge ba la mos pa nyid do/_/dkon 
[\[5b.7\]]mchog gsum la zhum pa med pas bkur sti byed pa'o/_/tha snyad la mi gnas par dang du len pa nyid do/_/lus la mi lta ba nyid do/_/srog la lhag par chags pa med pa nyid do/_/'tsho ba dag par byed pa'o/_/bsod snyoms la rgyu ba dag brtson pa mi spong ba'o/_/tshogs pa'i 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]gnas yongs su spong ba'o/_/khyim pa rnams la mi bstod pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba rnams kyi nang na 'du 'dzi la mi gnas pa'o/_/tshul 'chos pa med pa nyid do/_/kha gsag med pa nyid do/_/snyan par smra ba nyid do/_/byang chub yang dag par len du 'jug pa 
[\[6a.2\]]nyid do/_/rang bzhin gyis zhum pa med pa nyid do/_/tshul bzhin la 'jug pa'o/_/phyir zhing sangs rgyas la bstod pa nyid do/_/chos la rtag tu sems pa nyid do/_/dge 'dun la rtag tu rje sa byed pa'o/_/shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la rtag tu mchod pa byed pa'o/_/mdzangs 
[\[6a.3\]]pa rnams la rtag tu bsten pa'o/_/bsam gtan pa rnams la rtag tu bsrung ba'o/_/rigs pa dang ldan pa rnams la rtag tu skul ma 'debs pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rtag tu rton pa'o/_/chos rnams la rtag tu bsgom pa'o/_/bsod nams la rtag tu yid ches 
[\[6a.4\]]pa nyid do/_/sems can rnams la rtag tu yangs pa'o/_/dad pa dang ldan pa rnams la rtag tu byams pa'o/_/sdug bsngal dang ldan pa rnams sel ba'o/_/spyod lam dag par byed pa'o/_/ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'o/_/ngo tsha ba dang 'jigs pa ston pa'i tshul can no/_/
[\[6a.5\]]spyod pa ngan pa spong ba nyid do/_/cho ga la bsten pa'o/_/spong ba la mngon du phyogs pa'o/_/'phags pa'i gnas pa tshol ba'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba bsten pa'o/_/dbang po rnams 'dzin pa'o/_/stobs rnams zil gyis mi non 
[\[6a.6\]]pa'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams lhag par mthong ba'o/_/lam la phyin ci ma log pa nyid do/_/zhi gnas rgya che ba'o/_/lhag mthong la skul ma 'debs pa'o/_/sems brjed ngas pa med pa nyid do/_/chos la mngon par dga' ba'o/_/dmigs pa las yang dag 
[\[6a.7\]]par 'das pa'o/_/mi gnas pa la mi skrag pa'o/_/dmigs pa med pa la bag med pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bsrung ba nyid do/_/sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa tshad med par byed pa'o/_/mi 'thun pa'i spyod pa la smod pa nyid do/_/
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]sngon gyi mngon par 'du byed pa la yid byung ba'o/_/rang gi las yongs su sbyong zhing 'dul ba ma yin pa sbed pa'o/_/bstan pa sun mi 'byin pa'o/_/the tsom mi 'dzin pa'o/_/dus su spyod pa nyid do/_/dus ma yin pa rnam par spong ba nyid do/_/'gro ba dang ldog pa la mkhas pa'o/_/
[\[6b.2\]]tshod shes pa nyid do/_/yo byad kyis chog shes pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa rgya che ba'o/_/ting nge 'dzin khong du chud pa'o/_/spyod pa'i bye brag can no/_/snying stobs rgya che ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bstan pa'o/_/mi dmigs pas yongs su bzung ba'o/_/
[\[6b.3\]]brtson pa dang ldan pa rnams tshim par byed pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams kyis bsgom pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor yin no/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas pa'o/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o/_/cang shes kyi 'gros kyi spyod yul ba'o/_/chos smra ba 
[\[6b.4\]]rnams kyi spyod yul lo/_/mos pa mang ba rnams la skul ma 'debs pa'o/_/'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po mthong ba'i tshul can no/_/nor don du gnyer ba rnams kyi mdzod do/_/rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi zhing ngo /_/gdungs pa rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba'o/_/
[\[6b.5\]]gzungs thob pa rnams kyi skyed mos tshal lo/_/ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnams kyi rdzing ngo /_/chos dkar po dang ldan pa rnams kyi ma'o/_/gtam la mos pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/mtshan rnams kyi rgyu'o/_/dpe byad rnams rnam par 'byed pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag pa'i 
[\[6b.6\]]gnas so/_/gzungs rab tu thob pa'o/_/bsgrub pa khong du chud pa'o/_/shin tu rigs par smra ba nyid do/_/bdud kyi yul las 'das pa'o/_/dpa' bo rnams kyi yul lo/_/nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'o/_/mi dge ba 'jil ba'o/_/smon lam dang ldan pa rnams kyi rgyan no/_/
[\[6b.7\]]bdud kyis mi phyed pa'o/_/bstan pa zad mi shes pa'o/_/mu stegs can rnams kyis shes par dka' ba'o/_/'jig rten dang mi mtshungs pa'o/_/nyan thos kyi chos las 'das pa'o/_/rang byang chub kyis nges par ma byung ba'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par zhugs 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]pa'o/_/sems can gyi 'gro ba la 'jug pa'o/_/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du skul ma 'debs pa'o/_/bza' ba 'dod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'o/_/btung ba 'dod pa rnams kyi ro bro ba'o/_/mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba rnams kyi snying po'o/_/mya ngan las 
[\[7a.2\]]'das par 'gro ba rnams kyi shing rta'o/_/pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi gru'o/_/rgal 'dod pa rnams kyi gzings so/_/snying rje can rnams kyi mar me'o/_/chos ston pa rnams kyi skar mda'o/_/mi slu bar 'dod pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/sbyin par 'dod pa rnams kyi nor yin no/_/
[\[7a.3\]]grol bar 'dod pa rnams kyi rig pa'o/_/rtsed mo don du gnyer ba rnams dang bar byed pa'o/_/nyan pa'i bsam pa can rnams kyi rgya mtsho'o/_/ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnams kyi ri rab bo/_/mig la dga' ba rnams kyi dbang po'o/_/blta 'dod pa rnams kyi bkod pa'o/_/sems 
[\[7a.4\]]dang ldan pa rnams dga' ba'o/_/phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi bsam pa'o/_/las dang po pa rnams kyi bsgom pa'o/_/skyes bu shes pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan no/_/zhi gnas la bkur sti byed pa rnams kyi byang chub 
[\[7a.5\]]bo/_/bdag med par smra ba rnams kyi sred med kyi bu'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam mo/_/ye shes dang rnam par grol ba rnams kyi skye ba mnyam pa nyid do/_/lha rnams kyis bsngags pa'o/_/klu rnams kyis brjed pa'o/_/mi rnams kyis mchod pa'o/_/slob pa rnams 
[\[7a.6\]]kyis ngo mtshar du byas pa'o/_/mi slob pa rnams kyis phyag byas pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bstod pa'o/_/chos kyi rje rnams kyis bsgoms pa'o/_/dbang po sbas pa rnams kyi grong khyer ro/_/thabs mkhas pa rnams kyi tshul lo/_/brtson pa rnams kyi rnyed pa'o/_/
[\[7a.7\]]the tsom rnams sel ba'o/_/yid gnyis gcod pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams sel ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs so/_/nad pa rnams kyi sman pa'o/_/phyin ci log pa rnams gso ba'o/_/zug rngu rnams 'byin pa'o/_/brtson par 'dod pa rnams yid la byed 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]pa'o/_/sgrogs par 'dod pa rnams kyi mi 'jigs pa'o/_/smra bar 'dod pa rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa rgya che ba'o/_/rnam par 'phrul par 'dod pa rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul lo/_/nyan 'dod pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'o/_/blta 'dod pa rnams kyi mig go/_/mya ngan las 
[\[7b.2\]]'das pa'i lam mo/_/ngan song rnams spong ba'o/_/'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa dag las 'das pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag rnam par bsgrub pa'o/_/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin len pa'o/_/srid pa tha ma pa dag seng ge'i gdan la 'dug pa'o/_/chud 
[\[7b.3\]]za ba med par don du gnyer ba rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad do/_/skyo ba rnams dga' bar byed pa'o/_/lhung ba rnams 'deg pa'o/_/rtsom pa rnams brtan por byed pa'o/_/spyod pa'i khams rnam par bsgrub pa'o/_/snyom las byed pa dag yid la byed pa'o/_/theg pa 
[\[7b.4\]]gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi bka' yin no/_/'dzin pa thams cad spangs pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/don dam pa smra ba rnams kyi sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa'o/_/stong pa nyid smra ba rnams kyi chos chud mi za ba'o/_/smon lam gyi sgo'i shugs 
[\[7b.5\]]mthar phyin pa'o/_/mtshan ma med pa la mos pa rnams la brda sprod pa'o/_/mthong ba dang /_btang snyoms la mos pa rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid do/_/thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la thabs mkhas pa'o/_/byang chub yongs su ston pa'o/_/pha rol pos spa dgong 
[\[7b.6\]]du med pa'o/_/chos smra ba la ma 'khrul bar tshol ba nyid do/_/zang zing med par chos smra ba la yang dag par bsten pa'o/_/chos mnyan pa la g.yeng ba med pa'o/_/'khor la brnyas pa med pa'o/_/chos kyi sbyin pa la bar chad med pa'o/_/nges pa rnams kyi dri ba la ngo mtshar du 
[\[7b.7\]]byed pa'o/_/'gyod pa rnam par sel ba'o/_/sbyor ba la rgyun chad pa med pa'o/_/ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su mi gtong ba'o/_/'dzin pa la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'o/_/ma rungs pa rnams dul bar byed pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa rnams 'dor ba'o/_/mi gnas pa la 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]spyod pa'o/_/rjes su dran pa 'dod pa rnams kyi dran pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams slong bar byed pa'o/_/'khor bzhi la ston pa'o/_/ro bro ba rnams kyi nang na mngar ba'o/_/rnam par 'phrul par 'dod pa rnams kyi sgra sgrogs pa'o/_/srid pa las ldog par 
[\[8a.2\]]'dod pa rnams kyi sgo 'byed pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das par thar pa'o/_/lus bde ba'o/_/sems bde ba'o/_/mkhas pa rnams dga' ba'o/_/yi dam la brtan pa rnams mi gtong ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan las mi ldog pa'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi 
[\[8a.3\]]gnas so/_/mi dge ba rnams nges par 'joms pa'o/_/'chal pa'i shes rab can rnams kyi bslab pa'o/_/rigs pa la gnas pa rnams kyi gnas so/_/slu ba med par mtshon pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi snang ba sgrub pa'o/_/ye shes kyi phung po'i snang ba'o/_/sangs 
[\[8a.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing ston pa'o/_/dri ba bye ba snyed 'dri ba'o/_/chos dkar po dag la rtag pa'o/_/skyo ba'i blo can rnams kyi dmigs pa'o/_/shes rab chung ba rnams chud mi za ba'o/_/rig pa can rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba'o/_/smra 'dod pa rnams kyi spyod pa'i rgyu'o/_/chos 
[\[8a.5\]]ston pa rnams bsrung ba'o/_/rgyu thams cad yongs su shes pa'o/_/chos thams cad la thabs mkhas pa'o/_/rtog pa'i thabs grub pa'o/_/de kho na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba'o/_/bdag la brda sprod pa'o/_/gzhan dag yang dag par tshim par byed pa'o/_/
[\[8a.6\]]dra ba gcod pa'o/_/ma rig pa sel ba'o/_/phung po rnams yongs su shes pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa yongs su shes pa'o/_/ming dang gzugs sdud pa'o/_/skye mched drug mthong ba'o/_/reg pa yongs su shes pa'o/_/tshor ba shes pa'o/_/sred pa rab tu zhi bar byed 
[\[8a.7\]]pa'o/_/nye bar len pa bor ba'o/_/srid pa chad pa'o/_/skye ba choms pa'o/_/rga shi las 'das pa'o/_/sdug bsngal shin tu sbyangs pa'o/_/bde ba la kun tu rangs pa'o/_/sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba rnam par sel ba'o/_/grub pa rnams gnas par sbyor 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]ba'o/_/dpyod pa rnams tshim par byed pa'o/_/snang ba skyon med pa'o/_/chos kyi rjes su bsgrags pa'o/_/skyes bu grags pa can rnams kyi mthu rtsal lo/_/'byung po dri ma can rnams 'khru ba'o/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba rnams nges par 'joms pa'o/_/thos pa kun tu 
[\[8b.2\]]'dzin pa'o/_/chos rnams kun tu 'dzin pa'o/_/byang chub 'khrul pa med pa nyid do/_/dge ba thams cad la 'jug pa mi ldog pa'o/_/dge ba phal cher bsags pa'o/_/blo bsgrub pa'i gzhi'o/_/brtson pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi chos kyi tshul lo/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun 
[\[8b.3\]]'phel bar byed pa'o/_/phas kyi rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa'o/_/chos smra ba rnams la legs so zhes brjod pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'o/_/rtsed mo 'dod pa rnams kyi zla ba'o/_/las kyi mtha' don du gnyer ba rnams kyi nyi ma'o/_/slob par 'dod 
[\[8b.4\]]pa rnams kyi bstan bcos so/_/phu dud dang bcas pa rnams kyi rgyal po'o/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi 'dren pa'o/_/chos dkar po rnams kyi sa bon no/_/rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'i bdud rtsi'o/_/skye ba dran pa'i gzhi'o/_/skye ba rab tu thob pa'o/_/byis pa'i chos rnams la smod 
[\[8b.5\]]pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi yon tan yang dag pa'o/_/ston pa dang 'dzin pa rnam par smin pa mtha' yas pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gnas so/_/ston pa na bde 'gro thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/yi ger 'dri ba na 'jigs pa thams cad spong ba'o/_/rgal nas 
[\[8b.6\]]phyir ldog pa med pa'o/_/rtogs pa brjod pa'i gnas so/_/'jig rten pa thams cad kyi bstan pa mnos pa'o/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'o/_/da ltar gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi gter ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa 
[\[8b.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/yang dag pa'i ye shes 'khrugs pa med pa myur du 'thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi phyag las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yongs su dri bar 'dun pa la ngoms pa med pa'o/_/khong khro ba'i rnam par rig pa rab tu zhi ba'o/_/
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]thabs mkhas pa rab tu thob pa'o/_/sa'i khams bsgom pa'o/_/chu'i khams la 'jug pa'o/_/me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa'o/_/rlung gi khams la gnas par byed pa'o/_/nam mkha'i khams rnam par thar pa bsgrub pa'o/_/shes pa'i khams 
[\[9a.2\]]ston par byed pa'o/_/'dus byas la yid byung ba'o/_/bag la nyal zlog pa'o/_/khong khro ba sel ba'o/_/btang snyoms su 'dor ba'o/_/rang gi gnas pa la mkhas pa'o/_/gzhan gyi gnas pa la mkhas pa'o/_/brjod pa 'dod pa rnams kyi yi ge'o/_/bsgrub 
[\[9a.3\]]pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa med pa'o/_/ngar 'dzin pa spong ba'o/_/nga yir 'dzin pa 'dor ba'o/_/mos pa bzlog pa'i gnas so/_/sems 'jig pa dang bcas pa'o/_/sems khyi dang mtshungs pas bsten pa'o/_/rgya che ba la 'jug pa'o/_/phra ba rtogs par byed pa'o/_/
[\[9a.4\]]ngal ba rnams kyi grib ma'o/_/chu bo las sgrol ba'o/_/phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyis mi phyed pa'o/_/des pa rnams kyi 'khar ba'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o/_/rmugs pa dang gnyid rnams spong ba'o/_/rgod pa las 'das pa'o/_/the tsom 
[\[9a.5\]]spong ba'o/_/'dod pa la 'dun pa sel ba'o/_/le lo yongs su spong ba'o/_/bdag tu mi dmigs pa'o/_/sems can du mi ston pa'o/_/srog la mi gnas pa'o/_/chos la brjed ngas pa med pa'o/_/phyin ci log med pa'i gtam smra ba'o/_/rigs par smra ba'o/_/
[\[9a.6\]]mngon par 'du byed pa la legs par bsams pa'o/_/cang shes kyi ngo bo'o/_/zhum pa med pa'i ngo bo'o/_/sbyin pa dang ye shes la mos pa nyid do/_/'khor gyi nang du zhum pa med par 'gro ba nyid do/_/gzhan la mi smod pa nyid do/_/rang gi yon tan mi brjod pa'o/_/
[\[9a.7\]]byang chub kyi phyir rtag tu gnas pa'o/_/sbyor bar brtsams pa'o/_/phyogs 'ga' la yun ring du mi gnas pa'o/_/yongs su 'dzin pa spong ba'o/_/bkra shis par yang dag par spyod pa'o/_/lus kyi ngo bo ma yin pa'o/_/sems zhum pa med pa nyid do/_/gnas 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]pa la mkhas pa'o/_/rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'o/_/mi g.yo zhing nga rgyal med pa'o/_/rnam par grol ba tshol ba'o/_/the tsom nges par byed pa'o/_/tshangs pa'i gnas pa bskyed pa'o/_/byams pa'i sems mnyam pa nyid do/_/snying rjes rjes su 'dzin pa nyid do/_/
[\[9b.2\]]dga' bas rang la dga' bar nyams su myong ba nyid do/_/btang snyoms pa na rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba sel ba'o/_/tshul khrims kyis gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa la 'jug pa'o/_/chos thams cad la shes rab kyis rnam par grol bar 'jug 
[\[9b.3\]]pa'o/_/yi ge bsgrub pa khong du chud pa'o/_/nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa'o/_/brjod pa rtogs pa'o/_/sgra la 'jug pa'o/_/mkhas pa'i ngo bo don du gnyer ba nyid do/_/'dod pa med par chos kyi sbyin pa rab tu sgrogs pa nyid do/_/blo gcig tu nges pa la mngon par 
[\[9b.4\]]dga' ba med pa'o/_/tshul gcig pa la yongs su skyo ba med pa'o/_/byang chub la blang dor med pa'o/_/chos thams cad la chud za ba med pa'o/_/ji lta ba bzhin yongs su ston pa'o/_/sems can thams cad la slu ba med pa nyid do/_/smon lam brtan po yongs su rdzogs 
[\[9b.5\]]par byed pa'o/_/nyin mtshan du sbyor ba la rgyun chad pa med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o/_/sems can gyi khams la 'jug pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub pa ste/_mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po 'di ni chos thams cad kyi tshul la nges par ston pa zhes bya 
[\[9b.6\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/spyod pa dag byed 'phags pa rnams kyi lam/_/rjes su 'thun pa'i tshul yin sems sbyangs pa/_/spobs pa'i snying po byang chub yan lag tshul/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni 
[\[9b.7\]]bde bar gshegs pa'i nor/_/bdud 'dul dri bral kho nas khro ba spangs/_/srid pa'i sred pa gcod byed shes rab dang /_/snyan dang grags pa'i yon tan legs 'byor cing /_/khams gsum dag las nges 'byung mthar yang phyin/_/ye shes sa yin dge ba'i lam yang 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]yin/_/'phags pa'i rigs yin bdud rnams phung byed pa/_/srid las thar byed bde bar gshegs pas bstod/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i nor/_/shin tu mnyam 'jug tshul ni bye ba'i sgo/_/rjes su rtogs byed tshim byed gcod byed cing /_/
[\[10a.2\]]sdug bsngal bcom pa bde ba'i rjes 'jug pa/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni bde gshegs spyod pa yin/_/byang chub yan lag me tog dran rtogs byed/_/ngo tsha shes par legs gnas dge ba bsdus/_/byang chub yan lag phreng ba bde gshegs dgyes/_/ting 'dzin mchog de 'di 
[\[10a.3\]]ni gsungs pa yin/_/byang chub yan lag phreng ba rnam thar pa/_/rab tu skye byed zhing gi pha mthar phyin/_/zla ba'i 'od byed snang byed srid gsum 'das/_/chos mchog 'di kun zla bas bstod pa yin/_/sems g.yengs tshul 'chos shes khe rnyed pa dag_/spangs nas dgon 
[\[10a.4\]]par bsten par 'gyur bya zhing /_/sbyor ba rnam gsum dag par 'gyur bya na/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di yang dag bsgrub par gyis/_/pha rol 'ching dang g.yo dang shes khe'i rgyu/_/spangs nas rang gi yon tan mi rjod par/_/chos gos gsum dang bsod snyoms spyod par shog_/
[\[10a.5\]]'di la sbyor gyur [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]'jog byed ma gyur/_/'phags pa bged pa'i ngang tshul ldan bya zhing /_/gal te ting 'dzin myur thob 'dod na ni/_/mkhas pas rtag tu dri ba brtsam par gyis/_/dris nas yang dag bsgrub la'ang gnas par gyis/_/tshogs las thag ring zhi 
[\[10a.6\]]gnas dgar 'gyur dang /_/'gro kun la ni mdza' bas mnyen bya zhing /_/tshul 'chos gzhi yi grags pa gzhar btang na/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni btsal bar gyis/_/ngo tsha shes gos dben pa'i ro yi zas/_/bsam gtan mal cha stan dang dben pa'i khyim/_/bdag 
[\[10a.7\]]med rtogs la rtag tu dga' byed na/_/mkhas pa gzhan gyi bde la 'dod mi 'gyur/_/gal te ting 'dzin 'di myur thob 'dod na/_/khros pas smras na gzhan la bzod pa dang /_/nga rgyal bskyed mi bya zhing nga bral bya/_/las kyi rnam par smin la'ang mngon dad gyis/_/ngan 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]song lam dang dmigs la mi sten cing /_/'phags pa'i 'gro ba stong la'ang mi sten par/_/nyin mtshan brtson 'grus stobs la brtsam bya na/_/tshul gzhan min pa'i ting 'dzin 'di thob bya/_/mtha' gnyis yid 'ong ma yin lam spangs pa/_/yang dag tshul 'di lam ni 
[\[10b.2\]]mnyam pa ste/_/ma byas skye med chos ni sus mthong ba/_/bsgrub pa 'di la sangs rgyas dgyes par 'gyur/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po 'di ni chos thams cad kyi tshul la nges par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/_de thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni chos 
[\[10b.3\]]thams cad phyin ci ma log pa nyid du rtogs so/_/chos thams cad mi gnas par rtogs so/_/chos thams cad skye ba med par rtogs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad byas pa med par rtogs so/_/chos thams cad gsog tu rtogs so/_/chos thams cad gsob tu 
[\[10b.4\]]rtogs so/_/chos thams cad snying po med par rtogs so/_/gzhan gyis zil gyis mi non to/_/'gro ba lnga las rgal to/_/bdud rlag par byed do/_/sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba yin no/_/chos nyid thams cad mthong 
[\[10b.5\]]ngo /_/zla ba ltar lhang nger snang ngo /_/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyu ba rab tu shes so/_/bsam pa dag pa rnams la skul ma 'debs pa yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad shes pa yin no/_/spyod pa'i sa rjes su thob bo/_/bdag med 
[\[10b.6\]]pa nyid la 'jug go/_/nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i khams rab tu shes so/_/sems can thams cad kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i sa rjes su thob bo/_/sgrib pa las 'das so/_/ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin rab tu shes so/_/nges pa'i tshig gi sgo nas sangs rgyas 
[\[10b.7\]]rnams kyis bstan pa rjes su rtogs so/_/mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rab tu thob bo/_/rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pas gtugs pa las 'das so/_/'jig rten na gos pa med pa nyid thob bo/_/sems can rnams kyi gnas yin no/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo 'byed do/_/sbyin pa po 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]yin no/_/'chi ba med par ston pa yin no/_/mya ngan las 'das pa khong du chud pa yin no/_/sems can rnams kyi gdung ba sel to/_/sems can rnams kyi the tsom gcod pa yin no/_/dbang po drug po dag gis mi gos pa yin no/_/yi ge'i sgo bcu drug la 
[\[11a.2\]]'jug pa'i gzungs thob bo/_/yi ge bcu drug 'thob pa gang zhe na/_a zhes bya ba dang /_ra zhes bya ba dang /_pa zhes bya ba dang /_tsa zhes bya ba dang /_na zhes bya ba dang /_da zhes bya ba dang /_sa zhes bya ba dang /_ka zhes bya ba dang /_tha zhes bya ba dang /_pa zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[11a.3\]]ba zhes bya ba dang /_k+sha zhes bya ba dang /_tsha zhes bya ba dang /_pa zhes bya ba dang /_Tha zhes bya ba dang /_D+ha zhes bya ba ste/_'di dag ni bcu drug go/_/rnam pa bcu drug la 'jug pa'i gzungs las ni mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i sa yang thob bo/_/chos thams cad ya ma brlar 
[\[11a.4\]]rab tu shes so/_/nges par byed do/_/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dag skyed par byed do/_/de la nyon mongs pa thams cad yod pa ma yin no/_/byis pa thams cad kyis gzung ba'i chos de kho na rab tu shes so/_/'jug par byed do/_/sems can 
[\[11a.5\]]rnams tshim par byed do/_/legs par smras pas mchod sbyin byed do/_/'chi ba med pa'i mchod sbyin nye bar 'jog go/_/sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du byed do/_/yongs su shes pa rjes su 'thob bo/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi som nyi gcod do/_/
[\[11a.6\]]sems can rnams kyi 'gyod pa bsal bar yi dam blangs pa'o/_/bya ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs lta bu 'thob bo/_/mnyam pa nyid kyis rjes su 'thob bo/_/seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa yin no/_/des pa yin no/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la zhugs nas snying rje chen po 
[\[11a.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/bdud kyi yul las 'das so/_/dbyangs snyan pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir bzod pa thob bo/_/bsam gtan zab mo'i bsam gtan pa yin no/_/'gro ba las rgyal ba'i chos ston to/_/gting 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]thob pa yin no/_/chos thams cad la stobs dang mthu che ba rjes su 'thob bo/_/chos thams cad kyi sgo nas shes pa'i phyir shes pa po yin no/_/sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dran no/_/bskal pa grangs med pa nas chos rnams kyi chos de bzhin nyid mngon par rtogs 
[\[11b.2\]]so/_/rgol ba thams cad shes so/_/skyo ba'i bsam pa thams cad spong ba 'thob bo/_/byang chub myur du rtogs so/_/lha rnams kyis bstod do/_/shes pas chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug go/_/don thob par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no/_/de la chos thams cad yang 
[\[11b.3\]]dag par snang ngo /_/zas su bdud rtsi za'o/_/the tsom thams cad gcod do/_/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba 'dor ro/_/snying rje chen pos 'gebs so/_/dgongs pa dran no/_/sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan spyod pa myur bar 
[\[11b.4\]]rtogs so/_/tshogs kyis mchod pa byas pa 'thob bo/_/nga rgyal thams cad gcog go/_/mthu'i sa nges par rjes su 'thob bo/_/sna tshogs pa nyid la 'jug go/_/bsgrub pa shes so/_/smin pa thams cad shes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyas par byed do/_/phung po'i 
[\[11b.5\]]bdud 'joms so/_/dgongs pa'i bka' myur du rtogs so/_/de las bdud myur du rlag par byed do/_/phas kyi rgol ba myur du 'dul lo/_/'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na sangs rgyas mthong ngo /_/chos kyang nyan to/_/dam pa'i chos brjed pa med do/_/ji 
[\[11b.6\]]ltar bsam pa bzhin ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par rol pa bsgrub pa yang rjes su 'thob ste/_ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bag yod pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brjod par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gal te de 'dod na skye ba gcig kho nas sam/_'dod 
[\[11b.7\]]na skye ba gnyis sam/_gsum 'am/_bzhi nas bskal pa'i bar gyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]'di dag bka' stsal to/_/stobs bcu'i spyod pa tshul 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/ma 'khrul ma 'khrugs 'dra ba yod min la/_/'chi med bdud rtsi 'thob cing lha yul dang /_/mi yul dpal byed mtshungs med rtsom par 'gyur/_/stobs bcus bstod pa tshul 'di 
[\[12a.2\]]'dzin pa ni/_/dga' byed nyon mongs rdul dang tha ba 'joms/_/gsal ba'i tshig gis lha mi dga' bar byed/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan 'os yin srid mun sel/_/stobs bcu thob bya phyir ni 'di spyod na/_/'gro ngan 'joms shing 'gro ba ngan la mkhas/_/lha mi gzhan blo ngan 
[\[12a.3\]]sel dga' bar 'gyur/_/blo ldan lam mkhas gzhan spyod rnam par 'byed/_/tshul 'di spyod pa srid 'gro yangs pa spong /_/srid song log pa rnams la bskul 'debs shing /_/lha mi ji ltar 'dod bzhin spyod byed la/_/mthu ldan dri med zla 'dra'i mig tu 'gyur/_/bya ba 
[\[12a.4\]]'di spyod mtshungs pa med pa yin/_/de la lha mi rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/blo ldan srid 'gro mi dga' yul 'khrul med/_/'khor la sgra sgrogs tshul brgya rnam par 'byed/_/rgyal ba yon tan grong rdal bdud rtsi'i tshul/_/'di 'dzin rang gis len bcug rnam 'byed pa/_/
[\[12a.5\]]sbyin bdag mtshan rab mdzes pa sum cu gnyis/_/thob pas lha dang mi rnams dga' bar byed/_/'di la spyod pa mtha' 'khob tshogs sel cing /_/skye dgu mang 'dul yon tan phal chen 'byed/_/g.yon can yul dang 'gro mkhas myur bar ni/_/dge sbyong mchog 'gyur 
[\[12a.6\]]lha mis yon tan bstod/_/'chi med nor mchog dag ni thob 'dod na/_/spyad pa 'di spyod myur du rgyal bar 'gyur/_/grags ldan yon tan mchog thob dri bsung gtong /_/lha mi 'jigs med grong khyer zhi bar sgrol/_/tshul 'di spyod pa 'chi ba med la dga'/_/gnas na gnas 
[\[12a.7\]]tshe phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs bstod/_/de ni gtam brjod lha mi rnams dga' la/_/phan 'dul mnyam gzhag snyan pa spyod mchog smra/_/lha dang lha min sa steng sdug bsngal las/_/'da' bar byed cing bdud dpung rlag par byed/_/rgyal ba'i thad song mchod byed 'gro 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]gnas mkhas/_/srid 'gro spong dran rtogs mkhas yon tan 'dzin/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di 'dzin pa ni/_/dbang po zhi zhing ye shes mchog 'dzin la/_/bse ru lta bu spyod cing ngar mi 'dzin/_/chos kyi skar mda' rtag tu 'bar ba 'ang yin/_/ye shes rgya mtsho 
[\[12b.2\]]'di ni ston pa dag_/dngos po'i tshul la skad cig par yang rtogs/_/srid gsum dag na 'di ni gdugs bzhin te/_/lha mang rgyal po de la stod par byed/_/zhi ba blta dka' 'di la 'bad pa dag_/nyon mongs nyam thag dag ni sel byed cing /_/bde bar gshegs 
[\[12b.3\]]kyi 'gro bar 'gog pa brjod/_/nyon mongs rgyun chad srid gsum 'dul bar byed/_/ting 'dzin mchog rab 'di dag thob pa ni/_/gzhan gyi spyod pa dran las bdag gi'ang sten/_/gang gis bde gshegs mkhyen pa mang shes shing /_/tshul rnams thams cad la ni gnas 
[\[12b.4\]]pa yin/_/'di bsgrub pa ni sangs rgyas rigs yin zhing /_/bsgrub pa bye ba mang po chub par byed/_/sdug bsngal can gyi reg pa rtag sel cing /_/mi de 'chi ba med pa ston pa yin/_/mthong dga' tshig snyan yon tan grags pas 'phags/_/yon tan dag gis kun tu 
[\[12b.5\]]mngon mdzes la/_/'khor gyi nang du phyin na nam mkha' la/_/ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]zla ba nya ba bzhin/_/ting nge 'dzin te 'di dag bsten pa ni/_/'khor ba na yang 'khor dang longs spyod dang /_/rus rigs grags pa bde bar gshegs kyis mkhyen/_/de yi spobs pa rgya mtsho 
[\[12b.6\]]ji bzhin no/_/rmad du byung ba'i mdo 'di spyod pa ni/_/chos kyi ngo bo bdag med tshul dag la/_/ring por mi thogs rtogs shing ston par byed/_/stong gsum dag gi sman par myur du 'gyur/_/'chi ba med par thob par sbyor ba na/_/stong gsum 'jig rten mi rnams 
[\[12b.7\]]ji snyed dang /_/gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed sems can khams/_/de las brgal te ye shes sgo yang 'thob/_/gang zhig lhag pa'i bsam pas 'di sbyor ba/_/dug dang mtshon dang mes kyang mi tshugs shing /_/rgyal pos bkrabs ltung khu sgo'i 'jigs pa'ang med/_/
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]rgyal po srin po'i 'jigs pa'ang 'byung mi 'gyur/_/tshig bzhi po ni 'dzin par byed pa na/_/khyim nas 'chi med nor chud zos mi 'gyur/_/me dang skems dang gdon gyis mi tshugs shing /_/long dang zhar dang rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba 
[\[13a.2\]]'di la sbyor byed pa/_/de la gang dag gzungs kyi gter yang stsol/_/gang zhig 'di sbyor de tshe bde bar gshegs/_/bye ba drug cu gnyis po'ang dgongs par 'gyur/_/gal te byang chub myur du reg 'dod cing /_/gal te yon tan zhing mchog 'dod byed pas/_/mdo 
[\[13a.3\]]mchog tshul 'di la ni sbyor ba na/_/thams cad mkhyen pa de yi lag tu 'thob/_/de bas mnyan te 'dir ni sems can gang /_/byang chub don du dge la dga' bya na/_/zhag bzhi'i bar du legs par brtson byas pas/_/stobs bcu dag gi nor ni 'thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[13a.4\]]ting 'dzin mchog ma la ni 'jug byed pa/_/rkang gnyis mchog ma bye ba brgyad cu dang /_/gzhan yang rgyal ba khrag khrig drug cu rnams/_/gang dag de la rtag tu dgongs par 'gyur/_/gang gis mnyan pa rnyed pa legs rnyed la/_/'di mnyan nas kyang 'di la mos byas 
[\[13a.5\]]pa/_/de dag yid gnyis spongs te byang chub la/_/de dag the tsom 'khor bar phyir mi mthong /_/de bas mnyan te yang dag spyod 'di la/_/brtson dang yon tan dag la dga' bya na/_/mdo 'di bris nas kyang ni 'chang byed pa/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid nges par lag tu 'thob/_/
[\[13a.6\]]ngas mngon shes te bskal pa brgya 'das na/_/spobs pa'i tog ces bya ba'i rgyal ba byung /_/de ni ting 'dzin mchog 'di bstan pa dag_/rgyal po'i bu ste zla ba dpal gyis mnyan/_/rgyal srid spangs nas myur bar rab byung ste/_/des ni nyin mtshan gcig tu mnyan nas 
[\[13a.7\]]kyang /_/de thun tha ma dag la dus las 'das/_/zhing gzhan dag tu de ni rdzus te skyes/_/ji ltar gang gA'i bye ma de bas kyang /_/mang ba'i zhag tu mtshungs pa med la mchod/_/byang chub rjes su de rtogs bya ba'i phyir/_/kun las ting nge 'dzin 'di bskal par mnyan/_/
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]rgyal ba mar me mdzad lung ston pa gang /_/rin chen gtsug tor zhes bya'i rgyal de byung /_/de ltar 'di thos 'bras bu che bas na/_/de phyir thos nas le lor mi bya'o/_/lha mi rnams la snyan pa'i dbyangs dag gis/_/rab tu rtogs par bya zhing mchod bya la/_/ngas ni rin 
[\[13b.2\]]chen gter dag phye zin gyis/_/stobs bcu po yi nor 'di gzung bar gyis/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[13b.3\]]sangs rgyas spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro snyan par 'brug sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la chos smra ba spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i yon tan tog gi rgyal mtshan rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba zhig byung nas de ting nge 'dzin 'di ston pa'i tshe/_rgyal 
[\[13b.4\]]po'i bu skye bo mang po la bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa dag par sgra sgrogs pas 'bum ri ba'i gos gyon gyon pa bskon te/_'di snyam du sems can thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba des na gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye 
[\[13b.5\]]ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgyes par byas nas/_thams cad las ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan te/_ma bstan pa'i chos thams cad kyang snang ngo /_/rtag tu rdzus te byung bar gyur pa'i skye ba'ang dran no/_/rgyal po'i bu skye bo mang po la bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa 
[\[13b.6\]]dag par sgra sgrogs pa de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod par tshe dpag med ces bya bar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to/_/dge slong chos smra ba spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i yon tan tog gi rgyal mtshan rnam par 'phrul pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba 
[\[13b.7\]]de ni de bzhin gshegs pa spyan chen po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rgyal po'i bu des ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun cur mngon par 'dus byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams spangs so/_/rnam par 'byed pa'i le'u dang /_sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrubs pa'i gzungs 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]dang yang skye ba thams cad du ma bral te/_chung ngu na se gol gtogs pa tsam yang ma bral bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal zla ba dri ma med pa'i dpal gyi snying po gzi brjid ces bya ba byung ste/_des de la ting nge 'dzin 'di bstan cing bshad 
[\[14a.2\]]pa na/_tshong dpon gyi bu rgya cher mdzes shing bkod pa legs sems kyis de las mnyan nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_chung ma bdun cu dang /_dpag tshad gcig khor yug tsam gyi gter bzhi dang /_skyed mos tshal brgya phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag spangs nas de gos 
[\[14a.3\]]bkram pa'i sa gzhi la rkang pa nam yang 'jog par ma gyur to/_/de rab tu byung nas lo khri'i bar du bshang gci dang gral ma gtogs par nam yang 'dug pa dang mchil lham bgos pa ma myong ste/_rmugs pa dang gnyid dang bral nas 'chag pa la mngon du brtson par gyur to/_/
[\[14a.4\]]de lo khri po de dag 'das nas des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bka' dang nges pa'i tshig dang dbyangs sdud pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_sgra thams cad la 'jug par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/_de la lha drug 'bum snyed po de dag kyang bsnyen bkur 
[\[14a.5\]]byed pa la brtson par gyur to/_/lus dang sems mchog tu dge bar bsgrub pa'i tshe/_lho phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan par de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'thad ces bya bar da ltar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[14a.6\]]rgyas so//_//'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/dper na gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/bskal pa mtha' yas 
[\[14a.7\]]dran gyur te/_/gang tshe spobs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya/_/'jig rten mgon po byung bar gyur/_/de yi gsung rab dag la ni/_/dge slong chos 'dzin mkhas pa byung /_/de yis ting 'dzin 'di bshad pa/_/rgyal po'i bu des mnyan nas ni/_/de yi gos kyang bskon byas te/_/
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]yongs su bsngo ba byas nas kyang /_/mgon po sangs rgyas des mthong nas/_/tshe dpag med pa byang chub 'thob/_/sngon gang las rnams byas gyur pa'i/_/de yi rnam par smin pa dag_/ye shes phung po 'di thos pas/_/ma lus par ni thams cad zad/_/gzhan yang 
[\[14b.2\]]sangs rgyas dri med zlas/_/ting nge 'dzin ni bshad pa na/_/tshong dpon bu yis mnyan nas ni/_/khyim dag spangs nas nges byung ste/_/gnyid dang 'dod pa med gyur cing /_/mchil lham bgos par ma gyur par/_/de yis lo ni stong phrag bcur/_/ting nge 'dzin ni bsgom pa 
[\[14b.3\]]byas/_/'di thos tsam gyi mod la ni/_/byang chub mchog ni thob 'gyur te/_/phyir zhing khyim nor 'dod pa dang /_/longs spyod dag la dga' ma gyur/_/sangs rgyas mtha' yas des mthong nas/_/thams cad dag la yongs zhus te/_/de yis tshul kun 'dzug pa ni/_/
[\[14b.4\]]myur bar rjes su rtogs par gyur/_/ting 'dzin 'di la sbyor byed des/_/yid du 'thad ces bya ba yin/_/bsam pa yongs su rdzogs mdzad pa/_/byang chub de ni myur du 'thob/_/phyi ma'i dus na 'byung ba ni/_/ye shes phyag rgya 'di mnyan kyang /_/longs spyod med cing 
[\[14b.5\]]bde ba med/_/rab tu byung bar 'dun pa'ang med/_/gcig la gcig ni spyo ba dang /_/gshe ba dang ni bsdigs pa dang /_/smod pa dag ni sgrogs byed kyang /_/sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bya zhes zer/_/khyim na sdug bsngal stong yod pa/_/bzod 'gyur 'dod pa'i rgyu dag 
[\[14b.6\]]las/_/ltos nas nyon mongs bran gyur kyang /_/sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bya zhes zer/_/de dag gi ni rmi lam du/_/sangs rgyas mthong nas dbugs 'byin cing /_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal 'byung gzhan yang /_/nga la byang chub the tsom med/_/don phyir ma yin de dag gis/_/
[\[14b.7\]]mdo 'di sgra tsam mnyan nas kyang /_/dbugs dag 'byin byed bdag gis ni/_/ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob/_/de yis yang dag tshul 'di ni/_/ji bzhin thos shing mnyan byas kyang /_/'dzin med phyir zhing chags med pa/_/bar snang gi ni rlung bzhin no/_/'di la mang 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]po kha cig dag_/byang chub don phyir rab byung yang /_/phan tshun shes khe'i gzhi dag las/_/nyes pa dag ni skyed par 'gyur/_/shin tu dbul zhing shes rab dman/_/thos pa tsam gyis nga rgyal can/_/gzhan la snyems par byed pa des/_/bdag gis 
[\[15a.2\]]byang chub mthar phyin snyam/_/sku gdung rnyed dang 'od mthong dang /_/rgyal ba mchod pas spu zing byed/_/byang chub thob par shes 'gyur bas/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam gyis ngo mtshar byed/_/byang chub shin tu ring gyur pa'i/_/gang de'i g.yo 'di dag gis kyang /_/nyams par byas nas 
[\[15a.3\]]phyir zhing ni/_/de yi rgyal ba shin tu ring /_/mdo 'di dag ni mnyan nas kyang /_/byang chub thob par 'gyur shes shing /_/tshe dpag med gyur blta bya snyam/_/myur du sangs rgyas blta bya snyam/_/dmigs pa dag la gnas pa yi/_/byang chub shin tu ring ba ste/_/yang 
[\[15a.4\]]dag mtha' la gang mi brtson/_/de dag la ni lung mi bstan/_/tshong dpon gyi ni bu 'di yis/_/nor mdzod gang yin btang mthong nas/_/de dag rab tu byung nas phyis/_/slongs mo ster ba'i khyim la chags/_/'di 'dra'i ting nge 'dzin ni gang /_/mar me mdzad las ngas 
[\[15a.5\]]sngon thos/_/yang dag pa ni mi shes pa/_/de ni gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur/_/rin chen rin thang med 'dod phyir/_/rgya mtshor sha na'i khur khyer ltar/_/blun po de dag rab byung nas/_/shes khe'i mchog la rag las so/_/'di la thos dang tshul khrims dang /_/rab 
[\[15a.6\]]tu byung bas dag mi 'gyur/_/byang chub lam ni bsgrubs 'di la/_/bag yod par ni gnas par gyis/_/phyi ma'i dus na gang zhig gis/_/bshad pa'i tshe na mnyan nas kyang /_/de nyid la ni rnyed pa'i rgyus/_/phyir zhing mi snyan pa dag zer/_/mdun nas kyang ni phyag 
[\[15a.7\]]'tshal la/_/legs so zhes ni sbyin byed cing /_/de la chos gos 'bul byed kyang /_/mi snyan pa dag zer bar 'gyur/_/mchi ma dag kyang blags byas shing /_/bdag nyid dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dge 'dun nang du de la ni/_/sdig pa byed ces phyir zhing smra/_/
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]slob dpon la ni mchod mi byed/_/bla ma dag la ri mo med/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam gyis khro byed cing /_/khyim sun 'byin dang ldan pa yin/_/pha rol bsod nams ma dad cing /_/rang gi skyon la mi sems par/_/gzhan gyi mchod pa shes nas ni/_/phrag dog mi bzad skyed par 
[\[15b.2\]]byed/_/bdag gis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_/chos gos dang ni me tog gis/_/sku gdung dag ni mchod byas nas/_/byang chub thob par 'gyur zhes zer/_/mdo 'di dag ni mnyan nas kyang /_/bde ba thams cad spang byas te/_/bsgrub pa dag la gnas pa ni/_/nga yi 
[\[15b.3\]]yang dag mchod 'di yin/_/dper na rab 'byor mchod byed ltar/_/bdag gi phung po spangs nas kyang /_/chos nyid de la mchod byed kyi/_/sku gdung gzugs la ci zhig mchod/_/mdo 'di sgom par byed pa na/_/srog la dga' ba spang bya ste/_/dgon par rtag tu gnas bya 
[\[15b.4\]]zhing /_/'tsho ba'i 'jig rten zad par bya/_/mchog dga' rgyal po nga las ni/_/bsgrub pa dag ni mnyan nas kyang /_/mi dang lhan cig rgyu ba na/_/nam yang yid brtan mi bya smra/_/'di bden 'di ni mi bden zhes/_/bdag smra ba na de dag ni/_/dga' bas mi snyan 
[\[15b.5\]]rjod byed pa/_/de tshe bdag ni nyams par 'gyur/_/byang chub mchog la phyir zhing ni/_/shes khe'i spyod yul 'dun pa med/_/de dag byang chub bkur sti can/_/de dag rnam grol shin tu ring /_/sdom pas bsgrubs te ngas thob pa/_/nga yi bdag nyid chen po dang /_/
[\[15b.6\]]rdzu 'phrul gang yang rung ba dag_/'di dag thams cad 'dir mthong ngam/_/shes kyi khe dang rnyed spangs nas/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du dgon pa na/_/dben pa dag tu bsten gyis te/_/sa dang tshul khrims gzungs rnams spyod/_/bden min ngas ni ma smras pa/_/khyod 
[\[15b.7\]]la byin gyis brlab bya ste/_/phyi dus mi bzad pa yi tshe/_/mdo sde 'di yang khyod la ni/_/tshe dpag med dang 'jig rten mgon/_/mi 'khrugs de bzhin 'od zer gtong /_/de la bye ba drug cu po/_/sangs rgyas 'khor bcas kun mthong ngam/_/ston pa 'khor bcas 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]de dag ni/_/phyi ma'i dus na chos kyang skyong /_/mdo 'di chos kyi phyag rgya ste/_/phyi ma'i tshe na bsgrub par 'gyur/_/yongs su gtad pa 'di mnyan tshe/_/stong gsum dag kyang g.yos gyur te/_/lha yis legs so zhes byin zhing /_/me tog mang po'i char 
[\[16a.2\]]pa bab/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' sum khri dang lhan cig tu lus 'dar la mchi ma zag cing skyi bung zhes byed la/_mchan khung nas rngul byung bzhin du stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 
[\[16a.3\]]thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus na brdeg 'tshog la nye bar gnas pa dang /_chos smra ba la brnyas pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma mchis pa dang /_bstan pa 
[\[16a.4\]]'jig pa dang ye shes mthong ba chung ba dang /_chos dkar po rnam par gzhig pa dang /_'tsho ba'i mthar gyur pa de'i tshe na lus dang srog yongs su btang ste/_bde bar grags pa thams cad bdag gis ral gri lta bus gcad par bgyi zhing /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[16a.5\]]pa'i lam gter sna tshogs pa spobs pa phyin ci ma log pa phyag rgya dge ba'i rtsa ba legs par sdud pa'i rgya mtsho gzungs kyi rigs bdud zil gyis gnon pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsgrub pa la rjes su rtogs pa'i mdo sde 'di dang 'di lta bu dag bris nas 'chang ba dang ston par 
[\[16a.6\]]bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sems can dmyal ba na mchis su lags kyang /_ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'di'i slad du ni spro bar bgyid lags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[16a.7\]]gsol to/_/'jig rten mgon po ma gtogs par/_/dpang gzhan su yang ma mchis na/_/ci nas byang chub bdag 'dun dang /_/bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen lags sam/_/rgyal ba slad dus 'jigs chen tshe/_/bdag gi lus dang srog dag ni/_/ma lus 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]par ni spangs gyur kyang /_/ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bgyi/_/gal te bskal pa tshad med par/_/sems dmyal gnas na mchis gyur kyang /_/ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chang ba na/_/rtag tu de la spro bar bgyi/_/sems can thams cad gnyer nas ni/_/
[\[16b.2\]]zang zing ma mchis chos bstan bgyi/_/'du byed thams cad spangs nas kyang /_/srog chags rnams kyi don dag bgyi/_/slad dus nye bar gnas pa na/_/bdag gi lus srog rus pa dang /_/sha dang chu rgyus zhig kyang rung /_/bdag gis le lo mi bgyi'o/_/
[\[16b.3\]]bshes 'drin thams cad spangs nas ni/_/dgon gnas dag tu mchi bgyi zhing /_/byams pas sems can khyab bgyi ste/_/nad med 'gyur ba'i sman stsal bgyi/_/spyod yul log pa gang de dag_/de dag gi ni mi bslab cing /_/ci nas mdo 'di spyad pa yang /_/
[\[16b.4\]]yang dag ji bzhin spyad par bgyi/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas mkhyen pa ltar/_/rtag tu bag mchis par yang bgyi/_/'di la thog mar mchi ba dag_/sems can rnams la'ang spro bar bgyi/_/zhugs kyi phung por mchongs kyang rung /_/'jigs chen sman chos 'tshal 
[\[16b.5\]]kyang rung /_/grags pa dang ni mchod slad du/_/byang chub mchog ma ston mi bgyid/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_gang gA'i klung bdun cu'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sems can gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nas lhags te/_de dag gis 'di thos 
[\[16b.6\]]nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong po de dag thams cad kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo/_/phyi ma'i tshe na gang dag chos smra ba lha 'bum phrag bcu po de dag kyang spro bar mdzad nas byang chub las 
[\[16b.7\]]phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/lha dung phyur phrag bdun po dag kyang gang dag chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/_/'khor bzhi po mi'i skye dgu bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po dag gis kyang gang dag chos rnams la chos kyi mig skyes so/_/ngan song gsum po thams cad kyang 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]rab tu zhi bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa dag tu snang bar gyur to/_/de'i mod la srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can thams cad bde bar gyur to/_/
[\[17a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od de las rin po che bkod pa mtha' yas pa'i pad ma 'dab ma 'bum yod pa bye ba khrag khrig byung bar gyur nas/_pad ma thams cad la yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji lta ba bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'khor de lta bu dag dang 
[\[17a.3\]]bzhugs te/_mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po yang thams cad la gsol ba 'debs la/_sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di bka' stsal nas/_sems can grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi 
[\[17a.4\]]ldog par mdzad do/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa ston pa spyod pa yongs su dag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la bka' 
[\[17a.5\]]stsal pa/_mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de lta bas na sbyin pa lhur ma byed par/_chos la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ni mchod pa gyis shig_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa mang po dag byung ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[17a.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser sdug mdzes pa rnam par nges pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_sku tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa ni mtha' yas so/_/'khor ni grangs med do/_/phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya 
[\[17a.7\]]pa tha ma'i tshe de'i chos smra ba rin po che'i lus mtha' yas par grags pa spyod pa'i mdzod ces bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/_de ting nge 'dzin 'di ston pa na dge slong gzhan dag gis bstan pa thams cad las bsnyil bar gyur to/_/de nas chos smra ba de zhum pa med pa'i sems 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]kyis lus dang srog la mi blta bar/_'di ltar dur khrod du gnas bcas nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za zhing ting nge 'dzin 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_de las chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag nas bzung ste/_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams lhags so/_/de'i tshe 
[\[17b.2\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po skye bo mang po mngon par dga' zhing mya ngan med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_des chos smra ba de las ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan to/_/mnyan nas kyang chos smra ba de la mi 'jigs pa byin te/_dge slong sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par bka' 
[\[17b.3\]]stsal pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ston cig_/bdag ni khyod la bsrung zhing skyong ba lags so/_/des bu stong yang de'i bsrungs mar bkod la/_thogs pa med pa'i sems kyis srog chags sum khri zhig kyang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sbyor du bcug go/_/chos smra ba bde 
[\[17b.4\]]bar gnas par byas pa des kyang bskal pa phyed kyi bar du ting nge 'dzin 'di bstan te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de byas pas chos smra ba dang /_rgyal po bu dang bcas shing skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_tshogs pa thams cad kyis bskal pa brgyad cur sangs rgyas gtams pa bye 
[\[17b.5\]]ba sum khri mnyes par byas te/_thams cad las ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo/_/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su 'dzin par gyur to/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i tshe na chos smra ba de gal te khyod gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na 
[\[17b.6\]]de de ltar mi blta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ni chos smra bar der gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur to/_/bskal pa bzang po pa'i sangs rgyas stong ni rgyal po'i bu rnams su gyur to/_/mchog tu 
[\[17b.7\]]dga' ba'i rgyal po la sogs te byang chub sems dpa' sum khri po 'di dag ni 'di ltar chos smra ba de'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin bde bar sbyor ba dang /_bsrung zhing skyong bar gyur to/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin yin 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]te/_de lta bas na yang dag par bsgrub par gnas pas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni gus pa dang bcas par zung shig_/lhogs shig_/bri bar gyis shig_/ston cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[18a.2\]]'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang gis bskal pa bye ba stong tshang bar/_/sems can kun la bde ba byin pa bas/_/la las byang chub mchog sems gcig bskyed pa/_/de yi bsod nams dper yang bzod mi 'gyur/_/phyogs bcu dag na sems can ji snyed pa/_/
[\[18a.3\]]de dag thams cad rang rgyal gyur de la/_/bde ba kun gyis bskal par bkur byas kyang /_/'di ltar byang chub mchog tsam bsod nams med/_/'jig rten sems can kun sangs rgyas gyur te/_/de dag bsam pa ji bzhin bskal mchod pas/_/la las byang 
[\[18a.4\]]chub mchog sems gcig bskyed pa/_/de yi bsod nams dper yang bzod mi 'gyur/_/gang gis sangs rgyas chos rnams bsrung ba'i phyir/_/tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad mi yis gus byed pas/_/la las byang chub yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/_/byang chub 
[\[18a.5\]]sems kyi bsod nams de 'dra med/_/'jig rten khams 'di'i sems can gang su dag_/de dag thams cad byang chub bkod pa bas/_/la las phung po med pa'i tshig mnyan nas/_/skrag med de yi bsod nams khyad par 'phags/_/gang gA'i klung phrag 
[\[18a.6\]]bye ba bye snyed kyi/_/bskal par byang chub sems dpas rin po che'i/_/'byor pa kun gyis zhing bkang sbyin byin pas/_/la las byang chub bsrungs 'di khyad par 'phags/_/rgyal bas gnang ba'i byang chub bsrung bya ba/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi ting 
[\[18a.7\]]'dzin 'di/_/gang zhig tshig bzhi'i tshigs bcad bsrung ba de'i/_/tshig kun gyis ni brjod par mi nus so/_/gang zhig ting 'dzin 'di bris 'chang byed pa/_/dus byed tshe na sangs rgyas phal chen mthong /_/de ni dran ldan gzhar yang rmongs pa med/_/
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]gang du 'dod pa der ni skye ba len/_/ting 'dzin rgyal po la ni dga' byed pa/_/byang chub ma thob bar du lus bde zhing /_/de bzhin sems bde mtho ris su yang 'gro/_/'phags dang phrad cing sdug bsngal gzhar mi myong /_/rgyal ba rnams kyi mdzod yin 'od mtha' 
[\[18b.2\]]yas/_/sgo mo stong phrag khri la 'jug pa dag_/stobs mchog gnas te nga yis bstan par byas/_/ting 'dzin byang chub 'di la sbyor bar gyis/_/ngas ni tshig gis brjod nus de snyed do/_/khyod kyis bya ba dag ni 'di yin te/_/ji srid bar du der 'jug sbyor gyis 
[\[18b.3\]]dang /_/phyi ma'i dus na gdungs par mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar lag tu 'ongs bzhin ngas bshad de/_/lhag pa'i bsam pas spyod pa sbyor gyis shig_/byams pas bya ba mang po ngas byas pas/_/pha yis bu la gdams pa bzhin du bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[18b.4\]]kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di bstan nas ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po yang snyoms par zhugs te ting nge 'dzin 'di zhag bdun du chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pas rab tu rnam par 'byed do/_/de nas yangs 
[\[18b.5\]]pa can gyi nang rol na lits+tsha bI brgyad khri bzhi stong dang yangs pa can gyi phyi rol na lits+tsha bI brgyad khri bzhi stong 'khod pa dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i phyir dang /_
[\[18b.6\]]lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa 
[\[18b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs par bdag cag gi nang nas sus gsol ba gdab snyam mo/_/de nas nang rol na 'khod pa'i lits+tsha bI rnams tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]btsun pa shA ri'i bu tshe thung ba'i dus na sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang dkon la/_dad pa yang dkon pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam par bzhag pa de bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de 
[\[19a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ting nge 'dzin de las legs par bzhengs su gsol cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lits+tsha bI de dag las tshig de thos nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das bsam 
[\[19a.3\]]gtan gyis bsam gtan du zhugs shing /_ting nge 'dzin gyis ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa dag btsal yongs su btsal kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa mngon par ma rtogs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der song ste/_
[\[19a.4\]]lits+tsha bI rnams kyi bsam pa dang rang bzhin de nyid smras so/_/de nas maud gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin 
[\[19a.5\]]las bzhengs par gsol ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad dbyangs kyis go bar byas kyang ma bzhengs so/_/de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang /_lag 
[\[19a.6\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_ming chen dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_sgra gcan 'dzin dang /_gang po dang /_rab 'byor dang /_kA t+yA'i bu dang /_'od srung dang /_kun dga' bo dang /_gang po ngan dang /_ka pi na chen po dang /_nye bar 'khor dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 
[\[19a.7\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'khor bar bskor nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_shin tu 'thab bral 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dpag tu med pa dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[19b.2\]]'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das nyid la 'dud cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to/_/tshangs pa dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge rgyas dang /_'bras bu che ba nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar te/_lha'i bu dpag tu med pa dag dang lhan 
[\[19b.3\]]cig tu bcom ldan 'das nyid la 'dud cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de zhag bdun du yid la gzhan mi byed par nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs par gyur to/_/des zhag bdun 'das pa 
[\[19b.4\]]dang bsams dpyad de/_nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' yon tan la dbang du gyur pa dag dang /_'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas phyag btsal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas stan la 
[\[19b.5\]]'khod par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las mkhyen bzhin du bzhengs te thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis gzigs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' 
[\[19b.6\]]ba'i rgyal pos/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi bka' mchid 'bel ba bka' stsal ba'i dus la bab ste/_de lta lags pas/_gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la 
[\[19b.7\]]skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]gshegs pa la zhus shig dang ngas zhu ba zhus pa de dang de lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[20a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag gcig pu dben par zhugs te/_nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa na 'di snyam du gang dag byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag byang chub kyi don du yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /_de dag byang chub kyi don du pha rol tu phyin pa dag 
[\[20a.3\]]gis dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ro snyam bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das de la pha rol tu phyin pa sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa zhig gam/_pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub la phan 'dogs pa zhig gam/_pha rol tu phyin pa zag pa dang bcas pa zhig gam/_
[\[20a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa zag pa med pa zhig gam zhes de ltar brtags te ci nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa gang la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'phel ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi tshul thog ma dang /_bar ma dang /_tha ma'i bar du legs par gzung ba 
[\[20a.5\]]bskyed pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa de dag mchog tu dga' ba ches mang po rab tu thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya cher bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po legs so legs 
[\[20a.6\]]so/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po khyod gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di nyid dri bar sems pa khyod legs so/_/de lta mod kyi khyod kyis 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu dag las kyang zhu ba 'di nyid zhus so/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po 
[\[20a.7\]]de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mchog tu 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]dga' ba'i rgyal po yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/snang bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'jig rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/sems can la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/gnas pa'i pha rol 
[\[20b.2\]]tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/byang chub kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[20b.3\]]pa drug yod do/_/ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'thob pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/re ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rnam pa gsum lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod 
[\[20b.4\]]do/_/las byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/lam shin tu sbyangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/
[\[20b.5\]]bya ba ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rlom pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/brtsams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rno ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/zab pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/
[\[20b.6\]]sna tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/bkod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/thub pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/sems can la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/chos la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/zhi 
[\[20b.7\]]gnas la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/thams cad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/phyogs gcig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]yod do/_/bcos ma ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/dbul po ma yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rnam par bsgrubs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/dag pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[21a.2\]]phyin pa drug yod do/_/brtan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/brtun pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/ngoms pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'jig rten pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/
[\[21a.3\]]bla na med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/g.yeng ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mi 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/thun mong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/thun mong ma yin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[21a.4\]]phyin pa drug yod do/_/rnam par 'ged pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rnam par smin pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/ngo bo nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/dngos po med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rgya che ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[21a.5\]]yod do/_/rgyas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'tshol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rgal ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mngon par dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mngon par 
[\[21a.6\]]dga' ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/thos pa 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'khor bar yun ring ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rgyun chad pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'dod pa'i yon tan yongs su smin par bsngos pa'i 
[\[21a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/bsam gtan yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'jig rten pa'i bzo'i gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/byams pas yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]phyin pa drug yod do/_/snying rjes yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/dga' bas yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/btang snyoms kyis yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/log par lta bas yongs su 
[\[21b.2\]]bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/yang dag par lta bas yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/gnas par lta bas yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mi gnas par lta bas yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[21b.3\]]drug yod do/_/gnas med pas yongs su bsngos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/nga rgyal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/phan 'dogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/phan mi 'dogs pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[21b.4\]]phyin pa drug yod do/_/lhag ma dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/lhag ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rigs pa'i khyad par la gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[21b.5\]]'byung ba phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/dran pa nyams pa med par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu 'thob pa khyim gyi dngos po la gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/nges par 'byung ba 
[\[21b.6\]]bsgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mang du thos pa bsgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rab tu byung ba'i ngang tshul rgyun mi chad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mngon par shes pa la gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mngon par shes pa 
[\[21b.7\]]rgyun chad pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/lus 'dod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rnam par smin pa mang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rnam 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]par smin pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mngon par dga' ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/dus su sbyin pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'od kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'od mtha' yas 
[\[22a.2\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rnam par smin pa bde ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/dga' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rnam par dag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'jig rten pa'i 
[\[22a.3\]]chos las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/skye ba bkod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rigs phun sum tshogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'khor phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'khor mi phyed 
[\[22a.4\]]pa sgrub par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rnam par smin pa dag pa skyed par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/phyogs rnam par lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/yongs su shes pa yongs su bsgrags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/
[\[22a.5\]]bag yod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/brdzi ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/dbang che bar grags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/skul ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/
[\[22a.6\]]brjed ngas pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad rnams phan tshun 'brel ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mngon par 'byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/dus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/dus shes pa'i pha 
[\[22a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/'jig rten dang 'thun par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rdo rje lta bu'i pha rol tu 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]phyin pa drug yod do/_/mun pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/zil gyis mi non pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/bdud kyi dpung 'joms pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/g.yo ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/skad cig gcig 
[\[22b.2\]]dang ldan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/mnyam par bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/yongs su smin par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/
[\[22b.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/lhag ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/lhag ma dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/dang du len pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/rtogs par byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod 
[\[22b.4\]]do/_/rgya che ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/yid byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/gzhan la dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/gzhan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yod do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yang dag par spong ba re re'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[22b.5\]]drug go/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po re re'i yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug drug go/_/bsam gtan bzhi po dag gi yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug drug go/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po dag gi yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug drug go/_/bden pa bzhi po dag gi yang pha rol 
[\[22b.6\]]tu phyin pa drug drug go/_/dbang po lnga po re re'i yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug drug go/_/stobs lnga po dag gi yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug drug go/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag gi yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug drug go/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po 
[\[22b.7\]]dag gi yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug drug go/_/zhi gnas la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/lhag mthong la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/rig pa la dmigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/rnam par grol ba bsgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]drug go/_/dge slong gis 'khor nye bar 'ong ba sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po dag gi yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug drug go/_/yongs su skyo ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/sbyin pa las nges par byung
