[\[83b.3\]]'brel pa yod pa dang med par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[83b.4\]]dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_chos 'di rnams kyi bde ba 'di nges pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/cang shes pa mtshungs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/gzhan la phan par yongs su bsngos pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa de ni bzod 
[\[83b.5\]]pa'i'o/_/bdag la phan pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/snod ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/rgyu 'thun pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_de dag ni dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_bsam 
[\[83b.6\]]gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_sngon gyi gnas lus kyis rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/'gro ba rtogs pa gang 
[\[83b.7\]]yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/las kyi mtha' rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/nyon mongs pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/sems rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/rnam pa thams cad pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ji snyed pa 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]kun yang dag par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la lha'i mig gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_lha'i mig dang ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/sbyor ba kha na ma tho ba 
[\[84a.2\]]med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/thag ring por mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/ma lus par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/rgud pa dang /_dar ba dang /_bkur sti med pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/de dag gi nges 
[\[84a.3\]]par byung ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni lha'i mig gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go_/de la zag pa zad pa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_zag pa'i skyon mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/zag pa rnams la mngon par mi dga' ba gang yin 
[\[84a.4\]]pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/zag pa rnams la mi lta zhing sems kyis gtong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/zag pa rnams la mi rtog par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/zag pa rnams kyi yang dag pa yongs su shes pa'i spong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam 
[\[84a.5\]]gtan gyi'o/_/zag pa rnams kyi bag chags kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni zag pa zad pa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go_/de la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[84a.6\]]sangs ma rgyas pa'o zhes mi 'jigs pa dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas rigs par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/dam bcas pa la ma zhum pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/yang dag par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/
[\[84a.7\]]thams cad thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/'khor brgyad kyi nang na bag tsha ba mi mnga' zhing /_dam bcas pa brtan po gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]dag ni mi 'jigs pa dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la yang dag par zag pa zad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_zag pa zad pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/bag chags sel ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod 
[\[84b.2\]]pa'i'o/_/yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/dam bcas pa la 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi g.yos pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/rnam par grol ba la nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni mi 'jigs 
[\[84b.3\]]pa gnyis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la nges par 'byin pa'i lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_lam thabs la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/'thob par byed pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/'gog pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni 
[\[84b.4\]]bzod pa'i'o/_/'jug par byed pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/rab tu 'jog par byed pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/rnam par grol bar byed pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa gsum 
[\[84b.5\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go_/de la bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi gtam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_bar du gcod pa rnams la skye ba med par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/ma skyes par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/chags pa med par rtog 
[\[84b.6\]]pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/bar du gcod pa rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba med pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/bar du gcod pa rnams la the tsom med par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/bar du gcod pa rnams la chung ngu dang /_'bring 
[\[84b.7\]]dang /_chen pos nges pa dang /_ma nges par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi gtam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go//_//'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po brgyad pa/_
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]de la snying rje chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_sems can la phan pa dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/sems mnyam pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/sems can rnams la gnod pa dang du len pa gang yin pa de ni 
[\[85a.2\]]bzod pa'i'o/_/sems can nye bar 'ong ba rnams thar bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/mos pa ji lta ba bzhin yon tan la 'jog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/'khor ba las grol bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni 
[\[85a.3\]]snying rje chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la sha'i spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams gnyis dang ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams gnyis kyis brtan nas gzigs pa gang 
[\[85a.4\]]yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan rnams 'dres pa'i skyon gyis ma 'khrugs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/spyan blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/rigs par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/
[\[85a.5\]]ma lus par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni sha'i spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la lha'i spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_lha'i spyan gyis gzugs kyi lus gzigs pa gang yin pa 
[\[85a.6\]]de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/nam mkha'i lus gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/rgud pa gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/dar ba gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/rgyu gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/so sor 
[\[85a.7\]]gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni lha'i spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la shes rab kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_bsgoms pas 'grub pa'i shes rab kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa thar pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/mngon par brjod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/gzigs pa la rab tu gnas pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/blta bar bya ba la yang 
[\[85b.2\]]dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/'jug pa byang ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni shes rab kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la chos kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[85b.3\]]pa drug gang zhe na/_chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad thob pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/de dag 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/rnam par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/ngo bo nyid gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/sbyor 
[\[85b.4\]]ba gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/chud mi za bar gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni chos kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[85b.5\]]gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/phan par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/rnam par gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/ngo bo gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/
[\[85b.6\]]sbyor ba gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/rnam par dben pa gzigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_rang byung lhun 
[\[85b.7\]]gyis grub par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin gnas pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/rang gi spong ba'i rgyu rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/rab tu dbye ba shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/rnam pa thams 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]cad la nye bar rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/ji lta ba bzhin thams cad shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la rnam par rol pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_sbyin pa'i rnam 
[\[86a.2\]]par smin pas rnam par 'phrul pa ni dper na chu bo gang gAr gdugs lnga brgya lta bu gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/grong khyer du gshegs pa na sems can rnams bde bar gyur pa dang /_sil snyan rnams ma dkrol bar sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/dbang po ma 
[\[86a.3\]]tshang ba tshang ba dang 'od gsal ba rab tu 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/'od zer mtha' yas pa 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/yul yangs pa can gyi phyi dang nang logs su sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stong sprul pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan 
[\[86a.4\]]gyi'o/_/'khor brgyad po rnams la dus su chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni rnam par rol pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la gting dpag dka' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_spyod pa la tshad gzung bar mi nus pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin 
[\[86a.5\]]pa'i'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen par dka' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/bsam pa chud mi za zhing 'dzin pa la pha rol gnon pa ni dper na gnod sbyin 'dul zhing glang po che nor skyong dang /_sbrul gdug pa btul nas 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa sbyin no/_/zhes 
[\[86a.6\]]tshig gis smras pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/'od zer can du maud gal gyi bu chen po'i ma btul ba dang /_tshur gshegs pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi nang du lhung bzed kyi chu pho ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_sems bzhi 
[\[86a.7\]]skyes nas zhig go/_/smras pa/_tshad med pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas nam phyed na phrin las mdzad par gyur pa na gnam lcags phab kyang grong khyer gyi ma dad pa rnams btul nas/_sang ni ngas mngon par shes pa drug gi chos bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]zhes pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni gting dpag dka' ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi drug tshan [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gang zhe na/_de la ca co med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_'di ltar rgya cher ston pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/'od 
[\[86b.2\]]mngon par 'du byed pa rnam pa gsum ston pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/gzhan gyi rgyud dag la gnod sems med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin tshim par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi myong bar byed pa gang yin pa 
[\[86b.3\]]de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba dang bral bar ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni ca co med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la bsnyel ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_dran pa rgyun mi 'chad pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin 
[\[86b.4\]]pa'i'o/_/ji lta ba bzhin yongs su bsngo ba'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/sbyor ba kha na ma tho ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/chos thams cad mngon par go bar mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/dus gsum du ma bsnyel ba gang yin pa 
[\[86b.5\]]de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/gsung rab ma bsnyel ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni bsnyel ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la sems mnyam par bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_sems la skye ba med par mtshungs pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/
[\[86b.6\]]zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/phrad pas chog shes pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/gzhan la phan pa rnam par dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/sems tshar bcad cing kun tu 'dzin pa nye bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/dus 
[\[86b.7\]]thams cad du bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin lhun gyis grub par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni sems mnyam par bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_bsam pa grub pa btang 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/pha rol po gzhan la rag las pa la btang snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/snying rje'i yo byad btang snyoms pa ni dper na byang chub kyi snying po lta bu gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/thams cad du btang 
[\[87a.2\]]snyoms ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/chos ston pa na btang snyoms pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/chos bshad pa byas nas lus kyis gdams ngag ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms 
[\[87a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la tha dad pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_tha dad pa'i 'du shes kyis mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/de bzhin nyid du 'du shes pas phyin ci ma log par skye ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/yod pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes 
[\[87a.4\]]gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/bdag gi lus dang gzhan gyi lus la 'khrul pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/'du shes pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/thams cad de'i ngo bo ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni tha dad 
[\[87a.5\]]pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la 'dun pa yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_pha rol la phan par 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/bdag la phan par 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/chos kyi gzhi la 'dun pa gang yin 
[\[87a.6\]]pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/dus thams cad du 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/sred pa spong ba la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/ma rig pa spong ba la 'dun pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni 'dun pa yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[87a.7\]]phyin pa drug go/_/de la brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_thams cad du song ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/gzhan dad par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/gdul ba'i dus la sdod 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/chos lta ba mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/yig 'bru ston pa zad mi shes pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/don ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha 
[\[87b.2\]]rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la dran pa yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_dran pa la rnyog pa med pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/thag ring po dran pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/rigs pa ji lta ba bzhin dran pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/
[\[87b.3\]]mos pa ji lta ba bzhin dran pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/'jug par byed pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/yongs su gcod pa'i dran pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni dran pa yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la 
[\[87b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/yang dag pa'i spong ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su 
[\[87b.5\]]'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/bsam gtan yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/bden pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[87b.6\]]gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la shes rab yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_dbang po yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/stobs 
[\[87b.7\]]yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/lam yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/stobs bcu yongs su 'dzin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni shes rab yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams 
[\[88a.2\]]pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_lus nyam chung ba yongs su nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/tshogs kyi nang na gnas pas yongs su nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/ma 'dres par gnas pas yongs su nyams pa med pa 
[\[88a.3\]]gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/gzhan gyi gnas thob par byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/zad pa shes pas legs par byas pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/mi skye ba shes pas bag chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di 
[\[88a.4\]]dag ni rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/sdom 
[\[88a.5\]]pa med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/'dod par 'gyur ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/sa dang sa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/skye ba rnam par gzhag pa la mi slob pa gang yin 
[\[88a.6\]]pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/chos gos kyi tha mas khyer ba na yongs su nyams pa med pa'i shes rab rnam par grol ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba yongs su nyams pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la 
[\[88a.7\]]lus kyi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_lus kyi las ma 'khrul ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/lus kyi las nges pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/bag chags kyis 'gyur ba med pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i 'o/_/
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]gcig tu dge ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/skye bo mang po la rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/lus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis gdams ngag ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni lus kyi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[88b.2\]]pa drug go/_/de la ngag gi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_ngag 'khrul pa med par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/thams cad du song ba'i dbyangs gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/'khor dga' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 
[\[88b.3\]]de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/kun tu sgrogs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/mos par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/re ba la ston pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni ngag gi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/
[\[88b.4\]]de la yid kyi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_yid kyi las rang bzhin gyis rgyun mi 'chad pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/so sor brtags pa sgrub pa gang 
[\[88b.5\]]yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/gti mug dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/tshad med pas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni yid kyi las ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug 
[\[88b.6\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_khams la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/phung po la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/skye mched la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni 
[\[88b.7\]]bzod pa'i'o/_/las la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/nyon mongs pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/sems can la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]pa drug go/_/de la ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_'gro ba tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/lta ba tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/gang zag tha dad par rtog pa 
[\[89a.2\]]gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/sbyor ba tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/skye ba tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/rnam par smin pa tha dad par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs 
[\[89a.3\]]pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi bya ba shes pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul 
[\[89a.4\]]khrims kyi'o/_/'dod chags dang bral bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/'gog pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/mngon sum du bya ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la chud za ba med 
[\[89a.5\]]par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_thabs mkhas pas dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/skyon dang 
[\[89a.6\]]bral bar sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/thams cad du thogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/sems can rnams kyi mos pa 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/bde ba tshad med 
[\[89a.7\]]pa la 'jug pa thob par byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/_'di dag ni mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la ji lta ba bzhin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sbyor ba la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes gang 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/dngos po brgyad mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/lta ba gsal bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/gdul bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/nye bar sgrub pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam 
[\[89b.2\]]gtan gyi'o/_/brda la nges pa'i tshig 'jug par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la rang bzhin mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_mi dmigs pas yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni dper 
[\[89b.3\]]na mar me mdzad lta bu'i gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/lus la mi lta ba ni dper na zla 'od kyis bden pa gang gis nga'i mig ces smras pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/ljongs kyi 
[\[89b.4\]]nges pa'i tshig mthong bar khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/snying brtse ba mi gtong bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/gnyis su med pas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/_'di dag ni rang bzhin mthong ba'i pha 
[\[89b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la 'dod pa na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i las dman pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/'bring mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/chen po mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/las 
[\[89b.6\]]zad par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/las zad par sbyor bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/las zad par sbyor ba'i mi skye bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/_'di dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[89b.7\]]pa drug go/_/de la gzugs na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_gzugs kyi rnam par smin pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/gzugs kyi rgyu mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/skye ba'i las mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]skye ba'i las kyi rnam par rtog pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/rnam par smin pa gsal bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/dman pa dang dman pa ma yin par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/_
[\[90a.2\]]'di dag ni gzugs na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go_/de la gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sa yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/rnam pa la rtog pa gang yin 
[\[90a.3\]]pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/dmigs pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/dmigs pa la mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/dmigs pa shin tu sbyangs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/tha dad pa med par ston par mthong ba nas 
[\[90a.4\]]nges par 'byung ba mthong ba'i bar gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la re ba med pa gang 
[\[90a.5\]]yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/mtshan ma med pa rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/rgyun mi 'chad pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/rnam par lta ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/kun tu 'phel ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/dkar 
[\[90a.6\]]po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la chos su 'du shes shing sems can gyi 'du shes med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/_'di dag ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la rigs kyi chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_rigs 
[\[90a.7\]]kyi chos mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/'bring po mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/sred par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/rigs las ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/rigs yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/brgyad pa'i chos rab tu 'thob pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/_'di dag ni rigs kyi sa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la brgyad pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_brgyad pa dad pa'i rjes 
[\[90b.2\]]su 'brang ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/brgyad pa chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/brgyad pa skye ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/brgyad pa dgra bcom pa stan gcig pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/brgyad pa rgyun du zhugs 
[\[90b.3\]]pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gnas pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba gang gis so so yang dag par rig pa sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/_
[\[90b.4\]]'di dag ni brgyad pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos kyi lam la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i'o/_/rno bar rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/
[\[90b.5\]]de ltar thogs na lan bdun pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/rigs nas rigs su skye ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/bar chad gcig pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/_'di dag ni rgyun 
[\[90b.6\]]du zhugs pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba la nyon mongs pa chung bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i'o/_/nyon mongs pa rno bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni 
[\[90b.7\]]tshul khrims kyi'o/_/las chung bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/las la sred par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/bul ba nyid du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/lhag par sred par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/_'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'dod chags spong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/mi lta ba'i sems dang de'i ngo bo ma 
[\[91a.2\]]yin pa dang phyir mi 'ong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/srid pa bzang por skye ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/shin tu mthong bar skye ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/'og min du skye ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/skyes bu dam pa'i 'gro ba drug gi shes 
[\[91a.3\]]pa thag ring ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/_'di dag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la dgra bcom pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_dgra bcom pa yongs su nyams pa'i chos la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/
[\[91a.4\]]yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/dad pas mos pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/lus kyis mngon du byed pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam 
[\[91a.5\]]gtan gyi'o/_/gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/_'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la rang sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_rang sangs rgyas la yid byung ba chung 
[\[91a.6\]]bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/yid byung nas 'byol ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/gcig pu la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/thar pa la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/zhi gnas la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bsam 
[\[91a.7\]]gtan gyi'o/_/gcig pu spobs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_g.yo med par sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i'o/_/
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]lhag pa'i bsam pas zhugs pa'i sbyor ba ni dper na ngang pa'i skyes pa'i rabs lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/shes pa thams cad rnam par dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus 
[\[91b.2\]]kyi'o/_/gzhan gyis bsgrags pa las brten nas snyoms par 'jug pa rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/'khor ba na yongs su skyo ba med pa'i shes pa dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni 
[\[91b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la zad pa shes pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_zad pa shes pa la thogs pa med par sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/sbyor ba cha phra ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/mtshan nyid med pa 
[\[91b.4\]]la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/yongs su gcod pa'i dmigs pa la sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/mi lta bar sbyor ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/mi shes pa thams cad dang bral zhing shes pa thams cad rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes 
[\[91b.5\]]rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni zad pa shes pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la mi skye ba shes pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_sred pa'i rtsa ba dgu po dag mi skye bar shes pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/gnod sems kyi dngos po dgu mi 
[\[91b.6\]]skye bar shes pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gtugs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/rnam par thar pa yongs su ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/mi slob pa'i shes pa bcu po dag mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam 
[\[91b.7\]]gtan gyi'o/_/yongs su gcod par 'gyur ba med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni mi skye ba shes pas rab tu phye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la byin gyi rlabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_dam pa'i chos ma nub kyi bar du chos thams 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]cad gnas pa dang bstan pa la zang zing gis mchod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/bstan pa la zil gyis ma non pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/'jig rten gyi rigs bzhi dad par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/mngon par brtson pa 
[\[92a.2\]]'bras bu dang bcas par rtsol pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/bsam pa des pas chos mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/'jig rten gyi chos thams cad yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/_'di dag 
[\[92a.3\]]ni byin gyi rlabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la lha'i mig sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_lha'i mig gis gzugs can mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/gzugs can ma yin pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/sgro btags pa 
[\[92a.4\]]med pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/nges par 'byung ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/nye bar zhi ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni lha'i mig 
[\[92a.5\]]sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la lha'i rna ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_sgra che ba nyan pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/sgra chung ba nyan pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/byams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/
[\[92a.6\]]thabs kyi tshig sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/'du byed rnams thos nas kun du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/sgra thams cad dpyod pa la 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni lha'i rna ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la sems 
[\[92a.7\]]kyi rnam grangs shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_sems kyi rang bzhin mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/sems la dge ba dang mi dge bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/sems kyi rgyu dang rkyen mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/'das pa 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]dang /_ma 'ongs pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/da ltar byung ba la mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/thams cad du rgyu bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug 
[\[92b.2\]]go/_/de la sngon gyi gnas mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_sngon gyi gnas na bden pa'i dmigs pa mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/skye ba la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/'gro bar 'jug pa med pa la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/
[\[92b.3\]]de lta bu la rtog pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/de ltar bdag med par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/rnam pas lung 'bogs par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni sngon gyi gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[92b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/dmigs pa tha dad pa med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/sems can rnams la snying rjes rnam par 'phrul pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/thams cad du thogs 
[\[92b.5\]]pa med pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/yid kyi las mi ldog pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/zil gyis ma non pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la zag pa zad par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[92b.6\]]drug gang zhe na/_zag par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/zag pa kun 'byung bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/zag pa 'gog par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/zag pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mthong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 
[\[92b.7\]]'grus kyi'o/_/'di nyid du zag pa bcu ma lus par 'gog par lta ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/'di nyid du zag pa bcom nas mi snang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang /_de ltar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni zag pa zad pa shes pa'i 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la spyod lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_/skye bo mang po dad par byed pa'i spyod lam gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/kun nas mdzes pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/rgyun mi 'chad par bltas pa gang yin 
[\[93a.2\]]pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/gom pa 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/spyod lam ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/spyod lam ma bcos pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni spyod lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la 
[\[93a.3\]]phan par 'dod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_spyod pa yang bar zang zing len pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/sems can ma rungs pa dag la skyabs byed pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/mu stegs can rnams kyi gnod pa bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod 
[\[93a.4\]]pa'i'o/_/'di ltar gdul ba'i phyir dga' bo lha'i nang du son pa dang /_'di ltar pad ma'i snying po'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/gdul ba'i phyir bzang brtsams sgom pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/'di ltar lnga po'i nang nas kun shes snying 
[\[93a.5\]]rjes nye bar 'ongs te chos bstan pa dang /_'di ltar bden pa po'i lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni phan par 'dod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la nyon mongs pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_nyon mongs pas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang 
[\[93a.6\]]yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/dbang rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/gnod sems med par gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/mos pa la yon sbyong ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/mngon par zhen pa med par rtag tu sbyor ba gang yin pa 
[\[93a.7\]]de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin gnas pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba la dbang sgyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_tshe 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]bor nas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/mtshams bcad pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/lta bar song ba'i srid pa thams cad spangs pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/sems can smin par bya ba'i phyir btang ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/
[\[93b.2\]]sems can yid byung ba rnams gdul ba'i phyir btang ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba la dbang sgyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_len pa med par mya ngan las 
[\[93b.3\]]'das pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/sems kyi byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/'od srung chen po mthong bar sgrub pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/stong gsum g.yo bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/sems la 'jog 
[\[93b.4\]]pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/ring bsrel sel bur blags pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la cho 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_phyogs tha dad pa dag tu sku gdung rnams 'thor 
[\[93b.5\]]pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/sku gdung gi cho 'phrul gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/sems can rnams dang bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/cho 'phrul la lha rnams spro bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/spu zing zhes byed cing mchi 
[\[93b.6\]]ma 'dzag pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/bden pa'i tshig gis ring bsrel las cho 'phrul 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni cho 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la bstan pa rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_rnyed pa rab 
[\[93b.7\]]tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i'o/_/kha na ma tho ba med pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/zil gyis ma non pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/ji tsam du lha dang mis bstan pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/bdud kyis bltar med pa gang yin 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/bstan pa dang bral bar dga' zhing dang ba tsam gyis mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi ste/_'di dag ni bstan pa rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de la ring bsrel rnam 
[\[94a.2\]]par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/_ring bsrel rnams la yo byad kyis mchod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i'o/_/skye bo mang po dad pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi'o/_/ring bsrel gyi mchod rten gzi byin can gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i'o/_/
[\[94a.3\]]lha dang mi rnams dga' ba gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi'o/_/ring bsrel gyi dmigs pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi'o/_/ring bsrel tshol bas spobs pa yongs su ma nyams pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha 
[\[94a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa'i ste/_'di dag ni ring bsrel rnam par dbye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/_/de dag las pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la chos ston pa'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni zhe sdang spyod pa rnams la chos ston pa'o/_/
[\[94a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni gti mug spyod pa rnams la chos ston pa'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa nyis stong chig brgya ni cha mnyam par spyod pa rnams la chos ston pa ste/_de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong bzhi brgya'o/_/de dag gi ting nge 'dzin kyang brgyad stong bzhi 
[\[94a.6\]]brgya'o/_/de dag gi rnam pa la 'jug pa yang stong stong ste/_rnam pa brgya brgya po re re'i stong stong po des na de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes bya'o/_/de dag gi ting nge 'dzin brgyad khri bzhi stong sgrub par byed pa ni bdag la phan par brtson pa zhes 
[\[94a.7\]]bya'o/_/gzungs brgyad khri bzhi stong ni gzhan la phan par brtson pa ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir de ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po ngas byang chub kyi snying por bdud btul te/_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas nga 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]chos la dga' ba'i rnam par smin pas zhag bdun gyi bar du skyil mo krung ma bshig par 'dug pa la tshangs pas kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di ni chab 'tshal te/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos rgya chen po 'di lta bu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang thugs las 
[\[94b.2\]]chung ngu la thugs mngon par gzhol bar mdzad kyi/_chos bstan pa'i slad du ni ma lags so zhes gsol ba btab bo/_/de nas nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i dpal dang gzi brjid dag gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mthong ngo /_/kha dog dang tshul 
[\[94b.3\]]bzang po dang /_kha dog du ma snang ba dang /_sku drang por bzhugs pa dang /_bkra shis pa dang /_thad du 'gro bar 'os pa dang /_kun nas mdzes pa dang /_legs par gnas pa dang /_'od kyi kha dog mchog dang ldan pa dang /_blta na sdug pa dang /_bkod 
[\[94b.4\]]pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /_bkod pa yid du 'ong ba dang /_ye shes kyi bdag nyid chen po dang /_blta na dkon pa dang /_gzi byin mtha' yas pa dang /_snyan par grags pa dang /_mkhyen bzhin 
[\[94b.5\]]du kha dog mdzes par snang ba dag kyang mthong nas/_de'i tshe spyan sngar 'khod de zhe sa dang bcas pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/bdud btul nyon mongs pa dag rnam bcom zhing /_/stong gsum po yi sa gzhi g.yo mdzad la/_/ngan song sa yi sdug 
[\[94b.6\]]bsngal spangs nas kyang /_/byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa kun du mdzes/_/lhun po ri dang 'dra bar mi g.yo bar/_/drang po'i sku yis bde bar bzhugs mdzad la/_/zhing rnams kun du 'od zer 'gyed mdzad pa/_/mgon po shing dbang drung na lhang nger bzhugs/_/skyil mo 
[\[94b.7\]]krung mchog mnyam gzhag dbang po yis/_/seng ge lta bur mi g.yo bzhugs mdzad cing /_/gong na med par bdag nyid gzigs pa na/_/mgon po rgyal ba'i gdan la lhang nger bzhugs/_/ngan song srog chags sdug bsngal zhi mdzad cing /_/mtho ris lam dag rgya cher 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]mdzad pa na/_/'jig rten las mi 'dod pa zhi mdzad pa/_/sA la'i mchog dbang drung na lhang nger bzhugs/_/spyod mnyam mnyam pa nyid kyis bzhugs mdzad cing /_/'jig rten phan par bden tshul dgongs pa po/_/bden pa'i dbang phyug bstan pa dgongs pa na/_/
[\[95a.2\]]mgon po rgyal ba'i gdan la lhang nger bzhugs/_/dus gsum chos kyi de nyid dgongs mdzad cing /_/'gro ba tshogs gsum dag tu mdzad pa na/_/bstan pa dgongs tshe dus shes 'di dag ni/_/thugs chung gsung ba zla ba lhang nger bzhugs/_/sems can mkhas pa 
[\[95a.3\]]'jig rten dam pa ste/_/sum cu gnyis mtshan ldan pa gzugs mchog mnga'/_/drang srong chen po 'jig rten mi sdug pa/_/tshangs pa yi chad dngos kyis nyer mchis na/_/me gsum lhung ba'i 'jig rten gzigs su gsol/_/khyod kyis byang chub yan lag grus bstan 
[\[95a.4\]]gsol/_/mgon po byang chub yan lag bdun ston pa/_/khyod kyis bdud rtsi'i char dbab dus 'di lags/_/'du shes log pa long ba rab nyams pa'i/_/skye dgu bdud lam gnas pa gzigs su gsol/_/ston khyod mig ldan gzhan du mi 'gyur ba/_/khyod kyi 
[\[95a.5\]]dus 'dir thugs rje bskyed du gsol/_/mu stegs ngan 'gro g.yang sa chen po yi/_/srid pa'i rgya mtshos skye dgu 'di khyer rnams/_/sems can srid mtsho las 'don 'gro ba'i don/_/mdzad pas byang chub yan lag grus kyang bsgral/_/'jig tshogs ltas bcings 
[\[95a.6\]]skye dgu 'di dag rnams/_/lta bas gnod byas srid pa'i khol po dag_/yun ring bgags pa bcings las thar ma mchis/_/sems can kha sgyur ci slad grol mi mdzad/_/nyon mongs dbang gis log par rab song la/_/yun ring gnyid log sgrib pas khebs pa rnams/_/
[\[95a.7\]]tshul khrims brtul zhugs brtan pa'i ting 'dzin 'thob/_/chos kyi rnga sgra ci slad bsgrags mi bgyid/_/'jig rten dag na dbul gyur 'gro ba rnams/_/'gro lnga re thag chad pa slong zhugs la/_/khyod kyis nor bdun de ring brnyes gyur pas/_/mchod sbyin dam pa ci slad da mi 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]stsal/_/bdud rtsi med pa'i sems can stong po rnams/_/dad pa phal chen sa bon 'dzin mchis na/_/rnam grol glog dang thugs rje'i char sprin las/_/ci slad byang chub yan lag char mi dbab/_/zug rngus zug pa'i nad pa khams gsum na/_/nyon mongs nyam thag 
[\[95b.2\]]nad snying zas phongs la/_/byang chub yan lag sman mchog brnyes pa yis/_/nad pa yun ring [{]ding [,]deng [}]ci grol mi mdzad/_/mun pa mun nag zhugs pa'i 'gro ba rnams/_/gti mug bsgribs pa mya ngan chen po'i nang /_/stong chen shes rab mar mes mun chen po/_/bzod brlag 
[\[95b.3\]]ci yi slad du sel mi mdzad/_/'dam rdzab chu bo bzhi na yongs skyo ba'i/_/skye bo g.yang sa chen por lhung 'di dag_/lhar bcas 'jig rten sman slad thugs brtse ba'i/_/mgon pos da ni ci slad gdon mi bgyi/_/lta la chags pa'i mu stegs phal chen gyis/_/lha mi 
[\[95b.4\]]kun du glongs par mchis rnams la/_/drang po ma yo g.yo med bde ba yis/_/ci slad rin chen lam dag da mi bstan/_/mi dbang seng ge la ni tshangs gsol bas/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas spyan 'jig rten gsum la gzigs/_/gzigs nas sems can rnams 
[\[95b.5\]]la brtse bskyed de/_/nad med chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol/_/lha de dag gis de ltar brtags nas kyang /_/byang chub snying por seng gdan nga 'dug la/_/bstod de bstod nas de ltar dga' bas dong /_/ngas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/de skad ces 
[\[95b.6\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor 'dus pa 'di'i nang na ni gang dag ting nge 'dzin 'di 
[\[95b.7\]]dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa 'di dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la 'jug pa brgyad khri bzhi stong po 'di rnams thob pa dag mchis lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor 'dus pa 'di'i nang na gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas 
[\[96a.2\]]pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po dag ma gtogs par gang dag ting nge 'dzin 'di dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa 'di dag dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la 'jug pa brgyad khri bzhi stong po 'di dag thob pa gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[96a.3\]]'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag yod do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/legs so legs so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_
[\[96a.4\]]skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[96a.5\]]rnams la snang ba bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa na sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ba'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi rigs dang /_ming de dag bka' stsal du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[96a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' 
[\[96a.7\]]ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]ming tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa//_//'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dgu pa/_'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub dang /_/'od srung shAkya skyes mchog dang /_/byams pa seng ge rab gsal dang /_/thub 
[\[96b.2\]]pa me tog ces bya dang /_/me tog rgyu skar bzang ded dpon/_/lag chen dang ni stobs chen dang /_/rgyu skar rgyal po rtsi sman dang /_/snyan pa'i tog dang 'od chen dang /_/grol ba'i phung po zhes bya ba'i/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni sde tshan rdzogs/_/rnam par snang mdzad nyi ma'i 
[\[96b.3\]]snying /_/zla ba 'od 'phro 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_/mya ngan med dang skar rgyal dang /_/rab gsal phreng thogs yon tan 'od/_/don gzigs dang ni mar me dang /_/mthu ldan sman pa des pa dag_/mdzod spu brtan ldan lha yi dpal/_/gdul dka' yon tan 
[\[96b.4\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_/sgra gcan tshogs ldan tshangs pa'i dbyangs/_/tshigs brtan dang ni mi 'gying dang /_/'od mdzad lhun po chen po dang /_/rdo rje sdom can mi bsnyengs dang /_/rin chen pad spyan stobs sde dang /_/me tog 'od zer ye shes dgyes/_/
[\[96b.5\]]gzi chen tshangs pa 'od dpag med/_/klu sbyin dang ni brtan gshegs dang /_/don yod mthong dang brtson 'grus sbyin/_/bzang skyong dga' bo 'chi med dang /_/seng ge'i rgyal mtshan rgyal ba chos/_/mchog dga' rgyal po kha lo sgyur/_/dgyes gshegs chu 
[\[96b.6\]]lha yon tan lag_/spos kyi glang po rnam par gzigs/_/'brug sgra dang ni legs sems dang /_/yid [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dri med zla ba dang /_/grags chen gtsug na nor bu dang /_/drag shul seng ge'i stabs ljon pa/_/rnam par rgyal chen shes rab brtsegs/_/
[\[96b.7\]]legs gnas blo gros yan lag skyes/_/blo mtha' yas dang gzugs bzang dang /_/mkhyen ldan 'od zer brtul zhugs brtan/_/bkra shis dang ni bden pa'i tog_/pad ma dang ni sred med bu/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ye shes 'byung gnas dang /_/yon tan 'od 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]ni 'phro ba yin/_/tshangs byin rin chen 'byung gnas lha yi me tog dang /_/don legs sems dang chos kyi dbang phyug blo gros pa/_/spobs pa dag ni brtsegs pa rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang /_/bcu pa stobs bcur ldan pa phan par bzhed pa yin/_/
[\[97a.2\]]rnam par rol par ldan dang mun dang bral ba sgra gcan lha/_/ri bo'i rgyal mtshan tshogs can 'od dang de bzhin rin chen snying /_/shin tu mthor gshegs dang ni rgyal ba skar rgyal ru [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_/bcu pa khams gsum mgon po yon tan grags zhes bya ba yin/_/nyi 
[\[97a.3\]]zla nyi ma'i 'od dang skar mkhan seng ge'i tog dang ni/_/dus mkhyen rgyal po dpal gyi snying po srid mtha' gzigs pa dang /_/glog gi 'od dang gser gyi ri bo seng ges byin pa dang /_/bcu pa mi dbang rgyal ba gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan yin/_/mchog dga' grags pa 
[\[97a.4\]]brtson 'grus brtan pa dang ni grags rdzogs dang /_/bsnyengs bral dang ni mchod 'os lha dang sgron ma chen po dang /_/'jig rten 'od dang spos dri zhim dang yon tan mchog 'dzin dang /_/bcu pa rang byung mtshungs med mun dang rnam par bral ba yin/_/seng ge'i 'gram pa dang 
[\[97a.5\]]ni rin chen grags dang skyon rab zhi/_/bdud rtsi 'chang dang mi yi zla ba dang ni shin tu gzigs/_/rab tu brgyan dang nor bu 'od dang ri bo brtsegs pa'i tog_/bcu pa chos kyi 'byung gnas don nges ldan pa yin/_/chos sbyin dang ni rin chen 'byung gnas skye dbang mtshungs/_/stabs 
[\[97a.6\]]kyis gshegs pa dang ni blo gnas pa dang gdugs mdzes dang /_/gtso bo dang ni shin tu 'phags dpal seng ge'i sgra/_/bcu pa skyes bu gtso bo rnam par rol ldan yin/_/klu yi 'od dang me tog ri bo dang ni klu dga' dang /_/spos kyi dbang phyug shin tu grags dang stobs 
[\[97a.7\]]lha zhes bya dang /_/yon tan phreng bar ldan dang klu yi lag dang mig brgyan dang /_/bcu pa drang srong chen po legs par sbyangs pa'i blo zhes bya/_/zil non ye shes mtha' yas spyan dang bden par gsung ba dang /_/nyi ma'i 'od dang nges pa'i blo dang mtha' yas pa yi gzugs/_/
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]rnam par snang mdzad rin chen tog dang the tshom spangs pa dang /_/bcu pa rang nyid byung ba 'jig rten dag las 'das pa yin/_/don yod rnam par gnon dang rtog mdzad me tog rgyal mtshan dang /_/ri dbang rgyal po dang ni gzi brjid che dang don mdzad gzigs/_/grags 
[\[97b.2\]]pa mtha' yas dang ni rin chen lha dang don gnas mkhyen/_/bcu pa blo ni yongs su rdzogs pa dman min grags pa yin/_/mya ngan med ces bya dang dri ma bral dang tshangs lha dang /_/sa yi dbang phyug me tog spyan dang rnam par 'byes pa'i sku/_/chos kyi 'od dang kun ni gzigs 
[\[97b.3\]]dang yon tan 'od gsal dang /_/bcu pa 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod pa dri med zla ba'i zhal/_/rin chen 'od dang rin chen tog dang ni/_/grags bla 'od byed gzi brjid dpag med dang /_/dus mkhyen seng ge'i sku dang mkhas blo dang /_/rgyal bar dka' dang yon tan phung 
[\[97b.4\]]po dang /_/zla ba'i tog dang mthu ni thob pa dang /_/mthu rtsal mtha' yas zla ba dri med dang /_/don rnams thams cad gzigs dang dpa' bo dang /_/'byor par ldan dang bsod nams sgron ma dang /_/yon tan 'od 'phro blo ni yangs pa dang /_/legs skyes nor lha yid 
[\[97b.5\]]gnyis spong ba dang /_/'dzin pa dpag med mchog sred choms med dang /_/mi gnas pa dang sangs rgyas der gnas dang /_/tshogs can gtso bo 'gro ba'i 'od zer dang /_/phal chen rgyal dang gzi brjid mtha' yas dang /_/don gyi blo gros sman pa'i rgyal po 
[\[97b.6\]]dang /_/tha ba spangs dang rims med legs byin dang /_/grags byin me tog byin dang skyes bus byin/_/rdo rje sde dang phal chen byin pa dang /_/zhi ba'i blo gros spos kyi glang po dang /_/sred med bu dang des pa mi tshugs pa/_/nyi zla glog gi tog dang mchod pa dang /_/
[\[97b.7\]]dpal sbas dang ni ye shes nyi ma dang /_/don grub lhun po brtsegs dang dgra 'dul dang /_/pad ma dang ni dgra bcom grags pa yin/_/ye shes 'gros dang nyon mongs bral ba dang /_/'dam bu dang ni spos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yul 'khor rangs/_/lha grags srid 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]mtha' gzigs dang zla ba dang /_/sgra gcan dang ni rin chen zla ba dang /_/seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang ni bsam gtan dgyes/_/rdzogs ldan rnam rol yon tan rin chen dang /_/dgra bcom grags pa pad ngos mdzod spu ldan/_/spobs pa grags 
[\[98a.2\]]pa rdo rje nor bu dang /_/tshe dpag med dang nor bu bkod pa dang /_/dbang chen yon tan 'byung gnas lhun po grags/_/'od zer bcu pa ma smad glang po'i 'gros/_/yid du 'thad pa rin chen zla ba dang /_/zhi ba rab gsal rgyal po kha lo sgyur/_/dga' ba'i dbang 
[\[98a.3\]]phyug gtsug na rin po che/_/bsnyengs bral rin chen snying po zla ba'i zhal/_/dri ma med grags zhi ba'i gzi brjid dang /_/dga' tog sgra gcan lha dang na tshod bzang /_/lha dag dga' dang rin chen phung po dang /_/mdzes par gshegs dang seng ge'i phyogs pa dang /_/
[\[98a.4\]]shin tu mthor gshegs skye dbang blo gros bzang /_/'jig rten 'od dang rin chen gzi brjid dang /_/skal ldan shing rta kun rgyal dga' ba bkod/_/stegs mdzad dang ni spos glang blo 'od 'phro/_/ri bo'i rgyal mtshan dang ni spos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_/chos brtan dang ni gzi 
[\[98a.5\]]brjid drag shul can/_/chos kyi nor bu bzang byin bde gshegs zla/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang seng ge'i zla ba dpal/_/legs par skyes dang thub pa med pa'i tshogs/_/grags pa'i bshes gnyen bden pa zhes bya dang /_/dka' thub chen po lhun po'i 'od 
[\[98a.6\]]zer dang /_/yon tan brtsegs pa mchod grags chos grags dang /_/sbyin 'od glog 'byin bden par gsung ba dang /_/'tsho byed na tshod bzang po legs tshogs can/_/rnam nges blo gros srid mtha' nor bu'i spos/_/rgyal bas dgyes dang seng ge'i 'od zer dang /_/
[\[98a.7\]]rnam par snang mdzad grags mchog thugs rab gzhungs/_/nor bu zla ba drag shul 'od zer dang /_/brtul zhugs thub med 'gros mchod nor bu'i tshogs/_/'jig rten bla ma glang chen seng ge dang /_/zla ba rin chen 'od zer sgra gcan sbed/_/yon tan rgya mtsho 'od zer ldan 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]pa dang /_/rab tu zhi stabs 'jig rten bzang po dang /_/mya ngan med pa shugs bcu stobs dgyes dang /_/mthu yi dpal dang mthu thob mthu chen dang /_/yon tan snying po bden par spyod pa dang /_/dge mchog rgyal po skar rgyal 'od zer che/_/glog gi 'od dang yon tan 
[\[98b.2\]]rgya chen dang /_/rin po che dang dpal 'od bdud 'dul dang /_/go bgos seng ge'i phyag dang me tog bzang /_/rin chen mthon po dang ni rgya mtsho dang /_/sa 'dzin don blo mnga' ba yon tan bsags/_/yon tan tshogs dang rin po che yi me/_/'jig rten 'das dang 
[\[98b.3\]]'jig rten zla ba dang /_/dbyangs snyan tshangs pa'i tog dang tshogs chen gtso/_/seng ge'i stabs dang drag shul byin pa dang /_/chos kyi dbang phyug gzi 'od 'od zer che/_/rin chen grags pa tshogs can gsal ba dang /_/grags pa mtha' yas 'od zer don yod dang /_/
[\[98b.4\]]lha yi drang srong skye dbang dge 'dun brtan/_/phyogs bzang tog dang yul 'khor me tog dang /_/chos kyi blo gros rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs/_/legs bsams grags pa snang ldan lha tshogs dang /_/yon tan bsrungs don blo gros bsnyengs pa med/_/grogs 
[\[98b.5\]]brtan dang ni 'od gnas mtshungs pa dang /_/nor zhabs thar pa'i gzi brjid ngos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_/blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang ni kun du gzi brjid dang /_/ye shes mchog ma dang ni tshangs par gnas/_/bden pa gsung dang blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]stobs byin dang /_/seng stabs me tog tog 
[\[98b.6\]]dang shes 'byung gnas/_/me tog byin dang yon tan snying po dang /_/rin chen grags pa grags pa rmad byung dang /_/mi tshugs bsnyengs med nyi ma'i 'od dag dang /_/tshangs gshegs lha yi mthu rtsal ye shes dgyes/_/lha bden nor bu'i snying po yon tan grags/_/
[\[98b.7\]]ye shes dpal dang bcings pa med pa dang /_/brtul shugs brtan dang lha yi gzi brjid dang /_/tshangs thub dal bzhud brtul zhugs dka' thub dang /_/'od zer phung po dang ni gzi brjid che/_/tsam pa ka dang dga' mdzad tshogs can bzang /_/dbang po'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]bcu pa dgyes chen yin/_/sna ma'i me tog 'od dang tshogs can 'od/_/skrun mdzad mdangs 'gro don legs nges pa dang /_/khyu mchog dang ni lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od zer che/_/bsam pas byin pa dang ni bsod nams 'od/_/rin chen dbyangs dang rdo rje'i sde 
[\[99a.2\]]dang ni/_/'byor ldan seng ge'i stobs dang dri med spyan/_/'od srung dang ni blo gsal ye shes 'gros/_/gzi brjid drag shul 'od zer chen po dang /_/nyi ma'i 'od dang dri ma med pa'i 'od/_/gzi brjid rnam 'byes khengs med sbrang rtsi'i zhal/_/zla 'od glog 'byin rab zhir 
[\[99a.3\]]gshegs pa dang /_/mi 'khrugs pa dang dgra bcom grags pa dang /_/chos kyi yon tan zhing bzang bkod rgyal po/_/mngon par 'phags dang sbyin bsreg 'od 'phro dang /_/pad dpal rin chen bkod dang shin tu bzang /_/rin chen mchog dang thugs ni shin tu 
[\[99a.4\]]gzhungs/_/rgya mtshos byin dang tshangs pa'i tog dang zla gdugs 'od 'phro dang /_/dri med rgyal po ye shes grags pa kun rgyal yon tan 'od/_/sgra grags zla rgyal pad ma'i 'od zer brtul zhugs bzang po dang /_/sgron rgyal glog gi tog dang 'od zer rgyal po skar mkhan 
[\[99a.5\]]dang /_/grags pa rdzogs ldan pad ma'i snying po rgyal dang spyan mdzes dang /_/rnyog pa med don drag shul sde dang bsod nams gzi mthu rtsal/_/thogs med blo dang sgra gcan lha dang shes phung kha lo sgyur/_/skye dbang mtshungs dang me tog tog dang sgra gcan 'dzin sman chen/_/
[\[99a.6\]]rgyu skar rgyal po sman rgyal bsod nams glang po gcod mdzad dang /_/rnam grags rgyal po nyi 'od chos mdzod blo gros bzang /_/yon tan dbang mtshungs rdo rje'i sde dang shes rab brtsegs pa dang /_/legs gnas blo sbyangs tshangs dbyangs yon tan mchog dang 'brug sgra 
[\[99a.7\]]dbyangs/_/mngon shes tog dang tog 'od dge ba tshangs pa skyes mchog dang /_/spyan sdug pa dang klus byin bden pa'i tog dang brgyan pa dang /_/zhum pa med dbyangs rin chen 'od dang tshangs byin seng ge dang /_/'od zer sna tshogs ye shes dpa' bo pad phung me tog 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]rgyas/_/mthu rtsal stobs dang bsod nams phung po gzugs mchog skar mkhan dang /_/zla sgron gzi brjid phung po byang chub rgyal po mi zad pa/_/mngon rtogs spyan dang yan lag rgyas dang yul 'khor shes rab mchog_/gzi brjid tshim mdzad shes rab byin 
[\[99b.2\]]dang mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/_/chags pa med mdzod gtso bos byin dang gtso bo shes mthu rtsal/_/'od 'phro dbang po shugs 'chang skar rgyal 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]grags pa byin/_/gzugs bzang rgyal po don grub seng ge'i sde dang nor lha'i bu/_/grags rgyal 
[\[99b.3\]]rgya chen snying po bsod nams 'od zer smrang 'don pa/_/sgron rgyal ye shes brtsegs dang lha mchog dang ni sa bdag dang /_/grol brnyes gtsug gi gser dang sgra gcan bzang po thub par dka'/_/thub gsal zla ba'i 'od zer gser gyi 'od dang legs byin lha'i/_/
[\[99b.4\]]yon tan dbang po chos gdugs bsod nams lag dang chags med dang /_/ye shes gya nom blo zhib gzi byin thams cad pa rtsi sman/_/rnam grol tog dang 'od mdzod ye shes rgyal po 'jigs mdzad dang /_/chu bo spong dang thogs med grags pa bden phung dbyangs snyan dang /_/
[\[99b.5\]]ri dbang mtshungs dang chos brtsegs thar pa'i gzi brjid legs mdzad dang /_/rab zhi'i sku dang yid 'ong gsung blo sbyangs dang chu lha dang /_/'gros mchod seng ge'i logs dang chos kyi mthu rtsal skal bzang po/_/mi 'khrugs mdog dang gzi brjid rgyal po rtogs mdzad 
[\[99b.6\]]spyan legs dang /_/don gnas blo dang snang ba'i 'od zer spos gzi'i kun dga' mdzad/_/don yod gshegs dang khro ba bcom dang gzugs mchog legs gshegs dang /_/rab sbyin grags dang 'od gtsang lha yi nyi ma shes rab byin/_/mnyam gzhag bdag nyid gzi 
[\[99b.7\]]mdangs rgyal rigs skal ldan shing rta dang /_/gser mchog rnam grol gtsug dang chos ldan dang ni spos gnas dang /_/dregs spangs ye shes mdzod dang tshangs par gshegs dang tsan dan dang /_/mya ngan med dang seng ge'i 'od zer yul 'khor tog pad snying /_/gzi 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]brjid mtha' yas lha 'od shes rab me tog mkhas pa dang /_/ye shes 'byor ldan tshangs dbyig phyag na rin chen dbang ldan dang /_/rdzogs par gsung dang mchog gsung mchod 'os skar rgyal nyi ma dang /_/'dam brgal ye shes brnyes dang grub pa rma bya chos 
[\[100a.2\]]sbyin dang /_/phan bzhed ye shes ldan grags 'od zer dra ba rnam bcom dang /_/bai dUr+ya snying me tog lha rgyal zla ba dran 'od dang /_/dge ba'i 'od dang yon tan mchog ma kun gyi 'od/_/rin po che yi dpal dang skyes bu zla ba dang /_/sgra gcan bdud rtsi'i 'od dang 'jig rten 
[\[100a.3\]]dag gi mchog_/skar 'od zhi stobs bcu pa ye shes rgya mtsho yin/_/ri dbang rab zhi yon tan mthu stobs lha dbang dang /_/dbyangs snyan ngos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang ni don la gnas pa dang /_/yon tan gzi brjid dpal dang mkhyen ldan zla med dang /_/bcu pa nga ro dpag med 
[\[100a.4\]]rgyal ba zhes kyang bya/_/'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]shin tu thugs gzhungs don dgongs gti mug bral/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad 'phags mchog tu mdzes par gshegs/_/zhi ba'i don dang skyon med blo dbyangs dge ba dang /_/pad ma'i mdzod dang bcu pa 'od zer bzang po yin/_/
[\[100a.5\]]spobs pa'i mchog dang stegs bzang po dang tshogs dbang dang /_/bsnyengs pa dang ni bral ba ye shes bzhed pa dang /_/bde gshegs spobs pa'i spyan dang blo yi mchog ma dang /_/zla ba rin chen zla 'od dang ni bcu pa bsnyengs med yin/_/gzigs pa che dang tshangs pa'i 
[\[100a.6\]]dbyangs dang dbyangs bzang dang /_/shes rab chen po'i stegs dang blo gros zla med dang /_/rdo rje mkhregs dang byang chub blo gros ljon shing dbang /_/gdangs snyan pa dang bcu pa bsod nams stobs kyang yin/_/mthu yi dpal dang 'phags pa dgyes dang mthu stobs dang /_/
[\[100a.7\]]skar ma la ni dgyes dang sprin gyi rnga sgra dang /_/spyan sdug zhal dang ye shes bzang ldan 'byor ldan dang /_/yon tan phung po dang ni bcu pa gsal ba yin/_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan ye shes nga ro nam mkha' dang /_/mchod sbyin nga ro shes rab rnam 'god nga ro dang /_/yon tan 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]'od zer gzi brjid drang srong dbang po dang /_/blo ldan spobs pa'i tshogs dang bcu pa mchod sbyin bzang /_/zla ba'i zhal dang shin tu gzigs dang rdul bral dang /_/yon tan tshogs dang tog ldan bsod nams rgyal mtshan dang /_/yul 'khor spobs pa dang ni rin chen 
[\[100b.2\]]rab sbyin dang /_/zla ba dgyes pa dang ni bcu pa seng ge'i stobs/_/dbang sgyur rgyal po dang ni bdud rtsi gsal ba dang /_/bsam gtan snyoms dang 'khrug med dri ma rab zhi dang /_/phyogs ma bslad dang mdzes pa dang ni zhal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_/shugs gnas ye shes 
[\[100b.3\]]ldan dang bcu pa gsung dbang yin/_/gzi brjid chen po blo gros zab mo bdud rtsi dang /_/chos kyi stobs dang mchod par ldan dang me tog 'od/_/khams gsum dag gi mchod gnas sgra gcan nyi ma'i snying /_/lha yis mchod pa bcu pa thar pa'i rgyal mtshan yin/_/
[\[100b.4\]]dge ba'i gtsug dang bdud rtsi'i 'od dang rdo rje dang /_/brtan pa dang ni rin chen phung po mdzes gshegs dang /_/nyi ma lta bur gshegs pa dang ni dag pa'i 'od/_/yon tan gtsug dang bcu pa dpal ni rdzogs pa dang /_/seng ge'i stabs dang gyen du 'phags pa 
[\[100b.5\]]me tog byin/_/'od 'gyed pa dang pad ma dang ni ye shes dgyes/_/bkod pa mdzes dang gti mug med par gnas pa dang /_/rma med pa dang bcu pa tog gi rgyal mtshan yin/_/bde bar dgongs dang gti mug med rgyal cho ga mkhyen/_/dag pa'i rgya mtsho dang ni rin chen mnga' 
[\[100b.6\]]dang mi dma' ba/_/skye bo dga' mdzad rma bya'i nga ro ma zhum dang /_/bcu pa srid pa'i sred pa dri ma spangs pa yin/_/spyod pa'i stegs dang lha mang dag gis snyan bsgrags pa/_/rin po che yi stabs dang phyag na pad bsnams dpal/_/dgra las rgyal dang 'byor ldan grags pa 
[\[100b.7\]]yul 'khor bzang /_/me tog 'od dang bcu pa seng ge'i nga ro yin/_/zla ltar shar dang 'joms pa'i mchog dang mi g.yo dang /_/phan ldan gshegs dang bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal po dang /_/dbyangs kyis bskul dang gau ta mi dang mdangs stobs dang /_/blo gnas 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]rang bzhin dang ni bcu pa zla ba bzang /_/byang chub yan lag me tog bkra shis legs ston dang /_/ye shes gzi brjid stobs dang dge ba'i sgron ma dang /_/mthu rtsal brtan po lha yi sgra dang rab zhi dang /_/nyi ma'i zhal dang bcu pa thar pa'i brtul zhugs 
[\[101a.2\]]yin/_/tshul khrims 'od dang brtul zhugs gnas pa rdul med dang /_/snying po 'phags dang mig sman 'phel bar mdzad pa dang /_/spos 'od dus mkhyen 'od dang dran pa'i dbang po dang /_/thogs med rgyal mtshan bcu pa byang chub mchog bgrod yin/_/spyod gsal 
[\[101a.3\]]rin chen dgyes dang chos dbang phyug_/lha thams cad pa bshes gnyen chen po dang /_/bshes gnyen bzang po rab tu zhi ba'i stabs/_/bdud rtsi bdag po bcu pa lhun po'i 'od/_/'phags pas bstod dang snang ldan gzi brjid 'bar/_/snang ba gzigs dang legs 
[\[101a.4\]]spyad rnam smin dang /_/legs dgyes mya ngan bral dang rin chen 'od/_/spyod par ldan dang bcu pa bsod nams stobs/_/yon tan rgya mtsho rmad byung nga rgyal spong /_/bdud brlag mdzad dang bag chags rgal stabs dang /_/mi phyed blo mnga' rgya mtsho dag mdzad dang /_/
[\[101a.5\]]tshogs can grol rgyal bcu pa dga' ba'i 'od/_/byang chub rgyal mtshan ye shes rin chen dang /_/shin tu bsil ba tshangs rgyal ye shes dgyes/_/rdzu 'phrul tog skye dbang mtshungs sa dbang phyug_/nyi ma dgyes dang bcu pa sgra gcan zla/_/me tog 'od dang sman bdag 
[\[101a.6\]]mdangs mnga' dang /_/bsod nams dgyes dang dga' stobs dbyangs snyan dang /_/chos kyi dbang phyug tshangs dbyangs spyod bzang dang /_/bcu pa rgyal ba 'khrul pa med pa'i blo/_/dbyangs chen snyan par grags dang tog ldan dang /_/gzi brjid rnam grags 
[\[101a.7\]]'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang /_/ljon pa gti mug rab zad dpag med dang /_/zla bzang bcu pa spobs pa mtha' yas tog_/brtul zhugs bstar dang mchod gnas mya ngan rgal/_/dge dgyes 'gro ba'i blo gros dgyes par gshegs/_/zhabs mdzes ud pal dul 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]gnas me tog dang /_/bcu pa spobs pa mtha' yas 'od zer yin/_/drang srong gsal ba yon tan brtson 'grus snying /_/lha bdag rin chen mtho gsal skal shing rta/_/bsod nams blo gros sbyin sreg 'od 'phro dang /_/bcu pa yon tan mtha' yas gzi brjid phung po 
[\[101b.2\]]yin/_/seng ge'i stabs dang mi g.yo rab gsal dang /_/'od spyod glu dbyangs glu dbyangs 'khor lo 'dzin/_/dbyig mchog 'jig rten dga' ba chos zla dang /_/bcu pa dga' ba mtha' yas grags zhes bya/_/sprin tog shes rab 'gros dang spos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[101b.3\]]dang /_/nam mkha'i dbyangs dang lha dang lha rgyal dang /_/nor bu gsal dang nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sgron ma dang /_/bcu pa rin chen nga ro'i dbyangs zhes bya/_/skye dbang rgyal po sgra gcan sbed pa dang /_/dge mdzad seng blo rin chen grags pa dang /_/don mdzad mdzad 
[\[101b.4\]]mtha' gzigs dang srid me tog_/mdzod pu bcu pa spobs pa mtshungs med rgyal/_/ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro seng mche ba/_/mdzes gshegs bsod nams sgron ma bkra shis ldan/_/yul 'khor mya ngan med blo sems blo ldan/_/chos sgron spyan dang bcu pa shin 
[\[101b.5\]]tu gzigs/_/shugs 'dor stobs chen shes rab me tog dang /_/brtan pa'i dbyangs dang bde ldan don gsung dang /_/dgyes pa gsal ba seng ge'i zhal gtsug phud/_/bcu pa seng ge zhes bya snang mdzad 'gyur/_/bskal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di la sangs rgyas gang de 
[\[101b.6\]]dag_/de dag gi ni mtshan rnams bsgrags pa rnams/_/'bras bu mya ngan 'das shes bya ba gang /_/nyan pa de dag 'di la rmongs mi 'gyur/_/mkhas pa bag yod ldan pas gus bgyis te/_/rgyal ba 'di dag gi ni mtshan rnams nyon/_/de dag gi ni mtshan rnams 
[\[101b.7\]]legs thos nas/_/ngan song sdug bsngal phyir zhing myongs mi 'gyur/_/tshul khrims gnas pa sdom pa'i rjes 'thun zhing /_/thos la mos pas rtogs dang ldan pa rnams/_/zab mo'i bzod pa yongs su rdzogs byas nas/_/'jig rten mgon kun de dag gis ni 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]mthong /_/gang zhig mi shes bskal pa bye bar ni/_/sdig pa'i las byas las 'bras rnam smin kun/_/des ni zad byas rgyal ba de dag gi/_/mtshan rnams bzung nas kyang ni rgyal bar 'gyur/_/mdo sde khri phrag du mar 'jug pa dang /_/ting 'dzin rdzu 
[\[102a.2\]]'phrul so sor yang dag rig_/sgra skad du ma rtogs dang ye shes dag_/ting nge 'dzin 'di las ni btsal bar bya/_/'tsho ba dag pa g.yo ni med pa dang /_/rnam smin shes dang phrag dog med pa dang /_/bsdu ba dang ni gzungs la brtson pa yis/_/ting 'dzin 'di ni 
[\[102a.3\]]rab tu shes par bya/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni legs lags te/_lha dang mi rnams dang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang 
[\[102a.4\]]po la bde bar gyur pa de dang /_ma 'ongs pa na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thos na yang phyir zhing /_'dun par 'gyur ba dang /_dam pa'i chos la ches khyad par du 'phags par smon par 'gyur ba dang /_phyir zhing snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba'i slad du/_bskal pa 
[\[102a.5\]]bzang po'i sangs rgyas de dag gi yul dang /_rigs dang /_'od dang /_yab dang /_yum dang /_sras dang /_rim gro pa dang /_mchog gi zung dang /_bzang po'i zung dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sku tshe'i tshad dang /_dam pa'i chos gnas 
[\[102a.6\]]pa dang /_sku gdung 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig 
[\[102a.7\]]dang bshad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig skyes pa'i yul ni rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer bzang po zhes bya'o/_/gdung ni kA sh+ya pa'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad gcig go/_/yab ni mchod sbyin zhes bya'o/_/skyed pa'i yum ni tshangs rgyal zhes bya'o/_/sras ni bla ma 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni blo rdzogs zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni dge slong mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni bsnyen pa zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni dge slong bzhi khri'o/_/gnyis pa la ni bdun khri'o/_/'dus pa gsum 
[\[102b.2\]]pa la ni nyan thos drug khri'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bzhi khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub skyes pa'i yul ni grong khyer lnga pa zhes 
[\[102b.3\]]bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad phyed do/_/yab ni mes byin zhes bya'o/_/yum ni bla ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni bkra shis ldan zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mchog ma zhes bya'o/_/
[\[102b.4\]]rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rgyal zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni dge slong bdun khri'o/_/gnyis pa la ni drug khri'o/_/'dus pa gsum pa la ni dge slong lnga khri'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung 
[\[102b.5\]]ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung skyes pa'i yul ni tshe ta na zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni rgyang grags gcig go/_/yab ni tshangs byin zhes bya'o/_/yum ni nor bdag ma zhes bya'o/_/sras 
[\[102b.6\]]ni ded dpon zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni kun gyi bshes gnyen zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ba ra dwA dza zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni skar rgyal zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni dge slong nyi khri'o/_/gnyis pa la ni khri brgyad stong ngo /_/gsum 
[\[102b.7\]]pa la ni khri drug stong ngo /_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo nyi khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nga skyes pa'i yul ni ser 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]skya'i gnas zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/gdung ni gau ta ma'o/_/'od ni 'dom gang ngo /_/yab ni zas gtsang ma zhes bya'o/_/yum ni sgyu 'phrul zhes bya'o/_/sras ni sgra gcan 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni kun dga' bo zhes bya'o/_/shes 
[\[103a.2\]]rab can rnams kyi mchog ni nye rgyal zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni pang nas skyes zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgya'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga brgya'i bar du gnas so/_/lo lnga brgya'i bar du ni dam 
[\[103a.3\]]pa'i chos ltar bcos par snang ngo /_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa skye ba'i yul ni rgyal po'i pho brang grong khyer tog gi blo gros zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad gcig go/_/yab ni tshangs 
[\[103a.4\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya'o/_/yum ni tshangs bdag ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni bsod nams stobs zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni rgya mtsho zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes 'od ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni brtson 'grus brtan zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa 
[\[103a.5\]]dang po la ni nyan thos dgra bcom pa dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba phrag drug go/_/gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba phrag bzhi'o/_/gsum pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba phrag gnyis so/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri'i 
[\[103a.6\]]bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge skye ba'i yul ni grong khyer me tog lha zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad gcig go/_/yab ni seng ge stag ces bya'o/_/
[\[103a.7\]]yum ni dga' ba'i nga ro zhes bya'o/_/sras ni stobs chen zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni des pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes brtsegs pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni sprin ldan zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni ther 'bum mo/_/gnyis 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu'o/_/gsum pa la ni dung phyur phrag brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab gsal skye ba'i yul ni rgyu skar can zhes bya'o/_/rigs 
[\[103b.2\]]ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad lnga'o/_/yab ni legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o/_/yum ni me tog ces bya'o/_/sras ni dus rig ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dpa' ba'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bkra shis zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[103b.3\]]can rnams kyi mchog ni 'brug sgra zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos bye ba phrag 'bum mo/_/gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba phrag dgu'o/_/'dus pa gsum pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba phrag brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag dgu'o/_/
[\[103b.4\]]dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri lnga stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa skye ba'i yul ni grong khyer me tog bla ma zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad gcig go/_/yab ni lhun chen zhes bya'o/_/
[\[103b.5\]]yum ni sna ma'i me tog 'od ces bya'o/_/sras ni rin chen mchog ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mchog gi dam pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rnam par nges pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mthus byin zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa 
[\[103b.6\]]dang po la ni nyan thos khri'o/_/gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag bzhi'o/_/'dus pa gsum pa la ni dgra bcom pa dung phyur phrag lnga'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[103b.7\]]gshegs pa me tog skye ba'i yul ni pad ma dkar po zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad do/_/yab ni dus mchog ces bya'o/_/yum ni me tog ces bya'o/_/sras ni skye ba'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni byang chub dga' ba zhes 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni chos stobs zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mi tshugs pa zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos ther 'bum phrag drug cu'o/_/gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag gsum dang bye ba phrag lnga'o/_/
[\[104a.2\]]gsum pa la ni dung phyur phrag gsum dang bye ba phrag bzhi'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo lnga khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gnyis pa skye ba'i
