[\[124b.5\]]tu mthor gshegs kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mchog tu bzang zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze dpag tshad drug pa'i 'od/_/kun tu khyab pa yab ni legs yid gzhungs/_/de'i yum bsod nams ldan yin sras po ni/_/mu stegs bzang po stobs can rim gro pa/_/
[\[124b.6\]]legs par sems zhes bya ba shes rab can/_/kha lo sgyur dga' zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por dgra bcom bye ba phrag_/dgu bcu rtsa bzhi gnyis par bye ba gsum/_/gsum par tshogs pa bye ba brgyad cu tham/_/mi rnams dag gi tshe tshad lo stong yin/_/mya 
[\[124b.7\]]ngan 'das nas dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs stong phrag drug cu tham par gnas/_/dpag tshad gnyis pa'i mchod rten gcig 'byung la/_/gdugs ni bye ba dag gis kun tu khyab/_/mi yi mchog ma bdag po skar rgyal gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rin chen sgron zhes bya/_/de 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od/_/dpag tshad brgyad yod yab ni mu stegs bzang /_/gzugs bzang yum yin sras ni drang srong yin/_/chos 'dzin dbyangs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa yang yin/_/rin chen dga' zhes bya ba shes rab can/_/brtan 
[\[125a.2\]]pas byin zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por dri gsum bral ba'i tshogs/_/bye ba sum cu rtsa drug gnyis par yang /_/sum cu rtsa lnga gsum par sum cu bzhi/_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag bdun cu bdun/_/skyes mchog yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam 
[\[125a.3\]]chos lo bye drug cu gnyis su gnas/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten gcig 'byung la/_/rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya yis brgyan par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ru [{]rings [,]ring [}]skye ba yi/_/yul ni dpal ldan gsal ba zhes kyang bya/_/de'i rigs rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi 
[\[125a.4\]]tshad/_/dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis 'byor ldan yab/_/yon tan mtha' yas yum yin sras po ni/_/byang chub dga' yin dpal can rim gro pa/_/so [{]rings [,]ring [}]zhes ni bya ba shes rab can/_/sna ma'i me tog 'od ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por nyan thos bsam 
[\[125a.5\]]gtan pa/_/stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa drug gnyis par yang /_/sum khri lnga stong gsum par drug khri yod/_/de tshe mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri yin/_/rkang gnyis mchog ma mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs bye bar gnas/_/de yi sku gdung dag kyang 
[\[125a.6\]]rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag sum cu lnga/_/gang zag mtshungs med yon tan grags pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rin chen sgron zhes bya/_/'dren pa'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni legs pa'i lha/_/shin tu mdzes zhes 
[\[125a.7\]]bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po rin chen drang srong rim gro pa/_/spobs dga' zhes bya shes rab can gyi mchog_/ye shes dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog_/'dus pa dang por bye ba brgya phrag drug_/gnyis par bdun yod gsum par bye ba brgyad/_/sku tshe lo grangs 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]stong phrag nyi shu gcig_/mya ngan 'das nas dam chos lo lngar bsgyur/_/rkang gnyis mchog ma mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag dgu bcu drug_/gsung rab dag ni 'di 'drar 'gyur ba ste/_/skye bo su yang ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[125b.2\]]'od ldan nyi zla yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'byor pa'i sgra zhes bya/_/de rigs rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yab ni zla ba yin/_/tog gi 'od ces bya ba de yum yin/_/sras po legs sems tshogs can rim gro pa/_/srid mthar byed ces bya ba shes rab 
[\[125b.3\]]can/_/me tog 'od ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por dgra bcom tshogs bye ba/_/gnyis par bye lnga gsum par bye ba bcu/_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag bdun cu drug_/'dren pa mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bye ba phrag gnyis bar du gnas/_/
[\[125b.4\]]de yi sku gdung dag kyang rgyas 'gyur la/_/phyogs rnams mchod rten 'bum phrag dgu bcu dgu/_/mchod rten re rer gdugs ni stong stong yod/_/rgyal ba nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'od zer bcu zhes bya/_/de rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag 
[\[125b.5\]]tshad brgyad cu rtsa brgyad skye dbang yab/_/de'i yum gser mdog ces ni bya ba yin/_/mchod pa sras yin lhun po rim gro pa/_/bsod nams 'byung gnas zhes bya shes rab can/_/bzang po dga' zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por dgra bcom dge slong 
[\[125b.6\]]tshogs/_/khri phrag bdun cu rtsa drug gnyis par yang /_/khri phrag brgyad cu gsum par khri dgu bcu/_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag dgu bcu gnyis/_/rkang gnyis mchog ma mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs bye bar gnas/_/mchod rten gcig tu zad la 
[\[125b.7\]]gdugs kyi grangs/_/stong phrag brgyad cus dpag tshad bzhir yang khyab/_/mi yi 'dren pa skar mkhan zhes bya ba'i/_/skye yul de tshe dga' bas lta zhes bya/_/de bzhin gshegs rigs rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni legs pa'i lha/_/bsod 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]nams blo gros zhes bya skyed pa'i yum/_/de'i sras skye dbang mchog ma rim gro pa/_/lha dga' zhes ni bya ba shes rab can/_/rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog ma legs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/'dus pa dang por nyan thos ther 'bum phrag_/khri phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'byung 
[\[126a.2\]]bar 'gyur/_/de yi phyin chad nyan thos tshogs mtha' yas/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs bye ba yin/_/'dren pa yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba gsum du gnas/_/mi yi 'dren pa'i mchod rten gcig 'byung la/_/gdugs ni brgya phrag nyi 
[\[126a.3\]]shu gnyis kyis khyab/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i tog dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba'i rgyud ces bya/_/de'i rigs rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin/_/de yi yum ni pad ma dkar zhes bya/_/mdzes pa 
[\[126a.4\]]zhes bya de yi sras po yin/_/gzi brjid 'od 'phro zhes bya rim gro pa/_/mya ngan med pa'i ri bo shes rab can/_/dge ba'i dpal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por nyan thos drug stong yod/_/gnyis par lnga stong gsum par bzhi stong yod/_/tshe tshad lo grangs 
[\[126a.5\]]stong phrag bdun cu gcig_/mya ngan 'das nas de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs bye ba phyed dang gnyis su gnas/_/rgyal ba de yi sku gdung rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag dgu bcu gnyis/_/mi yi bdag po dus mkhyen rgyal po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mthong 
[\[126a.6\]]na dga' zhes bya/_/de bzhin gshegs rigs bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug yod yab ni lhas byin yin/_/de yi yum ni ma smad pa zhes bya/_/sras po sprin yin dpal ni rim gro pa/_/'bar ba zhes bya mkhas pa'i mchog ma ste/_/bsam gtan stobs zhes bya ba rdzu 
[\[126a.7\]]'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por dgra bcom zag zad pa/_/nyon mongs med pa bye ba nyi shu gnyis/_/gnyis par nyi shu gsum yod gsum par yang /_/gnyis yod mi rnams tshe tshad lo lnga brgya/_/'khor ba 'jig mdzad mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs nyis 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]stong bar du gnas/_/de yi sku gdung ril gcig mchod rten gcig_/gser gyi srog shing dpag tshad gcig tu 'phags/_/srid mthar mdzad pa dpal gyi snying po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni skye bo dga' zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze 'od ni dpag tshad gcig_/de yi yab ni 
[\[126b.2\]]zla ba'i stobs zhes bya/_/u be zhes bya yum yin zla ba sras/_/brtson 'grus bde ba'i dbang po rim gro pa/_/nor gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya shes rab can/_/bsam gtan dbang phyug zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgongs pa dri ma med pa'i dge slong dag_/'dus pa dang por lnga 
[\[126b.3\]]khri bzhi stong yod/_/gnyis par drug khri gsum par brgyad khri yod/_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag lnga bcu yin/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs 'bum du gnas/_/rkang gnyis mchog ma de yi mchod rten yang /_/gcig 'byung dpag tshad bzhi tsam khor yug tu/_/gdugs 
[\[126b.4\]]bkab dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas khyab/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' gzigs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' bas mthong zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dpag tshad dag_/sum cu gsum yod yab ni rnam par gnon/_/de yi yum ni zla ba'i 'dab ldan 
[\[126b.5\]]ma/_/sras po rje btsan sbed pa rim gro pa/_/skye ba'i 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa'i mchog_/rlung ltar 'gro zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por dge slong brgyad khri yod/_/gnyis par dgu khri gsum par bye ba yod/_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag brgya yang yin/_/mya 
[\[126b.6\]]ngan 'das nas dam pa'i chos rnams kyang /_/lo grangs bye ba'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom mi mnga' ba/_/de yi sku gdung rnams kyang rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag dgu bcu gcig_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi 'od 
[\[126b.7\]]dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni sman ces bya ba yin/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gnyis yod bde ba'i dbang po yab/_/de yi yum ni yan lag dga' zhes bya/_/sras po stobs brtan chos ni rim gro pa/_/nor lha zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/snyan 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]par sems zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/de yi 'dus pa dang por dgra bcom pa/_/nyon mongs zad pa brgyad cu gnyis par yang /_/nyis 'gyur gsum pa dag tu sum 'gyur yod/_/de yi sku tshe lo grangs nyis stong yin/_/rgyal ba de ni mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/
[\[127a.2\]]dam chos lo grangs stong phrag bcur yang gnas/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten gcig 'byung la/_/gdugs grangs brgya phrag drug cu gnyis kyis khyab/_/'jig rten mgon po gser gyi ri bo de'i/_/skye ba'i yul ni dregs par byed ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 
[\[127a.3\]]'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gnyis yod yab ni gsal ba yin/_/de yi yum ni dge mchog ma zhes bya/_/shin tu bkra shis sras chos rim gro pa/_/chos 'phags zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mi yi tog ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por dgra bcom pa yi tshogs/_/
[\[127a.4\]]stong phrag sum cu dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'dus pa gnyis par nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod/_/'dus pa gsum par tshogs pa nyi shu yod/_/de yi sku tshe lo grangs dgu stong yin/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis tham par gnas 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[127a.5\]]de yi sku gdung rnams kyang rgyas par 'gyur/_/spyan dang ldan pa seng ges byin pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rin chen mchog ces bya/_/mgon po'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug cu rtsa lnga chos ldan yab/_/yum ni zla ldan sras ni rin po che/_/rim gro pa ni 
[\[127a.6\]]glog 'gyu zhes kyang bya/_/de tshe mkhas gyur dga' ba blo zhes bya/_/dga' chen zhes bya de yi rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por yang srid zad pa yi/_/dge slong tshogs pa 'bum phrag bzhi bcu yod/_/'dus pa gnyis par 'bum phrag bzhi bcu gnyis/_/'dus pa 
[\[127a.7\]]gsum par 'bum phrag bzhi bcu gsum/_/mi rnams tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bcu/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten gcig tu zad/_/bde gshegs gzhan gyis mi 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]thub rgyal mtshan gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni me tog ldan zhes bya/_/de'i rigs rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gcig yod yab ni tshogs dbang po/_/de'i yum lus mchog ces ni bya ba yin/_/yon tan stobs sras sgra gcan rim gro pa/_/kha lo 
[\[127b.2\]]sgyur zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/sprin po che zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por drang srong mchog dgra bcom/_/tshogs pa bye ba brgya phrag gsum yang yod/_/gnyis par gnyis yod gsum par bye brgya gcig_/de tshe mi tshe lo grangs stong yin no/_/mya ngan 
[\[127b.3\]]'das pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs sum stong bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten bye ba ste/_/sku gdung dam pa rnams kyang 'phel bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog dga' grags pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams ldan zhes 
[\[127b.4\]]bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni 'dron [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/de yi yum ni sprin ldan ma zhes bya/_/sras ni rgyal po skye ldan rim gro pa/_/tshul khrims dga' zhes bya ba shes rab can/_/bdud rtsi stobs zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[127b.5\]]'dus pa dang por bye ba phrag drug yod/_/gnyis par lnga yod gsum par gnyis yod do/_/de yi tshe na 'dren pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/_/lo grangs stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis yin/_/'dren pa yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba phrag gnyis gnas/_/
[\[127b.6\]]mchod rten 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis te/_/rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan gdugs stong dag gis khyab/_/yon tan mtha' yas brtson 'grus brtan pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' sdug ces kyang bya/_/de bzhin gshegs rigs rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gcig yod 
[\[127b.7\]]yab ni mya ngan med/_/de yi yum ni me tog ldan zhes bya/_/sras po 'byor ldan grags pa rim gro pa/_/'od byed rgyal po zhes bya shes rab can/_/legs don spyod ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dge slong tshogs pa bye brgya lnga bcu drug_/de tshe 'dus pa gnyis par lnga bcu yod/_/
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]'dus pa gsum par lnga bcu rtsa bzhi yod/_/mi rnams tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag gsum/_/mya ngan 'das nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul/_/lo grangs bye ba phrag ni bzhi bcur gnas/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten gcig byung la/_/dpag tshad gsum tsam 
[\[128a.2\]]khor yug gdugs kyis brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rdzogs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni yul [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dbus zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gcig yod yab ni sdong bu yin/_/dpe med ma zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/
[\[128a.3\]]lha dga' zhes ni bya ba sras po yin/_/bde bar 'tsho ldan zhes bya rim gro pa/_/mkhas pa tog yin glang po rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang po dag tu dgra bcom pa/_/bye ba brgya phrag nyi shu gnyis par yang /_/nyis 'gyur gsum pa dag tu sum 'gyur yod/_/mi rnams tshe 
[\[128a.4\]]tshad lo grangs stong phrag bcu/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos tshul/_/lo grangs lnga khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/de yi sku gdung rnams kyang rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag sum cu gnyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs dang bral ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul 
[\[128a.5\]]ni me tog brgyan ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad khri yod yab ni legs yid gzhungs/_/chos kyi dbang phyug ces bya de yi yum/_/sras po rnam 'phrul rgyal ni rim gro pa/_/the tsom gcod ces bya ba shes rab can/_/brtul zhugs mi g.yo 
[\[128a.6\]]ba ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por bsam gtan pa tshogs pa/_/ther 'bum khri phrag brgyad cu 'dus par 'gyur/_/gnyis par bdun cu gsum par drug cu yod/_/gzhan rnams kun tu bye brgya tshang bar 'gyur/_/mi rnams dag gi tshe tshad lo grangs ni/_/bye ba sum cu rtsa 
[\[128a.7\]]drug tham pa yin/_/dam chos brgyad 'gyur gnas shing sku gdung ni/_/ril gcig mchod rten dpag tshad lnga tsam mo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod 'os lha dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba'i blo zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od ni dpag tshad gcig_/sbyin sreg 'od 'phro 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]yab yin chos bzang yum/_/legs pa'i lha zhes bya ba sras yin no/_/snying stobs mchog ces bya ba rim gro pa/_/zla sdug ces ni bya ba shes rab can/_/thub med stobs zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por 'jigs med tshogs pa dag_/stong phrag lnga bcu 
[\[128b.2\]]rtsa drug gnyis par yang /_/drug cu gsum pa dag tu drug cu lnga/_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag nyi shu gnyis/_/sa bdag yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs stong phrag brgyad cur gnas/_/mchod rten bye ba drug cu tham pa la/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 
[\[128b.3\]]zla gam dag gis brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma chen po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba bzang zhes bya/_/de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun cu yab ni spyan legs yin/_/de yi yum ni yan lag mchog ces bya/_/sras po dbyangs 
[\[128b.4\]]snyan dge ba rim gro pa/_/don legs spyod ces bya ba shes rab can/_/drang srong byin zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul mchog_/drang srong dge 'dun bye ba brgya phrag gsum/_/gnyis par gnyis yod gsum par gcig yod do/_/de tshe mi de dag gi tshe yi tshad/_/lo grangs stong phrag 
[\[128b.5\]]brgyad cu rtsa yang drug_/de yi dam chos lo grangs bye bar gnas/_/sku gdung ril gcig mchod rten gcig 'byung la/_/dpag tshad gsum tsam khor yug gdugs stong gis/_/brgyan cing rin chen dra ba dag gis khyab/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten 'od dag 
[\[128b.6\]]gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'jig rten dga' zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze 'od ni dpag tshad gcig_/de yi yab ni bzang po dpal zhes bya/_/sna ma'i me tog dri ldan de yi yum/_/skye bo dga' ba sras me rim gro pa/_/tshogs rgyal dga' ba drang srong shes rab can/_/
[\[128b.7\]]bsnyen par grags zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/rkang gnyis mchog ma'i 'dus pa dang por ni/_/dge slong stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu tham/_/'dus pa gnyis par dgu bcu rtsa brgyad do/_/gsum par 'khor ni dgu bcu rtsa yang bdun/_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag nyi shu 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]lnga/_/dam pa'i chos ni de yi lnga 'gyur gnas/_/sku gdung rgyas 'gyur mchod rten phal che ste/_/bye ba dgu bcu rtsa gnyis rgyan gyis brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos dri zhim pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni spos kyis brgyan zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od ni 
[\[129a.2\]]gling chen dag_/stong phrag gsum khyab yab ni bsod nams bzang /_/'gro ba 'dzin zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po legs mthong lhun po rim gro pa/_/gang zag mchog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/lha yis mchod ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom 'dus pa bye ba phrag 
[\[129a.3\]]bzhi yod/_/gnyis par gsum yod gsum par gnyis yod do/_/de na mi de dag gi tshe yi tshad/_/lo grangs stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa yang gnyis/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/sangs rgyas zhing du lo bye gnyis su gnas/_/mchod rten gcig 'byung dpag tshad 
[\[129a.4\]]drug tsam gyi/_/khyon kun rin po che yis khyab par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mchog 'dzin gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' bas brgyan zhes bya/_/mi mchog rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs te/_/'od ni rgyang grags gsum yod me tog yab/_/de yi yum ni bde 
[\[129a.5\]]bar byed ces bya/_/sras po 'byor ldan 'brug sgra rim gro pa/_/de tshe grags mchog ces bya shes rab can/_/'od byed ces bya rdzu 'phrul ldan pa yin/_/dgra bcom 'dus pa bye ba brgya phrag gnyis/_/de tshe 'dus pa gnyis par de lnga bsgyur/_/gsum par tshogs pa bye stong bcu 
[\[129a.6\]]gsum yod/_/de tshe sku tshe lo grangs bye ba gsum/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs lnga brgyar gnas/_/de yi sku gdung ril gcig mchod rten yang /_/dpag tshad gnyis pa gdugs ni stong phrag brgyas/_/brgyan cing rin chen me tog dag gis gang /_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[129a.7\]]pa mun dang bral ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams ldan zhes bya/_/de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu bzhi drang srong chen po yab/_/shin tu bkra shis zhes bya yum yin no/_/sras po chos smra ngos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/dpal bzang zhes bya 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]mkhas pa chen po ste/_/yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por bye ba dgu bcu gnyis/_/'dus pa gnyis par bye ba bdun cu yod/_/gsum par bye ba bdun cu rtsa drug yod/_/sku tshe lo grangs lnga brgya tham pa yin/_/'jig rten rnam par 'dren 
[\[129b.2\]]pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag bzhi bcu drug tu gnas/_/de yi sku gdung rnams kyang rgyas 'gyur la/_/rgyal mtshan bzang po bye ba brgyad cus gang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'gram pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dge dang ldan zhes bya/_/de'i 
[\[129b.3\]]rigs rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu gnyis yab ni legs yid gzhungs/_/bde 'od ces bya yum yin sras po ni/_/yon tan rgyal mtshan bden pa rim gro pa/_/chos 'dod ces ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'gro ba'i mchod rten zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[129b.4\]]drang srong yid zhi dge 'dun 'dus pa rnams/_/stong phrag brgyad cu dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs bdun khri'i bar/_/gnas par 'gyur ro sku gdung 'phel bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bsod 
[\[129b.5\]]nams snying po yin/_/de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun cu yab ni legs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/rin chen gtsug tor zhes bya yum yin no/_/ri mchog sras yin rgyal ni rim gro pa/_/shes rab sgron ma zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/gtsug na nor bu zhes 
[\[129b.6\]]bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por srid pa zad pa dag_/ther 'bum yod do gnyis par lnga yang yod/_/gsum pa dag tu ther 'bum phrag kyang dgu/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs stong yang yin/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs stong 
[\[129b.7\]]phrag bcur yang gnas/_/rin chen bdun po kun gyi rgyus byung ba/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag bcu yang 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyon rab zhi ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' bar byed ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu bcu gnyis yod 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]'byor ldan yab/_/de yi yum ni bzang ldan ma zhes bya/_/dbyangs snyan sras po gsal ba rim gro pa/_/chos dpal 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/don smra zhes ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por rdzu 'phrul stobs can dag_/dgra bcom stong phrag drug 
[\[130a.2\]]cu rtsa gsum yod/_/gnyis par drug cu rtsa gnyis tham par yod/_/'dus pa gsum par drug cu rtsa yang gcig_/de tshe lo ni stong phrag dgu bcu drug_/de srid dus su dam pa'i chos ni lo/_/bye phrag gnyis gnas ston pa mya ngan 'das/_/sku gdung ril gcig mchod rten 
[\[130a.3\]]gcig byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'chang ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bzang dang ldan zhes bya/_/de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu drug yab ni tshangs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/me tog can zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po zlas byin rgyal dbang rim 
[\[130a.4\]]gro pa/_/ye shes 'od gsal zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/'od po che zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por dgra bcom ther 'bum dgu/_/gnyis par brgyad yod gsum pa dag tu'ang brgyad/_/de tshe sangs rgyas mchog ma'i sku tshe'i tshad/_/lo grangs stong phrag 
[\[130a.5\]]bdun cu rtsa drug yin/_/bde gshegs yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs bye bar gnas/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu dgu/_/rin po che yi gdugs kyis brgyan par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi yi zla ba yi/_/skye 
[\[130a.6\]]ba'i yul ni dga' ba [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]zhes bya/_/de'i rigs bram ze 'od ni dpag tshad gcig_/bde bar gshegs pa'i yab ni bzang po yin/_/sprin ldan ma zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po legs mthong lhun po rim gro pa/_/rin chen mchog ma shes rab gtam ldan te/_/
[\[130a.7\]]'dzam bu'i chu bo zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom bye ba stong phrag bcu yod de/_/gnyis par brgyad yod gsum par dgra bcom pa/_/de dag bye brgya lnga bcu rtsa lnga yod/_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag brgya drug cu/_/bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba gnyis su gnas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten bye ba bdun cu drug_/'jig rten gsum du sil snyan brgya yang grags/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gzigs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni skyed par ldan zhes bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od 
[\[130b.2\]]kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod bsod nams bzang po yab/_/de yi yum ni snyan par smra zhes bya/_/sras po chos bzang zla ba rim gro pa/_/shes rab mthar phyin zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/gtam ldan gtso bo zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por rga nad sel ba po/_/
[\[130b.3\]]dgra bcom bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu yod/_/'dus pa gnyis par bye ba brgyad cu yod/_/gsum par tshogs pa bye ba brgyad cu bdun/_/mi rnams tshe tshad bye ba phrag brgya yin/_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba brgyad du gnas/_/ston pa mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten dag_/bye ba 
[\[130b.4\]]stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gsum 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu brgyan pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mchod pa'i rten zhes bya/_/rgyal ba de'i rigs bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun yod yab ni lha bzang yin/_/gzi ldan ma ni yum yin sras po ni/_/mya ngan med pa 
[\[130b.5\]]thub med rim gro pa/_/gzhan 'joms pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/nga ro snyan zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por srid pa mthar byed pa/_/zhi bar song ba bye ba bdun cu gnyis/_/gnyis par bye ba bdun cu rtsa gcig yod/_/gsum par nga rgyal gcogs pa bdun cu yod/_/
[\[130b.6\]]'jig rten mkhyen pa'i sku tshe'i tshad dag ni/_/lo grangs stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu yin/_/mya ngan 'das nas dam chos lo grangs dag_/bye bar gnas 'gyur sku gdung dbyer med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i 'od skye ba'i/_/yul ni me tog legs rgyas gzi brjid yin/_/
[\[130b.7\]]de'i rigs rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni zla bzang yin/_/de yi yum ni rin chen zla zhes bya/_/sras po skal 'dod tog ni rim gro pa/_/sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/skye bo dga' zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por drang srong dgra 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]bcom pa/_/dge slong bye ba stong phrag dgu yod do/_/gnyis par brgyad yod gsum par bdun yang yod/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs bye ba yin/_/bde gshegs mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bye ba gsum du nyams med gnas/_/mchod rten bye 
[\[131a.2\]]ba stong phrag dgu bcu dgu/_/'byung bar 'gyur la cod pan dag gis brgyan/_/sangs rgyas ri bo brtsegs pa'i tog dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni tsan dan zhes kyang bya/_/de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun cu yab ni na tshod bzang /_/me tog mchog ces bya ba yum 
[\[131a.3\]]yin no/_/sras po 'od 'chang chos mchog rim gro pa/_/chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/'od 'gro zhes ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por lus ni sil ba po/_/bye ba stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bzhi 'byung /_/gnyis par gsum yod gsum par gnyis 'byung ngo /_/
[\[131a.4\]]sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag bdun cu yin/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan par mdzad pa po/_/de ni mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag dgu bcu drug gnas shing /_/mchod rten dbyer med pa ni gcig cig 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas 
[\[131a.5\]]kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni me tog ldan zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu gnyis yod bsod nams bzang po yab/_/bsod nams ldan pa yum yin sras po ni/_/sA la'i dri ldan byang chub rim gro pa/_/smra ba 'joms byed ces bya mkhas pa ste/_/brtul 
[\[131a.6\]]zhugs brtan zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por gang dag dgra bcom pa/_/bye ba dgu bcu rtsa bzhi tham pa yod/_/gnyis par gsum yod gsum par bzhi yod do/_/de yi sku tshe lo grangs brgyad khri yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag bcu 
[\[131a.7\]]yi bar du gnas/_/mchod rten bye ba dgu bcu rtsa drug ste/_/thams cad rin chen dra bas rnam par brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshims sbyin skye ba'i yul/_/me tog rnam par brgyan zhes bya ba yin/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/khri brgya sum cu 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]gnyis yod legs skyes yab/_/sA la'i 'od ces bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po legs ldan 'od 'phro rim gro pa/_/dpal rgyal zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'od byed sbyin zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por skye ba 'joms byed pa/_/dgra bcom stong phrag sum cu 
[\[131b.2\]]rtsa gnyis yod/_/'dus pa gnyis par nyi shu rtsa dgu yod/_/gsum par nyi shu rtsa brgyad tham pa yod/_/de na mi rnams dag gi tshe yi tshad/_/lo grangs stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis yin/_/mya ngan 'das nas dam chos sum 'gyur gnas/_/bde gshegs sku gdung ril 
[\[131b.3\]]gcig mchod rten gcig_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni zla ba can zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gnyis yod yab ni mya ngan med/_/bsod nams ldan zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po legs 
[\[131b.4\]]mthong mchog ma rim gro pa/_/blo sbyin zhes bya shes rab gtso bo ste/_/seng ge dga' zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por skye rga 'chi ba dag_/mthar byed bye ba brgya phrag dgu bcu yod/_/'dus pa gnyis par dgu bcu rtsa lnga yod/_/gsum par tshogs pa 
[\[131b.5\]]dgu bcu rtsa drug tham/_/mi rnams dag gi tshe tshad lo brgya yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag bdun cu'i bar du gnas/_/de yi mchod rten dpag tshad gcig pa gcig_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye dbang mtshungs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 
[\[131b.6\]]rnam par bltas zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad sum cu yab ni spos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/rin chen ldan zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po sdug dga' 'dun pa rim gro pa/_/rgya mtsho'i blo zhes bya ba shes rab che/_/'od byed sbyin zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[131b.7\]]dang por tshogs pa ther 'bum dgu bcu yod/_/bar ma gnyis par tshogs pa brgyad cu brgyad/_/tha mar ther 'bum brgyad cu rtsa drug yod/_/de dag tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag brgya/_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba bcur yang gnas/_/mchod rten bye ba dgu bcu rtsa brgyad de/_/rin chen 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]rgyal mtshan gdugs dang 'phan gyis brgyan/_/mchod rten re re'ang gdugs ni bye ba yod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stabs kyis gshegs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni me tog 'od ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze 'od zer dra ba'i tshad/_/dpag tshad nyi shu gnyis yod ri dbang 
[\[132a.2\]]yab/_/rgyal de'i yum ni dga' ba zhes kyang bya/_/de yi sras po yon tan sems zhes bya/_/srid pa'i bshes gnyen de yi rim gro pa/_/nye sde shes can rkang stobs rdzu 'phrul can/_/mi mchog de yi 'dus pa dang por ni/_/dgra bcom brgya phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis yod/_/gnyis 
[\[132a.3\]]par brgya phrag sum cu rtsa gsum yod/_/gsum par tshogs pa phal cher ther 'bum yod/_/mi yi 'dren pa de yi sku tshe'i tshad/_/lo grangs stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi yin/_/de tshe de yi sum 'gyur dam chos gnas/_/de tshe sku gdung ril gcig mchod rten gcig_/'jig 
[\[132a.4\]]rten rnam par 'dren pa blo gnas kyi/_/skye yul rin chen gzi brjid dga' zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od ni dpag tshad gcig_/bsod nams dpal yab dga' ba bzang mo yum/_/sras po chu lha dga' ba rim gro pa/_/bsod nams sgron zhes bya ba shes rab can/_/
[\[132a.5\]]'brug sgra rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog ma yin/_/'dus pa dang por dgra bcom bye ba brgya/_/'dus pa gnyis par yang srid zad pa dag_/brgyad cu gsum par drug cu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de na mi de dag gi tshe yi tshad/_/lo grangs stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin/_/mya ngan 'das nas 
[\[132a.6\]]de na dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag lnga brgya'i bar du gnas/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag lnga yod de/_/thams cad rin chen gdugs kyis mdzes khebs byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs mdzes pa dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rin chen phung po yin/_/rigs 
[\[132a.7\]]ni rgyal rigs 'od gzi dpag tshad ni/_/bye ba tham pa yab ni sgra gcan lha/_/me tog can zhes bya ba de yi yum/_/de'i sras rgyal ba blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/lha yis mchod ces bya ba shes rab can/_/ma ga d+ha zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom bye ba brgya phrag sum 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]cu gsum/_/gnyis par chags med sum cu rtsa gnyis yod/_/gsum par zad med sum cu rtsa gcig yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag nyi shu lnga/_/'jig rten rnam 'dren mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs bye bar gnas/_/mchod rten dpag tshad phyed 
[\[132b.2\]]pa bye ba phrag_/brgyad cu rin chen bdun yin rgyas par 'gyur/_/'jig rten dag gi mgon po gtso bo yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams ldan zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gnyis yod yab ni zla [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/de yi yum ni 
[\[132b.3\]]me tog bsags zhes bya/_/sras po mdzes pa dpal can rim gro pa/_/blo sbyangs zhes ni bya ba shes rab can/_/mtha' yas dpal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por dbang du gyur pa rnams/_/stong phrag brgyad cu gnyis par dgu bcu yod/_/gsum 
[\[132b.4\]]par dri ma med pa bye ba brgya/_/sku tshe lo grangs bye ba gnyis kyang yin/_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba bcur yang gnas/_/rgyang grags sum cu pa yi mchod rten gcig_/rin chen bdun po dag gis de rgyas shing /_/gdugs grangs bye ba brgya phrag bdun cu gnyis/_/
[\[132b.5\]]bde bar gshegs pa shin tu 'phags dpal gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni ye shes ldan zhes bya/_/bde gshegs de'i rigs bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/rgyang grags bcu yod bshes gnyen bzang po yab/_/skye bo'i mchod rten zhes bya skyed pa'i yum/_/sras po mchog ma mig 
[\[132b.6\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa ni mkhas pa ste/_/bla ma zhes ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por dgra bcom bye phrag bcu/_/gnyis par bcu gnyis gsum par brgyad yod do/_/de na mi rnams dag gi tshe yi tshad/_/lo grangs stong phrag 
[\[132b.7\]]nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bye bar gnas shing sku gdung 'phel/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag dgu yod de/_/thams cad rgyang grags bdun pa rin chen gdugs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra dag gi/_/skye 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]ba'i yul ni sA la'i bdag ces bya/_/bde gshegs rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/rgyang grags dgu yod yab ni lus mdzes yin/_/smra ba grub ces bya ba de yi yum/_/sras po nad med tog ni rim gro pa/_/shes rab gdon mi za ba mkhas pa ste/_/chos 
[\[133a.2\]]dga' zhes ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dang por tshogs pa stong phrag drug cu yod/_/gnyis par bdun cu gsum par brgyad cu yod/_/dgra bcom kun kyang nga rgyal dregs las grol/_/sku tshe ring ste lo grangs stong phrag bcu/_/rdul dang rnam bral mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam 
[\[133a.3\]]pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong du gnas/_/de tshe bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten gcig_/dpag tshad bdun tsam khor yug rin chen gang /_/bde bar gshegs pa rnam rol ldan pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams dpal zhes bya/_/bde gshegs rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/
[\[133a.4\]]rgyang grags gsum yod gzi brjid bzang po yab/_/bsod nams nga ro zhes bya yum yin no/_/sras po lha sdug zhi ba rim gro pa/_/chos 'phags zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/smra ba'i mchog ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por 'dod chags rdul rnams ni/_/ma 
[\[133a.5\]]lus bcom pa stong phrag brgyad cu yod/_/'dus pa gnyis par bdun cu rtsa brgyad yod/_/gsum par gti mug spangs pa bdun cu drug_/de tshe mi rnams dag gi tshe yi tshad/_/lo grangs stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bzhi yin/_/nyis 'gyur dag tu de yi dam chos gnas/_/drang 
[\[133a.6\]]srong chen po'i mchod rten gcig cig 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu yi 'od dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni glang pos mthong zhes bya/_/de'i rigs rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun cu yab ni yul 'khor bzang /_/shin tu dga' zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/
[\[133a.7\]]sras po 'phan byed lhun po rim gro pa/_/rgyu yi stobs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/drang srong byin dga' zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por rgyal ba'i dgra bcom pa/_/tshogs pa bye ba stong phrag bdun cu gnyis/_/gnyis pa dag tu bdun cu rtsa gcig yod/_/gsum par bye ba 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]stong phrag bdun cu yod/_/de tshe skad cig de la sku tshe'i tshad/_/lo grangs brgyad brgya'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/dam chos lo grangs brgya phrag bcu gnyis gnas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten gcig cig 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ri bo yi/_/skye 
[\[133b.2\]]ba'i yul ni ri yis mthong zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag_/dpag tshad sum cu yab ni legs yid gzhungs/_/yon tan bsags zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po bde stobs drag shul rim gro pa/_/blo rdzogs 'od zer zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/
[\[133b.3\]]glog mchog ces bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom 'dus pa stong phrag drug cu drug_/gnyis par rdul med drug cu rtsa yang lnga/_/gsum par stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi yod/_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag brgyad cu yin/_/bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/
[\[133b.4\]]dam chos lo grangs bye ba gsum du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten khri phrag bcu yod de/_/mu tig dra ba mchog dag sbyangs pas khyab/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu ni dga' ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni me tog 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag 
[\[133b.5\]]tshad drug cu rtsa bdun 'phros par 'gyur/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'gros zhes bya ba yab yin la/_/gzugs bzang mo zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/de yi sras po klu zhes bya ba ste/_/gling 'gro zhes bya de yi rim gro pa/_/'gro ba'i gzi brjid ces bya mkhas pa ste/_/dga' chen zhes 
[\[133b.6\]]ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dang por tshogs pa bye ba stong phrag yod/_/gnyis par brgyad yod gsum pa dag tu lnga/_/sku tshe lo grangs dag ni sum khri yin/_/dam chos lo grangs stong phrag bdun cur gnas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten stong phrag brgyad cu ste/_/rgyal mtshan mthon 
[\[133b.7\]]po dpag tshad gcig pas brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi dbang phyug gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' bas mthong zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad sum cu yab ni legs skyes yin/_/zla 'od yum yin sras po 'dzam bu 'gro/_/
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]legs gtso zhes ni bya ba rim gro pa/_/shes rab 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/dpal dregs zhes ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dang por dgra bcom bye brgya dgu bcu yod/_/gnyis par brgyad cu gsum par bdun cu drug_/de tshe mi rnams dag gi tshe yi 
[\[134a.2\]]tshad/_/lo grangs stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yin/_/de yi dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs ni/_/'bum phrag brgya yi bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag bdun cu gcig_/gser mchog dam pa dag gis legs par spras/_/bde bar gshegs pa 
[\[134a.3\]]shin tu grags pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dag par dga' zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga yod yab ni tshogs dbang yin/_/gser ldan ma zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po skal 'dod nyi ma rim gro pa/_/chos 'od ces ni bya ba 
[\[134a.4\]]mkhas pa ste/_/thos pa rtogs zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang po dag tu dgra bcom pa/_/bye ba stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa drug yod/_/gnyis par bzhi bcu rtsa gsum tham pa yod/_/gsum par nyi shu rtsa gsum tham pa 'byung /_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag gnyis 
[\[134a.5\]]kyang yin/_/ston pa mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khrir gnas 'gyur sku gdung gcig_/dpag tshad lnga pa'i mchod rten gcig cig 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi lha de yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'od po che zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin 
[\[134a.6\]]te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad nyi shu gnyis yod legs bzang yab/_/zla 'od ces ni bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po dbang 'od dga' bo rim gro pa/_/seng ge'i blo gros zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/srid pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por rdul rnams bcom pa 
[\[134a.7\]]po/_/bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gsum yod/_/'dus pa gnyis par dgu bcu rtsa gnyis yod/_/'dus pa gsum par dgu bcu rtsa gcig yod/_/sku tshe lo grangs dag ni dgu stong yin/_/dam chos lo grangs stong phrag bdun cur gnas/_/de yi sku gdung dag kyang rgyas 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu tham/_/mtshungs pa med pa yon tan phreng ldan gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba sdug ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bdun cu rtsa drug yab ni na tshod bzang /_/skal ldan nga ro zhes bya yum yin no/_/de 
[\[134b.2\]]tshe rgyal ba'i sras po tshangs bdag yin/_/blo rdzogs zhes ni bya ba rim gro pa/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mkhas pa bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rdzu 'phrul can/_/dang por tshogs pa dgra bcom bye ba stong /_/gnyis pa dag tu'ang de snyed yod gyur la/_/'dus pa gsum pa dag tu lnga 'gyur yod/_/
[\[134b.3\]]sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag brgyad cu yin/_/mtshungs med mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bye ba phrag ni gsum du gnas/_/mchod rten bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu ste/_/thams cad gser dag gis ni khyab par 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pa klu yi lag pa yi/_/
[\[134b.4\]]skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba zhes kyang bya/_/mgon po'i rigs ni bram ze dag tu 'gyur/_/gling phran stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams/_/de yi 'od kyis rtag pa dag tu khyab/_/de yi yab ni tshogs can 'od yin la/_/de yi yum ni spos ldan ma zhes bya/_/sras po des pa 'od 'phro rim 
[\[134b.5\]]gro pa/_/ye shes rnam lta zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/bden par smra zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por bye ba bcu drug yod/_/gnyis par [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gsum par nyi shu yod/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs stong phrag bcu/_/bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/
[\[134b.6\]]dam chos lo grangs bye ba phrag brgyad gnas/_/de yi mchod rten bye ba dgu bcu dgu/_/bde bar gshegs pa mig ni brgyan pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mchod rten mchog ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun yod yab ni grogs bzang yin/_/
[\[134b.7\]]yum ni dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya/_/sras po shugs dga' grol ba rim gro pa/_/chos mthong zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mnyam par bzhag ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por dgra bcom bye stong brgya/_/'dus pa gnyis par dgra bcom tshogs pa dag_/bye 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]stong dgu bcu gsum par brgyad cu yod/_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag nyi shu drug_/sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba'i bar du gnas/_/mchod rten bzang po grangs ni bye ba ste/_/rin chen brgya yi dra bas rnam par 
[\[135a.2\]]spras/_/sangs rgyas legs par sbyangs pa'i blo dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bcu ldan zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gnyis yod yab ni dbang chen yin/_/tog 'od ces bya yum yin sras po ni/_/skye ba'i khyu mchog rgyan ni 
[\[135a.3\]]rim gro pa/_/sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/tshig gi kha lo sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis yod/_/gnyis par de na sum cu yod par 'gyur/_/'dus pa gsum par nyi shu rtsa yang brgyad/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs stong 
[\[135a.4\]]yin no/_/sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs stong phrag bcu bzhir spyod/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i sku gdung mchod rten ni/_/gcig yin dpag tshad rangs pa gcig tsam mo/_/sangs rgyas zil gyis gnon pa ye shes kyi/_/skye ba'i 
[\[135a.5\]]yul ni dga' ba 'dod ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gnyis yod yab ni mthu ldan yin/_/brtul zhugs bden pa yum yin sras po ni/_/drang srong sdug pa dga' bo rim gro pa/_/chos kyis rnam par rol pa mkhas pa ste/_/zla ba'i 
[\[135a.6\]]'od ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por bye phrag bcu gsum yod/_/gnyis par bcu gnyis gsum pa dag tu brgyad/_/sku tshe lo grangs brgya phrag gnyis kyang yin/_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba stong du gnas/_/de yi sku gdung dag kyang rgyas 'gyur la/_/
[\[135a.7\]]mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag sum cu gnyis/_/mchod rten kun kyang dpag tshad gnyis pa ste/_/thams cad gdugs grangs stong phrag brgyad cus khyab/_/sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi spyan dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams 'od gsal yin/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bzhi yod yab ni brtul zhugs shes/_/chos gnas zhes bya yum yin sras po ni/_/rgyal bar dga' ba snying po rim gro pa/_/me tog tshogs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/glang po'i 'gros zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom bye ba 
[\[135b.2\]]brgya phrag drug cu drug_/gnyis par lnga yod gsum pa dag tu bdun/_/thugs rje can gyi sku tshe'i tshad dag ni/_/lo grangs stong phrag nyi shu rtsa yang gsum/_/bdud rnams brlag mdzad de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag bcu yi bar du gnas/_/mchod rten 
[\[135b.3\]]bye ba phrag bcu tshang ba ste/_/me tog rgyan dang rta babs dag gis brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gsung ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mdangs dang ldan zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni bsod nams bzang /_/
[\[135b.4\]]lha 'od ces ni bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po don chen 'od ldan rim gro pa/_/ye shes yang dag 'phags pa mkhas pa ste/_/srid par 'gro zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom bye ba brgya phrag nyi shu ste/_/gnyis par bye ba brgya ni tshang bar yod/_/'dus pa gsum par bye ba 
[\[135b.5\]]dgu bcu yod/_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag brgyad cu yin/_/zhi bar gyur pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs stong phrag nyi shu gnyis su gnas/_/mchod rten dam pa bye ba drug cu ste/_/gser las byas pa'i rgyal mtshan dag gis gang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 
[\[135b.6\]]ma'i 'od dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni sman zhes bya ba yin/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni mig bzang yin/_/tshul khrims ldan zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po thar dga' zhi ba rim gro pa/_/nor grags zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/
[\[135b.7\]]rnyog pa med ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por bye phrag sum cu gnyis/_/'dus pa gnyis par bye phrag nyi shu gcig_/'dus pa gsum par bye phrag sum cu tham/_/sku tshe lo grangs 'bum phrag drug cu yin/_/dam chos lo grangs sa ya phrag gcig dang /_/'bum 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]phrag gsum gyi bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag dgu yod de/_/gser las byas pa'i rgyal mtshan dag gis gang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa des pa'i blo dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba sdug ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi 
[\[136a.2\]]tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni khyad par 'phags/_/bde ldan ma zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/gang po sras yin skar ma rim gro pa/_/lhag shes zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bdud spong zhes ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por phal chen bye ba brgya/_/gnyis par 
[\[136a.3\]]brgyad cu gsum par drug cu yod/_/mi rnams tshe tshad lo grangs stong phrag bcu/_/de yis lnga 'gyur du ni dam chos gnas/_/'dzam bu'i gling na sku gdung rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag brgyad cu brgyad/_/mchod rten re re dag gi thad na yang /_/mar me bye ba brgya phrag nyin 
[\[136a.4\]]mtshan 'bar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mchod pa zhes kyang bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa bzhi grogs bzang yab/_/bzang ldan ma zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po 'jigs med 'od ldan 
[\[136a.5\]]rim gro pa/_/gsang sngags gdon mi za ba mkhas pa ste/_/bde ba'i 'od ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/shin tu dga' ba'i blo can dgra bcom pa/_/bye ba lnga bcu rtsa drug gnyis par lnga/_/'dus pa gsum par lnga bcu rtsa yang bzhi/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs bye ba yin/_/bde 
[\[136a.6\]]bar gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba'i bar du gnas/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag sum cu gnyis/_/rin chen pad ma dag gis rnam par spras/_/bde bar gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni me tog rdzogs zhes bya/_/rgyal 
[\[136a.7\]]ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga yod yab ni na tshod bzang /_/gang gA'i mchog ces bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po 'od mtha' gang po rim gro pa/_/gti mug rnam par sel ba mkhas pa ste/_/nyon mongs spong zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/shes ldan 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]srid las rgal ba dgra bcom pa/_/'dus pa dang por bye ba drug cu yod/_/gnyis par bdun cu gsum par brgyad cu yod/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs bye ba yin/_/mtshungs pa med pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba gsum du gnas/_/de yi mchod 
[\[136b.2\]]rten dag kyang gcig 'byung la/_/dpag tshad phyed dang gsum khyon rin chen khebs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba zhes kyang bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu gnyis yod yab ni rnam par gnon/_/
[\[136b.3\]]thams cad dga' zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po bzang grags dri med rim gro pa/_/nam mkha'i blo zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/ri bo'i 'od ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom 'dus pa bye ba dgu bcu bzhi/_/'dus pa gnyis par bye ba dgu bcu gsum/_/'dus 
[\[136b.4\]]pa gsum par bye ba dgu bcu gnyis/_/de yi sku tshe lo grangs dgu khri yin/_/srid gsum mchod pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs bye bar gnas/_/sku gdung dag kyang legs par rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba dgu bcu rtsa gnyis 'byung /_/
[\[136b.5\]]mgon po the tshom rnam par spangs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bkra shis can zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni mya ngan med/_/blo gros bzang mo zhes bya yum yin no/_/sras po rnyog med shes can rim gro pa/_/des pa'i shugs 
[\[136b.6\]]zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/rdzu 'phrul dga' zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por bye ba phrag dgu yod/_/gnyis par bye brgyad gsum par bye ba bdun/_/de yi tshe na rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tshad/_/lo grangs sum brgya dag tu 'gyur ba yin/_/rgyal ba 'gog par phyin pa'i 
[\[136b.7\]]dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyis stong bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/de yi mchod rten gcig ste rin po che/_/bdun las grub pa 'phang du dpag tshad gcig_/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten 'das pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rtag tu dga' zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]bram ze 'od dpag tshad/_/drug yod yab ni srid pa'i zla ba yin/_/tshangs 'od ces bya yum yin sras po ni/_/tshangs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gtsug phud 'phyang ba rim gro pa/_/nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/phrad med ces ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom bye ba 
[\[137a.2\]]phrag ni bcu bzhi ste/_/'dus pa gnyis par blo ldan sum cu yod/_/de tshe gsum par bye ba nyi shu yod/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs bye ba yin/_/'jig rten 'od mdzad mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba gsum du gnas/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten rin 
[\[137a.3\]]chen spras/_/grangs ni bye ba brgyad cu tshang bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas don yod rnam par gnon pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni sprin dang ldan zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od dpag tshad/_/bdun yod yab ni drang srong dbang po yin/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yum yin 
[\[137a.4\]]no/_/sras po bde 'od brtan pa rim gro pa/_/yul 'khor ye shes zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom nga med bye ba dgu bcu dgu/_/gnyis pa dag tu dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod/_/gsum pa dag tu dgu bcu rtsa drug yod/_/de'i tshe lo ni 
[\[137a.5\]]dgu khri lnga stong yin/_/bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs bye bar gnas/_/de yi sku gdung dag kyang rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag sum cu gnyis/_/bde bar gshegs pa rtogs par mdzad pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 
[\[137a.6\]]dga' ba'i sprin zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad sum cu yab ni dbang chen yin/_/rin chen dga' ba yum yin sras po ni/_/skye bo dga' ba thub pa rim gro pa/_/chos kyi stobs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mkhas pa shes rab ldan pa rdzu 
[\[137a.7\]]'phrul can/_/yid gnyis spong bar byed pa dgra bcom pa/_/'dus pa dang por bye ba brgya phrag dgu/_/gnyis par brgyad yod gsum par bdun yang yod/_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag brgyad cu yin/_/bde bar gshegs pa zad mthar phyin pa yi/_/dam chos lo grangs 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]bye ba gsum du gnas/_/sku gdung ril gcig mchod rten gcig 'byung la/_/dpag tshad gsum khyon gser gyi rgyal mtshan brgyan//_//'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu gnyis pa/_bde bar gshegs 
[\[137b.2\]]pa me tog rgyal mtshan gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mchog ma zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga yod yab ni ngo tsha shes/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo zhes bya yum yin no/_/sras po brtan ldan dga' ba rim gro pa/_/'jig rten 'od ces bya ba 
[\[137b.3\]]mkhas pa ste/_/ye shes ldan zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por bye ba bdun cu yod/_/gnyis pa dag tu sems grol brgyad cu yod/_/'dus pa gsum par bye ba dgu bcu yod/_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag dgu bcu dgu/_/mya ngan 'das nas dam pa'i 
[\[137b.4\]]chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bye ba phrag bcu'i bar du gnas/_/de yi mchod rten bzang po sku gdung bcas/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu rtsa gnyis 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' bas mthong zhes bya/_/de yi rigs ni 
[\[137b.5\]]rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu drug yab ni brtul zhugs bzang /_/sbyin la dga' zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po tsam ka 'od dbang rim gro pa/_/shes rab sgra skad ces bya mkhas pa ste/_/zla sdug ces ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom dag ni 
[\[137b.6\]]stong phrag brgyad cu ste/_/gnyis par bdun cu gsum par drug cu yod/_/mi de dag gi tshe yi tshad dag ni/_/lo yi grangs dag bye ba tshang bar 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs bye bar gnas/_/de yi mchod rten gcig 
[\[137b.7\]]'byung 'phang dag tu/_/dpag tshad gcig yod rin po che yis spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rtag tu mthong zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gnyis yod yab ni mu stegs bzang /_/'brug sgra 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]zhes ni bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po 'jam dga' 'od ldan rim gro pa/_/skar mda' 'phags zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/dpa' bar grags zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom nga med stong phrag sum cu gnyis/_/gnyis pa dag tu stong phrag sum cu 
[\[138a.2\]]gcig_/'dus pa gsum par stong phrag sum cu yod/_/de tshe sku tshe'i lo grangs drug khri yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag brgyad cu tshang bar gnas/_/de yi sku gdung dag kyang rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag 
[\[138a.3\]]bdun cu drug_/de bzhin gshegs pa don mdzad gzigs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni ud pal 'dab ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/dung phyur brgyad yod yab ni 'jigs med yin/_/dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya yum yin no/_/sras po rnam 
[\[138a.4\]]sgrogs chos ldan rim gro pa/_/'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/blo gros mchog ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom bye ba bzhi bcu rtsa gsum ste/_/'dus pa gnyis par bye ba bzhi bcu gnyis/_/'dus pa gsum par bye ba bzhi bcu gcig_/sku tshe lo grangs 
[\[138a.5\]]stong phrag bzhi bcu drug_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag brgyad cu drug tu gnas/_/sku gdung ril gcig mchod rten gcig 'byung la/_/gdugs grangs stong phrag brgyad cu dag gis khebs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa mtha' 
[\[138a.6\]]yas kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni pad ma nges zhes bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni sgyu med yin/_/bde bar sems zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po grags dga' klu ni rim gro pa/_/gdon mi za ba'i blo ni mkhas pa ste/_/dga' ba'i nga ro 
[\[138a.7\]]zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por dgra bcom bye ba phrag_/bdun cu gnyis par bye ba drug cu yod/_/gsum pa dag tu bye ba lnga bcu yod/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs drug 'bum yin/_/bde bar gshegs pa zad mthar phyin nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba gsum du 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]gnas/_/sku gdung rgyas pa'i mchod rten dung phyur bdun/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dag gis brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lha dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni ud pal brgyan ces bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gnyis yod yab 
[\[138b.2\]]ni dpa' bo yin/_/sA la'i 'od ces bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po bzang dga' rgyal ba rim gro pa/_/skar 'od ces ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gser gyi 'od ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por bye ba brgyad cu yod/_/gnyis par lnga bcu gsum par sum cu yod/_/de 
[\[138b.3\]]na mi rnams dag gi tshe yi tshad/_/lo grangs stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis yin/_/de tshe 'gog par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag dgu bcu'i bar du gnas/_/mchod rten dpag tshad gnyis kyi khyon tsam la/_/gdugs grangs bye ba phrag ni brgya yis bskor/_/de bzhin 
[\[138b.4\]]gshegs pa don gnas mkhyen pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni brgyan pa zhes kyang bya/_/de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu gnyis yab ni don gnas yin/_/zla ldan ma zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po zla sdug dga' ba rim gro pa/_/dpal rgyas zhes ni 
[\[138b.5\]]bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/brtul zhugs snying po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom bye ba nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/_/'dus pa gnyis par nyi shu rtsa yang gcig_/'dus pa gsum par nyi shu tham pa yod/_/mi yi tshe tshad lo grangs bye ba yin/_/rdul dang bral ba'i dam pa'i chos 
[\[138b.6\]]dag kyang /_/lo grangs stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur gnas/_/de yi mchod rten dpag tshad bzhi pa la/_/gdugs grangs bye ba dag gis legs par brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo ni rdzogs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams 'od ces bya/_/de'i rigs 
[\[138b.7\]]rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug yod yab ni blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/pad ma can zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po snyan dga' do shal rim gro pa/_/bsod nams yang dag 'phags pa mkhas pa ste/_/zla ba'i stobs zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]'dus pa dang por bye ba brgyad cu yod/_/'dus pa gnyis par 'jigs bral bdun cu yod/_/'dus pa gsum par bye ba phrag stong yod/_/sku tshe lo grangs stong phrag bdun cu drug_/'jig rten mkhyen pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bye ba nyi shu gsum 
[\[139a.2\]]du gnas/_/rdul bral mchod rten bye brgya drug cu bzhi/_/thams cad rgyang grags gsum gyi tshad tsam yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mdangs 'phags zhes kyang bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu bzhi 
[\[139a.3\]]yab ni zla ri yin/_/legs sems ma ni yum yin sras po ni/_/yid 'ong sdug pa yon tan rim gro pa/_/chos mthong ba zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/seng ge'i stabs zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por stong phrag sum cu yod/_/'dus pa gnyis par nyi shu rtsa 
[\[139a.4\]]brgyad yod/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs stong yang yin/_/bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas/_/dpag tshad gcig pa'i mchod rten tha dad pa/_/rin chen mchog ma sna bdun rang bzhin yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[139a.5\]]dri ma bral ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rin chen brgyan ces bya/_/de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni lha legs yin/_/rab tu zhi ldan yum yin sras po ni/_/zla sdug yon tan can ni rim gro pa/_/glang po bsgyings zhes bya ba mkhas 
[\[139a.6\]]pa ste/_/bden par smra zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom bye ba brgya phrag lnga yod de/_/gnyis par bye ba brgya phrag gnyis kyang yod/_/gsum pa dag tu bye ba brgya phrag gsum/_/sku tshe lo grangs brgyad khri bzhi stong yin/_/rkang gnyis mchog ma mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/
[\[139a.7\]]dam chos lo grangs bye ba stong du gnas/_/mchod rten gcig ste 'phang du dpag tshad gcig_/gdugs mchog stong phrag bcu yis khyab par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs lha skye ba'i yul/_/bsod nams dag gis rnam par brgyan ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/kun tu sum cu yab ni legs yid gzhungs/_/yum ni me tog 'od yin sras po ni/_/yon tan bsags pa 'jam pa rim gro pa/_/rta dbang lha zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/sgra gcan 'dzin ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/yang srid zad pa dgra 
[\[139b.2\]]ni bcom pa dag_/'dus pa dang por 'bum phrag lnga yod do/_/gnyis par drug cu gsum par bdun cu bdun/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs stong yin no/_/rgyal ba dam pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs sum stong bar du gnas/_/de yi sku gdung ril po 
[\[139b.3\]]gcig yin la/_/mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad gsum tsam 'phags/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa yi dbang phyug gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni gzi dang ldan zhes bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug cu yab ni gzugs bzang yin/_/chos kyi 'od 
[\[139b.4\]]ces bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po bde dga' dge ba rim gro pa/_/gti mug sel zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/dga' rgyal zhes ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi ste/_/'dus pa gnyis par drug cu rtsa yang lnga/_/'dus pa gsum par stong 
[\[139b.5\]]phrag drug cu yod/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs bye ba yin/_/mtshungs pa med pa bde bar gshegs pa'i chos/_/lo grangs bye ba phrag ni gsum du gnas/_/de yi sku gdung dag kyang rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag drug cu gnyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me 
[\[139b.6\]]tog spyan dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni sems dang 'brel zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/drug cu rtsa gnyis yab ni skye dbang yin/_/blo gros sems ma zhes bya yum yin no/_/sras po bde 'gro me tog rim gro pa/_/mya ngan sel zhes bya ba mkhas pa 
[\[139b.7\]]ste/_/'gro ba 'dzin ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por stong phrag drug cu yod/_/gnyis par bdun cu gsum par brgyad cu yod/_/de tshe rgyal ba de yi sku tshe'i tshad/_/lo grangs stong phrag dgu bcu dag kyang yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]grangs bye ba phrag ni gnyis su gnas/_/mchod rten bye ba phrag ni bcu yod la/_/gser gyis brgyan cing rin po che yis spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'byes pa'i sku/_/skye ba'i yul ni rin chen sna tshogs yin/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi 
[\[140a.2\]]tshad/_/dpag tshad phyed yod yab ni grags dbang po/_/rnam par snang mdzad ces bya yum yin no/_/sras po rab 'phags mu stegs rim gro pa/_/phal chen sbyin pa bden smra mkhas pa ste/_/seng ge'i nga ro zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por drang srong dgra 
[\[140a.3\]]bcom pa/_/bye ba stong phrag dag ni bcu yod do/_/gnyis par brgyad yod gsum par bdun yod do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs bye ba yin/_/sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba phrag lngar gnas/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung 
[\[140a.4\]]ril po gcig_/mchod rten dpag tshad bdun pa gcig cig 'byung /_/bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi 'od dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mdangs mthong zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga yod yab ni khyad par 'phags/_/rin chen 
[\[140a.5\]]chen mo yum yin sras po ni/_/rab 'phags ngo tsha shes pa rim gro pa/_/seng ge rnam par sgrogs pa mkhas pa ste/_/'jam pa'i 'od ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dang por bye ba dgu bcu yod/_/gnyis par brgyad cu gsum par drug cu yod/_/de na mi rnams dag 
[\[140a.6\]]gi tshe yi tshad/_/lo yi grangs ni bdun khri bzhi stong yin/_/dngos po med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs bye ba phrag ni nyi shur gnas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten sku gdung bcas pa'i grangs/_/bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 
[\[140a.7\]]gzigs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'jig rten lta zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/seng ge'i blo gros yum yin sras po ni/_/yon tan 'od yin mya ngan rim gro pa/_/mya ngan sel zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]grags chen zhes ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom bye ba bdun cu rtsa bzhi ste/_/'dus pa gnyis par bdun cu rtsa lnga yod/_/'dus pa gsum par bdun cu rtsa yang drug_/sku tshe lo grangs bye ba bdun cu yin/_/rdul dang bral ba zad mthar mdzad pa yi/_/dam chos lo grangs bye 
[\[140b.2\]]ba phrag dgur gnas/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag gsum yod de/_/gser gyis brgyan cing rin po che yis spras/_/bde bar gshegs pa yon tan 'od gsal gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni byang chub mthong zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/kun tu bye ba 
[\[140b.3\]]yab ni dgra thul yin/_/brtul zhugs drag ldan zhes bya yum yin no/_/sras po bde dga' dga' bo rim gro pa/_/lta sems zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'od po che zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom bye ba brgya phrag gcig tshang ste/_/gnyis par dgu bcu rtsa drug 
[\[140b.4\]]gsum par yang /_/brgyad cu yod de de tshe sku tshe'i tshad/_/'jig rten dag na de tshe lo stong yin/_/zad mthar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs dgu khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/mchod rten khyad par 'phags pa dung phyur lnga/_/nor bu rin chen mchog ma 
[\[140b.5\]]dag gis spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams tshogs zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bye ba gsum yod yab ni rgya mtsho yin/_/me tog ldan zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po tshogs dga' ni 
[\[140b.6\]]khum rim gro pa/_/seng ges bltas zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/shin tu dga' zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu ste/_/gnyis par bdun cu gsum par sum cu yod/_/mi de dag gi tshe yi tshad dag ni/_/lo grangs stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa drug 
[\[140b.7\]]yin/_/zad mthar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs stong phrag bcu ni tshang bar gnas/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu dgu/_/rin chen dag gis rnam par spras par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od skye ba'i yul ni gtsug na rin po che zhes 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad cu'o/_/yab ni skal ldan 'dod ces bya'o/_/yum ni grags lha zhes bya'o/_/sras ni snyan par smra zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 'gro ba dga' zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 
[\[141a.2\]]tshogs can gtso bo zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni gdul dka' zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos tshogs pa dung phyur phrag dgu'o/_/gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag gcig dang bye ba phrag gnyis so/_/gsum pa la ni dung phyur phrag gcig dang bye ba phrag lnga'o/_/
[\[141a.3\]]sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba phrag gsum gyi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog skye ba'i yul ni sna tshogs brtsegs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/
[\[141a.4\]]'od ni dpag tshad 'bum mo/_/yab ni rgya mtsho'i blo zhes bya'o/_/yum ni rdzogs sems zhes bya'o/_/sras ni 'jig rten dga' zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni nga ro can zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni blo'i sgron ma zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 
[\[141a.5\]]gzi brjid dpal zhes bya'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag 'bum mo/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos dung phyur phrag drug go/_/gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag brgyad do/_/gsum pa la ni ther 'bum mo/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni 
[\[141a.6\]]rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten ni 'bum 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i bla ma skye ba'i yul ni me tog mchog ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug cu'o/_/yab ni bla ma zhes bya'o/_/yum ni mchog ldan ma zhes 
[\[141a.7\]]bya'o/_/sras ni gzi brjid mdzes pa zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni yon tan lhag ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bden pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'gro ba brtan zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos ther 'bum mo/_/gnyis pa la ni bye ba 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]phrag lnga'o/_/gsum pa la ni ther 'bum phrag bcu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo khri brgyad stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bzhi khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od byed skye ba'i yul ni rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni 
[\[141b.2\]]rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad khri'o/_/yab ni tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/_/yum ni dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya'o/_/sras ni glog sbyin zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dgra bcom dga' zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rnam par 'byed blo zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 
[\[141b.3\]]'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni thub med ces bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos dung phyur phrag bdun no/_/gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag brgyad do/_/gsum pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/
[\[141b.4\]]sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpag med skye ba'i yul ni blta bar bya ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad sa ya phrag gcig dang 'bum phrag gnyis so/_/yab 
[\[141b.5\]]ni bde bar 'dud ces bya'o/_/yum ni bzang sbyin ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni tshul khrims sbyin zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mnyam par sems zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jigs med ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jigs bral zhes bya'o/_/
[\[141b.6\]]'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos dung phyur phrag dgu'o/_/gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba phrag brgyad do/_/gsum pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba phrag dgu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo khri brgyad stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo khri brgyad stong gi bar du gnas 
[\[141b.7\]]so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen skye ba'i yul ni skar ma dga' zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni 'dzam bu'i gling tsam mo/_/yab ni dbyig mchog ces bya'o/_/yum ni blo gros 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]bzang mo zhes bya'o/_/sras ni bzang sbyin zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dpag med 'gro zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni zla gdugs zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mtshungs med ces bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos tshogs 
[\[142a.2\]]pa dung phyur phrag brgyad do/_/gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag brgyad dang bye ba phrag lnga'o/_/gsum pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs drug khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[142a.3\]]pa seng ge'i sku skye ba'i yul ni nyams dga' ba sdug pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni gling bzhi pa tsam mo/_/yab ni lha'i me tog ces bya'o/_/yum ni mtshungs med mnyam zhes bya'o/_/sras ni blo ldan zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni blo rdzogs zhes 
[\[142a.4\]]bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bsam pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rnam par 'byed pa'i sde zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de thams cad la yang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang 
[\[142a.5\]]lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa'i blo skye ba'i yul ni mchog bsags zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad lnga brgya'o/_/yab ni blo mchog 
[\[142a.6\]]ces bya'o/_/yum ni tshangs mchog ces bya'o/_/sras ni brtul zhugs grub ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni nor lha zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten dga' zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal brtan po zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa 
[\[142a.7\]]ni lan bcu ste thams cad la yang bye ba stong phrag bcu bcu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo drug khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dka' skye ba'i yul ni 'od ldan zhes bya'o/_/rigs 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad nyi shu'o/_/yab ni me tog sbyin zhes bya'o/_/yum ni me tog phreng zhes bya'o/_/sras ni gtsug na rin po che zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mdzod 'dzin ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni khyad par 'phags zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[142b.2\]]can rnams kyi mchog ni des pa zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos khri'o/_/gnyis pa la ni sum khri'o/_/gsum pa la ni lnga khri'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo dgu khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[142b.3\]]pa yon tan phung po skye ba'i yul ni rtag tu blta ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad sa ya phrag drug go/_/yab ni mtshon cha bzang po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni bzang sbyin ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni mya ngan med ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mya ngan dang bral ba zhes 
[\[142b.4\]]bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni legs sems zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal g.yo med ces bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan brgyad cu ste thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag brgyad brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni 
[\[142b.5\]]lo dung phyur phrag gcig dang bye ba phrag brgyad kyi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i tog skye ba'i yul ni bzang mchog ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad sa ya phrag gcig dang 'bum phrag brgyad do/_/yab 
[\[142b.6\]]ni legs bzang zhes bya'o/_/yum ni gnam mo zhes bya'o/_/sras ni srog ldan zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni blo ldan zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mig lta zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal blo gros zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan 
[\[142b.7\]]thos ther 'bum drug cu'o/_/gnyis pa la ni ther 'bum bdun cu'o/_/gsum pa la ni ther 'bum brgyad cu'o/_/bzhi pa la ni ther 'bum dgu bcu'o/_/lnga pa la ni ther 'bum brgya'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri drug stong 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]gi bar du gnas so/_/mchod rten ni brgyad khri bzhi stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu thob skye ba'i yul ni bkod pa mtha' yas zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum brgya'o/_/yab ni sa'i dbang 
[\[143a.2\]]phyug ces bya'o/_/yum ni mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni ye shes dpal zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni bsod nams 'dod ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni blo brtan zhes 
[\[143a.3\]]bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan sum cu ste thams cad la yang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri chig stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal mtha' 
[\[143a.4\]]yas skye ba'i yul ni chos kyi bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug cu'o/_/yab ni kha lo sgyur dga' zhes bya'o/_/yum ni grags sbyin ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni mtshon cha bzang po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni gnas 'phyag ces bya'o/_/shes 
[\[143a.5\]]rab can rnams kyi mchog ni blo gros 'bar ba zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni dpal 'od ces bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos drug 'bum mo/_/gnyis pa la ni lnga 'bum mo/_/gsum pa la ni bzhi 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o/_/dam 
[\[143a.6\]]pa'i chos ni lo nyi khri nyis stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba skye ba'i yul ni 'od kyis brgyan pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad dung phyur phrag gsum mo/_/yab ni dri med 'od 'phro zhes bya'o/_/
[\[143a.7\]]yum ni gzi brjid phung po zhes bya'o/_/sras ni gzi brjid sgron ma zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni yon tan gyi tshogs zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni sgrib pa med pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mchog sbyin zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]lan brgyad cu ste thams cad la yang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dung phyur phrag drug go/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba phrag brgyad kyi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[143b.2\]]pa dri med skye ba'i yul ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu'o/_/yab ni yul 'khor bzang po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni chos kyi blo gros ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni nabs so zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mchod 'os ces bya'o/_/
[\[143b.3\]]shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni thub med ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rin chen dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos ther 'bum mo/_/gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba phrag dgu'o/_/gsum pa la ni dung phyur phrag brgyad dang bye ba 
[\[143b.4\]]phrag brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad gzigs pa skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid phung po 
[\[143b.5\]]zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag gnyis dang sa ya phrag lnga'o/_/yab ni rdo rje'i sde zhes bya'o/_/yum ni rgya mtshos byin zhes bya'o/_/sras ni dga' ba'i dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni don dga' zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi 
[\[143b.6\]]mchog ni rgol ba tshar gcod ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni grags pa'i mngon par 'phags zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan nyi shu ste thams cad la yang 'bum 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri bdun stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo sum khri drug stong gi bar du 
[\[143b.7\]]gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo skye ba'i yul ni tshugs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgya'o/_/yab ni dga' ba'i 'od ces bya'o/_/yum ni bsod nams can zhes bya'o/_/sras ni mdzes 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dbyangs snyan zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yid 'ong sems pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mchog smra zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan drug cu ste thams cad la yang bye ba phrag bcu bzhi bcu 
[\[144a.2\]]bzhi'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag lnga'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bzhi khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan skye ba'i yul ni bsams bzhin ster zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bzhi khri'o/_/
[\[144a.3\]]yab ni sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni nges par dga' zhes bya'o/_/sras ni don sems zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni chos sems zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni chos can zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni zla ba'i tog ces bya'o/_/'dus pa ni 
[\[144a.4\]]lan bzhi bcu ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag bcu bcu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo ther 'bum mo/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo ther 'bum phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin 
[\[144a.5\]]gshegs pa bsod nams skye ba'i yul ni skye bos mchod ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad dgu khri dgu stong ngo /_/yab ni lha dga' zhes bya'o/_/yum ni snyan par dga' zhes bya'o/_/sras ni dga' bo zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni skye bo phal chen dga' 
[\[144a.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes lag ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni chos stobs zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos bye ba stong phrag bdun cu'o/_/gnyis pa la ni bye ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa lnga'o/_/gsum pa la ni bye ba stong 
[\[144a.7\]]phrag drug cu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma skye ba'i yul ni rin po che'i mdzod ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad dgu 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]stong brgyad brgya'o/_/yab ni tsan dan ces bya'o/_/yum ni spobs ldan ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni tsam pa'i mchog ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni sbrang rtsi sbyin zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni tshig snyan ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni sems 
[\[144b.2\]]gsal zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bzhi bcu ste thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag bdun bdun no/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri nyis stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/
[\[144b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od 'phro skye ba'i yul ni don snang zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad cu'o/_/yab ni bde bar gzhol zhes bya'o/_/yum ni blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o/_/sras ni rin po che zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 'byor ldan zhes 
[\[144b.4\]]bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes mchog ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rin chen mchog ces bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bcu drug ste thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag gsum dang bye ba phrag drug drug go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo /_/
[\[144b.5\]]dam pa'i chos ni lo sa ya phrag dgu'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo yang skye ba'i yul ni rgya mtsho zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgya'o/_/yab ni legs 
[\[144b.6\]]yid gzhungs zhes bya'o/_/yum ni blo gnas zhes bya'o/_/sras ni legs 'byung zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mdzod dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes 
[\[144b.7\]]bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan dgu ste thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag gsum gsum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo dgu khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs skyes skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]dga' zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo /_/yab ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/yum ni chos ldan ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni rgyu skar rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni rnam par snang byed ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog 
[\[145a.2\]]ni 'jig rten dga' zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni thub med ces bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos ther 'bum mo/_/gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba phrag brgyad do/_/gsum pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba phrag drug go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni 
[\[145a.3\]]lo 'bum mo/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo drug khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor lha skye ba'i yul ni me tog ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa gnyis so/_/yab ni bzang po zhes bya'o/_/yum 
[\[145a.4\]]ni so [{]rings [,]ring [}]ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni zla ba zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni sbrang rtsi sbyin zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mdangs stobs zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni blo mnyam zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bcu bzhi ste thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag 
[\[145a.5\]]gcig dang bye ba phrag bzhi bzhi'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis spong skye ba'i yul ni nyams dga' 
[\[145a.6\]]yon tan can zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad bye ba'o/_/yab ni be'u dga' zhes bya'o/_/yum ni bzang ldan ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni me tog dga' zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni blo gros legs gnas zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog 
[\[145a.7\]]ni mdzes 'gro zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal mdzes pa zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan dgu ste thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag brgyad brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo dgu stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzin pa dpag med skye ba'i yul ni rtag tu mthong zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum cu rtsa drug go/_/yab ni yul 'khor bzang po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni smon sems zhes bya'o/_/sras ni lha dga' zhes
