[\[166a.2\]]mchod rten gcig_/dpag tshad brgya tsam rgyal mtshan mchog gis gang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog ni 'byin pa yi/_/skye yul rtag tu snang bar byas zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bye ba gsum yod yab ni blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/byang chub 
[\[166a.3\]]dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po blo rdzogs khyad 'phags rim gro pa/_/dga' bas lta zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs med sems zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu rtsa drug ste/_/kun la'ang yid ni yongs dag dgra bcom pa/_/'khor 
[\[166a.4\]]ni ther 'bum bdun cu drug drug yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni nyis stong yin/_/rgyal ba thar par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs drug stong bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/dpag tshad lnga pa'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gsung ba yi/_/
[\[166a.5\]]skye ba'i yul ni mchod pa'i gnas zhes bya/_/de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bye ba phrag bcu bdag nyid chen po yab/_/mchod rten grags zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po chos mchog chos ldan rim gro pa/_/bdud 'joms pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/
[\[166a.6\]]sdug bsngal sel zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs lnga ste kun la yang /_/nga med zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri sum stong yin/_/chos thob pa yi dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo 
[\[166a.7\]]grangs nyi khri chig stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bzang po ther 'bum phrag gsum 'byung /_/'jig rten dag gi mgon po 'tsho byed kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni thams cad 'byor zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]tshad gsum yod yab ni ngos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/dga' 'gro ma zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po rgyal byin lus [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/skyabs mchog rgyal po blo gros ldan pa ste/_/skar mkhan mkhas pa zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun te kun la yang /_/drang 
[\[166b.2\]]srong gti mug med par thar dga' ba/_/bye ba phrag ni drug cu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni nyis stong yin/_/'jig rten gsum las spags pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/mchod rten bzang po'i grangs ni ther 'bum phrag_/dgu 
[\[166b.3\]]bcu rtsa lnga dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa na tshod bzang po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rtag tu 'dod ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu gnyis yod yab ni mya ngan med/_/grags ldan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po dga' 
[\[166b.4\]]chen zla ba rim gro pa/_/'gros mdzes pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs med lha zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu kun la yang /_/yid gnyis dag dang bral ba'i dgra bcom kun/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs 
[\[166b.5\]]dag ni chig stong yin/_/rgyal ba 'khrug pa med par phyin pa yi/_/dam chos lo grangs sum stong bar du gnas/_/sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur mchod rten grangs/_/ther 'bum phrag gnyis sku gdung dag gis brgyan/_/bde bar gshegs pa legs pa'i tshogs 
[\[166b.6\]]can gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni gser gyi ri zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/dgu bcu gsum yod yab ni legs mchod yin/_/tshogs mkhas ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po bla ma skyon med rim gro pa/_/rnam par lta zhes bya ba shes can te/_/
[\[166b.7\]]rgya mtsho brtsegs zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs lnga ste kun la yang /_/srid pa'i sred la chags pa med gyur pa/_/skye ba'i bzlog pa dag ni khri khri yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni bzhi stong yin/_/zad mthar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]drug stong bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten bye ba nyi shu gnyis/_/rgyal mtshan dam pa brgya snyed dag gis brgyan/_/rgyal ba rnam par nges pa'i blo gros kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mchod par nges zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/
[\[167a.2\]]dpag tshad [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yab ni su me ru/_/yon tan 'dzin zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mtshan bzang legs mthong rim gro pa/_/mthu rtsal bcu ldan zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/rnam 'phrul klu zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu rtsa drug ste/_/kun la'ang lta 
[\[167a.3\]]ba'i dra bsal bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bdun bdun yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yin/_/srid mthar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bdun khri bdun stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten bdun cu rtsa bzhi ste/_/rin chen dra ba 
[\[167a.4\]]yid du 'ong bas spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' nor bu'i spos/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba dad ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bye ba yab ni dga' 'byor yin/_/yon tan mchog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po dge legs 
[\[167a.5\]]phan ldan rim gro pa/_/bdud 'joms pa ni blo gros ldan pa ste/_/blo mi 'khrug ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu ste kun la yang /_/mi 'khrugs yid ldan ri dang mtshungs pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu re re yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bye ba brgya phrag bcu/_/
[\[167a.6\]]dam chos lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong dang /_/gzhan yang dgu khri dgu stong bar du gnas/_/dpag tshad lnga pa'i mchod rten sku gdung bcas/_/gcig ste rin chen rgyal mtshan dra bas brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bas dgyes pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni sems sbyangs pa 
[\[167a.7\]]zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug yod yab ni sa ga yin/_/dgra bcom dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mchod legs gnyid sangs rim gro pa/_/phas kyi rgol ba 'joms pa mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten bkra shis pa 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu rtsa gsum ste/_/kun la'ang srid pa kun la ma chags pa/_/bye ba phrag ni gnyis gnyis yod par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs bye ba sum cu gnyis/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das kyang dam chos dag_/lo grangs bye bar the tshom med 
[\[167b.2\]]par gnas/_/mchod rten grangs ni ther 'bum phrag gnyis te/_/na bza' brgya stong snyed kyis rnam par brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni drag shul nges zhes bya/_/de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bye ba yab ni 
[\[167b.3\]]grogs bzang yin/_/don ldan nga ro zhes bya yum yang yin/_/sras po don ldan don chen rim gro pa/_/dge ba dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bdag brtags pa zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dag ni lan grangs bdun cu ste/_/thams cad la yang nga rgyal 
[\[167b.4\]]spangs pa po/_/bye ba stong phrag dag ni mtha' yang yas/_/mi tshe lo grangs chig khri bzhi stong yin/_/rgyal ba'i dam chos lo grangs chig khri dang /_/gzhan yang sum khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/mchod rten bye ba phrag ni stong snyed de/_/gser gyi rgyal mtshan dag 
[\[167b.5\]]gis 'khor bar bskor/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni grags pa tshad med yin/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bye ba yab ni lha legs yin/_/mi yis mchod ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po dga' 
[\[167b.6\]]byed brtan ldan rim gro pa/_/dpa' brtan zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mthu rtsal nor gnas pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun te dgra bcom grangs/_/bye ba phrag ni chig khri chig stong dang /_/nyis brgya drug cu dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sku tshe lo grangs nyi 
[\[167b.7\]]khri nyis stong yin/_/rgyal ba'i dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs dag_/chig khri bdun stong bar du gnas rgyal ba'i/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad gnyis pa gcig_/nor bu'i dra ba dag gis rnam par brgyan/_/tha ba med pa grags pa mchog dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]grags pa'i 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni phreng [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/me tog dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rgyal byin lha [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/srid pa g.yo bar byed pa mkhas pa ste/_/the tshom 
[\[168a.2\]]rnam par 'jig pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu rtsa drug dang /_/gzhan yang lan grangs nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/_/'dus pa kun la'ang bye ba stong stong yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri nyis stong yin/_/de yi dam chos lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/bcu bdun tshang ba'i bar du 
[\[168a.3\]]gnas par 'gyur/_/sku gdung dag ni rnam par rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten dag gi grangs ni brgya yang yin/_/mi yi 'dren pa thugs rab gzhungs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni ye shes blta zhes bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga yod yab ni 
[\[168a.4\]]sgron ma yin/_/byang chub yan lag dga' ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po shed bu dge bzang rim gro pa/_/'gro bas mchod ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/ye shes stobs mchog ldan ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu rtsa drug ste/_/'jig rten rgol ba rab 'joms 
[\[168a.5\]]g.yo med la/_/kha gsag med pa'i dgra bcom sha stag 'dus/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni khri yang yin/_/zad mthar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs chig khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten grangs ni bye ba 
[\[168a.6\]]dgur yang tshang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu zla ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mig gis mthong zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod 'od zer bzang po yab/_/grags ldan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po chos 'dod skar rgyal rim 
[\[168a.7\]]gro pa/_/'gro ba lta zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mdza' yi gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/legs rtogs sems ldan tshul khrims mtshungs pa po/_/dgra bcom bye ba phrag ni brgya brgya yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs chig khri nyis stong 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]yin/_/rgyal ba srid pa zhi bar gyur pa yi/_/dam chos lo grangs stong phrag bcu yang gnas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten drug cu rtsa gnyis te/_/gdugs grangs chig khri drug stong dag gis brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul 'od zer gyi/_/skye yul 'od ni rtag pa zhes 
[\[168b.2\]]kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/gling bzhi pa tsam brgyad yod dbyangs snyan yab/_/rgyal ldan ma ni yum yin sras po ni/_/kha lo sgyur yin dbyer med rim gro pa/_/'gros mkhas pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten pa yis bsngags pa rdzu 
[\[168b.3\]]'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad de kun la yang /_/nga med phung por 'dzin pa spangs pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bcu bzhi bcu bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/bzhi bcu rtsa drug bar du gnas par 
[\[168b.4\]]'gyur/_/sku gdung rgyas 'gyur mchod rten bzang po'i grangs/_/bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs thub med kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' bas tshim zhes bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu 
[\[168b.5\]]yin yab ni lha dbang yin/_/sa bdag ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po byams pa legs byams rim gro pa/_/blo mtshungs pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/legs nges thob ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu gcig kun la yang /_/dgra bcom 
[\[168b.6\]]bye phrag dgu bcu gnyis gnyis yod/_/lhag pa gzhan yang brgyad stong brgyad stong yin/_/mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag bdun cu yin/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/drug cu rtsa dgu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/mchod rten grangs ni bye ba phrag brgya dang /_/
[\[168b.7\]]lhag kyang rtsa lnga gser gyi rgyal mtshan can/_/'od dang ldan pa 'gro bas mchod pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni sems sbyangs pa zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu gnyis yod yab ni byams legs yin/_/blo gros grags ma yum yin sras po ni/_/
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]rin chen rin chen bzang po rim gro pa/_/brtul zhugs chen po zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/skyes mchog dam pa zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dag ni lan grangs brgyad cu dang /_/gzhan yang lhag pa nyi shu gnyis kun la'ang /_/bye ba stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[169a.2\]]brgyad yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin/_/mchod pa'i gnas kyi dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs stong du gnas shing sku gdung rgyas/_/mchod rten grangs ni brgyad khri nyis stong ste/_/rin chen spras shing 'gro ba dag gis brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[169a.3\]]pa nor bu'i tshogs skye ba'i/_/yul ni gzi byin kun las 'phags zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun cu drang srong dbang po yab/_/lha dga' zhes ni bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po lha yin lha bzang rim gro pa/_/mi yi dbang phyug ces bya mkhas 
[\[169a.4\]]pa ste/_/chags med gnas zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu rtsa drug ste/_/kun la'ang so so yang dag rig ces pa'i/_/pha rol phyin pa ther 'bum ther 'bum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/
[\[169a.5\]]bzhi bcur tshang ba'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten bye ba phrag bcu ste/_/gser gyi pad ma dag gis 'khor bar bskor/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten bla ma yi/_/skye yul bsod nams yang dag 'phags zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od 
[\[169a.6\]]dpag tshad/_/bye ba brgyad cu yab ni dpal ldan yin/_/phyogs lha zhes ni bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po pad ma blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/kun tu dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/ye shes 'od ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgya ni drug cu ste/_/kun 
[\[169a.7\]]la'ang lhag med mya ngan 'das phyin pa/_/dgra bcom bye ba brgya phrag bcu bcu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri nyis stong yin/_/'gog par phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs nyis stong bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/mchod rten dgu bcu rtsa bzhir tshang ba ste/_/
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]rin chen rang bzhin lan kan dag gis brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glang chen seng ge yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mdangs sdug pa zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod mchod sbyin bzang po yab/_/'gro dga' rgyal ba'i yum yin 
[\[169b.2\]]sras po ni/_/me tog me tog bzang po rim gro pa/_/mchod par 'os zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/lha yis phyag byas pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/shin tu nges pa'i shes rab ldan pa po/_/dgra bcom sems sbyangs bye ba stong stong yod/_/
[\[169b.3\]]mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs bye ba phrag_/lnga dag tshang ba'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung rgyas 'gyur mchod rten grangs/_/ther 'bum phrag gcig chig 'bum lnga stong yod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba skye ba 
[\[169b.4\]]yi/_/yul ni snying po rtag tu brtan zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gcig yod sA la'i dbang po yab/_/yon tan smra zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po chos sbyin chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/rab tu zhi dga' zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/
[\[169b.5\]]'jig rten mi gnas pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad de kun la yang /_/shes rab legs bsgoms pha rol phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin/_/'gro la phan phyir dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/
[\[169b.6\]]lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/mchod rten grangs ni ther 'bum phrag gnyis 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni shes rab snang zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 
[\[169b.7\]]'od dpag tshad/_/bdun cu gsum yod yab ni chu dbang po/_/dge ldan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rig dga' lha ni rim gro pa/_/blo gros mig ldan pa ni mkhas pa ste/_/yid sbyangs pa zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu rtsa drug ste/_/
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]'jig rten ma chags rnam grol thob pa po/_/'khrul med skyugs pa bor ba sha stag go/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni sum stong yin/_/rab tu zhi bar phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs sum stong tshang ba'i bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig 
[\[170a.2\]]yin te/_/dpag tshad gsum pa nor bu'i dra bas spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan sbed pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dge bas brgyan zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu gnyis yod yab ni mthu ldan yin/_/grags pa'i bla ma zhes bya yum yin no/_/
[\[170a.3\]]sras po lha dga' chos ldan rim gro pa/_/gser lta bu zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten 'od byed pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dag ni lan grangs brgyad cu dang /_/gzhan yang nyi shu rims nad med pa po/_/bye ba 'bum phrag tshang ba sha stag go/_/mi tshe lo grangs 
[\[170a.4\]]bdun khri drug stong yin/_/zhi bar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs stong phrag bcur ni tshang bar gnas/_/sku gdung rgyas 'gyur mchod rten bzang po'i grangs/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis kyang yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho yi/_/skye ba'i 
[\[170a.5\]]yul ni byang chub 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad sum cu yab ni pad ma bzang /_/pad ma can zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po pad ma pad [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/yon tan spos 'od de ni mkhas pa ste/_/kun tu gsal zhes bya ba 
[\[170a.6\]]rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgya ste kun la yang /_/rtswa shing med par mtshungs pa'i sems thob pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri brgyad stong yin/_/zad mthar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du 
[\[170a.7\]]gnas par 'gyur/_/sku gdung rgyas 'gyur mchod rten dag gi grangs/_/stong phrag brgyad cu dag ni tshang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer ldan pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'khrul pa med ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu gnyis yod 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]yab ni dge bzang yin/_/rin chen mchog yum sras po yan lag g.yo/_/yan lag sdug ldan pa ni rim gro pa/_/rab tu brgyan pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan te/_/'jigs pa med pa'i blo ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kun la yang /_/bsgoms rgyus 
[\[170b.2\]]nyon mongs thal bar rlag pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni sum khri sum khri yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/'phang du 
[\[170b.3\]]dpag tshad gcig pa gdugs kyis brgyan/_/sangs rgyas rab tu zhi ba'i stabs dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mdzes par mchod ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu gnyis yod yab ni tshangs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/mkhas blo ma zhes bya ba yum 
[\[170b.4\]]yin no/_/sras po skar mkhan skar [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/skyes pa bud med dga' ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten dad ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu drug kun la'ang /_/'jig rten dag gi mthar ni phyin pa po/_/dgra bcom dge 'dun bye ba bcu bcu 
[\[170b.5\]]yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri nyis stong yin/_/de yi dam chos lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten dag gi grangs kyang bye ba 'byung /_/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten bzang 
[\[170b.6\]]po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba 'byung zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni sman pa bzang /_/mang pos mchod ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po zla nyi rtsi sman rim gro pa/_/ye shes mchog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gti 
[\[170b.7\]]mug med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu rtsa gnyis te/_/re re kun la'ang dgra dag bcom pa'i tshogs/_/ther 'bum phrag ni lnga lnga 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/_/'gro ba'i don du dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]lo grangs stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad dgu pa rin chen bzang pos spras/_/mi yi mchog ma mya ngan med pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mya ngan 'tshang zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 
[\[171a.2\]]'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu gcig yab ni mya ngan med/_/mya ngan spong zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mdzes can sdug legs rim gro pa/_/rab tu brgyan pa shes blo can yin te/_/rnam par 'phrul pa'i sems ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs 
[\[171a.3\]]sum cu rtsa drug ste/_/'dus pa kun la'ang yid ni rab zhi ba/_/bye ba phrag ni bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni khri yang yin/_/'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/mchod rten grangs ni ther 
[\[171a.4\]]'bum phrag gnyis te/_/mu tig rgyal mtshan rin chen mchog gis spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shugs bcu pa dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mthong na mchod ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu gnyis yod yab ni stobs dbang yin/_/nga ro 
[\[171a.5\]]snyan zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po skad snyan bzang po rim gro pa/_/dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/seng ge'i glal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/ri yi rgyal po lta bur mi g.yo ba/_/bye ba phrag ni 'bum phrag re re 
[\[171a.6\]]yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/rgyal ba'i dam chos lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/bcu drug dag gi bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dpag tshad bcu pa'i mchod rten gdung bcas gcig_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs la 
[\[171a.7\]]dgyes pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba'i dbyangs zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni legs byin yin/_/dga' mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po dga' ba klu chen rim gro pa/_/'jig rten gsum du snang ba 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs pa med pa'i mchog ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu rtsa drug ste/_/rtswa shing lta bur chags pa med pa po/_/ngar mi 'dzin pa nyis 'bum nyis 'bum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/dam chos dag ni lo grangs stong du gnas/_/
[\[171b.2\]]mchod rten grangs ni bdun khri bzhi stong kun/_/lha yi lha rdzas gzhal med khang lta bur/_/gser gyi rgyal mtshan dag gis rnam par spras/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthu dpal skye ba yi/_/yul ni legs par brtan po sbed ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/
[\[171b.3\]]dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni legs yid gzhungs/_/pad ma can zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lha dbang tshogs dbang rim gro pa/_/blo sbyong ba zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'khrug pa med pa'i blo ldan rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgya rtsa bcu drug ste/_/kun la'ang bar 
[\[171b.4\]]snang mi gnas 'dra ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni stong yang yin/_/'gro la phan phyir dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs drug khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/zhi bar phyin pa'i sku gdung rgyas 'gyur la/_/rin chen mchod rten bye ba phrag gnyis 
[\[171b.5\]]'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu thob pa de yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni legs gnas mchog ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod rnam par rol pa yab/_/nges par byas zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po ma smad dul ba rim gro pa/_/
[\[171b.6\]]'gro ba dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bsod nams phung po'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/rmas pa med cing rims nad med pa po/_/dgra bcom ther 'bum phrag ni gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin/_/
[\[171b.7\]]dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/dgu bcu rtsa gnyis bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung bcas pa'i mchod rten grangs/_/bdun yod dpag tshad gcig pa gser gyis spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu ni chen po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rgyal bar dka' 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu gsum yod gzhal med khang pa yab/_/yid dga' yum yin kha lo sgyur ba ni/_/sras po shin tu bden pa rim gro pa/_/'gro sdug pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/chags pa med par gnas 
[\[172a.2\]]pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dag ni lan grangs bzhi bcu ste/_/kun la'ang sems ni zla ba nya 'dra ba/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi khri nyi khri yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri nyis stong yin/_/'gro la phan phyir dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs stong phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du gnas/_/
[\[172a.3\]]mtshungs pa med pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/mchod rten grangs ni ther 'bum phrag bcu 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan snying po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mchod rten mchod ces bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gcig yod bdag nyid 
[\[172a.4\]]chen po yab/_/'gros mchod rgyal yum sras po rdzu 'phrul can/_/shin tu 'byor zhes bya ba rim gro pa/_/chu lha dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/tshangs pa lha zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu ste kun la yang /_/dri gsum dri bral chags pa med gyur pa/_/
[\[172a.5\]]bye ba phrag ni brgya brgya 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku tshe lo grangs khri chig stong /_/'jig rten gsum la phan phyir dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri sum stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung bcas pa'i mchod rten gcig_/dpag tshad bzhi pa gdugs grangs stong dang ldan/_/
[\[172a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bden par spyod pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bden pa 'dod ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug yod yab ni stobs ldan zhi/_/'od mdzes pa zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mchog ldan don [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/yon tan 
[\[172a.7\]]mthu rtsal zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/mthu rtsal mchog ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu rtsa drug ste/_/kun la'ang nyon mongs dri ma kun spangs pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni dgu khri yin/_/zhi bar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]dag kyang /_/lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dgu bcu rtsa bzhi ste/_/rin chen rta babs gser gyis rnam par spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge mchog rgyal po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mi 'jigs brdzi ba med/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 
[\[172b.2\]]'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod glang po'i dbang po yab/_/sems mtshungs ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po srid dga' mchod pa rim gro pa/_/spobs pa'i nga ro zhes bya blo ldan te/_/grags pa kun 'phags pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu rtsa drug ste/_/
[\[172b.3\]]kun la'ang drang srong bdud yul bral ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/zhi bar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs sum stong tshang bar gnas par 'gyur/_/dpag tshad gnyis pa'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig_/
[\[172b.4\]]gser gyi rgyal mtshan gdugs kyis rnam par spras/_/bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho skar rgyal gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mtshan gyis spras zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni blo ldan yin/_/yid dga' ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i 
[\[172b.5\]]yum/_/sras po khros can rdul bral rim gro pa/_/yid gnyis spong zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/the tshom 'joms zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu rtsa gnyis te/_/kun la'ang dngos po bsal bar gyur pa po/_/'ching ba bcad pa ther 'bum ther 'bum yod/_/
[\[172b.6\]]mi tshe lo grangs sum khri nyis stong yin/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/mchod rten grangs ni dgu khri dgu stong ste/_/lha yi gzhal med khang ltar shin tu spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po yi/_/skye ba'i yul 
[\[172b.7\]]ni bsod nams snang zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni tog [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/tog gi blo gros ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lhas byin bla ma rim gro pa/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'khrugs byed mkhas pa ste/_/smra ba'i chu mchog ces 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu ste kun la yang /_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho skems pa'i yid ldan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/zhi bar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bdun khri chig 
[\[173a.2\]]stong bar du gnas/_/sku gdung rgyas 'gyur sa gzhi thams cad du/_/mchod rten grangs ni dgu khri 'byung bar 'gyur/_/yon tan mnga' ba glog gi 'od skye ba'i/_/yul ni gzi byin shin tu brgyan ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga brgya yab ni 
[\[173a.3\]]lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/lhas bsams ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po sgom byed ngos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/grags mchog ces ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/kha lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu gcig kun la yang /_/tshul bzhin chos 
[\[173a.4\]]la 'jigs med thob gyur pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu re re yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri sum stong yin/_/'gro la phan phyir dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs dgu 'bum bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad bzhi pa dag_/gser gyi mchod rten 
[\[173a.5\]]rgyal mtshan dag gis bskor/_/bde gshegs mgon po yon tan rgya chen gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mtshan mo rgyas zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug yod yab ni blo bzang yin/_/blo ldan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po 
[\[173a.6\]]rtogs byed blo ldan rim gro pa/_/blos 'gro ba zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/rnam par 'phrul pa'i blo ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun te kun la yang /_/lhun po'i rtse ltar g.yo ba med pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni dgu 
[\[173a.7\]]khri yin/_/rgyal ba thub pa zhi bar phyin pa yi/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong du gnas/_/mchod rten ther 'bum phrag ni gnyis yod de/_/rin chen chun phreng stong snyed dag gis spras/_/mi yi 'dren pa rin po che dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rin chen mang zhes bya/_/rigs 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]ni rgyal rigs 'od tshad zhing gi grangs/_/stong snyed khyab pa yab ni rin chen [{]bzangs[,]bzang[}]/_/rin chen mchog ma zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po dga' byin khyad 'phags rim gro pa/_/yon tan tshogs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/rnam grangs sems zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus 
[\[173b.2\]]pa lan grangs brgyad de kun la yang /_/srid par 'ching ba gcod par byed pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu drug drug 'dus/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug khri bzhi stong yin/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/brgyad cu rtsa lnga'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten 
[\[173b.3\]]dpag tshad gsum pa dag_/rin chen gtsug phud bye ba dag gis spras/_/'gro ba dag gis mchod pa dpal 'od kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni pad ma can zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gcig yod yab ni bkra shis yin/_/legs mchod ma zhes bya ba 
[\[173b.4\]]rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mgon byin mgon [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/sdug dga' zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/thar pa rnam par sgrogs pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/zla ba nya 'dra dri ma med pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gsum gsum yod/_/
[\[173b.5\]]mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri chig stong yin/_/mi yi rab mchog dag gi dam chos rnams/_/lo grangs nyi khri chig stong bar du gnas/_/sku gdung rgyas 'gyur mchod rten bzang po'i grangs/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu rtsa gsum 'byung /_/rgyal ba bdud dag 'dul bar mdzad pa po'i/_/skye 
[\[173b.6\]]ba'i yul ni bsod nams ldan zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga brgya khyab gyur phal chen yab/_/'od kyi tshogs zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po des ldan chu lha rim gro pa/_/ye shes 'od mchog ces bya mkhas pa ste/_/don la rnam 
[\[173b.7\]]par nges pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dag ni lan grangs brgyad cu ste/_/chags med yid ldan de dag thams cad grangs/_/ther 'bum phrag gnyis snyed ni 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/grags pa mtha' yas dag gi dam chos rnams/_/lo 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]grangs bzhi khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/sku gdung bcas pa'i mchod rten bzang po dag_/'jig rten dag tu ther 'bum phrag gnyis 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa go cha bgos pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni blta na mdzes zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od 
[\[174a.2\]]dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi yab ni legs snang yin/_/nges byams ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po gser yin rnam dag rim gro pa/_/me tog dga' zhes bya ba blo ldan te/_/gzugs brtsegs pa zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bye ba phrag bzhi dang /_/
[\[174a.3\]]gzhan yang drug cu rtsa drug kun la yang /_/brgyad khri brgyad khri dag ni tshogs par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri lnga stong yin/_/mgon po mchog ma'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bdun khri lnga stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad bzhi pa kun/_/
[\[174a.4\]]gser gyi 'od kyis rnam par mdzes par byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i phyag dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni nges pa'i don zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bdun cu rtsa drug yab ni mi dman pa/_/bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras 
[\[174a.5\]]po chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phan 'dod rim gro pa/_/ye shes mchog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/nges par thob ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad de kun la yang /_/theg pa mchog gis rnam thar thob pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bcu bcu tshogs par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo 
[\[174a.6\]]grangs drug khri nyis stong yin/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs dgu bcu rtsa dgur gnas/_/dpag tshad lnga pa'i mchod rten sku gdung bcas/_/gcig ste rin chen brgya snyed dra bas spras/_/mi yi 'dren pa me tog bzang po yi/_/skye ba'i yul 
[\[174a.7\]]ni me tog brgyan zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga yod yab ni mchod legs yin/_/me tog mchog ma rgyal yum sras po ni/_/me tog bzang po me tog rim gro pa/_/'gros mdzes pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gzi brjid mngon 'phags 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/mtshungs med bya dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/_/'gro la phan phyir dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs stong phrag 
[\[174b.2\]]bcu bzhi'i bar du gnas/_/mchod rten bzang po bye ba brgya phrag bcu/_/gser gyi 'od dag gis ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mthon po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rin chen tshogs zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug 
[\[174b.3\]]yod rin chen bzang po yab/_/dpal rgyan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po 'jigs med dul ba rim gro pa/_/yon tan tshogs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/ston pa mtha' yas pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu rtsa drug ste/_/dgra bcom de dag thams cad 
[\[174b.4\]]bsam gtan pa/_/ther 'bum phrag ni bcu bcu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku tshe lo grangs khri yang yin/_/'gog par phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs nyi khri sum stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten sku gdung bcas pa gcig_/dpag tshad gsum pa 
[\[174b.5\]]phreng ba mdzes pa bzhin/_/mgon po de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho yi/_/skye yul mthu rtsal snying po zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bzhi yod yab ni lha dbang yin/_/yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rgya mtsho legs dga' 
[\[174b.6\]]rim gro pa/_/chu yi rgyal po lta bu blo can te/_/bla med thob ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu rtsa drug ste/_/kun la'ang mtsho ltar gang ba'i yid 'dra ba/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/_/mtha' med 
[\[174b.7\]]brnyes pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs brgyad khri tshang ba'i bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba zhi bar phyin pa'i mchod rten grangs/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'byung /_/mgon po de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'dzin gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni legs par dul zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni legs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/mchod sbyin yon brgyan ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po byams ldan blo ldan rim gro pa/_/sa bdag ces ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gzungs dgu thob ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[175a.2\]]'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/mtshungs pa med pa pad ma'i dngos lta bu'i/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/yon tan mngon par dgyes pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag bcu bdun bar du gnas/_/rgyal 
[\[175a.3\]]ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad gcig pa ste/_/me tog brgya dag gis ni brgyan zhing spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi blo mnga' ba'i/_/skye ba'i yul ni don ldan sgra zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/tshangs 
[\[175a.4\]]pa'i mchod rten zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mchod rten legs sems rim gro pa/_/blo gros bdud rtsi zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/rnam par nges pa'i mdzod ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/khong khro med pa ri ltar gnas pa po/_/bye ba 
[\[175a.5\]]phrag ni bdun cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug khri nyis stong yin/_/rnam par thar par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bar du gnas/_/sku gdung rgyas 'gyur sa gzhi thams cad ni/_/rin chen mchod rten bye ba drug gis khyab/_/dpal 
[\[175a.6\]]ldan legs pa yon tan bsags pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni blo gros ngan zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gcig yod yab ni blo ldan yin/_/mi sdug rgyal ba'i yum yin sras po ni/_/'jig rten dga' ba skar ma rim gro pa/_/'gros snyoms 
[\[175a.7\]]pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'od can grags pa zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgya ni rtsa lnga ste/_/bye ba brgya phrag dag ni tshang ba dang /_/drug cu rtsa drug dag kyang 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/_/lha mi'i don phyir dam chos lo 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]stong du/_/gnas 'gyur sku gdung bcas pa'i mchod rten ni/_/dpag tshad dgu bcu rtsa brgyad pa gcig ste/_/rin chen brgya snyed dra bas rnam par spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tshogs dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni yon tan brgyan ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal 
[\[175b.2\]]rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni rgal ba po/_/yon tan gzi brjid ldan pa rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po blo ldan blo can rim gro pa/_/mi dga' spong zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/dra ba gcod byed pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu gcig kun 
[\[175b.3\]]la yang /_/chags pa med pa bsam gtan pa de kun/_/bye ba brgya phrag dag ni gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe'i tshad ni lo grangs khri yang yin/_/rgyal ba'i dam chos lo grangs stong du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten sku gdung bcas pa ni/_/dpag tshad phyed pa'i mchod 
[\[175b.4\]]rten gcig yin te/_/gdugs grangs stong phrag bdun cus rnam par brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni blo ldan mchog ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/drug cu rtsa gnyis tshogs can dbang po yab/_/seng ge rgyal 
[\[175b.5\]]mtshan zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po tshogs can tshogs bzang rim gro pa/_/ri ltar brtsegs zhes bya ba blo ldan te/_/chags pa med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/phyir mi ldog pa gzungs ni thob pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni 
[\[175b.6\]]bdun cu drug drug 'dus/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/_/zhi bar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs sum khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/srid pa thar mdzad pa yi mchod rten grangs/_/brgyad khri bzhi stong dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs 
[\[175b.7\]]pa 'jig rten 'das pa yi/_/skye yul bsod nams legs par bsgoms zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa drug yab ni mu stegs bzang /_/don la dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po don ldan dga' ba rim gro pa/_/'jigs 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]med dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/grags pa mngon 'phags pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dag ni lan grangs dgu bcu ste/_/rab mchog dag gi tshogs kyi grangs rnams kyang /_/bye ba phrag ni stong stong 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri sum stong yin/_/
[\[176a.2\]]yon tan ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/rims nad med pa'i sku gdung rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag bdun cu bzhi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten zla ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni zla ba can zhes bya/_/rgyal 
[\[176a.3\]]ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni zla ba yin/_/zla bzhin mdzes ma yum yin sras po ni/_/tshe ldan me tog bzang po rim gro pa/_/rnam par snang byed grags pa blo ldan te/_/tshul khrims 'od byed pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/tshogs kyi rgyal po rab 
[\[176a.4\]]mchog dam pa yi/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu rtsa drug la/_/bye ba phrag ni brgya rtsa bzhi bzhi 'dus/_/sku tshe lo grangs sum khri nyis stong yin/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/dgu bcu rtsa lnga'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten sku gdung bcas 
[\[176a.5\]]pa ni/_/dpag tshad bdun pa gcig ste gser gyis brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs ni snyan pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni chos kyi lta zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad sum cu yab ni sku [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/bzang dpal zhes ni bya ba rgyal 
[\[176a.6\]]ba'i yum/_/sras po pad ma rgyal dga' rim gro pa/_/yon tan snying po zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/chos 'phags zhes ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bzhi ste kun la yang /_/zhi ba goms par bsgoms pa'i yid ldan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bdun bdun 
[\[176a.7\]]'dus/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni dgu khri yin/_/dngos po med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyis 'bum bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung rgyas 'gyur mtha' yas shing /_/mchod rten bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gsum/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]pa'i tog dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni tshangs pas lta zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bdun cu rtsa gnyis yab ni tshangs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/tshangs ldan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po tshangs pa tshangs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/bsam pa snying rje 
[\[176b.2\]]can ni mkhas pa ste/_/byams la gnas zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/chags pa med gyur gti mug med pa kun/_/bye ba phrag ni bcu gsum bcu gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni 'bum yang yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa 
[\[176b.3\]]de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu khri tshang ba'i bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten sku gdung bcas pa ni/_/dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa gcig gser gyis brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can gtso bo yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni brtags pa'i blo zhes 
[\[176b.4\]]bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni zla [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/sems snyoms ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po pad ma ljon pa rim gro pa/_/yon tan dag gis brtse ba mkhas pa ste/_/bla ma sems zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul 
[\[176b.5\]]can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu rtsa drug ste/_/kun la'ang lhag ma med pa rlung 'dra ba/_/bye ba phrag ni stong stong tshang bar yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yin/_/'dren pa mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag bcu gsum bar du gnas/_/
[\[176b.6\]]rin chen mchod rten grangs ni bye ba phrag_/stong phrag chig brgya rtsa ni bcu dag 'byung /_/yon tan bsags pa seng ge'i stabs dag gi/_/skye yul 'jig rten bla ma dgyes zhes bya/_/de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/'dzam gling gnyis khyab yab ni legs grub yin/_/
[\[176b.7\]]dkyil 'khor 'gro zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po yid 'dzin yid 'ong rim gro pa/_/brtul zhugs grub pa shes rab can yin te/_/nga ro'i mchog grub pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dag ni lan grangs brgyad yin te/_/dgra bcom ther 'bum ji snyed yod pa rnams/_/gang 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]gA'i rgyun ltar dri med sha stag yin/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni bzhi khri yin/_/mi yi mchog ma mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs drug khri drug stong gnas/_/sku gdung mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad gcig_/rin chen brgya snyed dag gi dra bas 
[\[177a.2\]]spras/_/sangs rgyas drag shul can gyis byin pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dka' thub drag ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni spos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/gser 'od rgyal ba'i yum yin sras po ni/_/dpal ldan shin tu dpal ldan rim 
[\[177a.3\]]gro pa/_/yon tan yid ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/yon tan mthon po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dag ni lan grangs lnga yin te/_/gtan pa lta bur legs par gnas pa po/_/bye ba stong phrag bcu bcu tshogs par 'gyur/_/sku tshe lo grangs nyi khri brgyad stong yin/_/'jig 
[\[177a.4\]]rten phan phyir dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs stong phrag bcu dgu gnas par 'gyur/_/mchod rten grangs ni ther 'bum phrag gsum ste/_/lha yi skyed mos tshal snyoms pa yis bskor/_/skyes bu dam pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni phyag byas mchod ces bya/_/
[\[177a.5\]]rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bdun cu rtsa lnga yab ni legs mchod yin/_/grags pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po me tog mchod legs rim gro pa/_/'od kyi tog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/tog gi 'od ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus 
[\[177a.6\]]pa lan grangs gsum ste kun la yang /_/sras mchog slob pa med par phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi khri nyi khri yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri chig stong yin/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/brgyad cu dag gi bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung 
[\[177a.7\]]mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad gsum pa rin chen mang pos spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'od dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mchod cing bkur zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug yod yab ni legs rgal yin/_/yon tan 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]brgyan ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mkhas ldan snang ldan rim gro pa/_/srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod byed mkhas pa ste/_/srid pa 'joms zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dag ni brgya yin te/_/bsod nams rnam grol dgra bcom mi slob pa/_/de dag 'dus 
[\[177b.2\]]pa ther 'bum tshang bar yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni dgu khri yin/_/dam chos lo grangs bye bar gnas 'gyur zhing /_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten grangs ni ther 'bum phrag gsum ste/_/rnam rgyal khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lta bur legs par spras/_/de bzhin 
[\[177b.3\]]gshegs pa 'od zer chen po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni chos kyi 'od ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bdun cu rtsa gnyis bdag nyid chen po yab/_/sems mtshungs ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po 'od ldan nges ldan rim gro pa/_/shin tu rnam par nges pa 
[\[177b.4\]]mkhas pa ste/_/nges thob ces ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dag ni lan grangs bcu bzhi ste/_/kun la'ang dgra bcom pa yi tshogs dag gi/_/mtshungs par 'gyur te ther 'bum ther 'bum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/_/bdud rnams phung bar mdzad 
[\[177b.5\]]pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong bar du gnas/_/ston pa mya ngan 'das nas rgyal ba yi/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad brgya pa gcig_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa skye ba'i yul ni rin po che'i tog ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/
[\[177b.6\]]'od ni stong gsum tsam mo/_/yab ni 'gro ba'i dbang phyug ces bya'o/_/yum ni dpal gyi rin chen mchog ces bya'o/_/sras ni yon tan stong gi gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni yon tan mtha' yas zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan gyi tshogs zhes bya'o/_/
[\[177b.7\]]rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'od zer yid du 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan grangs grangs med de/_thams cad la yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba khri phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten ni sum 'bum mo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can gsal ba skye ba'i yul ni blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad dgu bcu'o/_/yab ni bzang mchog ces bya'o/_/
[\[178a.2\]]yum ni yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/sras ni seng ges rnam par rtse zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni yon tan gyi tshogs zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni grags pa'i sgron ma zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni ro mchog rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus 
[\[178a.3\]]pa dang po ni ther 'bum phrag gsum mo/_/gnyis pa la ni ther 'bum phrag bzhi'o/_/gsum pa la ni ther 'bum phrag lnga'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[178a.4\]]grags pa mtha' yas skye ba'i yul ni yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad gnyis so/_/yab ni nor lha zhes bya'o/_/yum ni rgyu skar bdag mo zhes bya'o/_/sras ni rin chen mchog ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni bsod nams 'byor ldan zhes bya'o/_/
[\[178a.5\]]shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni bsod nams gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bcu ste thams cad la yang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga stong gi bar du 
[\[178a.6\]]gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer don yod skye ba'i yul ni don yod stegs zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum brgya'o/_/yab ni kha dog byin zhes bya'o/_/yum ni 
[\[178a.7\]]dga' bas lta zhes bya'o/_/sras ni kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 'jig rten dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni kha lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni bdud spangs zhes bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa 'dus pa ni lan drug ste/_
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]thams cad la yang bye ba phrag 'bum 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i drang srong skye ba'i yul ni kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag 
[\[178b.2\]]tshad phyed dang gnyis so/_/yab ni drang srong bshes gnyen zhes bya'o/_/yum ni phyogs gnas ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni spos mchog rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni shin tu 'byor pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes 
[\[178b.3\]]bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i blo zhes bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa 'dus pa ni lan gnyis te/_gnyis ka la yang 'bum 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum mo/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[178b.4\]]mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i dbang po skye ba'i yul ni skye bo dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mo/_/yab ni zla rgyas zhes bya'o/_/yum ni rgyal dka' ma zhes bya'o/_/
[\[178b.5\]]sras ni 'khrul pa med par sems zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni khyad par sems zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bdud 'joms zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni yid gnyis spong zhes bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa 'dus pa ni lan lnga ste/_thams cad la yang 
[\[178b.6\]]khri phrag re re'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge 'dun brtan skye ba'i yul ni blo gros brtan pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad lnga 
[\[178b.7\]]brgya'o/_/yab ni bzang po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni rin chen mchog ces bya'o/_/sras ni lhas mchod ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 'gro ba lta zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni gzi brjid drag shul can zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mnyam nyid gnas 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan gcig tu zad de/_dgra bcom pa sum 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum mo/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo 'bum gyi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro//_//'phags pa bskal pa bzang 
[\[179a.2\]]po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]skye ba'i yul ni rin po che'i ngos zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun brgya'o/_/yab ni dbyig gi 'od zer zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yid du 'ong bas 
[\[179a.3\]]byin zhes bya'o/_/sras ni don yod dga' zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni skar mda' 'dod ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i blo zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni dgra bcom grags pa zhes bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa 'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[179a.4\]]dgu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag lnga lnga'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo khri chig stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo khri chig stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tog skye ba'i yul ni tog mchog 
[\[179a.5\]]ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad nyi shu'o/_/yab ni gzhal med mchog ces bya'o/_/yum ni yon tan lta zhes bya'o/_/sras ni rnam par snang byed ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni yang srid thul zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni zag pa med 
[\[179a.6\]]pa'i sems zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'gog pa thob ces bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni dgra bcom pa dung phyur phrag bzhi'o/_/gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag drug go/_/gsum pa la ni ther 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo 
[\[179a.7\]]brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten ni brgyad khri 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor me tog skye ba'i yul ni yon tan gyis brgyan pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun stong ngo /_/yab ni bsod 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]nams dpal zhes bya'o/_/yum ni me tog byin zhes bya'o/_/sras ni pad ma dkar po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni me tog ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni grogs thul zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i mthu zhes bya'o/_/
[\[179b.2\]]'dus pa ni lan bcu drug ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag 'bum 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri bdun stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros skye ba'i yul ni grong khyer 'dab 
[\[179b.3\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun no/_/yab ni tshangs pa sems zhes bya'o/_/yum ni bsam pas byin zhes bya'o/_/sras ni nor dga' zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni shin tu dge zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni zlas byin dbyangs 
[\[179b.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni zhi bas byin zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos ther 'bum mo/_/gnyis pa la ni dung phyur ro/_/gsum pa la ni dung phyur phrag gsum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri dgu stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo drug khri dgu 
[\[179b.5\]]stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs pa skye ba'i yul ni shin tu gnas zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong ngo /_/yab ni mi 'thun pa med pa'i sems zhes bya'o/_/
[\[179b.6\]]yum ni thar pa dad ces bya'o/_/sras ni be'u dga' zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni me tog mya ngan 'tshang zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni me tog man dA ra ba'i dri zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni tsan dan 'od ces bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu ste/_/
[\[179b.7\]]thams cad la yang bye ba phrag stong stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo drug khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs bsams grags pa skye ba'i yul ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad gcig go/_/yab ni gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/yum ni gzi ldan ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni rlung sems zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni blo snyoms zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni tshogs gsal zhes bya'o/_/
[\[180a.2\]]rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu bzhi ste/_thams cad la yang 'bum 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri bdun stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 
[\[180a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ldan skye ba'i yul ni skar ma'i 'od ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo /_/yab ni glog gis byin zhes bya'o/_/yum ni bzang sbyin ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni mchod dga' zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 
[\[180a.4\]]don mthong zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bden mthong zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan dga' zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan brgyad de/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag sum cu sum cu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri lnga stong ngo /_/dam pa'i 
[\[180a.5\]]chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha tshogs skye ba'i yul ni mtshon cha bzang po zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad brgya'o/_/yab ni lha ma 
[\[180a.6\]]yin gyi lha zhes bya'o/_/yum ni klu 'od ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni gtso mchog ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni tog 'phags zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni klu dbang grags zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rin chen gtong zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la 
[\[180a.7\]]ni nyan thos ther 'bum mo/_/gnyis pa la ni dung phyur phrag gcig dang bye ba phrag lnga'o/_/gsum pa la ni dung phyur phrag dgu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo nyi khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]bsrungs skye ba'i yul ni yon tan dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug go/_/yab ni yon tan mchog ces bya'o/_/yum ni yon tan dpal zhes bya'o/_/sras ni rin chen mchod ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mngon par dga' zhes bya'o/_/shes rab 
[\[180b.2\]]can rnams kyi mchog ni legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni bla ma zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bcu bzhi ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag bcu gsum bcu gsum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo nyi khri sum stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri'i bar du 
[\[180b.3\]]gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi blo gros skye ba'i yul ni chos gsal zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad bzhi khri bzhi stong ngo /_/yab ni me tog rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/
[\[180b.4\]]yum ni grags ldan ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni pad ma can zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni legs skyes zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mi gnas pa'i blo zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni drang srong zla ba zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa dgu ste/_thams 
[\[180b.5\]]cad la yang stong phrag bcu gsum bcu gsum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo dgu stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med skye ba'i yul ni zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/
[\[180b.6\]]'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo /_/yab ni stobs lha zhes bya'o/_/yum ni legs bsams grags ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni skrag med ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mi skrag gnas zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[180b.7\]]can rnams kyi mchog ni tshogs thub ces bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan dgu ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo khri dgu stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grogs brtan skye ba'i yul ni bkod pa gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad nyis stong ngo /_/yab ni bkod pa byin zhes bya'o/_/yum ni dga' sdug ces bya'o/_/sras ni blo mi 
[\[181a.2\]]g.yo zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni sems snyoms zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bde bar gnas zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mdangs kyis 'gro zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag 'bum 'bum mo/_/
[\[181a.3\]]sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bzhi khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo bzhi khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gnas mtshungs skye ba'i yul ni bkod pa bcos pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad do/_/yab ni bdag 
[\[181a.4\]]nyid thul zhes bya'o/_/yum ni sdes mi thub ces bya'o/_/sras ni sna tshogs sde zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ma chags sems zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni spyod pa ma bcos pa zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan 
[\[181a.5\]]bcu gcig ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag stong stong ngo /_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo nyi khri lnga stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i zhabs skye ba'i yul ni nor bu gsal zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal 
[\[181a.6\]]rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/_/yab ni rin chen grags pa zhes bya'o/_/yum ni rin chen 'phags pa zhes bya'o/_/sras ni nor bu'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni byams dga' zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni sems pa 'od ces bya'o/_/
[\[181a.7\]]rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mi tshugs pa zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bcu bdun te/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag stong stong ngo /_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo lnga khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]gshegs pa thar pa'i gzi brjid skye ba'i yul ni rnam par thar pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bye ba'o/_/yab ni chags pa med pa'i sems zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yid dga' ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni sems kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 
[\[181b.2\]]mchod sbyin legs zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni gzi brjid dga' zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mchod 'os ces bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan dgu ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo nyi khri chig stong ngo /_/
[\[181b.3\]]dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ngos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]skye ba'i yul ni thub pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad gsum mo/_/yab ni 
[\[181b.4\]]mchod sbyin legs mchod byin zhes bya'o/_/yum ni rin chen 'od ces bya'o/_/sras ni khyad par sems zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni legs byin zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni shugs brtan 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mdangs thob ces bya'o/_/
[\[181b.5\]]'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu'o/_/gnyis pa la ni bye ba stong phrag lnga'o/_/gsum pa la ni bye ba stong phrag brgyad do/_/bzhi pa la ni bye ba stong phrag bcu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri brgyad stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo 'bum gyi bar du gnas so/_/
[\[181b.6\]]sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]skye ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas can zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bye ba'o/_/yab ni thar pa dga' zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yon tan mtha' yas ma zhes 
[\[181b.7\]]bya'o/_/sras ni skye ba'i mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni lta ba can zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rtsal bdag ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rnam par dag pa'i tog ces bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bdun cu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]sum cu rtsa drug drug go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzi brjid skye ba'i yul ni sgrib pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag 
[\[182a.2\]]tshad nyi shu'o/_/yab ni sa ga'i sems zhes bya'o/_/yum ni sems mi 'khrug ces bya'o/_/sras ni lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni seng ge'i mthu rtsal zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni chos kyis blta zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 
[\[182a.3\]]bdud rtsi grags pa zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bcu drug ste/_thams cad la yang sa ya phrag gsum gsum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum mo/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo 'bum gyi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de 
[\[182a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mchog skye ba'i yul ni ye shes dam pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad gcig go/_/yab ni blo gros gya nom zhes bya'o/_/yum ni bsod nams byin zhes bya'o/_/sras ni chos dpal zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni chos dga' zhes bya'o/_/
[\[182a.5\]]shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bsod nams dag ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'khrug med grags zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag dgu dgu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo brgyad khri'i 
[\[182a.6\]]bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs par gnas skye ba'i yul ni bde bas mthong zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug go/_/yab ni sems gsal zhes bya'o/_/yum ni tshangs byin ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni gzungs 
[\[182a.7\]]kyi dbang phyug ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni sgra mi zad ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni sgrogs mkhas zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rin chen gtong zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan lnga bcu rtsa drug ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag bdun stong bdun stong ngo /_/sku tshe'i tshad 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]ni lo bye ba'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa gsung skye ba'i yul ni kun tu skar mda' zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad 
[\[182b.2\]]drug brgya'o/_/yab ni skye bo'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni ku mu da'i so zhes bya'o/_/sras ni bden dpal zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dbang po bsdams zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu ldan zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni gzi brjid chen po zhes bya'o/_/
[\[182b.3\]]'dus pa ni lan bcu bzhi ste/_/thams cad la yang bye ba phrag stong stong ngo /_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo dgu khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]skye ba'i yul ni 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[182b.4\]]rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad stong bzhi brgya'o/_/yab ni brtul zhugs sems zhes bya'o/_/yum ni skar mda' 'chang zhes bya'o/_/sras ni mchod rten mchod ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni byang chub 'dod ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni shin tu brtan pa'i 
[\[182b.5\]]'gros zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni stobs brtan zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bdun cu rtsa lnga ste/_thams cad la yang 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo sum stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 
[\[182b.6\]]'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs byin skye ba'i yul ni ma smad pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa drug go/_/yab ni gzhan gyis mi thub par grags pa zhes bya'o/_/yum ni me tog can zhes bya'o/_/
[\[182b.7\]]sras ni skye ba'i mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni skyon med par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni kun tu 'dzin pa'i blo zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni des par dga' zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bdun cu rtsa gnyis te/_thams cad la 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]yang 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gsum gsum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag gsum mo/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo bye ba phrag gsum gyi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge stabs 
[\[183a.2\]]skye ba'i yul ni dbyangs mchog ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad brgya'o/_/yab ni lha 'dod ces bya'o/_/yum ni phan 'gro ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni lha mchog ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mya ngan sel zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'dam las 
[\[183a.3\]]rgal zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni dgra bcom bsrungs zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bcu drug ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dgu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri bzhi stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo dgu khri bzhi stong gi bar du gnas so/_/
[\[183a.4\]]sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi tog skye ba'i yul ni me tog dri ldan zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad nyis stong ngo /_/yab ni dbyig gi zla ba zhes bya'o/_/yum ni me tog 'od ces bya'o/_/sras ni me tog so zhes bya'o/_/
[\[183a.5\]]rim gro pa ni lha'i me tog ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni dgra bcom byin zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni ston dga' zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan dgu ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag bcu bcu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba'o/_/dam pa'i 
[\[183a.6\]]chos kyang lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas skye ba'i yul ni yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo /_/yab ni yon 
[\[183a.7\]]tan mchod gnas zhes bya'o/_/yum ni kha lo sgyur dga' zhes bya'o/_/sras ni 'od zer bzang po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni bkra shis 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes tog ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'od byin zhes bya'o/_/'dus 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]pa ni lan bcu drug ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dgu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog byin skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams 'dod ces bya'o/_/
[\[183b.2\]]rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad gcig go/_/yab ni lha bzang zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yon tan rin chen gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/sras ni rnam par lta ba grags pa dpag med ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni brtson 'grus thob ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog 
[\[183b.3\]]ni yid kyis dpyod ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jigs med blo zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan drug ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag gsum gsum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po 
[\[183b.4\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan snying po skye ba'i yul ni lha'i pho nya zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad lnga'o/_/yab ni nor byin zhes bya'o/_/yum ni rin chen sdong zhes bya'o/_/sras ni skyon med 
[\[183b.5\]]ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni yid 'thad ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni tog mthu zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni dran pas 'gro zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu bdun te/_thams cad la yang khri phrag re rer mtshungs so/_/sku tshe'i 
[\[183b.6\]]tshad ni lo nyi khri chig stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa skye ba'i yul ni grags bdag ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad khri'o/_/yab ni dge ba dga' 
[\[183b.7\]]zhes bya'o/_/yum ni spyod lam ldan ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni sna tshogs sems zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni rig gsum ldan zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rig sngags 'chang zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni sman pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/dgra 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]bcom pa 'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa dgu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba drug cu rtsa re re'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo nyi khri nyis stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rmad du byung ba skye ba'i yul ni 
[\[184a.2\]]lha'i pho nya zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo /_/yab ni bsod nams dga' zhes bya'o/_/yum ni bsod nams can zhes bya'o/_/sras ni bsod nams chen po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni bsod nams mi dman pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog 
[\[184a.3\]]ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni seng ge'i stabs ltar 'gro zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bcu bzhi ste/_thams cad la yang khri phrag re re'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po 
[\[184a.4\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi tshugs pa skye ba'i yul ni blta na sdug ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa lnga'o/_/yab ni 'od gsal zhes bya'o/_/yum ni snang ba mtha' yas ma zhes bya'o/_/sras 
[\[184a.5\]]ni spobs pa'i blo zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni thos pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni spobs pa'i lha zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rgol ba rab 'joms zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan drug ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag dgu 
[\[184a.6\]]dgu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo khri sum stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid skye ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa 
[\[184a.7\]]bdun no/_/yab ni yul 'khor lha zhes bya'o/_/yum ni tshangs dbyangs ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni dbyangs mkhas zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni rgol bas mchod ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni skar mda' 'chang zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni gzhal 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]med mchog ces bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan sum cu ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis gnyis so/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo lnga stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo nyi khri chig stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten 
[\[184b.2\]]yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad khri'o/_/yab ni bden pa byin zhes bya'o/_/yum ni rin chen blo gros ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni skye ba'i dbang pos byin zhes 
[\[184b.3\]]bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dri za'i blo zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni thos pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni lha chos zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan brgyad de/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum bdun cu bdun cu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 
[\[184b.4\]]bzhi khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri dgu stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs par gshegs skye ba'i yul ni snyan pa ma smad pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgya'o/_/yab ni mthu ldan zhes bya'o/_/
[\[184b.5\]]yum ni nga rgyal dang rgyags pa las rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o/_/sras ni mtshan gyis rnam par spras pa zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni yid mi skyo zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mkhas pa'i blo can zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs 
[\[184b.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga ste/_thams cad la yang khri phrag re re'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri bdun stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo nyi khri bdun stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i mthu rtsal skye ba'i 
[\[184b.7\]]yul ni mngon du 'gro bar bya ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo /_/yab ni thams cad byin zhes bya'o/_/yum ni blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o/_/sras ni thams cad 'dod ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mngon par grags zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]rnams kyi mchog ni gzi brjid bzang po zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan brgya ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag lnga lnga'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum mo/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad stong gi 
[\[185a.2\]]bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dgyes skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba dad ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad lnga'o/_/yab ni 'phags pa dad ces bya'o/_/yum ni lhas mchod ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni mchod 
[\[185a.3\]]'os zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 'jig rten mchod ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan stong gi gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mnyam par gnas zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan sum cu rtsa gcig ste/_thams cad la yang sum khri sum 
[\[185a.4\]]khri'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha bden skye ba'i yul ni lhas mchod ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni mtha' yas so/_/yab ni mchod 'os zhes bya'o/_/yum ni mchod 'dod ma zhes bya'o/_/
[\[185a.5\]]sras ni tshangs pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 'jig rten lha zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten mchod gnas zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan stong ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag drug 
[\[185a.6\]]drug go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri chig stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri brgyad stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i snying po skye ba'i yul ni yon tan thams cad kyis mdzes 
[\[185a.7\]]par byas pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo /_/yab ni mi'i zla ba zhes bya'o/_/yum ni rin chen sgron ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni phyogs kyi mthu rtsal zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni yon tan 'phel zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan nges 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni blo mi 'khrul zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa gsum gsum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo lnga khri lnga stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga khri chig stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku 
[\[185b.2\]]gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags skye ba'i yul ni rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad gsum mo/_/yab ni 'phags pa'i lha zhes bya'o/_/yum ni shin tu 
[\[185b.3\]]mdzes ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni drang srong byin zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni spong dga' zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni dbang phyug chen po zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos bye ba phrag drug go/_/
[\[185b.4\]]gnyis pa la ni bye ba phrag bdun no/_/gsum pa la ni bye ba phrag brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo khri chig stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo 'bum gyi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang dpag tshad brgyad stong drug brgya pa ste gcig tu zad do/_/
[\[185b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal skye ba'i yul ni yon tan phung po zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad khri'o/_/yab ni skye bo'i mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yon tan zla ba zhes bya'o/_/sras ni skal ldan shing rta zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni nyi ma'i lha zhes bya'o/_/
[\[185b.6\]]shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal mchog ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal grags pa zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo 
[\[185b.7\]]bdun stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bcings med skye ba'i yul ni 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o/_/yab ni chu lha'i lha zhes bya'o/_/yum ni zla ldan ma zhes bya'o/_/
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]sras ni dge mchog rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni yon tan gsal zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten dga' zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni yid du 'ong bar gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan sum cu rtsa gsum ste/_
[\[186a.2\]]thams cad la yang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs brtan skye ba'i yul ni ma smad pa zhes 
[\[186a.3\]]bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo /_/yab ni spos ldan zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yid 'ong spos zhes bya'o/_/sras ni kun tu gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni ye shes rnam par 'thor zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes mdzod 'chang zhes bya'o/_/
[\[186a.4\]]rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes nyi ma zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu gsum ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag brgyad brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum mo/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[186a.5\]]gshegs pa lha'i gzi brjid skye ba'i yul ni 'gro ba'i gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug go/_/yab ni lhas bsrungs zhes bya'o/_/yum ni thar pa lha zhes bya'o/_/sras ni lha la dad ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni srid gsum mya ngan med ces bya'o/_/
