[\[186a.6\]]shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes rtse mo zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni snyan par grags zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bdun cu ste/_thams cad la yang nyis 'bum nyis 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo ther 'bum gyi bar 
[\[186a.7\]]du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa thub skye ba'i yul ni legs bsams grags pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgya'o/_/yab ni ma smad pa zhes bya'o/_/yum ni dbang po dul zhes bya'o/_/sras ni phyag 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]dga' zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni zhi gnas dga' zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni me tog dga' zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni dbyangs snyan zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo/_/sku 
[\[186b.2\]]tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bzhi stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dal gyis bzhud skye ba'i yul ni dga' bas 'gro zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun no/_/yab ni yon 
[\[186b.3\]]tan phung po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yon tan gyi tshogs zhes bya'o/_/sras ni kun tu gsal zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni tshogs dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes grags mdzes zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan kun 'byung zhes bya'o/_/
[\[186b.4\]]nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu ste/_thams cad la yang 'bum phrag bcu drug bcu drug go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo lnga khri bdun stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[186b.5\]]pa brtul zhugs dka' thub skye ba'i yul ni 'od chen po zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug go/_/yab ni 'od zer chen po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yid 'ong gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/sras ni bzhin ma zhum zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni ngoms pa med pa'i blo 
[\[186b.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes tshogs zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni sgrib med ma rmongs pa zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu drug ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag stong stong ngo /_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri nyis stong ngo /_/
[\[186b.7\]]dam pa'i chos ni lo drug khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer phung po skye ba'i yul ni klu 'od ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]rten gyi khams bcu tsam mo/_/yab ni 'od chen po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni 'jig rten sgron ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni gzi brjid me tog ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni gzi brjid thul zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni pad ma'i dri zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams 
[\[187a.2\]]kyi mchog ni thub pa med pa'i mthu zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu drug ste/_thams cad la yang nyi khri nyi khri'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 
[\[187a.3\]]chen po skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum brgya'o/_/yab ni 'gros brtan zhes bya'o/_/yum ni dbang sgyur ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni 'od gsal zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/shes 
[\[187a.4\]]rab can rnams kyi mchog ni shes rab phung po zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mchog gi blo gros zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag gsum gsum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun stong gi bar du 
[\[187a.5\]]gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka skye ba'i yul ni spos ldan zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug cu'o/_/yab ni bsod nams 'od ces bya'o/_/yum ni mthong na 
[\[187a.6\]]yid 'ong zhes bya'o/_/sras ni seng ge'i lta stangs zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni glang po che'i lta stangs zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rgyal mchog ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni bsod nams rgyal zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bye ba phrag bcu ste/_
[\[187a.7\]]thams cad la yang bye ba phrag bcu dgu bcu dgu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri bdun stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri brgyad stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mdzad skye ba'i yul ni dga' mchog ces bya'o/_/rigs ni 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni gling chen po bzhi pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga tsam mo/_/yab ni dga' 'od ces bya'o/_/yum ni mchod 'os ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni klu spos zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni tshul khrims 'od ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bden smra dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[187b.2\]]can rnams kyi mchog ni chos smra dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu drug ste/_thams cad la yang khri phrag brgyad stong brgyad stong ngo /_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo lnga stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo lnga khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[187b.3\]]mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can bzang po skye ba'i yul ni tshogs ldan gsal ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bzhi khri'o/_/yab ni nyi ma'i tog ces bya'o/_/yum ni nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/sras ni 'gros mdzes 
[\[187b.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni nor lha'i bu dga' zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni byang chub dga' zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni bsod nams 'byung gnas zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bzhi bcu ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag bdun bdun 
[\[187b.5\]]no/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan skye ba'i yul ni rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo /_/
[\[187b.6\]]yab ni bsod nams rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yon tan rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/_/sras ni chos kyi blo zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 'khrul med blo zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yid 'ong sems zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni dge ba'i tshogs zhes 
[\[187b.7\]]bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu drug ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag brgyad brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun 'bum mo/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po skye ba'i 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]yul ni yon tan stong snyed snang zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bcu drug go/_/yab ni mdzod mtha' yas zhes bya'o/_/yum ni ye shes 'jigs med ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni byang chub sems zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni brtson 'grus brtan zhes bya'o/_/
[\[188a.2\]]shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ma smad grags pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni yid 'ong 'dod ces bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa gcig ste/_thams cad la yang 'bum 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo 'bum gyi bar du gnas so/_/
[\[188a.3\]]sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sna ma'i me tog 'od skye ba'i yul ni me tog gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun brgya'o/_/yab ni me tog bla ma zhes bya'o/_/yum ni me tog can zhes bya'o/_/sras ni me tog zla ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[188a.4\]]rim gro pa ni me tog gi tog ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan me tog ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni pad ma dkar po'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan stong ste/_thams cad la yang drug 'bum drug khri drug khri'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 
[\[188a.5\]]dung phyur phrag brgyad do/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo dung phyur phrag brgyad kyi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can 'od skye ba'i yul ni kha lo sgyur ba'i 'od ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad bcu bzhi'o/_/yab ni 
[\[188a.6\]]yon tan 'od ces bya'o/_/yum ni lhas mchod ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni bsod nams gsal zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni grags pa gsal zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes gsal zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'phags pa gsal zhes bya'o/_/nyan 
[\[188a.7\]]thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu drug ste/_thams cad la yang dgu khri dgu khri'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo bdun stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skrun par mdzad 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]pa skye ba'i yul ni shin tu mdzes pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so/_/yab ni khur stobs can zhes bya'o/_/yum ni nyi ma can zhes bya'o/_/sras ni grags pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni tog gi phung po zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can 
[\[188b.2\]]rnams kyi mchog ni rin chen dpal zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu dpal zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu gsum ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug brgya'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo drug brgya'i bar du gnas so/_/sku 
[\[188b.3\]]gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs 'gro skye ba'i yul ni bkod pa yid du 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad lnga'o/_/yab ni seng ges rnam par rol pa zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yon 
[\[188b.4\]]tan phung po zhes bya'o/_/sras ni mtha' yas mig ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni brtson 'grus mi gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni brtson 'grus phung po zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni kun tu mthu rtsal can zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa 
[\[188b.5\]]gcig ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri dgu stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri chig stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don legs nges skye ba'i yul ni yon tan nges pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs 
[\[188b.6\]]ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad dgu bcu rtsa dgu'o/_/yab ni don gyi yon tan zhes bya'o/_/yum ni gzi brjid dpag med ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni grags pa dpag med ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mthu rtsal chen po zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'gro ba'i bshes 
[\[188b.7\]]gnyen zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni gzi brjid dpag tu med ces bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan drug ste/_thams cad la yang 'bum 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo khri chig stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo khri chig stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog skye ba'i yul ni lhas mchod ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo /_/yab ni sa mchog ces bya'o/_/yum ni dri med blo gros ma zhes bya'o/_/sras 
[\[189a.2\]]ni thub med sde zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni kun tu mthu rtsal can zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni lhas mchod ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni lus pa med pa'i blo zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan dung phyur phrag bdun te/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag bcu drug 
[\[189a.3\]]bcu drug go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]skye ba'i yul ni lha'i mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa gnyis so/_/
[\[189a.4\]]yab ni bshes gnyen bzang po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni brtan 'gro ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni mchog 'dod ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni bdud rtsi sgrogs zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni sgra gcan shis pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten bla ma zhes bya'o/_/
[\[189a.5\]]nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/_/thams cad la yang bye ba sum cu rtsa brgyad brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri sum stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin 
[\[189a.6\]]gshegs pa 'od zer chen po skye ba'i yul ni nor dga' zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad lnga brgya'o/_/yab ni bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yon tan 'dod ces bya'o/_/sras ni ro mchog ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni ro brgya pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can 
[\[189a.7\]]rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal sems zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rnyog pa med pa'i blo zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu gcig ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag bcu gcig bcu gcig go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri chig stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]bdun khri chig stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pas byin skye ba'i yul ni bsam pa yang dag 'phags zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad dgu stong ngo /_/yab ni gsang ba mthong zhes bya'o/_/
[\[189b.2\]]yum ni brtul zhugs yang dag 'phags zhes bya'o/_/sras ni skyon med nga ro zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni rin chen dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni dge ba'i spos zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni gdangs po che zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan 
[\[189b.3\]]bcu gnyis te/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag bcu bdun bcu bdun no/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri nyis stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 
[\[189b.4\]]'od skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams phung po zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo /_/yab ni bsod nams gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/yum ni bsod nams 'od zer zhes bya'o/_/sras ni gzi brjid grags pa zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni lha'i grags pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[189b.5\]]shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni nyi ma'i 'od ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni blo gros grags pa zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan drug ste/_thams cad la yang sa ya phrag gsum gsum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo stong gi bar du 
[\[189b.6\]]gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbyangs skye ba'i yul ni thar pa'i dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad bye ba'o/_/yab ni bai dUr+ya'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni 
[\[189b.7\]]thar pa'i nga ro zhes bya'o/_/sras ni mi gnas thob ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni lhas mchod ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten mchod ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni klus mchod ces bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan lnga bcu ste/_thams cad la yang khri 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]bzhi stong bzhi stong ngo /_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri lnga stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i sde skye ba'i yul ni mi phyed pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug 
[\[190a.2\]]stong ngo /_/yab ni mi phyed par dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/yum ni rdo rje'i blo gros ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni dga' ba'i sems zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dbyangs byin zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni klu'i me tog ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten mchod 
[\[190a.3\]]ces bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu bzhi ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa re re'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo nyi khri chig stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin 
[\[190a.4\]]gshegs pa 'byor ldan skye ba'i yul ni thams cad 'byor pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad lnga stong ngo /_/yab ni 'byor pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni dge rgyal ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni rgyal chen zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni lha'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/shes 
[\[190a.5\]]rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mchod 'os zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni ma spangs pa zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bdun te/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag stong stong ngo /_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung 
[\[190a.6\]]ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs skye ba'i yul ni stobs chen zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum stong ngo /_/yab ni klu stobs zhes bya'o/_/yum ni grags ldan ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni rin chen stobs zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 
[\[190a.7\]]yon tan stobs zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni blo gros stobs zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jigs med stobs zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan lnga bcu ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag lnga lnga'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum stong ngo /_/dam 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]pa'i chos ni lo lnga khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i spyan skye ba'i yul ni mig tu sdug ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgya'o/_/yab ni mig mtshungs zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yid 'ong mig ces 
[\[190b.2\]]bya'o/_/sras ni bdud rtsi'i lha zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dmigs pa gsal zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rgyal ba'i mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mi zad pa'i blo zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu drug ste/_thams cad la 
[\[190b.3\]]yang khri bdun stong bdun stong ngo /_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung skye ba'i yul ni yul 'khor bzang po zhes bya'o/_/
[\[190b.4\]]rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum cu'o/_/yab ni lha'i drang srong zhes bya'o/_/yum ni mi 'jigs byin zhes bya'o/_/sras ni rig pa'i mthu rtsal zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni kun tu blo zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni sgrib med blo zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[190b.5\]]can rnams kyi mchog ni bsod nams brtsegs zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi bzhi'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo nyis stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug 
[\[190b.6\]]go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal skye ba'i yul ni gsal ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo /_/yab ni gsal can zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yon tan gsal zhes bya'o/_/sras ni thar pa dad ces bya'o/_/
[\[190b.7\]]rim gro pa ni rgyal ba gsal zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni smra ba gsal zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rdzu 'phrul gsal zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan sum cu rtsa gnyis te/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag brgyad brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo khri bzhi 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'gros skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid kyis brgyan zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug go/_/yab ni mthu rtsal brtan 
[\[191a.2\]]zhes bya'o/_/yum ni ye shes thob ces bya'o/_/sras ni mthong dga' zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dga' sdug ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni b+ha ra ta zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni gzi brjid rab gsal zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu gsum 
[\[191a.3\]]ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba stong phrag bcu bcu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo nyi khri bdun stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri sum stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag shul can skye ba'i yul ni kun tu gzi brjid can zhes bya'o/_/
[\[191a.4\]]rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu'o/_/yab ni drag shul brtsegs zhes bya'o/_/yum ni gzi brjid me tog ces bya'o/_/sras ni dmigs pa ma 'khrul zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni sems brtags zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal 
[\[191a.5\]]po zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'khrugs pa med par gnas zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos drug khri'o/_/gnyis pa la ni 'bum mo/_/gsum pa la ni sum 'bum mo/_/bzhi pa la ni drug 'bum mo/_/lnga pa la ni brgyad 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 
[\[191a.6\]]lnga khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po skye ba'i yul ni 'od zer mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun cu'o/_/yab ni rin chen 
[\[191a.7\]]sgron ma zhes bya'o/_/yum ni gzi brjid mchod ces bya'o/_/sras ni lha'i gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni lag mchog gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni khams gsum gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bzhi bcu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag bcu drug bcu drug go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo drug khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od skye ba'i yul ni sgron byed 'od 
[\[191b.2\]]ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so/_/yab ni grags pa'i 'od ces bya'o/_/yum ni dpag med mig ces bya'o/_/sras ni skar mda' 'od ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 'od mthong zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni lha 'od ces 
[\[191b.3\]]bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni zla 'od ces bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag brgyad brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo sum stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro//_//
[\[191b.4\]]'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po bcu drug pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od skye ba'i yul ni bkod pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug go/_/yab ni lha'i gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/yum ni 
[\[191b.5\]]lus dga' ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni yan lag ma smad pa zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni skyon med lus zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni pha rol phyin thob ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni dpag med 'gro zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bzhi bcu ste/_thams cad la yang 
[\[191b.6\]]bye ba phrag dgu dgu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri nyis stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo sum khri nyis stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rnam par 'byes pa skye ba'i yul ni shin tu 
[\[191b.7\]]rnam par 'byes pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bcu drug go/_/yab ni gzi brjid dpal zhes bya'o/_/yum ni gzi brjid mchog ces bya'o/_/sras ni skar mkhan zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni kha lo sgyur ba'i spos zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]blo dge zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni bsod nams lag ces bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad de/_thams cad la yang sum khri sum khri'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri lnga stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du gnas so/_/
[\[192a.2\]]sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khengs med skye ba'i yul ni rdzogs ldan zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad cu'o/_/yab ni mi tshugs pa zhes bya'o/_/yum ni khyad par thob ces bya'o/_/sras ni 'jig rten khyad par 'phags zhes bya'o/_/
[\[192a.3\]]rim gro pa ni 'dra med ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten khyad par 'phags zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni khyad par 'phags zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan sum cu ste/_thams cad la yang khri phrag re re'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri bdun stong ngo /_/dam 
[\[192a.4\]]pa'i chos ni lo dgu khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sbrang rtsi'i zhal skye ba'i yul ni gcig tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad stong ngo /_/
[\[192a.5\]]yab ni dga' byed ces bya'o/_/yum ni bdud rtsi byed ces bya'o/_/sras ni bkod pa mi 'khrul zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 'jig rten mchod ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni skar mda' 'chang zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni shugs 'chang zhes bya'o/_/'dus 
[\[192a.6\]]pa ni lan lnga bcu rtsa dgu ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag drug drug go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri lnga stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo drug khri lnga stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od skye ba'i yul ni dri ma med pa'i 'od ces 
[\[192a.7\]]bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu'o/_/yab ni zla ba'i tog ces bya'o/_/yum ni zla ba'i me tog ces bya'o/_/sras ni zla snang zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni zla [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bdud rtsi zla ba zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]can rnams kyi mchog ni lha'i bdud rtsi zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan drug ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag lnga lnga'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum mo/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri sum stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog 
[\[192b.2\]]'byin skye ba'i yul ni nyi ma'i blo gros zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug go/_/yab ni dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/_/yum ni lha mchod ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni nyi ma'i tog ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni sgron ma drang po zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams 
[\[192b.3\]]kyi mchog ni gser 'od dpal zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni don yod go 'phang gnon zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis gnyis so/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos 
[\[192b.4\]]ni lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi bar gshegs pa skye ba'i yul ni blo brtan zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum cu'o/_/yab 
[\[192b.5\]]ni 'gros snyoms zhes bya'o/_/yum ni bde 'gro ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni 'phags pa 'dod ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dgra bcom 'dod ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni don yod go 'phang gnon zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal brtan po zhes bya'o/_/
[\[192b.6\]]'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa gcig ste/_thams cad la yang 'bum phrag bcu gcig bcu gcig go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri nyis stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo bdun khri nyis stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de 
[\[192b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa skye ba'i yul ni 'od ldan zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun stong ngo /_/yab ni byams gnas zhes bya'o/_/yum ni snying rjes gnas zhes bya'o/_/sras ni yid ma 'khrugs zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni sems snyoms zhes bya'o/_/
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'khrul med ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan yang dag 'phags zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bcu drug ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa bzhi bzhi'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i 
[\[193a.2\]]chos kyang lo khri bzhi stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom grags pa skye ba'i yul ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu drug tsam mo/_/
[\[193a.3\]]yab ni dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o/_/yum ni 'phags be'u ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni mya ngan 'das pa grags zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dgra bcom gsal zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni snyan pa grangs med pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni spobs pa chen po zhes 
[\[193a.4\]]bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ste/_thams cad la yang 'bum sum khri sum khri'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bdun stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[193a.5\]]pa chos kyi yon tan skye ba'i yul ni yon tan can zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad nyis brgya'o/_/yab ni yon tan gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/yum ni yon tan can zhes bya'o/_/sras ni yon tan mtha' yas zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni yon tan chen po'i gzi brjid 
[\[193a.6\]]ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan gzi brjid mtha' yas zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni thar pa'i yon tan rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan sum cu rtsa gsum ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag bdun bdun no/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum 
[\[193a.7\]]mo/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri bdun stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhing bzang po skye ba'i yul ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nyi shu tsam mo/_/yab ni rin chen 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]'od ces bya'o/_/yum ni mtha' yas zhing zhes bya'o/_/sras ni shes rab sgron ma zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni shes rab gsal zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni skar mkhan 'od ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni 
[\[193b.2\]]lan drug cu rtsa dgu ste/_thams cad la yang drug 'bum drug 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri chig stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod 
[\[193b.3\]]pa'i rgyal po skye ba'i yul ni rin po che bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun cu rtsa brgyad do/_/yab ni bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o/_/yum ni gzi brjid rdzogs ldan zhes bya'o/_/sras ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni thar 
[\[193b.4\]]pa bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni lha'i nyi ma zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni gzi brjid mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bdun cu ste/_thams cad la yang sa ya phrag brgyad brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos 
[\[193b.5\]]ni lo brgyad khri bdun stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa skye ba'i yul ni lha brtsegs zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum brgya'o/_/yab ni 'gro ba'i dbang phyug ces bya'o/_/yum 
[\[193b.6\]]ni 'od zer mchog ces bya'o/_/sras ni khengs med ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dbang po zhi zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni nor lha'i bu dga' zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni bsod nams 'dod ces bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bcu ste/_thams cad la 
[\[193b.7\]]yang bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa re re'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bdun stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo drug khri dgu stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin sreg 'od 'phro skye ba'i yul ni tshangs 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]pa'i tog ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun cu'o/_/yab ni drang srong blo zhes bya'o/_/yum ni sems grol ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni the tshom med ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dul bar gnas zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni dpa' 
[\[194a.2\]]spyod ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rgya mtsho'i tog ces bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan brgyad cu rtsa lnga ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag bcu dgu bcu dgu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du gnas so/_/
[\[194a.3\]]sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i dpal skye ba'i yul ni pad ma can zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun brgya'o/_/yab ni me tog byin zhes bya'o/_/yum ni pad ma'i mig ces bya'o/_/sras ni me tog rgyal po zhes 
[\[194a.4\]]bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni lha'i me tog ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni lha ma yin gyi lha zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni sems can kha lo sgyur zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa bdun te/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag brgyad brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i 
[\[194a.5\]]tshad ni lo dgu khri dgu stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo dgu khri dgu stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa skye ba'i yul ni lha'i bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram 
[\[194a.6\]]ze'o/_/'od ni gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sum cu tsam mo/_/yab ni rin chen 'od ces bya'o/_/yum ni blo gros gsal zhes bya'o/_/sras ni gsal chen zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni chos sems 
[\[194a.7\]]zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni thar pa dga' zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bdun cu rtsa lnga ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag bcu bdun bcu bdun no/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri sum stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri dgu stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu bzang po skye ba'i yul ni bzang po byed ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad stong ngo /_/yab ni lha bzang zhes bya'o/_/yum ni 'phags bzang ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni dpal bzang zhes bya'o/_/rim 
[\[194b.2\]]gro pa ni rin chen phung po zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bzang po mtha' yas zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mtshon cha bzang po zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ste/_thams cad la yang sa ya phrag lnga lnga'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri chig 
[\[194b.3\]]stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo dgu stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mchog skye ba'i yul ni rin po che chen po zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bcu drug go/_/yab ni khye'u mchog ces bya'o/_/
[\[194b.4\]]yum ni rin chen tog ces bya'o/_/sras ni rin po che'i rgya mtsho zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni blo gros 'byung gnas zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni byang chub stobs zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan brgyad 
[\[194b.5\]]cu ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag brgyad brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri bzhi stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thugs shin tu gzhungs 
[\[194b.6\]]pa skye ba'i yul ni lhun po chen po zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun cu rtsa gsum mo/_/yab ni rin po che'i lhun po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni rin chen chen mo zhes bya'o/_/sras ni bdud rtsi'i phung po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dge ba brtsegs zhes bya'o/_/
[\[194b.7\]]shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ri bo'i 'od zer zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni thogs pa med par gnas zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan brgyad cu ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag brgyad brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum mo/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid dpag tu med pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni mtha' yas so/_/yab ni don sems zhes bya'o/_/yum ni 
[\[195a.2\]]sde chen ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni grags pa 'phags zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa blo gros nye bar zhi zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni smon lam gzungs zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rtag tu rnam par 'phrul zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 
[\[195a.3\]]ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzhi'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba phrag lnga'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal ba rgya mtshos byin pa skye ba yi/_/yul ni rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya/_/rdul bral 
[\[195a.4\]]rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad sum stong thos pa'i dbang po yab/_/yon tan tshogs zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po legs mthong drag shul rim gro pa/_/mchod rten bcu pa zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/rgya mtsho'i blo zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan 
[\[195a.5\]]grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/lhun po'i rtse ltar g.yo ba med pa po/_/ther 'bum ther 'bum snyed ni 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/dngos po med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs bye ba phrag ni stong du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag 
[\[195a.6\]]ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bzang po bye ba dgu bcu drug_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i tog dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni ye shes sgron zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni tshangs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/grags mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal 
[\[195a.7\]]ba'i yum/_/sras po skar mkhan blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/tshogs ldan mchod rten zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/tshangs pa rnam par lta ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/rnam par thar brgyad thob pa'i bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gsum gsum yod/_/
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bzang po ther 'bum phrag gsum yod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla gdugs skye ba yi/_/
[\[195b.2\]]yul ni 'od dag 'phro bas brgyan ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni dran ldan yin/_/gdangs mtho ma ni rgyal yum sras po ni/_/sgra gcan 'dzin yin rigs ldan rim gro pa/_/ye shes dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/sred pa rnam par 
[\[195b.3\]]skems pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu ste kun la yang /_/g.yo med rims nad med pa'i bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/ston pa 'gog par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag bcu yi bar 
[\[195b.4\]]du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad lnga pa gser gyis rnam par spras/_/'jig rten mgon po 'od ni 'phro ba yi/_/skye yul legs par gsungs dang ldan zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu gnyis yod yab ni 'od 
[\[195b.5\]]byed yin/_/tog gi 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po bkra shis tshogs dbang rim gro pa/_/bzang po grags zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs pa med par grags pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu kun la yang /_/so so yang dag rig pa'i pha mthar phyin/_/
[\[195b.6\]]rnam grol mi slob 'bras ldan sha stag go/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri nyis stong yin/_/dngos po med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs sum khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten ther 'bum phrag ni sum cu gnyis/_/de bzhin 
[\[195b.7\]]gshegs pa dri med rgyal po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams 'od ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bdun cu gnyis yod yab ni dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/bdud rtsi dga' ba rgyal yum sras po ni/_/seng ge'i 'gros yin lha ldan rim gro pa/_/yon tan 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]'byung gnas shes rab chen po ste/_/rnam par blta ba'i blo ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/drang srong thams cad dgra bcom mtshungs pa po/_/ther 'bum ther 'bum dag ni 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong 
[\[196a.2\]]yin/_/'gro la phan phyir dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad bcu tsam pa/_/rin chen rgyal mtshan stong gis mdzes par byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes grags pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni grags 
[\[196a.3\]]pa'i 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni mya ngan med/_/lha yi mchod rten ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po shes ldan grags ldan rim gro pa/_/phyogs rnams blta zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bdud 'joms pa zhes bya ba rdzu 
[\[196a.4\]]'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga kun la yang /_/rnam thar brgyad la gnas pa thob pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu lnga lnga yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/_/mi mchog ting 'dzin thob pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs bye ba bdun cu drug tu gnas/_/rgyal 
[\[196a.5\]]ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag sum cu drug_/mi yi mchog ma kun las rgyal ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bden pa'i 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/yon tan rgya mtsho 
[\[196a.6\]]zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po bden ldan bden legs rim gro pa/_/'phags pa dgyes zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/lag mchog bzang po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs gnyis te gnyis ka la'ang /_/nam mkha'i dbyings la rlung ltar chags med pa/_/khri phrag 
[\[196a.7\]]bcu bcu dag ni 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug khri drug stong yin/_/'khrugs pa med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad lnga pa gser gyi bla rer ldan/_/
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]sangs rgyas yon tan 'od ni skye ba'i yul/_/yon tan kun gyi rgya mtsho zhes kyang bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu gnyis yod yab ni legs mchog yin/_/blo gsal rgyal yum sras po yon tan tshogs/_/yon tan 'od ces bya ba rim gro pa/_/yon tan dag gis 
[\[196b.2\]]brgyan pa mkhas pa ste/_/yon tan rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu gnyis kun la yang /_/chags pa med par gyur pa sems sbyangs pa/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni nyi khri yin/_/mig gi sbyin pa mdzad pa'i 
[\[196b.3\]]dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad brgyad pa thams cad rin chen yin/_/rgyal ba sgra ni rnam par grags pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni grags pa can zhes bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od 
[\[196b.4\]]kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni nor grags yin/_/blo gros grags ma zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po grags ldan lha legs rim gro pa/_/lha yi dbyangs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/rnam par grags pa'i klu ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs gsum ste kun 
[\[196b.5\]]la yang /_/ri bo'i lhun ltar g.yo ba med pa po/_/de dag ther 'bum ther 'bum 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yin/_/grags pa mtha' yas mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs stong snyed gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag 
[\[196b.6\]]tshad gsum pa ste/_/rin chen mchog rab bdun po'i rang bzhin yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyas pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni tog gi 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gnyis yod skye ba'i dbang po yab/_/grags byin ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i 
[\[196b.7\]]yum/_/sras po skye ldan 'od 'phro rim gro pa/_/sgra gcan gzi brjid can ni mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs pa med par rgol ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/tha spangs dug rtsa bcad par mtshungs pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]lo grangs dag ni lnga khri yin/_/shin tu dul ba'i yid ldan dam chos dag_/lo grangs sum khri sum stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bzang po bye ba bdun cu drug_/sangs rgyas pad ma'i 'od zer skye ba'i yul/_/me tog dag 
[\[197a.2\]]gis rnam par brgyan zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod pad ma bzang po yab/_/dga' ba sbyangs zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po pad ma yid 'thad rim gro pa/_/me tog dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/ye shes me tog legs rgyas 
[\[197a.3\]]rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bzhi ste kun la yang /_/dgra bcom dbang po tshang ba'i bsam gtan pa/_/ther 'bum phrag ni drug drug 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag bcu bdun yin/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/dgu bcu rtsa lnga'i bar du 
[\[197a.4\]]gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad bcu drug pa la mu tig spras/_/rnam par 'dren pa brtul zhugs bzang po yi/_/skye yul ye shes rnam par nges zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni rnam dag 
[\[197a.5\]]yin/_/thos pa'i 'od ni rgyal yum sras po ni/_/mdzes ldan shin tu mdzes pa rim gro pa/_/skye bos mchod ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/thogs pa med par ston pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu ste kun la yang /_/pad mtshungs srid pa kun las rnam grol ba/_/bye ba phrag ni 
[\[197a.6\]]dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri nyis stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri dgu stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma'i rgyal 
[\[197a.7\]]po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni lha yi 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni legs skyes yin/_/me tog can zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po skar ma skar [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/snang ba'i rgya mtsho zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/g.yo ba med 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu drug kun la yang /_/nga med nyon mongs med pa'i dgra bcom pa/_/bye ba stong phrag bcu gsum bcu gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri sum stong yin/_/'gog par phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar 
[\[197b.2\]]du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad gsum pa gcig_/gser gyi dra ba dag gis khebs par byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi tog dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rtag tu mthong zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu gnyis yod sman 
[\[197b.3\]]pa bzang po yab/_/glog mchod ma ni rgyal yum sras po ni/_/thub med shin tu rnam dul rim gro pa/_/rin chen 'chang ba blo gros can yin te/_/mtha' yas 'od ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu rtsa brgyad de/_/kun la'ang zhi ba mya ngan 'das gnas pa/_/
[\[197b.4\]]dgra bcom mchod par 'os pa sha stag go/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bdun stong yin/_/mi yi phul du byung ba'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri sum stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad gcig pa rgyal mtshan dag gis brgyan/_/
[\[197b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rgyal po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bzang la dga' zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bye ba gnyis yod 'od zer bzang po yab/_/yon tan 'od zer rgyal yum sras po ni/_/'od zer byin yin lha legs rim gro pa/_/snang ba'i 
[\[197b.6\]]'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/sgron ma mtha' yas pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/rdul sbyangs pa yi dgra bcom tshogs pa dag_/ther 'bum phrag ni brgyad cu brgyad cu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sa ya phrag brgyad yin/_/ston pa mya ngan 'das pa'i 
[\[197b.7\]]dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/stong gsum mchod rten bzang po dag gis gang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar mkhan skye ba yi/_/yul ni gser gyi gzi brjid ldan zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgyad khri yab ni ngo tsha shes/_/yon tan dga' ba rgyal yum sras po ni/_/yon tan can yin legs sbas rim gro pa/_/dbang po sbas zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs med bsam gtan pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan 
[\[198a.2\]]grangs bcu ste kun la yang /_/thams cad 'jigs med ye shes stobs ldan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni stong phrag bcu bcu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni 'bum yang yin/_/'jig rten phan phyir dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs chig khri chig stong bar du gnas/_/mchod rten dpag 
[\[198a.3\]]tshad drug pa gser gdugs can/_/mu tig bai dUr+ya yi dra bas rgyas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rdzogs ldan gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni blo gros grags zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu gnyis yod yab ni shin tu grags/_/srid par grags 
[\[198a.4\]]zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mchod ldan legs mchod rim gro pa/_/grags pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/grags pa rnam par nges ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu kun la yang /_/nyon mongs zad pa yang srid med pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni 
[\[198a.5\]]dgu bcu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri sum stong yin/_/zad mthar phyin pa dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/sku gdung rgyas 'gyur mchod rten bye ba stong /_/gser dang nor bu'i chun po dag gis spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad 
[\[198a.6\]]ma'i snying po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni gser gyi snying po yin/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/lnga bcu rtsa bzhi legs pa'i snying po yab/_/bai dUr+ya yi snying po rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po gser 'od seng ge rim gro pa/_/rin chen ljon pa zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/rin chen blo 
[\[198a.7\]]zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu brgyad kun la'ang /_/thams cad nga med nyon mongs zad pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni dgu khri yin/_/srid pa spangs pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bdun khri brgyad stong bar 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]du gnas/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa'i mchod rten dag gi grangs/_/ther 'bum phrag ni bdun cu tshang bar 'byung /_/rkang gnyis mchog ma de bzhin gshegs rgyal gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni nabs so zhes kyang bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu gnyis yod yab ni rgyu skar yin/_/
[\[198b.2\]]rgyu skar bdag mo zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po dgra 'dul zhi ba rim gro pa/_/zhi ba'i rgya mtsho zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs pa med pa'i blo ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu drug kun la'ang /_/theg pa mchog gis pha rol phyin gyur pa/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag 
[\[198b.3\]]re re yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri dgu stong yin/_/'gro la phan phyir dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/de yi sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad bdun pa gser gyis rnam par spras/_/bde bar gshegs pa spyan 
[\[198b.4\]]mdzes skye ba'i yul/_/nyams dga' mig tu sdug pa zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/mig sdug ces ni bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po dga' byed mig legs rim gro pa/_/blo gnas pa zhes 
[\[198b.5\]]bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/smad pa med pa'i lus ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu ste kun la yang /_/ri ltar g.yo ba med par mtshungs pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag bcu bdun yin/_/rgyal ba 'gog par phyin pa'i dam 
[\[198b.6\]]chos dag_/lo grangs stong gi bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten thams cad bye ba stong du tshang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med pa'i don/_/skye ba'i yul ni nor gyis brgyan zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/
[\[198b.7\]]nyi shu gsum yod yab ni gzugs bzang yin/_/sems mtshungs ma ni rgyal yum sras po ni/_/kha lo sgyur ba snang ldan rim gro pa/_/'gro ba'i dbang phyug ces bya mkhas pa ste/_/dad par byed pa'i blo ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/sred med ma rig pa 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]dang bral ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu lnga lnga yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs sum khri lnga stong bar du gnas/_/mchod rten bzang po dgu khri nyis stong ste/_/rgyal mtshan dam pa dag gis rgyas 
[\[199a.2\]]par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul sde skye ba'i/_/yul ni drag shul ldan pa zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni yul 'khor bzang /_/dman pa min zhes bya ba rdul bral yum/_/sras po mdzod spu rdzogs ldan rim gro pa/_/
[\[199a.3\]]yon tan rdzogs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/chos la rnam par nges pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun te kun la yang /_/yid bzhin grub pa dang ni 'dra ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni khri yang yin/_/'gog par phyin pa'i 
[\[199a.4\]]dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs dgu stong tshang bar gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad gsum pa ste/_/me yi phung po lta bur 'bar zhing spa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams gzi brjid kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams brgyan ces bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal 
[\[199a.5\]]rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni tog [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/tog gi blo gros ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po skar mkhan legs skyes rim gro pa/_/mthu rtsal brgya pa zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/the tshom sel zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug 
[\[199a.6\]]cu drug kun la'ang /_/dgra bcom 'phags pa'i chos ni thob pa po/_/srid pa'i pha mthar phyin pa sha stag go/_/mi tshe lo grangs lnga khri drug stong yin/_/rdul dang bral ba'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bye ba'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag 
[\[199a.7\]]tshad gsum pa ste/_/gser gyi rgyal mtshan mchog stong snyed kyis brgyan/_/bde gshegs mthu rtsal can ni skye ba'i yul/_/rnam par rgyal ba'i gzi brjid ces kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug yod yab ni shin tu mdzes/_/'gros mdzes 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po 'gros ldan lha legs rim gro pa/_/spobs pa 'chang zhes bya ba blo can te/_/skyes rabs kha lo sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu ste kun la yang /_/thams cad chags pa med par gyur pa po/_/bye phrag bdun cu gnyis 
[\[199b.2\]]gnyis 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni dgu khri yin/_/mya ngan 'das par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyis stong bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad lnga pa gser las byas pa yin/_/mgon po 
[\[199b.3\]]thogs med blo ni skye ba'i yul/_/'jig rten dag gis 'dul bar dka' zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab ni gdul dka' yin/_/mchod rten grags pa rgyal yum mchod sbyin byin/_/sras yin mchod sbyin bzang po rim gro pa/_/
[\[199b.4\]]gleng ba po la dga' ba mkhas pa ste/_/mchog gi rgyal po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu gcig kun la yang /_/ri ltar mi sgul lus ni sbyangs pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/mi yi slob 
[\[199b.5\]]dpon rgyal ba'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu stong bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/rin chen 'bum phrag snyed ni 'bar bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan lha dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni chu lhas mchod ces bya/_/rigs ni 
[\[199b.6\]]bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/dgu bcu rtsa gnyis yab ni lha bzang yin/_/lha ma yin gyi bdag mo rgyal yum sras/_/rin chen rin chen bzang po rim gro pa/_/dga' bas mchod ces bya ba blo can te/_/rnal 'byor ngag la dad byed rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun 
[\[199b.7\]]la yang /_/dri gsum dri ma gcod par byed pa po/_/ther 'bum phrag ni drug drug 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin/_/yon tan mchog tu phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/_/bcu 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]drug pa gcig gser gyis spra bar byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes phung po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni chos kyi phung po yin/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig mchod sbyin bzang po yab/_/ye shes mchog ma zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras 
[\[200a.2\]]po shes byin shes legs rim gro pa/_/rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/shes ldan mchod ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/theg pa mchog gis srid rtser phyin pa po/_/bye phrag drug cu rtsa ni re re yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad 
[\[200a.3\]]khri yin/_/drang srong phul du phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs drug khri sum stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/bsod nams 'bras bu gser gyis rnam par spras/_/'jig rten mgon po kha lo sgyur ba yi/_/skye yul mchod rten kha lo sgyur zhes bya/_/
[\[200a.4\]]rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni nga ro mchog_/rab mchog ces ni bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mchog sbyin pad ma rim gro pa/_/man dA ra ba'i bsung ldan blo can te/_/legs par mchod pa'i bsung ldan rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs 
[\[200a.5\]]bcu drug kun la yang /_/dgra bcom nga med tha ba spangs pa po/_/bye phrag bdun cu drug drug 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/zhi bar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur 
[\[200a.6\]]mchod rten grangs/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye dbang mtshungs pa yi/_/skye yul dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes kyang bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis rgyal ba'i dbang po yab/_/dbang mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/
[\[200a.7\]]sras po dbang ldan legs dbang rim gro pa/_/dbang chen sgron ma blo gros can yin te/_/'jigs med dbang po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu drug kun la'ang /_/tha spangs nyon mongs sbyangs pa'i yid ldan pa/_/bdud las rnam grol ther 'bum ther 'bum 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri tshang ba yin/_/'gro la phan phyir dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo stong tshang ba'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung gi/_/mchod rten dpag tshad lnga pa gcig kyang 'byung /_/sangs rgyas me tog tog ni skye ba'i yul/_/
[\[200b.2\]]me tog dag la dga' ba'i rang bzhin yin/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa drug me tog bzang po yab/_/rgyal yum me tog can yin me tog rgyas/_/sras yin me tog bzang po rim gro pa/_/me tog chen po'i gzi brjid blo can te/_/me tog sgron ma zhes 
[\[200b.3\]]bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/tha spangs dug rtsa bcad par mtshungs pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/_/'gog par phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs dgu khri dgu 
[\[200b.4\]]stong bar du gnas/_/dpag tshad gcig pa'i mchod rten 'byung 'gyur te/_/gser gyi dra ba rgyal mtshan dag gis spras/_/'jig rten mgon po sgra gcan 'dzin dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rin chen 'od ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa 
[\[200b.5\]]gcig tshul khrims bzang po yab/_/tshul khrims can yin rgyal yum sras po ni/_/tshul khrims bzang po mchod legs rim gro pa/_/srid pa gcod byed blo gros can yin te/_/'gros brtan zhes ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu kun la yang /_/drang srong 
[\[200b.6\]]thams cad tshang bar 'dus 'gyur te/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu re re yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/rgyal ba'i dam chos lo grangs bye ba phrag_/bdun khri sum stong bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/'gro ba kun gyis bgrang bar nus ma 
[\[200b.7\]]yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi sman chen po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni sman dang ldan zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab ni mdzod [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/mdangs dga' rgyal ba'i yum yin sras po ni/_/thar 'dod shin tu thar pa rim gro pa/_/yon tan 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]nges zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/chos la gnas zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/dgra bcom de dag thams cad 'dus 'gyur te/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri tshang bar 'gyur/_/'gog par phyin pa 
[\[201a.2\]]dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs nyi khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/sems can mkhas pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad gnyis pa gcig_/rdul dang bral ba rgyu skar rgyal po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni zla ba'i 'od ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag 
[\[201a.3\]]tshad/_/bdun cu rtsa gnyis yab ni zla bzang yin/_/zla mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po zlas byin zla legs rim gro pa/_/'od zer chen po zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/gzi brjid 'od ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/dgra bcom bye 
[\[201a.4\]]phrag bdun cu gnyis gnyis dang /_/gzhan yang bye ba phrag ni brgya brgya yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri nyis stong yin/_/mtshungs pa med pa mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/dam chos lo grangs dgu bcu drug tu gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/srid pa gsum 
[\[201a.5\]]na mchod cing bkur bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni kun nas gnas zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi yul 'khor bzang po yab/_/mdangs ldan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lha legs 
[\[201a.6\]]'gros ldan rim gro pa/_/dga' ldan zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mi zad blo zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/dgra bcom thams cad dag kyang 'dus 'gyur te/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gnyis snyed 'byung /_/de na mi rnams dag gi tshe yi tshad/_/lo grangs bdun khri dag tu tshang bar 
[\[201a.7\]]'gyur/_/rnam par grol bar phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bar du gnas/_/mig sbyin pa ni mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad gsum pa gcig_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams glang po yi/_/skye yul glang po rin 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]po che zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa bzhi bdag nyid chen po yab/_/rin chen ldan ma rgyal yum nga rgyal can/_/sras yin blo gros can ni rim gro pa/_/rin chen tshogs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/nor kun mthong zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[201b.2\]]'dus pa lan grangs lnga ste kun la yang /_/bye ba stong phrag nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/sku tshe'i tshad dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga rangs par tshang bar 'gyur ba yin/_/khyu mchog chen po'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/mtshungs 
[\[201b.3\]]pa med pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad gcig pa 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par mdzad pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni gsal bar mthong zhes bya/_/de'i rigs rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun cu yab ni sa ga yin/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[201b.4\]]ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po dag byed legs dag rim gro pa/_/drang srong rtogs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/legs par rtogs pa'i ye shes rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu drug kun la'ang /_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu bzhi bzhi dang /_/gzhan yang dgra 
[\[201b.5\]]bcom bye ba stong stong yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/_/dus gsum mkhyen pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/mtshungs pa med pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/de tshe sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/bde gshegs rnam par 
[\[201b.6\]]grags pa'i rgyal po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dag par grags zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgyad yod yab ni dad pa yin/_/blo gros grags zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po legs grags grags pa rim gro pa/_/yon tan grags zhes bya 
[\[201b.7\]]ba blo can te/_/rdzu 'phrul shin tu sbyangs pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang /_/phung por 'dzin la mi lta rnam grol ba/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/lha dang mi mchog dag gis mchod par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni tog gi 'od ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/dgu bcu 
[\[202a.2\]]rtsa dgu yab ni lha bzang yin/_/gser 'od ma ni yum yin sras po ni/_/'od zer byin yin lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/'od dang ldan pa blo gros can yin te/_/sgron ma 'od ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu drug kun la'ang /_/dgra bcom chags pa med par gyur pa po/_/
[\[202a.3\]]bye ba phrag ni stong stong 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag bcu gnyis yin/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/dam chos lo grangs stong du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/_/sum cu pa gcig gser gyis spra bar byas/_/de bzhin 
[\[202a.4\]]gshegs pa chos kyi mdzod dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni ye shes 'od ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab ni legs spong yin/_/mdzod mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rgyal sras drang srong rim gro pa/_/drang srong mthu rtsal can ni mkhas 
[\[202a.5\]]pa ste/_/'jigs pa med pa'i ye shes rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu drug kun la yang /_/lus sbyangs chags pa med par gyur pa po/_/dgra bcom ther 'bum ther 'bum tshang bar yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri chig stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo 
[\[202a.6\]]grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad lnga pa kun nas mdzes par byas/_/'jig rten mgon po blo gros bzang po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni blo gros bkod ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag 
[\[202a.7\]]tshad gsum yod yab ni blo gros can/_/blo gros chen mo rgyal yum kun gyis bkur/_/sras yin blo gros dbang po rim gro pa/_/yon tan mchod rten zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/phyogs gsal ba zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/chags med 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]rims nad med pa'i bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri tham pa yin/_/rgyal ba 'khrugs pa med par phyin pa yi/_/dam chos lo grangs sum khrir gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten 
[\[202b.2\]]grangs ni ther 'bum bcu drug 'byung /_/mgon po yon tan dbang mtshungs skye ba yi/_/yul ni tog gi dbang po'i rgyal mtshan yin/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yab ni dbang po yin/_/yon tan dbang po blo gros rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po dbang 
[\[202b.3\]]ldan tshogs dbang rim gro pa/_/yon tan tshogs zhes bya ba blo can te/_/yon tan kun gyi tshogs ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad de kun la yang /_/rgyal sras lus ni legs par sbyangs pa po/_/dgra bcom chags pa med pa sha stag go/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag 
[\[202b.4\]]ni khri yang yin/_/mtshungs pa med pa mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/dam chos lo grangs brgyad cu'i bar du gnas/_/sku gdung mchod rten chen po gcig yin te/_/rin chen dra ba rgyal mtshan dag gis spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i sde skye ba'i/_/yul ni rin po che dang ldan 
[\[202b.5\]]zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni sde [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/nges brtan rgyal ba'i yum yin sras po ni/_/rdo rje byin yin gsal ba rim gro pa/_/phas rgol dri ma med pa'i blo can te/_/sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs 
[\[202b.6\]]nyi shu drug kun la/_/mtshan ma med pas shin tu dul de kun/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri brgyad stong yin/_/de yi dam chos lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/nyi shu rtsa brgyad bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/sku gdung 
[\[202b.7\]]rgyas 'gyur zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab brtsegs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni shes rab brtsegs zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis shes rab bzang po yab/_/shes rab mchog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]po shes byin shes [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/shes rab 'byung gnas zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/shes rab rnam par sbyangs pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu kun la yang /_/dgra bcom thams cad thar par gzhol ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gnyis gnyis yod/_/
[\[203a.2\]]mi tshe lo grangs dag ni bzhi khri yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lngar gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/'phang du dpag tshad lnga pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po legs par gnas pa yi/_/
[\[203a.3\]]skye yul legs par rab tu gnas zhes bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni don gnas yin/_/yon tan ldan zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po legs mthu blo mthu rim gro pa/_/dge gnas zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gti mug med pa 
[\[203a.4\]]mtha' yas rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang /_/dgra bcom dag ni tshang bar 'dus 'gyur te/_/ther 'bum phrag ni dgu dgu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag bcu gcig yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun 
[\[203a.5\]]khri brgyad stong tshang bar gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/gser gyi rgyal mtshan mchog gis 'khor bar gang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo ni sbyangs pa yi/_/skye yul bsod nams legs par bsags zhes bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/
[\[203a.6\]]dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni snang ldan yin/_/bden ldan ma zhes bya ba yum yin no/_/sras po blo gros blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/'od zer chen po zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/dga' chen zhes ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang /_/srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod par byed 
[\[203a.7\]]pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bcu bcu 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs drug khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/lha rdzas rgyal mtshan mchog gis mdzes par 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs skye ba'i/_/yul ni sgra snyan pa dag grag ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa lnga yab ni tshangs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po tshangs byin brtul zhugs 
[\[203b.2\]]rim gro pa/_/snying rje'i mig ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/tshangs dbang bdag nyid chen po rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs lnga ste kun la yang /_/chags pa zhi ba'i yid dang ldan de dag_/bye ba phrag ni stong stong 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni khri yang yin/_/rgyal 
[\[203b.3\]]ba'i dam chos lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/nyi shu rtsa bdun bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag gi mchod rten ni/_/dpag tshad sum cu pa gcig 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mchog ma yi/_/skye yul lag mchog dag gis brgyan zhes bya/_/rgyal 
[\[203b.4\]]ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu gnyis yab ni lag mchog yin/_/klu 'od ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lnga pa gnyid spangs rim gro pa/_/glu dbyangs zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mgon po mthong zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs 
[\[203b.5\]]nyi shu gnyis kun la'ang /_/der ni thams cad dag kyang 'dus 'gyur te/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/mtshungs med rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs stong phrag bcu drug gnas/_/'jig rten phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku 
[\[203b.6\]]gdung dag_/rgyas par 'gyur zhing 'phel ba dag tu 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyangs dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni grags pa'i dbyangs zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab ni rnam par grags/_/dbyangs mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i 
[\[203b.7\]]yum/_/sras po skad snyan yid 'thad rim gro pa/_/dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/drag shul skad 'byin pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu kun la yang /_/srid pa gsum las rgal ba'i yid ldan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu sum cu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]sum khri nyis stong yin/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/bcu bdun dag gi bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad lnga pa gser rgyan rnam par sbyangs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par shes tog gi/_/skye 
[\[204a.2\]]ba'i yul ni tog gi 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bzhi yod mngon par shes pa yab/_/yon tan mngon shes rdul bral yum yin sras/_/mngon shes rdzu 'phrul bzang po rim gro pa/_/smon lam zhes bya blo gros can yin te/_/gzhung la rnam par 
[\[204a.3\]]bsgoms pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad de kun la yang /_/slob pa med par phyin pa kun 'du ste/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni khri yang yin/_/rgyal ba yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs drug khri'i 
[\[204a.4\]]bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad bzhi pa gser gyi bla rer ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi 'od skye ba'i/_/yul ni bsod nams phung po zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni phung 
[\[204a.5\]]po bzang /_/yon tan me tog rdul dang bral ba'i yum/_/phung po sras yin ri rab rim gro pa/_/yon tan dag gis brgyan pa mkhas pa ste/_/byang chub dag la gzhol ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga ste/_/kun la'ang thar pa thob par 'gyur ba dag_/bye ba phrag ni 
[\[204a.6\]]brgyad cu brgyad cu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri sum stong yin/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/'jig rten phan pa'i phyir ni rgyal ba de'i/_/sku gdung dag ni rnam par rgyas par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'dren dge ba yi/_/
[\[204a.7\]]skye ba'i yul ni dge dang ldan zhes bya/_/de yi rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad sum stong shin tu dge ba yab/_/dge mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po dge ba dge byin rim gro pa/_/'gro bas mchod ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten dad par byed pa rdzu 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/sangs rgyas yon tan ldan pa phyir mi ldog_/de dag dgu 'bum dgu 'bum 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs bye ba bdun cu drug_/grags pa mtha' yas dag gi dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu 'bum nyi khri'i bar du 
[\[204b.2\]]gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur te/_/khams gsum kun tu rnam par gang bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po tshangs pa skye ba'i yul/_/dga' zhing sdug la tshangs pa zhes kyang bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun cu tshangs pa'i dpang po yab/_/
[\[204b.3\]]tshangs dbyangs ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po skad snyan dan mchog rim gro pa/_/tshangs pa'i grogs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/tshangs pa rnam par lta ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan cig yin te dgra bcom pa/_/thams cad nyon mongs bdud ni bcom pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni 
[\[204b.4\]]grangs kyang med pa 'byung /_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri chig stong yin/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam pa'i chos ni nyin gcig gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung ni/_/mchod rten dpag tshad bdun pa gcig cig 'byung //_//
[\[204b.5\]]'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_'jig rten mgon po skyes mchog skye ba yi/_/yul ni mchog tu mdzes pa zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod ljon shing dbang po yab/_/nga 
[\[204b.6\]]rgyal ljon shing ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mchog ma legs mchog rim gro pa/_/chos kyi mchog ma zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/gsal bar gnas zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu kun la yang /_/dgra bcom thams cad dri ma sprugs pa po/_/ther 'bum phrag 
[\[204b.7\]]ni dgu dgu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni sum khri yin/_/grags pa mtha' yas pa yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/mchod rten dpag tshad drug pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]pa spyan sdug skye ba yi/_/yul ni blta na sdug pa zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od dpag tshad/_/dgu bcu rtsa dgu yab ni mdzes ldan yin/_/mdzes dga' ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mig ldan rim gro pa/_/mdzes pa 'od ces 
[\[205a.2\]]bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten dad par byed pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu drug kun la'ang /_/byang chub mchog rab dga' la legs gnas pa/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag bcu bcu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam 
[\[205a.3\]]chos dag_/lo grangs sum khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten gcig 'byung la/_/rin chen brgya yi dra bas bskor bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klus ni byin pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni klu dang ldan zhes bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/
[\[205a.4\]]dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni don gnas yin/_/yon tan ldan zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po legs mthu blo mthu rim gro pa/_/dge gnas zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gti mug med pa mtha' yas rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang /_/dgra bcom 
[\[205a.5\]]dag ni tshang bar 'dus 'gyur te/_/ther 'bum phrag ni dgu dgu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag bcu gcig yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs dag ni stong du gnas pa yin/_/dpag tshad brgyad pa'i mchod rten 'byung 'gyur te/_/rin chen brgya 
[\[205a.6\]]yi dra bas rnam par spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i tog dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni gsal ba'i tog ces bya/_/de yi rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad stong yod yab ni tog [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po sgron ma lha sbyin rim gro 
[\[205a.7\]]pa/_/'od mchog ces ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gsal bar gnas zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu kun la yang /_/srid pa kun la chags bral yid ldan pa/_/de dag bye ba phrag ni brgya brgya yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni lnga 'bum yin/_/'gro la phan phyir dam pa'i 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs dgu khri brgyad stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/lha mi dag gis rtag tu mchod par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po brgyan pa skye ba yi/_/yul ni gzi brjid legs par brgyan ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag 
[\[205b.2\]]tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab ni khyad par 'phags/_/blo brgyan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/gnam po sras yin des pa rim gro pa/_/yon tan brgyan ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/legs bsams sems zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/tha ba 
[\[205b.3\]]med pa'i bsam gtan pa de dag_/dung phyur phrag ni brgyad brgyad 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad cu yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad 
[\[205b.4\]]bzhi pa bla res mdzes par byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhum pa med dbyangs kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dbyangs dang ldan zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni dbang po dbyangs/_/dbyangs snyan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po skad 
[\[205b.5\]]snyan gdangs mchog rim gro pa/_/byams pa'i nga ro zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/mchog gi dbyangs zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu drug kun la'ang /_/dgra bcom thob pa rims nad med pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu bcu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri 
[\[205b.6\]]sum stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri tham par gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten 'bum phrag snyed kyis gang bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rin chen 'od ni skye ba yi/_/yul ni bsod nams gzi 
[\[205b.7\]]brjid bzang zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gnyis yod yab ni legs dga' yin/_/dul gnas dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rtsi sman mthu rtsal rim gro pa/_/srid pa sel zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/me tog 'od gsal ba ni rdzu 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu gsum kun la yang /_/dgra bcom rnal 'byor pa dag 'dus 'gyur te/_/bye ba phrag ni bcu gnyis bcu gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das nas dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs brgyad 
[\[206a.2\]]khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad brgyad pa gser gyi bla rer ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs byin skye ba yi/_/yul ni dbyangs dag dga' ba zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag 
[\[206a.3\]]tshad bcu yod yab ni dbyangs snyan yin/_/gdangs snyan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po bden ldan lha legs rim gro pa/_/yon tan dbyangs dga' blo gros can yin te/_/sa yi dbyangs zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/'jig 
[\[206a.4\]]rten dag la phan byed dgra bcom pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/dul ba dul bar mdzad pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/kun nas dpag tshad
