[\[226b.1\]]rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad stong ngo /_/yab ni mkhas brtson zhes bya'o/_/yum ni brtson pa mi gtong ba zhes bya'o/_/sras ni mthu rtsal gnas zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i mthu rtsal can zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes 
[\[226b.2\]]mthu rtsal sbyin zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten mchod 'os thob ces bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa 'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis gnyis so/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo dgu khri'i bar du 
[\[226b.3\]]gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa skye ba'i yul ni mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad nyi khri bzhi stong ngo /_/yab ni gsal dag ces bya'o/_/yum ni mya ngan thams cad gtong zhes bya'o/_/
[\[226b.4\]]sras ni smon lam ma 'khrul ba zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni blo ma 'dzings pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ma 'dres par sems pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni lta gsal blo can zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan sum cu ste/_thams cad 
[\[226b.5\]]la yang bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis so/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri sum stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo dgu khri dgu stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer 
[\[226b.6\]]skye ba'i yul ni bdag med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum cu rtsa drug go/_/yab ni chos mthong zhes bya'o/_/yum ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/sras ni kun tu lta ba can zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni bkod pa mi gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[226b.7\]]shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes gsal zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni yongs mthong blo nges zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan sum cu rtsa gnyis te/_thams cad la yang 'bum 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo nyi khri nyis stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]nyi khri chig stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor tog skye ba'i yul ni yul 'khor mtha' yas tog ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag 
[\[227a.2\]]tshad brgya'o/_/yab ni tog gi nga ro zhes bya'o/_/yum ni tog 'brangs zhes bya'o/_/sras ni mtha' yas tog ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni yon tan rin chen rnam par grags zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni shes rab tog gsal zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi 
[\[227a.3\]]mchog ni lha dga' kha lo sgyur zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu gnyis te/_thams cad la yang stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo khri bzhi stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo khri bzhi stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod 
[\[227a.4\]]rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i snying po skye ba'i yul ni me tog thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/_/yab ni snyan pa thob ces bya'o/_/yum ni ye shes can zhes bya'o/_/sras ni 
[\[227a.5\]]gzhal med gzi brjid bzang po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni lha'i tshogs kyi lha zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni lta ba tshod ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni lta ba mtha' yas 'phags zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bdun cu ste/_thams cad 
[\[227a.6\]]la yang bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas skye ba'i yul ni yon 
[\[227a.7\]]tan gzi brjid kyis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun cu'o/_/yab ni lhas mchod ces bya'o/_/yum ni 'od sbyin ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni blo'i sgron ma zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mtha' yas blo zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]ni dge ba kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni so [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan drug cu ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung 
[\[227b.2\]]ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i 'od zer skye ba'i yul ni lha dad ces bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgya'o/_/yab ni mthu rtsal mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o/_/yum ni mchod don zhes bya'o/_/sras ni mchod 'dod ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni me tog byin 
[\[227b.3\]]zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni don chen thob ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni shin tu mthu rtsal stobs zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bdun cu ste/_thams cad la yang 'bum phrag drug drug go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o/_/dam pa'i 
[\[227b.4\]]chos kyang lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab me tog skye ba'i yul ni rin po che'i me tog ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad cu'o/_/yab 
[\[227b.5\]]ni yon tan me tog ces bya'o/_/yum ni bdud rtsi'i me tog ces bya'o/_/sras ni bsod nams me tog ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i me tog ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten gyi me tog ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rin 
[\[227b.6\]]chen me tog gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu drug ste/_thams cad la yang sa ya phrag gsum gsum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa 
[\[227b.7\]]skye ba'i yul ni rin po che bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'o/_/yab ni pad ma'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni me tog bzang po'i gzi byin ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni bsod nams gzi brjid gzugs brnyan gzi byin sems zhes bya'o/_/
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]rim gro pa ni spa gos zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mchod sbyin go bgos nga ro'i blo can zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'od gsal dri med sems zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu bzhi ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum ther 
[\[228a.2\]]'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri bzhi stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byor ldan skye ba'i yul ni rin po che 'byor pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad dgu brgya'o/_/
[\[228a.3\]]yab ni rin chen gzi brjid snang ba ces bya'o/_/yum ni rin chen 'od ces bya'o/_/sras ni rin po che'i 'byung gnas zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni rin po che'i sgron ma zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rin chen bzang po zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni bzang 
[\[228a.4\]]mchog dpal zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu dgu ste/_thams cad la yang sa ya phrag gsum gsum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo dgu stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad 
[\[228a.5\]]do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyig skye ba'i yul ni dbyig snang zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum cu'o/_/yab ni gzungs kyi nga ro zhes bya'o/_/yum ni tshangs mchog dpal zhes bya'o/_/sras ni thar pa la dmigs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/
[\[228a.6\]]rim gro pa ni phung po mtha' yas zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni grags pa'i rgyal mtshan rgyal chen zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal bdud rtsi gnas zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan brgyad cu rtsa brgyad de/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag brgyad 
[\[228a.7\]]brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rin chen skye ba'i yul ni rin po che bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad brgya'o/_/
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]yab ni rin chen lag ces bya'o/_/yum ni rin chen mtha' yas ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni yon tan rnam par lta zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni rin chen mig ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan bkod pa'i lus zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni lus ma 
[\[228b.2\]]smad ces bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu bzhi ste/_thams cad la yang sa ya phrag drug drug go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo sum khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin 
[\[228b.3\]]gshegs pa dbang ldan skye ba'i yul ni dbang po'i rgyan bkod pa rnam par grags pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun cu'o/_/yab ni dbang pos byin zhes bya'o/_/yum ni lha ma yin gyi gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/sras ni dbang gsal byin zhes bya'o/_/rim 
[\[228b.4\]]gro pa ni dpal brtsegs dbang po brtan zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rnam par snang byed rgyal mtshan grags pa gsal zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni chags pa med par gnas pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan sum cu rtsa drug 
[\[228b.5\]]ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag drug cu drug cu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum mo/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs par gsung ba skye ba'i yul ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/
[\[228b.6\]]'od ni dpag tshad lnga brgya'o/_/yab ni mi thub thul zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yon tan gsal zhes bya'o/_/sras ni blo mchog ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni zhi ba gsal zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'phags dad gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rnam 
[\[228b.7\]]par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag 'bum 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo dgu khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gsung skye ba'i yul ni shin tu blta na gsal ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgya'o/_/yab ni 'od mchog dpal zhes bya'o/_/yum ni zil gyis mi non pa'i mdog can zhes bya'o/_/sras ni rnam 
[\[229a.2\]]grags rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni bdud rtsi'i sgron ma zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan mtha' yas spyad pa'i blo can zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni sgra la chags pa med par ston pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bdun cu rtsa 
[\[229a.3\]]brgyad de/_thams cad la yang 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod 'os skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[229a.4\]]rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad brgya'o/_/yab ni don dpyod ces bya'o/_/yum ni skar 'od can zhes bya'o/_/sras ni 'jig rten dga' zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 'phags pa dad ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'gro bas mchog ces bya'o/_/rdzu 
[\[229a.5\]]'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni shes rab spobs pa rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag gsum gsum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri'i bar du gnas 
[\[229a.6\]]so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid mtha' yas 'od ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sum cu tsam mo/_/yab ni yon 
[\[229a.7\]]tan rin chen tog 'od grags zhes bya'o/_/yum ni spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyal mo zhes bya'o/_/sras ni yon tan rin chen mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni bdud rnam par skrag par byed pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i blo can zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bag tsha ba med 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]pas rnam par rtse ba'i mngon par shes pa thob pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa thub pa med pa'i tshogs can zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan lnga bcu ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag gsum gsum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 
[\[229b.2\]]drug khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo drug khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma skye ba'i yul ni nyi ma'i 'od bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mo/_/yab ni phyogs gsal 
[\[229b.3\]]grags zhes bya'o/_/yum ni nyi ma'i snying po 'od ces bya'o/_/sras ni dri med 'od 'phro tog 'byung blo zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 'jig rten gyi spyod pa bas mchod pa'i bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni brtson 'grus brtan pos pha rol gnon par grags pa ma 
[\[229b.4\]]smad pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes rin po che'i me tog rnam par rtse ba'i dbyangs can zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu rtsa drug ste/_thams cad la yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dung phyur phrag re re'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o/_/
[\[229b.5\]]dam pa'i chos ni lo dgu khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dam las rgal ba skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba bkod pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mo/_/yab 
[\[229b.6\]]ni chu bo spong zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yon tan rin chen rgya mtsho'i blo gros zhes bya'o/_/sras ni dbyangs snyan bkod pa'i sems zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni ye shes me tog mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni gti mug med pa'i gnas pa rnam par brtse ba'i 
[\[229b.7\]]gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni stobs bcu la rtog cing mi tshugs par grags pa zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan sum cu rtsa drug ste/_thams cad la yang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ther 'bum phrag re re dang /_dung phyur phrag bdun bdun 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]dang bye ba phrag bzhi bzhi'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brnyes skye ba'i yul ni ye shes kyis rnam par sprul zhing gsal ba rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[230a.2\]]rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad do/_/yab ni ye shes 'phel zhes bya'o/_/yum ni ye shes snying po zhes bya'o/_/sras ni ye shes gsal zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni ye shes nyan 'dod ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni tshul thams cad kyis bden 
[\[230a.3\]]pa'i khyad par gyi sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa 'dus pa ni lan drug cu ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag re re'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo lnga khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo drug 
[\[230a.4\]]khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do//_//'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu dgu pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa skye ba'i yul ni nor bu rin po ches khong 
[\[230a.5\]]snums pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug brgya'o/_/yab ni byang chub la dad pa'i mid pa zhes bya'o/_/yum ni nyi zla rnam par mthong ba'i 'od ces bya'o/_/sras ni rin chen me tog gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni yon tan snang ba'i sems zhes 
[\[230a.6\]]bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni nor sbyin mthu rtsal ma 'khrul sems zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan lnga ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag re re'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo khri lnga stong ngo /_/
[\[230a.7\]]dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rma bya skye ba'i yul ni bkod pa yid du 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad do/_/yab ni lag 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]shugs sgra skad ces bya'o/_/yum ni mi'am ci'i dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/sras ni brda dang sgra thams cad pa zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni gti mug med pa'i dbang phyug gnas zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rang gi sgra snang ba zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni dge ba brgya 
[\[230b.2\]]stong gis rab tu brgyan pa'i nga ro zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan lnga bcu ste/_thams cad la yang sa ya phrag lnga lnga'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bzhi khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[230b.3\]]pa chos sbyin skye ba'i yul ni 'od kyi bkod pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug go/_/yab ni chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya'o/_/yum ni legs par bsams pa sems pa chos kyi blo gros ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni chos rin po che'i 
[\[230b.4\]]tog ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni chos kyi sgron ma'i rgyal po chen po zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan thams cad snang bar byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan gyi phung po 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan 
[\[230b.5\]]nyi shu rtsa lnga ste/_thams cad la yang nyi shu nyi shu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo nyi khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo nyi khri sum stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phan par bzhed pa skye ba'i yul ni grags pa ma 
[\[230b.6\]]smad pa'i gzugs zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad dgu brgya'o/_/yab ni drang srong sems gsal zhes bya'o/_/yum ni nyi ma'i gzugs brda ston zhes bya'o/_/sras ni skye ba'i tshul snang bar byed par grags pa zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni dge bas rab tu brgyan 
[\[230b.7\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni sgrib pa med par brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan thams cad kyis bag tsha ba med par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/dgra bcom pa 'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu ste/_thams cad la yang sa ya phrag 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]bdun bdun no/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri chig stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo dgu khri chig stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ldan skye ba'i yul ni ye shes kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/
[\[231a.2\]]rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgya'o/_/yab ni ye shes kyi 'byung gnas mtha' yas pa zhes bya'o/_/yum ni spobs pa thams cad ston pa zhes bya'o/_/sras ni dbyangs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po seng ge'i sgra rnam par sgrogs pa zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni nyi ma'i gzi brjid 
[\[231a.3\]]kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i nga ro zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni sgom pa la dad pa'i khyim gti mug med cing sgrib pa med par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mi gnas pa'i bkod pa thub pa med pa'i tshogs ston pa zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan brgyad 
[\[231a.4\]]cu ste/_thams cad la yang 'bum phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa 
[\[231a.5\]]skye ba'i yul ni dga' bas rgyas pa yang dag par rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bzhi bcu snyed tsam mo/_/yab ni bsam pa thams cad 'phags zhes bya'o/_/yum ni yid kyis sems pa yongs su tshim par byed pa 
[\[231a.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/sras ni brda skad thams cad la rab tu spobs pa zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mi thub pa'i tshogs kyi mdzod ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni lhun po'i rna rgyan sdug pa nyams dga' zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rin chen kun tu 'od ces bya'o/_/
[\[231a.7\]]nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi dra ba skye ba'i yul ni 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]rin po che'i dra ba mtha' yas pa bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu snyed tsam mo/_/yab ni thub pa med pa'i tshogs ston pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o/_/yum ni dgra thul gzi brjid blo gros ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni 'dod bzho 
[\[231b.2\]]yul 'khor mchod ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni brda skad zad mi shes pa'i blo can zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rin po che'i dra bas rnam par brgyan pa'i mdzod ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa'i blo can zhes bya'o/_/
[\[231b.3\]]nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan brgyad cu ste/_thams cad la yang 'bum phrag bcu drug bcu drug go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bcom pa skye ba'i yul 
[\[231b.4\]]ni mya ngan med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun stong ngo /_/yab ni seng ge rnam par rtse ba'i gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/yum ni rin chen me tog can zhes bya'o/_/sras ni brtul zhugs 'byung ba'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni rnam par 
[\[231b.5\]]snang byed 'od tog ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rgyags pa'i skyon dang sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni ston pa gsal bar brtsegs pa'i sems zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba stong 
[\[231b.6\]]phrag nyi shu rtsa bdun bdun no/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum mo/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bai dUr+ya'i snying po skye ba'i yul ni glog snang bar byed pa shin tu 'phags pa'i gzi 
[\[231b.7\]]brjid ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgya'o/_/yab ni rin chen snying po 'od ces bya'o/_/yum ni byi ru gsal zhes bya'o/_/sras ni bzang mchog tog ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni brtson 'grus brtan pos pha rol gnon pa can zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]kyi mchog ni rin chen bkod pa'i go gyon seng ge zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni phyogs bcu mthong bas rnam par rtse ba'i mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad 
[\[232a.2\]]ni lo bdun khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog skye ba'i yul ni rin po che'i me tog gis rab tu brgyan pa ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od 
[\[232a.3\]]ni dpag tshad brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'o/_/yab ni rin po che'i me tog thams cad snang ba zhes bya'o/_/yum ni rin po che'i me tog gis rab tu brgyan pa'i gzi brjid phung po zhes bya'o/_/sras ni 'khrul pa med pa'i sems zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mthu rtsal legs par spyod ces bya'o/_/shes 
[\[232a.4\]]rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ye shes lta bas mchod ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni brda skad thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bdun cu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag bcu gnyis bcu gnyis so/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o/_/dam 
[\[232a.5\]]pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba'i nyi ma bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo /_/yab 
[\[232a.6\]]ni lha dad rab brgyan ces bya'o/_/yum ni rin chen lha'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/sras ni ngan song las 'das par sems pa zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni chags med spobs pa brtsegs zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mngon par shes pa'i rgyal po byang chub 'phags zhes bya'o/_/
[\[232a.7\]]rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten pa thams cad mgu zhing mngon par dga' bar sems pa zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan brgyad cu ste/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum ther 'bum mo/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo nyi khri nyis stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so/_/
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba skye ba'i yul ni tshig la mngon par dga' ba can zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum cu'o/_/yab ni 'jig rten pas bsngags pa zhes bya'o/_/yum ni sems gsal ma zhes bya'o/_/sras ni 'jig 
[\[232b.2\]]rten kun mchog ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mchog gi ye shes rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan grags pa 'od ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las rgal ba'i blo can zhes bya'o/_/nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan lnga bcu 
[\[232b.3\]]ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag re re'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i 'od skye ba'i yul ni dran pa'i 
[\[232b.4\]]go bgos pa gnas kyi mchog ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu tsam mo/_/yab ni bskal pa grangs med mthong bar sems zhes bya'o/_/yum ni dus gsum mnyam nyid blo zhes bya'o/_/sras ni rin po che'i tshogs kyi 
[\[232b.5\]]mdzod ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyis rnam par rtse ba'i nga ro zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mya ngan sel ba bag tsha ba med pa thob pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni thos pa thams cad kyis rnam par sprul pa bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[232b.6\]]'dus pa ni lan brgya ste/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ther 'bum phrag sum cu snyed do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo nyi khri nyis stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir lo khri nyis stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas 
[\[232b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i 'od dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'jig rten mkhas zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis yab ni legs sems yin/_/yon tan bu ni rgyal yum yon tan sems/_/sras yin yon tan nor ni 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]rim gro pa/_/yon tan tshogs kyi tog ni blo can te/_/yon tan thams cad mchog ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs mtha' yas kun la yang /_/byang chub dag las phyir ni mi ldog pa/_/bye ba 'bum phrag 'bum phrag 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu 
[\[233a.2\]]khri nyis stong yin/_/srid mthar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/zhing khams kun tu sku gdung dag gis khyab/_/sangs rgyas yon tan mchog ma kun 'od kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rdzu 'phrul 
[\[233a.3\]]snang zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te dri med 'od/_/dpag tshad bcu yod 'od kyi dbang po yab/_/yon tan tshogs ni rgyal yum yon tan mchog_/sras yin yon tan dbang po rim gro pa/_/yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/yon tan dbang po gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[233a.4\]]'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/mtshungs med yon tan kun bsags snang med thob/_/sbyor bsregs bye ba nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri sum stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal 
[\[233a.5\]]ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad gsum pa bkod pas rnam par spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che yi dpal/_/skye ba'i yul ni dpal gyi tshogs zhes bya/_/rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod grags pa'i dbang po yab/_/dpal 
[\[233a.6\]]mchod ma ni rgyal yum rin po che/_/sras yin rin chen dpal ni rim gro pa/_/grags par gnas pa shes rab can yin te/_/mkhas pa zhes ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/kun kyang ri bo lhun ltar mi g.yo ba/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu bzhi snyed yod/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i dam chos dag_/
[\[233a.7\]]lo grangs sum khri brgyad stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten sa yas zhing rnams khyab par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu zla ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni zla bas brgyan zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]tshad dgu yod yab ni legs mchod yin/_/zla mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po zla bzang zla ba rim gro pa/_/bzhin ldan zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten rnam par lta ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu kun la yang /_/ngar mi 'dzin pa mkha' 
[\[233b.2\]]dang mtshungs pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri nyis stong yin/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/sum cu rtsa bdun bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/gser gyi rgyal mtshan mchog stong 
[\[233b.3\]]snyed kyis spras/_/'jig rten mgon po sgra gcan skye ba yi/_/yul ni lha min mchod rten zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab ni lha dbang yin/_/lha ma yin dbang bdag mo rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po nor ldan nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim 
[\[233b.4\]]gro pa/_/dul gnas dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/dgra yis 'jigs pa med pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu gnyis kun la yang /_/sred pa 'gog par thar la dga' ba po/_/ther 'bum phrag ni gsum gsum yod par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni khri yang 
[\[233b.5\]]yin/_/srid mthar phyin pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs stong du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/srid pa gsum por mchod cing bkur bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'od skye ba'i/_/yul ni yon tan snang bar byed 
[\[233b.6\]]ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni mthu ldan yin/_/dad ldan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po go bgos dul ba rim gro pa/_/bdud rtsi'i nga ro zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/bsam gtan pa la dad byed rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[233b.7\]]'dus pa lan grangs drug cu drug kun la'ang /_/nyon mongs bdud kun 'joms par byed pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri chig stong yin/_/dam chos lo grangs drug khri drug stong gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]te/_/dpag tshad bcu gnyis gser gyi bla rer ldan/_/rin chen mchog gi rna rgyan dag gis brgyan/_/bde gshegs 'jig rten mchog ma skye ba'i yul/_/shin tu snyan pa'i gtam dang ldan zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gsum 
[\[234a.2\]]me tog bzang po yab/_/dpal rgyal me tog yum yin me tog gsal/_/sras yin tsam pa ka ni rim gro pa/_/me tog sdug ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs med me tog ces bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu drug kun la'ang /_/chags las 'das pa 'jig rten mi 
[\[234a.3\]]lta ba/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri lnga stong yin/_/dam chos lo grangs bdun khri drug stong gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad bzhi pa mu tig bla rer bcas/_/bai dUr+ya yi rna rgyan brtsegs par ldan/_/de bzhin 
[\[234a.4\]]gshegs pa skar ma'i 'od dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'od 'phro can zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad nyi shu snang ba'i dbang po yab/_/'od 'phro snang zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po med byin 'od ldan rim gro pa/_/glog 'od gzi brjid blo gros 
[\[234a.5\]]can yin te/_/'od 'phro gsal ba'i dpal ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu kun la yang /_/chu bo bzhi yi pha mthar legs gnas pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu lnga lnga yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri brgyad stong yin/_/yon tan slob dpon dag gi dam chos dag_/
[\[234a.6\]]lo grangs sum khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mtshan mo mar me stong snyed 'od kyang 'bar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i stobs dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mkhas pas mchod ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi 
[\[234a.7\]]shu rtsa bdun yab ni rnam grol yin/_/dgra bcom dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po 'chad mkhan dge legs rim gro pa/_/mchod rten chen po zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/rgol bas 'jigs pa med pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/'jig 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]rten zang zing med pa'i dgra bcom pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri sum stong yin/_/dam chos lo grangs sum khri chig stong gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad bzhi pa rin chen phal po che'i/_/dra bas spras pas 
[\[234b.2\]]'od ni mtha' yang yas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni ye shes tshogs zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa gsum yab ni yon tan yin/_/don 'dod ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po legs gzhi zla dbang rim 
[\[234b.3\]]gro pa/_/mchod rten shing rta zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs med ye shes ldan pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/sred pa'i rgya mtsho rnam par skems pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri nyis stong yin/_/rgyal 
[\[234b.4\]]ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/'on kyang lo grangs stong du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/zhing rnams kun tu 'od ni mtha' yang yas/_/chos kyi dbang phyug ri yi dbang po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mdzes par spras zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs 
[\[234b.5\]]ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni lha bzang yin/_/lha yi dbang phyug ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po tsan dan spos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/rin chen 'gros zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/chos la rnam par lta ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug 
[\[234b.6\]]kun la'ang /_/dgra bcom thams cad chags pa med gyur pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri sum stong yin/_/'gro la phan phyir dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/sku gdung rgyas 'gyur mchod rten dam pa'i 
[\[234b.7\]]grangs/_/bye ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'byung /_/mi yi mgon po rab tu zhi ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni grags par snang zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis shin tu zhi ba yab/_/zhi gnas dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po zhi byin zhi 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]dbang rim gro pa/_/bdud bzhi byed pa blo gros can yin te/_/yid dbang shin tu zhi ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu drug kun la yang /_/srid par 'dzin pa'i mdud pa rnam grol ba/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum 
[\[235a.2\]]khri sum stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad lnga pa rin chen bdun las byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mthu stobs kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 
[\[235a.3\]]legs par skyes zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze khyad par 'phags pa'i 'od/_/dpag tshad bdun cu yab ni legs brtsegs yin/_/yon tan 'od 'phro rgyal yum yon tan mchog_/sras yin yon tan gtso bo rim gro pa/_/yon tan kha lo sgyur ba mkhas pa ste/_/yon tan dbang po 
[\[235a.4\]]gsal ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu drug kun la'ang /_/dgra bcom thams cad chags med gnas pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri sum stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du 
[\[235a.5\]]gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad bdun pa tog mchog bla rer ldan/_/bde bar gshegs pa lha yi dbang po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dbang pos brgyan zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni 
[\[235a.6\]]dbang chen yin/_/dge dbang blo gros rgyal yum sras po ni/_/tshig len nor kun bzang po rim gro pa/_/dbang po'i rgyal mtshan tog ni blo can te/_/bag yod rnam par grags pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/'ching dang dra ba 'dor bar byed pa 
[\[235a.7\]]po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri sum stong yin/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs sum khri drug stong gnas/_/mchod rten dpag tshad brgyad pa 'byung 'gyur te/_/rin chen brgya yi dra bas rnam par spras/_/mi yi 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]'dren pa dbyangs dag snyan pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dbyangs kyi yan lag yin/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni dbyangs snyan yin/_/gdangs snyan ma ni rgyal yum sras po ni/_/mchog ma shin tu rgyal dka' rim gro pa/_/yon tan grags 
[\[235b.2\]]pa'i dbang phyug blo can te/_/'jig rten dag gis mi 'jigs rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu drug kun la'ang /_/rigs ni 'od ldan lung ni mtshungs pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni drug khri yin/_/dngos po med par phyin pa'i dam 
[\[235b.3\]]chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/mi mchog mya ngan 'das nas sku gdung ni/_/mchod rten dpag tshad sum cu pa gcig 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa ngos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]skye ba yi/_/yul ni gzi brjid snang bar byed ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag 
[\[235b.4\]]tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab ni lha bzang yin/_/ril ba stobs brtan rgyal yum sras po ni/_/dka' thub chen po mthong ldan rim gro pa/_/phyogs rnams rnam par lta ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten sgron ma 'byin pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang /_/
[\[235b.5\]]dri gsum dri med ther 'bum ther 'bum yod/_/mi rnams dag gi tshe yi tshad dag kyang /_/lo grangs bdun khri sum stong tham pa yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri tshang ba'i bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/lha mi 
[\[235b.6\]]dag gis bstod cing mchod par 'gyur/_/mi yi 'dren pa don la gnas pa yi/_/skye yul don ston blo gros zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga yod yab ni don byas yin/_/don sgra zhes ni bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mchog ma 'gros 
[\[235b.7\]]ldan rim gro pa/_/'gro don skyong zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten sgron ma 'byin pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/dgra bcom ngar mi 'dzin pa sdig sbyangs pa/_/legs gnas de dag ther 'bum ther 'bum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]stong yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs sum khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten 'bum phrag snyed kyis brgyan par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gzi brjid dpal/_/skye yul 
[\[236a.2\]]yon tan thams cad 'byung zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi yab ni gzugs bzang yin/_/gzi brjid 'od ni rgyal yum sras po ni/_/gzi byin yon tan gzi brjid rim gro pa/_/phyogs mchod pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bdud rab 'joms 
[\[236a.3\]]zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/dgra bcom bye ba bcu drug bcu drug yod/_/mi rnams dag gi tshe yi tshad dag kyang /_/lo grangs nyi khri bdun stong tham pa yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs sum khri'i bar du 
[\[236a.4\]]gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/pad ma 'bum phrag snyed kyis brgyan par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen ldan zla med pa/_/skye yul shes ldan snang bar byed ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bdun cu rtsa gsum mchod 
[\[236a.5\]]sbyin bzang po yab/_/ye shes can ni rgyal yum shes ldan byin/_/sras yin legs pa'i mchod sbyin rim gro pa/_/ye shes dbang phyug ces bya mkhas pa ste/_/chags med rnam par grol ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu gnyis kun la'ang /_/sred phyogs dri ma dag 
[\[236a.6\]]dang bral ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni stong yang yin/_/dam chos lo grangs bdun khri drug stong gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad grangs/_/bcu gsum pa ste gcig cig 'byung 'gyur la/_/gser gyi bla re brgya phrag 
[\[236a.7\]]snyed kyis brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro dpag med kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rta skad dbyangs zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad nyi shu yab ni dbyangs snyan yin/_/shes ldan dbyangs ni yum yin sras po ni/_/bye brgyad pa yin snyan ldan rim gro 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]pa/_/gdangs snyan pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bdud rnams rnam par 'jig pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/thub pa'i dgra bcom ye shes mchog ldan pa/_/ther 'bum ther 'bum dag ni 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs 
[\[236b.2\]]dgu khri bzhi stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten stong phrag snyed kyis kun tu gang /_/skyes bu dam pa 'od bzang skye ba yi/_/yul ni 'od kyis legs par 
[\[236b.3\]]brgyan zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab ni mthu ldan yin/_/gzi brjid chen mo can ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po tshangs sbyin yul sa rim gro pa/_/nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs pa med pa'i blo ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[236b.4\]]'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang /_/tshangs par sems bzang lha yis mchod 'gyur ba/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i 
[\[236b.5\]]sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/'jig rten phan phyir rgyal bas rnam par bkang /_/'jig rten mchog ma shin tu thugs gzhungs pa'i/_/skye ba'i yul ni byang chub tshogs zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni gsal ba yin/_/
[\[236b.6\]]gzi brjid 'od ldan ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po yul sdug legs mthong rim gro pa/_/mi snyoms tog ni blo gros can yin te/_/'jigs pa med pa'i blo ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu drug kun la'ang /_/thams cad zang zing med pa'i chos sbyin byed/_/bye ba phrag ni 
[\[236b.7\]]nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/dam chos lo grangs bdun khri drug stong gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/'phang srid du ni dpag tshad bzhi 'phags la/_/gser gyi rgyan dag gis ni 'khor bar bskor/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]don dgongs gti mug bral/_/skye yul rnam par grol ba mchog ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa gsum yab ni legs bzang yin/_/bzang byed ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po bzang ldan zla legs rim gro pa/_/yon 
[\[237a.2\]]tan grags par byed pa blo can te/_/'jig rten rnam par snang byed rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu gcig kun la'ang /_/khur bor pha rol dag tu phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri chig stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam 
[\[237a.3\]]chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad lnga pa kun nas legs par spras/_/sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad 'phags kyi/_/skye yul khyad 'phags snang bar byed ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal 
[\[237a.4\]]rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bdun cu rtsa gnyis yab ni nga ro mchog_/gdangs mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/kha lo sgyur sras yid 'thad rim gro pa/_/rab tu zhi ba'i nga ro mkhas pa ste/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad 'phags rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs 
[\[237a.5\]]nyi shu drug kun la'ang /_/lta ba bsal ba gti mug med gyur pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu re re yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/
[\[237a.6\]]dpag tshad brgyad pa gser gyis mdzes par byas/_/rgyal ba mchog tu mdzes par gshegs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'jig rten bsngags zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni lha bzang yin/_/chos kyi dbang phyug ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/
[\[237a.7\]]sras po thar byed rnam thar rim gro pa/_/yon tan mchod rten zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/rnam grol gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu gsum kun la'ang /_/dgra bcom zla ba nya dang 'dra ba po/_/de dag ther 'bum phrag ni gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]nyi khri bzhi stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das nas dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs nyi khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/gser gyi bla re rgyal mtshan dag gis bskor/_/'jig rten mchog ma zhi don skye ba'i yul/_/rnam par gdon mi za ba'i 
[\[237b.2\]]don zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod gzi brjid dbang po yab/_/gzi brjid 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po ston byed yul [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/phyogs mchod pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/yon tan kun gyi mchog ma rdzu 'phrul 
[\[237b.3\]]can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad de kun la yang /_/mi khom sred pa'i dra ba gcod pa po/_/de dag bye phrag bcu bzhi bcu bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i 
[\[237b.4\]]sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/stong gsum 'gro ba thams cad dbang du mdzad/_/chos kyi dbang phyug skyon med skye ba yi/_/yul ni skyon rnams rab tu sel zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis yab ni rgya chen yin/_/lha mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal 
[\[237b.5\]]ba'i yum/_/sras po kha sgyur mthu rtsal rim gro pa/_/yon tan mchod rten zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/bsam gtan pa yis bsngags pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu drug kun la'ang /_/mtsho ltar gang ba de dang mtshungs pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/
[\[237b.6\]]mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/rgol ba tshar gcod pa yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad gcig pa bla re stong dang ldan/_/bde bar gshegs pa blo dbyangs dge ba yi/_/skye yul dge ba 
[\[237b.7\]]snang bar byed ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/dge 'od ma ni rgyal yum sras po ni/_/gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal ba'i rim gro pa/_/phyogs mchod pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten snang bar byed pa rdzu 'phrul 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/thams cad chags med gyur pa bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/snang ba med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong bar du 
[\[238a.2\]]gnas/_/'gro ba'i don du rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag_/'jig rten gsum kun rgyas shing gang bar 'gyur/_/rdul dang bral ba'i pad ma'i mdzod skye ba'i/_/yul ni pad ma'i phung po zhes kyang bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bdun cu rtsa drug yab ni pad ma bzang /_/
[\[238a.3\]]pad dpal ma ni rgyal yum sras po ni/_/snying rje chen po thog ni rim gro pa/_/yon tan me tog 'dzin pa blo can te/_/mchog sred ces ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu gsum kun la yang /_/cha gnyis dag las rnam grol dgra bcom mchog_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu bzhi 
[\[238a.4\]]bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug khri drug stong yin/_/dam chos lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag bcu drug ste/_/mchod rten de kun rin chen bdun las byas/_/'jig rten mchog ma 'od zer bzang po yi/_/skye yul 
[\[238a.5\]]'od zer snang bar byed ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'od zer chen po yab/_/dga' ba grags 'dzin ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po pad ma legs mthong rim gro pa/_/chags pa med pa'i sgra ni blo can te/_/gleng ba'i nga ro zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[238a.6\]]'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu kun la yang /_/me 'od 'phro ba ltar ni chags med pa/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri lnga stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten 
[\[238a.7\]]gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad brgya pa gser gyi 'od dang ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i mdog dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni spobs pa'i mdog ces bya/_/rgyal ba de yi rigs ni bram ze yin/_/'od ni mtha' yas bdag nyid chen po yab/_/'od kyi kha dog can ni rgyal ba'i 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]yum/_/rin chen mchog sras shes ldan rim gro pa/_/spobs pa'i dbyangs ni blo gros can yin te/_/shes rab rnam par 'phrul pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/chags dang bral bar gyur pa'i bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu gnyis 
[\[238b.2\]]gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong yin/_/yon tan mngon dgyes pa yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag drug cu 'byung /_/mi yi 'dren pa stegs ni bzang po yi/_/skye yul 
[\[238b.3\]]'phags pa dad par byed ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gsum yab ni don chen yin/_/bdud rtsi'i nga ro zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po zhi ba nyer zhi rim gro pa/_/yon tan tshogs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mthu rtsal mtha' yas pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[238b.4\]]'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/'jig rten bde dang phan phyir gnas pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri nyis stong yin/_/dam chos lo grangs sum khri drug stong gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin la/_/dpag 
[\[238b.5\]]tshad bcu gsum pa ste gser gyis spras/_/rgyal mtshan bye ba stong gis mdzes par byas/_/yon tan rgya mtsho tshogs kyi dbang po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dbang pos brgyan ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig dga' ba'i dbang po yab/_/tshogs 
[\[238b.6\]]can spong ni rgyal yum sras po ni/_/'phags pa dad byed des pa rim gro pa/_/thar pa dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bden la dad par byed pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu drug kun la yang /_/mi slob 'bras bu dag ni thob pa po/_/'bum phrag nyi shu bzhi bzhi 
[\[238b.7\]]'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yin/_/dam chos lo grangs stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad dgu pa mu tig bla rer ldan/_/gser gyi rgyal mtshan stong gis 'khor bar bskor/_/de 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs dang bral ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug cu yab ni skrag med yin/_/klu 'od ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po dga' byed mthu rtsal rim gro pa/_/gnod 
[\[239a.2\]]med pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs pa med pa'i mchod rten rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu drug kun la'ang /_/cha gnyis dag las rnam grol mi slob pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das 
[\[239a.3\]]pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag bcu bzhi'i bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/'jig rten khams rnams thams cad gang bar 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pa ye shes bzhed pa yi/_/skye yul ye shes rnam par sgrogs zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs 
[\[239a.4\]]ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni legs shes ldan/_/ye shes lhun grub ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po shes mchog nus ldan rim gro pa/_/ye shes ri bo zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/ye shes mthong zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu gnyis 
[\[239a.5\]]kun la'ang /_/pad ma lta bur srid pas mi gos pa/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu drug drug yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga yin/_/dam chos lo grangs drug khri drug stong gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad bcu pa rin po ches spras shing /_/
[\[239a.6\]]rna rgyan dag gis mdzes byas gser gyis spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i spyan dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'jig rten mthong zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa gsum yab ni spyan legs yin/_/mig sdug ma zhes bya ba 
[\[239a.7\]]rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po gnyen po blo chen rim gro pa/_/spobs pa'i snying stobs blo gros can yin te/_/rnam par grol bar gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dag ni lan grangs drug cu ste/_/'bras bu'i mchog ma dgra bcom thob pa po/_/'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa ni gnyis 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni sum stong yin/_/'jig rten phan phyir dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/mya ngan 'das nas lo stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong du tshang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo yi mchog ma yi/_/
[\[239b.2\]]skye ba'i yul ni blo yi tshogs zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/'od 'phro ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po chos ldan chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/spobs pa'i blo ni blo gros can yin te/_/legs pa bsags 
[\[239b.3\]]pa'i blo ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/dri gsum dri ma shin tu dri med pa/_/dgra bcom bsam gtan pa ni ther 'bum snyed/_/de dag thams cad lha mi phan phyir 'dus/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri brgyad stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das nas de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/
[\[239b.4\]]rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad brgyad pa khor yug bla rer ldan/_/chos kyi dbang phyug zla ba skye ba yi/_/yul ni snang ba gsal bar byed ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab ni mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/zla bzhin ma 
[\[239b.5\]]zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po zhi ldan lha dbang rim gro pa/_/mchod rten chen po zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten bsngags zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu gnyis kun la'ang /_/dgra bcom thams cad zang zing med pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu re 
[\[239b.6\]]re yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri dgu stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/thugs rje chen po'i rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag_/zhing rnams dag tu rgyas shing gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla 'od 
[\[239b.7\]]kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni blo gros tog ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gsum yab ni 'od ldan yin/_/lha mchod ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mtha' yas bzhin sdug rim gro pa/_/snang byin ces bya blo gros can yin te/_/'phags par 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]gzhol zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu bzhi kun la'ang /_/gti mug med gyur zhi ba'i bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri lnga stong yin/_/mgon po mchog ma mya ngan 'das nas 
[\[240a.2\]]kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs bdun khri drug stong gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad brgya pa khor yug bla rer ldan/_/'jig rten mgon po bsnyengs pa med pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni ye shes tshogs zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od 
[\[240a.3\]]dpag tshad/_/bdun cu rtsa gnyis yab ni mthu ldan yin/_/'gro bas mchod ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po byams ldan skyon med rim gro pa/_/yon tan mthu rtsal zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs pa med pa'i blo ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun 
[\[240a.4\]]la yang /_/bdud kyi dpung dag dpung med byed pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag bcu bcu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/_/rgyal ba'i dam chos lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/dgu bcu rtsa drug bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/lha mi dag la phan phyir rgyal ba yi/_/sku gdung 
[\[240a.5\]]rgyas shing rnam par gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'jig rten lta zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/dgu bcu rtsa dgu gzi brjid bzang po yab/_/zla lta ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po blo ldan blo 
[\[240a.6\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/ye shes 'gros zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/chos la rnam par lta ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/chags med dngos po med par song ba po/_/bye phrag sum cu gnyis gnyis tshang bar yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni drug khri 
[\[240a.7\]]yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs drug khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad drug pa gser gyi bla rer ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mchod rten 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]mchod ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bdun cu rtsa gnyis yab ni tshangs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/chos kyi dbang phyug ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po kha sgyur pham med rim gro pa/_/dgra 'joms pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten 'jigs pa med 
[\[240b.2\]]pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/srid gsum rnam grol yid ldan mi slob par/_/ther 'bum ther 'bum dag ni yod par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri drug stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun 
[\[240b.3\]]khri tshang bar gnas par 'gyur/_/lha mi dag la phan dang bde ba'i phyir/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mchog ma dbyangs ni bzang po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni yid 'ong ldan zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis yab ni 
[\[240b.4\]]tshangs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/grags ldan nga ro zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rab zhi legs zhi rim gro pa/_/rab zhi dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gsal bar gnas zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/'jig rten phan phyir gnas pa'i dgra 
[\[240b.5\]]bcom pa/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri nyis stong yin/_/dam chos lo grangs nyi khri drug stong gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag gi mchod rten ni/_/dpag tshad brgya pa gcig ni 'byung 'gyur te/_/rin chen stong snyed dag gis rnam par spras/_/
[\[240b.6\]]rgyal ba shes rab chen po'i stegs dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'jig rten tshogs zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab ni blo gros can/_/shes rab mchog ma rgyal yum shes rab can/_/sras yin shes rab bzang po rim gro pa/_/shes 
[\[240b.7\]]rab 'byung gnas zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/shes rab snang bar byed pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu ste kun la yang /_/rgya mtsho lta bu'i blo dang ldan pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong yin/_/dam chos lo grangs sum 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]khri drug stong gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin la/_/dpag tshad sum cu pa ste gser las byas/_/mu tig bla rer ldan zhing gser gyis spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zla med pa'i/_/skye ba'i yul ni mkhas pas mchod ces bya/_/
[\[241a.2\]]rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod lte ba bzang po yab/_/yon tan mchod rten zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po blo ldan dran ldan rim gro pa/_/byang chub 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/ye shes 'od byed pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs 
[\[241a.3\]]bdun cu kun la yang /_/'khrul med yon tan pha rol phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu drug drug yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/_/bden pa gsung ba mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs bdun khrir gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag 
[\[241a.4\]]ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten grangs ni ther 'bum dgu bcu 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mkhregs pa yi/_/skye yul rab tu 'dul bar dka' zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni dbyer med yin/_/mi thub thub ni rgyal 
[\[241a.5\]]yum bsam gtan 'gro/_/sras yin chags pa med pa rim gro pa/_/mthu rtsal brtan po zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/'gros mi 'khyil zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/mchog tu zhi bar phyin pa'i bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni brgyad 
[\[241a.6\]]cu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gcig pa/_/gcig ste rin chen brgya snyed dag gis spras/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[241a.7\]]pa byang chub blo gros kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni blo gros 'chang zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab ni shed bu yin/_/spos ldan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po blo ldan blo chen rim gro pa/_/byang chub rgyal mtshan zhes bya 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]mkhas pa ste/_/byang chub tshogs zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu gnyis kun la'ang /_/khur bor rnam par grol bar phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu bcu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos 
[\[241b.2\]]dag_/lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu 'byung /_/mi yi mchog ma ljon shing dbang po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dbang po snang zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag 
[\[241b.3\]]tshad brgya yod rgyal ba'i dbang po yab/_/yon tan tshogs zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po skar mkhan legs snang rim gro pa/_/yon tan dag gis brgyan pa mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs pa med pa'i phrug gu rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu kun la yang /_/bye ba phrag 
[\[241b.4\]]ni bdun cu bzhi bzhi yod/_/gzhan yang brgyad khri brgyad khri 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong yin/_/yon tan mtha' yas pa yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong gnas par 'gyur/_/lha mi dag la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag 
[\[241b.5\]]ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdangs snyan skye ba'i yul/_/yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang ldan zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun cu rab tu dga' ba yab/_/mchog mthong ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rgyal mchog 
[\[241b.6\]]chos can rim gro pa/_/bdud rtsi nga ro zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/'phags pas bsngags zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/dgra bcom zhi ba gti mug med gyur pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis 
[\[241b.7\]]stong yin/_/chags pa med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag gi mchod rten ni/_/dpag tshad bdun cu rtsa bdun pa gcig 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams stobs dag gi/_/skye yul bsod 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]nams snang bar byed ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bdun cu rtsa gsum yab ni bsod nams 'od/_/bsod nams zla ba rgyal ba'i yum yang yin/_/sras po blo ldan blo chen rim gro pa/_/blo chen 'od ni blo gros can yin te/_/
[\[242a.2\]]blo gros rnam par grol ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu drug kun la'ang /_/srid pa kun la chags bral yid ldan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yin/_/sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/
[\[242a.3\]]dam chos lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu yi dpal dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni brtan par snang zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 
[\[242a.4\]]'od dpag tshad/_/dgu bcu rtsa gnyis yab ni legs mthu yin/_/yon tan mthu bdag rgyal yum yang dag gnas/_/sras yin gnas pa'i dbang po rim gro pa/_/ye shes gnas zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mthu rtsal legs par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[242a.5\]]'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/dgra bcom thams cad rnam par grol gyur pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri chig stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri lnga stong bar du gnas/_/
[\[242a.6\]]rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad brgyad pa gser las byas pa yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa dgyes pa yi/_/skye yul drang srong dad par byed ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni lha 
[\[242a.7\]]bzang yin/_/dgra bcom mchod ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mchod pa mchod ldan rim gro pa/_/'phags pa'i 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'phags pa dad par byed pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu drug kun la'ang /_/nyon mongs gsum gyi 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]dri ma med gyur pa/_/de dag ther 'bum ther 'bum 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das nas dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung byin gyis brlabs nas kyang /_/'jig rten 
[\[242b.2\]]sku gdung rgyas shing gang bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po mthu stobs skye ba yi/_/yul ni yon tan snang bar byed ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni lha bzang yin/_/lha mchod ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po sgra gcan 
[\[242b.3\]]skar ma rim gro pa/_/yon tan dag gis brgyan pa mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten 'jigs pa med pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang /_/rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhis pha rol phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri sum stong 
[\[242b.4\]]yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad lnga pa gser gyi mgo rgyan ldan/_/sangs rgyas skar ma la ni dgyes pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'od 'phro snang zhes bya/_/
[\[242b.5\]]rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni lha bzang yin/_/mchog mchod ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lta byed 'od 'phro rim gro pa/_/yon tan kha lo sgyur ba mkhas pa ste/_/gnas pa mtha' yas pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus 
[\[242b.6\]]pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/mtsho ltar gang ba'i bsam gtan pa yi grangs/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong yin/_/rgyal ba yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs sum khri'i bar du gnas/_/lha mi dag la 
[\[242b.7\]]phan phyir rgyal ba yi/_/sku gdung rgyas shing rnam par gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi rnga sgra yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bdud rtsi'i dbyangs zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/dgu bcu rtsa gnyis yab ni legs bzang yin/_/gdangs snyan ma zhes bya ba 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po legs mthong dga' sbyangs rim gro pa/_/yon tan nges zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/chos nges pa zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/dgra bcom thams cad chags pa med gyur pa/_/bye ba phrag 
[\[243a.2\]]ni sum cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin/_/mtha' yas 'dul bar mdzad pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri sum stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad drug pa khor yug bla rer ldan/_/de bzhin 
[\[243a.3\]]gshegs pa spyan sdug pa yi zhal/_/skye ba'i yul ni mthong bas mchod ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni spyan legs yin/_/mig sbyin ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po 'jig rten chags med rim gro pa/_/yon tan mthong 
[\[243a.4\]]zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs pa med par grags pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu kun la yang /_/theg pa mchog gis legs gnas 'bras thob pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri bzhi stong yin/_/'gog par phyin pa'i 
[\[243a.5\]]dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur te/_/zhing grangs stong snyed dag tu gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes bzang ldan gyi/_/skye yul ye shes sgron ma zhes kyang bya/_/de'i rigs 
[\[243a.6\]]bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun cu ye shes skar mda' yab/_/ye shes dbang phyug ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po shes dga' shes 'byor rim gro pa/_/ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa 
[\[243a.7\]]lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/khor yug lta bur g.yo ba med pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni dgu khri yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad brgya pa khor yug bla rer ldan//_//'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu pa/_'jig rten bla ma 'byor par ldan pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rin chen brgyan ces bya/_/
[\[243b.2\]]rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab ni blo gros can/_/yon tan tshogs ni rgyal yum yon tan mchog_/sras yin yon tan gzi brjid rim gro pa/_/yon tan gzi brjid 'chang ba blo can te/_/yon tan kun gyis mchod pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus 
[\[243b.3\]]pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang /_/sred lcugs dra ba dag las grol ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bdun cu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri bdun stong bar du gnas/_/khams 
[\[243b.4\]]gsum kun gyi 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas yon tan phung po skye ba'i yul/_/yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod lha yi rdzu 'phrul yab/_/
[\[243b.5\]]rdzu 'phrul 'gros zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rnam sgrogs drag shul rim gro pa/_/yon tan tshogs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/yon tan sgron ma'i mchog ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu drug kun la'ang /_/srid gsum 'dam gyis gos pa med pa po/_/bye 
[\[243b.6\]]ba phrag ni dgu bcu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri brgyad stong yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri brgyad stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/_/bcu gnyis pa gcig lha rdzas bla rer ldan/_/'jig 
[\[243b.7\]]rten bla ma gsal ba skye ba'i yul/_/'jigs pa med pa'i bsod nams zhes kyang bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis grags pa'i dbang po yab/_/lha grags 'dzin ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po grags 'dzin zla sdug rim 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]gro pa/_/snyan par grags pa thob pa blo can te/_/snyan par grags pa gsal ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/'jig rten dag gis mchod 'os dgra bcom pa/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag bcu bcu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bye ba 
[\[244a.2\]]bdun cu drug_/sems can snying po'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bye ba nyi shu gnyis su gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten de kun rin chen bdun las byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni ye shes 
[\[244a.3\]]tshogs zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad nyi shu yab ni mya ngan med/_/rin chen rgyal mtshan zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po shes mchog 'phags pa rim gro pa/_/bdud rtsi'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs pa med par grags 
[\[244a.4\]]pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu gnyis kun la'ang /_/'jig rten chos brgyad dag las grol ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bdun cu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/dam chos lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag gi 
[\[244a.5\]]mchod rten ni/_/dpag tshad bcu pa gcig ste gdugs kyi grangs/_/stong phrag bdun cu snyed kyis rnam par brgyan/_/sangs rgyas ye shes nga ro skye ba yi/_/yul ni ye shes rab tu gnas zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni yon tan 
[\[244a.6\]]mchog_/gtso 'od ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po sde [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyad 'phags rim gro pa/_/chos kyi sgra zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/thar pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu lnga kun la'ang /_/dgra bcom byas bsrungs shes rab 
[\[244a.7\]]rnam grol ba/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin/_/grags pa mtha' yas mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs stong du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye stong 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]snyed kyis gang bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten mchog ma nam mkha' skye ba yi/_/yul ni gzi brjid sgron ma zhes kyang bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu bzhi yab ni ri dbang yin/_/'gros brtan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po gnas med thogs 
[\[244b.2\]]med rim gro pa/_/gnas la dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/chags pa med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu drug kun la'ang /_/srid pa kun nas grol ba'i yid ldan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/
[\[244b.3\]]yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad brgyad pa gser gyi bla re ldan/_/sangs rgyas mchod sbyin nga ro skye ba yi/_/yul ni chos rnams snang bar byed ces bya/_/
[\[244b.4\]]rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga yod yab ni sgron ma yin/_/yon tan gdangs snyan ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po sbrang rtsi skad snyan rim gro pa/_/spobs pa'i dbyangs ni blo gros can yin te/_/dbyangs mchog mtha' yas pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[244b.5\]]'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/rnam thar brgyad kyi pha mthar phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri bzhi stong yin/_/zhi bar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs dgu khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku 
[\[244b.6\]]gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu 'byung /_/sangs rgyas shes rab rnam 'god nga ro yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mchog tu dga' zhes bya/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs ni rgyal rigs yin/_/'od ni stong gsum tshad tsam blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yab/_/des 
[\[244b.7\]]pa'i sgra zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po snang byed lha ni rim gro pa/_/blta na sdug ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/rnam par snang byed lha ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dag ni mtha' yang yas pa ste/_/gzungs rnams thob pa phyir ni mi ldog pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]'khor rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad 'bum yin/_/byang chub bsrung phyir dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs brgyad 'bum bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung rgyas 'gyur zhing rnams gang /_/gser rgyan bye 
[\[245a.2\]]ba dag gis brgyan par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas yon tan 'od zer gzi brjid kyi/_/skye yul yon tan kun dang ldan zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis yab ni yon tan 'od/_/yon tan 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rgyal yum sras po ni/_/yon tan 
[\[245a.3\]]rgya mtsho zla ba rim gro pa/_/zla ba 'phags zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/yon tan mchog gis mchod pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu drug kun la'ang /_/yon tan kun gyi pha rol phyin pa po/_/ther 'bum ther 'bum dag ni 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag 
[\[245a.4\]]ni drug khri yin/_/'gro la phan phyir mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs stong du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/'gro ba kun gyis mchod cing bkur bar 'gyur/_/mi yi 'dren pa drang srong dbang po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'phags pas 
[\[245a.5\]]bltas zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bdun cu rtsa gsum yab ni gsal ba yin/_/'phags mnyam ma ni rgyal yum drang srong byin/_/sras yin 'phags pa'i me tog rim gro pa/_/yon tan gzi brjid 'chang ba blo can te/_/ye shes rnam par 'phrul 
[\[245a.6\]]pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu gsum kun la'ang /_/ming rnams gsal zhing mdud pa spangs pa po/_/bye ba stong phrag dag ni gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/mtha' yas 'dul bar mdzad pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs 
[\[245a.7\]]brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad brgyad pa nor bus rnam par spras/_/mi yi 'dren pa blo dang ldan pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mdzangs pas bltas zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni dran ldan yin/_/dge ba'i nga ro zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po me tog mkhas pa rim gro pa/_/yon tan kha lo sgyur ba blo can te/_/phan 'dod mtha' yas pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgya ste kun la yang /_/srid pa spangs 
[\[245b.2\]]pa'i sems dang ldan pa po/_/de dag ther 'bum phrag ni bcu bcu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong yin/_/snang med thob pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs stong gi bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba brgya phrag dgu 
[\[245b.3\]]bcu 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i tshogs dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mchod cing bsgoms zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/dgu bcu gsum yod yab ni rtogs ldan yin/_/ye shes stobs zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po 'phags 
[\[245b.4\]]pa dgra bcom rim gro pa/_/yon tan phung po zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/ye shes yon tan 'byung gnas rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/'gro ba'i mchog la dga' ba'i dgra bcom pa/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu re re yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyis khri nyis 
[\[245b.5\]]stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad brgyad pa gser gyis rnam par spras/_/'jig rten mchog ma mchod sbyin bzang po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mchod sbyin 
[\[245b.6\]]gsal zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa lnga mchod sbyin bzang po yab/_/thar pa'i nga ro rgyal yum sras po ni/_/bsod nams 'byung gnas rgyal ba rim gro pa/_/nges pas byas zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jigs pa med pa'i stobs ni rdzu 'phrul 
[\[245b.7\]]can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang /_/dgra bcom thams cad chags pa med gyur pa/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs lnga stong bar du gnas par 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong gis 'khor bar bskor/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal skye ba'i/_/yul ni rnam par snang byed lha zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun 
[\[246a.2\]]cu yab ni yul 'khor bzang /_/yul 'od ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po legs mthong phan 'dod rim gro pa/_/me tog 'byung gnas zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/snang bar byed pa'i lha ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/theg pa mchog 
[\[246a.3\]]gis rnam par grol gyur pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni dgu khri yin/_/grags pa mtha' yas mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs stong gi bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad lnga pa 
[\[246a.4\]]gser gyi bla rer ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gzigs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni skar ma snang zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni ri dbang yin/_/'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po kha sgyur pad ma rim 
[\[246a.5\]]gro pa/_/dga' ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/yon tan mchog gsal ba ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu ste kun la yang /_/theg pa mchog gis gti mug med gyur pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi kun tshe lo brgya ni sum cu yin/_/yongs 
[\[246a.6\]]su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag gi mchod rten ni/_/dpag tshad bcu drug pa gcig gser gyis spras/_/yon tan rgya mtsho rdul dang bral ba yi/_/skye yul yon tan kun dang ldan zhes bya/_/rigs 
[\[246a.7\]]ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa bzhi yon tan dbang po yab/_/yon tan bden 'dzin ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po bzang ldan legs sems rim gro pa/_/stobs bcu'i 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/tshogs dbang 'od ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang /_/'jig rten chos dang mtshungs med bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lnga lnga yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs sum khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/
[\[246b.2\]]'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag_/zhing rnams dag tu rgyas shing gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tshogs dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni grags pa mchog ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad sum cu yab ni yon tan 'od/_/
