[\[266a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs sbyang rnam par smin pa skye ba'i yul ni byang chub gsal ba can zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum brgya'o/_/yab ni yul dga' zhes bya'o/_/yum ni bdud rtsi'i grags zhes bya'o/_/sras ni lha bden 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni 'jig rten bsdus zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mthong bas spong zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mtha' yas zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bzhi bcu ste/_thams cad la yang 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gnyis so/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri 
[\[266b.2\]]sum stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo bzhi khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs dgyes skye ba'i yul ni 'od zer yid du 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad khri'o/_/
[\[266b.3\]]yab ni chu lha'i bdag ces bya'o/_/yum ni shes rab 'phags zhes bya'o/_/sras ni bden pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni seng ges byin zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'od zer mchog ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mchod spangs zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bdun 
[\[266b.4\]]cu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis so/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri bzhi stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo dgu khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan bral skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid yid du 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/
[\[266b.5\]]'od ni dpag tshad bdun khri dgu stong ngo /_/yab ni thar pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/_/yum ni 'phags pa'i me tog ces bya'o/_/sras ni yon tan kun sbed ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni ye shes 'od zer zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni lha'i sgron ma zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 
[\[266b.6\]]phung po bzang po 'od ces bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan sum cu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag stong stong ngo /_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo nyi khri brgyad stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo dgu khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od skye ba'i yul ni kun tu yon tan 
[\[266b.7\]]can zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgya'o/_/yab ni blo gros zla ba zhes bya'o/_/yum ni nges par grags pa zhes bya'o/_/sras ni bdud rtsi'i mig ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni phyogs grags rin chen zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni ma smad grags zhes bya'o/_/
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni kun tu blo zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/_thams cad la yang ther 'bum phrag bcu bcu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri drug stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo drug khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod 
[\[267a.2\]]rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa dang ldan pa skye ba'i yul ni skye bo'i mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad bdun khri'o/_/yab ni rin chen grags zhes bya'o/_/yum ni me tog man dA ra ba'i gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/sras ni legs mthong dga' zhes bya'o/_/
[\[267a.3\]]rim gro pa ni mthong chen blo gros gsal zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yul 'khor lha sbed ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni bsam sbyin grags pa zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan sum cu rtsa bzhi ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag bdun bdun no/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu 
[\[267a.4\]]khri sum stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo dgu khri bzhi stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams stobs skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams kyi phung po'i stegs zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad dung phyur phrag brgyad do/_/yab 
[\[267a.5\]]ni blo gros grags pa zhes bya'o/_/yum ni snying rje'i shugs can zhes bya'o/_/sras ni snying stobs zhum pa med pa'i blo zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni lha'i zla ba zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rin po ches rab tu brgyan pa'i gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni phyogs 
[\[267a.6\]]blta grags zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bdun cu ste/_thams cad la yang sa ya phrag dgu dgu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo lnga khri bzhi stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon 
[\[267a.7\]]tan rgya mtsho skye ba'i yul ni byang chub sgron ma zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mo/_/yab ni yon tan mtha' yas grags zhes bya'o/_/yum ni rin chen grags zhes bya'o/_/sras ni lha'i grong khyer gtso zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni shed 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]rdzogs 'du shes brtan zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mthong dga' be'u zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni blo gros skyon med ces bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan sum cu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dgu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri bzhi stong ngo /_/dam pa'i 
[\[267b.2\]]chos kyang lo dgu khri bzhi stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rmad du byung ba skye ba'i yul ni mchod gnas spyod ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad brgyad cu'o/_/yab ni grags pa mtha' yas zhes bya'o/_/yum ni nyi ma'i snying po gzi 
[\[267b.3\]]brjid ces bya'o/_/sras ni yid 'ong grags pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni phan ldan blo zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mkhas pa lha rdzas rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni dregs 'gro zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba 
[\[267b.4\]]stong phrag bcu bcu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo dgu khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal spong skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/
[\[267b.5\]]'od ni dpag tshad sum khri lnga stong ngo /_/yab ni yul 'khor lha zhes bya'o/_/yum ni blo gros bsod nams tog ces bya'o/_/sras ni mtha' yas 'od ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mtshan gyi gzi brjid me tog ces bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni seng ge'i blo gros grags pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 
[\[267b.6\]]'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rab mchog gsal ba zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan drug cu ste/_thams cad la yang 'bum phrag bcu drug bcu drug go/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu 
[\[267b.7\]]zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud brlag par mdzad pa skye ba'i yul ni byang chub bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad 'bum mo/_/yab ni rin chen gzi brjid kun tu sbed ces bya'o/_/yum ni bkod pa dpag tu med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/sras ni rnam par brtse ba'i nga ro 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni byams pa mtha' yas blo zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'brug sgra dbyangs zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'brug sgra mthu rtsal zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu rtsa drug ste/_thams cad la yang 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa drug drug go/_/sku 
[\[268a.2\]]tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri sum stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo 'bum gyi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro//_//'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa bag chags las rgal ba'i stabs skye ba'i yul 
[\[268a.3\]]ni bkod pa mtshungs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag 'bum mo/_/yab ni 'jig rten snyan par grags zhes bya'o/_/yum ni blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o/_/sras ni dga' dang grags zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni grags pa'i blo gros gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/shes rab 
[\[268a.4\]]can rnams kyi mchog ni mi'i zla ba'i 'od ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni skye dbang mtshungs zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag stong stong ngo /_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bdun stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo 'bum gyi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni 
[\[268a.5\]]ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi phyed pa'i blo mnga' ba skye ba'i yul ni byang chub nges pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum stong sum brgya'o/_/yab ni gzi brjid 'byor ces bya'o/_/yum ni grags chen rgyal mtshan zhes 
[\[268a.6\]]bya'o/_/sras ni rgyal mtshan gyi gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni yan lag ma smad pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bdud rtsi'i rin po che zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni blo gros grags pa sems zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bzhi bcu ste/_thams cad la yang dung 
[\[268a.7\]]phyur phrag lnga lnga'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri'o/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo drug khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba gsal ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad dgu khri dgu stong ngo /_/yab ni 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]rgyu skar tog ces bya'o/_/yum ni bde stobs grags zhes bya'o/_/sras ni bag yod gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mkhas brtson zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni blo gros bden pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/
[\[268b.2\]]'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu ste/_thams cad la yang bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi bzhi'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dag par mdzad pa skye ba'i yul ni gzi 
[\[268b.3\]]brjid kyis brgyan pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni bram ze'o/_/'od ni dpag tshad drug khri bdun stong ngo /_/yab ni rin chen me tog ces bya'o/_/yum ni yon tan rin chen me tog ces bya'o/_/sras ni seng ge'i blo gros grags pa zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni g.yo ba med par gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/shes 
[\[268b.4\]]rab can rnams kyi mchog ni zla ba'i snying po dpal zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse ba zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan bdun cu ste/_thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag bzhi bzhi'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bzhi khri bzhi stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni lo 
[\[268b.5\]]bzhi khri'i bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can grol ba'i rgyal po skye ba'i yul ni rin po che'i mchog ces bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad lnga khri'o/_/yab ni lus pa med pa'i 
[\[268b.6\]]blo zhes bya'o/_/yum ni kun tu rin chen zhes bya'o/_/sras ni me tog gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni tshwa rgo byin zhes bya'o/_/shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni srid pa'i sred pa 'joms pa zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'dzin pa dpag med ces bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan drug cu ste/_
[\[268b.7\]]thams cad la yang dung phyur phrag bdun bdun no/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri sum stong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo drug khri sum stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go/_/mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i 'od skye ba'i yul ni byang 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]chub spyad pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs so/_/'od ni dpag tshad sum khri brgyad stong ngo /_/yab ni yid 'ong gzi brjid ces bya'o/_/yum ni nga ro snyan pa'i seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o/_/sras ni bzhin gtsang zhes bya'o/_/rim gro pa ni mchod grags zhes bya'o/_/shes 
[\[269a.2\]]rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bdud rtsi'i skyed mos tshal zhes bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten sems zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa ni lan dgu bcu rtsa bzhi ste/_thams cad la yang 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dgu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri bzhi stong ngo /_/dam pa'i 
[\[269a.3\]]chos kyang lo dgu khri bzhi stong gi bar du gnas so/_/sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/bde gshegs byang chub rgyal mtshan skye ba yi/_/yul ni chos dag snang bar byed ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun cu yab ni legs bzang yin/_/chu lha mchod ces 
[\[269a.4\]]bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rtsi sman dpa' bo rim gro pa/_/phyogs mchod ces ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gti mug med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang /_/khams gsum srid la ngar ni mi 'dzin pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi 
[\[269a.5\]]tshe lo grangs bdun khri lnga stong yin/_/khyu mchog chen po'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/_/bcu drug pa gcig gser gyis mdzes par byas/_/mi yi 'dren pa ye shes rin chen gyi/_/skye ba'i 
[\[269a.6\]]yul ni thams cad brgyan ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga brgya yab ni legs mchog yin/_/'jig rten mchog ma zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po grol 'dod zla ba rim gro pa/_/kun tu dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/kha lo sgyur ba'i 
[\[269a.7\]]rgyal po rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang /_/nga med tshul 'chos med pa'i dgra bcom pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/'gog par phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bdun khri drug stong 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag brgyad cur 'byung /_/mi yi 'dren pa shin tu bsil ba yi/_/skye yul ye shes rnam par grags zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis yab ni tshangs bzang yin/_/
[\[269b.2\]]ye shes 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lha yin blo gros rim gro pa/_/blo ldan snyoms pa blo gros can yin te/_/'jig pa med par grags pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang /_/dgra bcom thams cad pha mthar phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu 
[\[269b.3\]]dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri bzhi stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad lnga pa rgyal mtshan mchog gis brgyan/_/'jig rten mgon po tshangs pa 
[\[269b.4\]]rgyal ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni legs par sbyangs zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni dran ldan yin/_/dge ba'i 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lta byed grags pa rim gro pa/_/yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya mkhas 
[\[269b.5\]]pa ste/_/'jigs pa med par grags pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/'jig rten dri ma dri bral dgra bcom pa/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/'gro la phan phyir dam pa'i chos 
[\[269b.6\]]dag kyang /_/lo grangs dgu khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad brgya pa gser gyi rna rgyan can/_/sangs rgyas ye shes dgyes pa skye ba yi/_/yul ni yon tan kun gyi 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 
[\[269b.7\]]'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgyad brgya brtul zhugs dbang po yab/_/dbang po'i 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po skar mkhan snang byed rim gro pa/_/mthu rtsal brtan po zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/kun tu gtso zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]grangs drug cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/lam rab mchog mar shin tu dul ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal 
[\[270a.2\]]ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu 'byung /_/rgyal ba rdzu 'phrul tog gi skye ba'i yul/_/bsod nams rnam par snang bar byed ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu bcu 'byor pa'i dbang po yab/_/bsod nams grags pa 
[\[270a.3\]]rgyal yum sras po ni/_/bsod nams legs nges chos ldan rim gro pa/_/yon tan kha lo sgyur ba mkhas pa ste/_/gnas pa khyad par 'phags pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/rma med tshul 'chos med pa'i dgra bcom pa/_/bye ba stong phrag bdun cu 
[\[270a.4\]]bdun bdun yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri sum stong yin/_/grags pa mtha' yas pa yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu khri chig stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad bcu pa rgyal mtshan bye bas brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye 
[\[270a.5\]]dbang mtshungs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug cu sbyin sreg 'od 'phro yab/_/yon tan tshogs zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po dge ldan dge [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/yon tan snod ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/
[\[270a.6\]]yon tan 'od gsal ba ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu gsum la yang /_/zhi ba gti mug med cing chags med pa/_/ther 'bum ther 'bum dag ni 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri brgyad stong yin/_/rnam grol thob pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos 
[\[270a.7\]]lo grangs stong du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten ther 'bum dag ni bdun cu 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa yi dbang phyug gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni legs par gnas zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]bye ba yab ni don gnas yin/_/blo gnas blo gros rgyal yum byang chub ni/_/sras yin legs pa'i byang chub rim gro pa/_/shed skyes dbang phyug ces bya mkhas pa ste/_/don yod sna tshogs pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/ston cing sgom 
[\[270b.2\]]pa'i mthar ni phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu re re yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong yin/_/grags pa mtha' yas pa yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri chig stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bzang pos khams gsum gang bar 
[\[270b.3\]]'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma dgyes pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid bsdus zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod thos pa'i dbang po yab/_/dbang po'i 'gros zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po kha sgyur gnas pa rim gro pa/_/
[\[270b.4\]]dmag ma'i mchog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/rnam par nges par grags pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/srid pa kun gyis gos pa med pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas 
[\[270b.5\]]dam chos dag_/lo grangs sum khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad bdun pa gser gyi bla rer ldan/_/bde gshegs sgra gcan zla ba skye ba yi/_/yul ni tog rnams snang bar byed ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 
[\[270b.6\]]'od dpag tshad/_/bdun cu rtsa gsum yab ni tog [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/snang ba can zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po gzi brjid ldan snang rim gro pa/_/grags ldan chen po zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/mya ngan med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la 
[\[270b.7\]]yang /_/'jigs med thang chen pha mthar legs gnas pa/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs drug khri brgyad stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]la/_/mchod rten bzang pos khams gsum gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od skye ba'i/_/yul ni me tog dag gis brgyan zhes bya/_/de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad stong yod yon tan dbang po yab/_/yon tan 
[\[271a.2\]]mchod rten zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rgyal mchog phan 'dogs rim gro pa/_/'jig rten mchog ma zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/mthu rtsal rgyal po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu drug kun la'ang /_/thar pa gti mug med par gnas gyur pa/_/
[\[271a.3\]]bye ba phrag ni khri phrag gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni drug khri yin/_/chags pa med par gyur pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad dgu pa nor bu bye bas spras/_/de 
[\[271a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i bdag po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mya ngan sel ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad stong yod yab ni mya ngan med/_/yon tan lta zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po 'tsho byed 'jigs med rim gro pa/_/bsod nams dga' 
[\[271a.5\]]zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs mtha' yas kun la yang /_/phyir mi ldog pa thams cad gzungs thob pa/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag brgya brgya yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bye ba phrag stong yin/_/byang chub tu ni yongs su smin bya'i 
[\[271a.6\]]phyir/_/dam chos lo grangs bye bar gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/rin chen me tog stong snyed dag gis brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs mnga' skye ba yi/_/yul ni sdug par rnam par lta zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/
[\[271a.7\]]dpag tshad bye ba yab ni 'byor ldan yin/_/ye shes can zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rnam grol chags med rim gro pa/_/'brug sgra zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mdangs stobs 'gros zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/theg pa mchog 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]gis byang chub thob pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri sum stong yin/_/byang chub tu ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/dam chos lo grangs sum khrir gnas par 'gyur/_/mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa 'byung ste/_/rin chen ther 'bum 
[\[271b.2\]]snyed kyis spras par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dgyes pa yi/_/skye yul bsod nams snang bar byed ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/stong gsum tsam yod yab ni 'od ldan yin/_/bdud rtsi'i 'od ni rgyal yum rtsi sman ni/_/sras yin 
[\[271b.3\]]sman pa bzang po rim gro pa/_/byang chub 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/rnam par brtse ba'i blo ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang /_/gzungs thob byang chub dag la rab gnas pa/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug 'bum 
[\[271b.4\]]sum khri yin/_/byang chub tu ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/dam chos lo grangs drug 'bum sum khrir gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/gser gyi rgyal mtshan mchog stong snyed kyis brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i stobs skye ba'i/_/yul 
[\[271b.5\]]ni mchod pas kun du tshim zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tu med do yab ni yid 'thad yin/_/phan par sems zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po phan 'dod zla ba rim gro pa/_/blo gros yangs pa zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/gser gyi 'od ces bya ba 
[\[271b.6\]]rdzu 'phrul can/_/phyir mi ldog pa gzungs ni thob pa po/_/'jam pa'i dpal dang mtshungs pa de dag kun/_/'dus pa dag ni shin tu mtha' yang yas/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum 'bum nyi khri yin/_/theg pa mchog ldan yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam 
[\[271b.7\]]chos dag_/lo grangs chig 'bum nyi khrir gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/mtshungs pa med pa dbyangs dag snyan pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'od kyi mchog ces bya/_/de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad stong yod yab ni dge bzang yin/_/
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]'jigs pa med pa'i 'od ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po shes rab shes chen rim gro pa/_/tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/gnas pa mtha' yas pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang /_/dgra dag bcom pa de dag 'dus pa'i 
[\[272a.2\]]grangs/_/'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa ni gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin/_/dngos po med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri sum stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/_/bcu gsum pa gcig mu tig bla rer ldan/_/
[\[272a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni thar pa'i sgra zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/stong gnyis tsam yod dbang po chen po yab/_/yon tan tshogs zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po legs mthong dge ba rim gro pa/_/
[\[272a.4\]]bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'byor ba'i sgron ma zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu drug kun la'ang /_/byang chub tu ni skye ba gcig thogs pa/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag brgya brgya yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri bzhi stong yin/_/byang chub tu ni yongs 
[\[272a.5\]]su smin bya'i phyir/_/dam chos lo grangs dung phyur phrag drug gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/_/bcu gcig pa gcig gser gyi 'od dang ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni sgra dbyangs 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i 
[\[272a.6\]]rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni mthu ldan yin/_/rin chen 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rgyal mchog skar mkhan rim gro pa/_/seng ge'i 'gros zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bsod nams 'khor zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan 
[\[272a.7\]]grangs bcu gnyis kun la yang /_/'phags pa mchog gnas nges par gyur pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri nyis stong yin/_/'jig rten phan phyir srid mthar mdzad pa po/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs drug khri'i 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/sems can snying po spyod pa bzang po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mchod rten bzang zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga brgya yab ni zla 'od yin/_/gzi brjid 'od ces bya ba rgyal 
[\[272b.2\]]ba'i yum/_/sras po nges pa gya nom rim gro pa/_/mig sdug pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/shin tu dul bar gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu kun la yang /_/bzod pa dul gnas zhi gnas mchog thob pa/_/ther 'bum ther 'bum dag ni 'dus par 
[\[272b.3\]]'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri drug stong gnas/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur te/_/zhing rnams kun tu rnam par gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrul 
[\[272b.4\]]pa med pa'i blo/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'jig rten 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/stong gsum tsam yod yab ni dran ldan yin/_/tshogs can gtso rgyal zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po chos can chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa 
[\[272b.5\]]ste/_/thar pa rnam 'phrul pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/theg pa mchog gis byang chub nges gyur pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri sum stong yin/_/byang chub tu ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/dam chos 
[\[272b.6\]]lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad bdun pa bkod pa mdzes par byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs ni chen po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni lha yis bsgrags zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/
[\[272b.7\]]dgu bcu rtsa gnyis yab ni me tog bzang /_/grags pa'i stobs ni rgyal yum sras po ni/_/yon tan dga' yin rdzogs ldan rim gro pa/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/shes rab legs sems pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang /_/nga 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]med dgra bcom 'khrul pa med pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu lnga lnga yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri sum stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri sum stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten rin chen 
[\[273a.2\]]sna bdun dag gis spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par grags pa yi/_/skye yul 'jig rten yon tan dga' zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa gsum yab ni phan 'dod yin/_/byang chub 'dod ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rma med sgra sgrogs 
[\[273a.3\]]rim gro pa/_/bdud rtsi'i blo gros zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/chags pa med pa'i sgron ma rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang /_/bdud dang srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po/_/'bum phrag sum cu rtsa ni bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/dngos 
[\[273a.4\]]po med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad dgu pa legs par rnam par spras/_/'jig rten mgon po tog ldan skye ba'i yul/_/'od 'phro snang bar byed pa zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal 
[\[273a.5\]]ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni lha dbang yin/_/thar pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po zla mchog sems dpa' rim gro pa/_/me tog 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/rdzu 'phrul spobs zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan 
[\[273a.6\]]grangs nyi shu drug kun la'ang /_/'jig rten chos kyis gos pa med pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bdun bdun yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri drug stong yin/_/rab tu zhi bar phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/mchod rten khri phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 
[\[273a.7\]]'byung /_/rgyal mtshan bye ba stong gis mdzes par byas/_/rgyal ba gzi brjid rnam par grags pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni thar pa'i dbyangs zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bye ba 'byor pa'i yon tan yab/_/rgyu skar bdag ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]sras po me tog bzod pa rim gro pa/_/yon tan sgrogs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bden par smra ba'i nga ro rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/bdud dang nyon mongs thams cad 'joms pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug 
[\[273b.2\]]khri bdun stong yin/_/rnam par grol bar phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs sum khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad brgya pa gcig_/rin chen brgya yi dra bas rnam par spras/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i dbang phyug skye ba yi/_/yul ni thar pa snang bar byed 
[\[273b.3\]]ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgyad brgya shin tu 'jigs byed yab/_/lha yi 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po grogs byed mthu rtsal rim gro pa/_/yid 'ong gzi brjid blo gros can yin te/_/chags bral gti mug med pa rdzu 
[\[273b.4\]]'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs lnga ste kun la yang /_/dgra bcom rims nad med par gyur pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag brgya brgya yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug khri bzhi stong yin/_/zad mthar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs drug khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/
[\[273b.5\]]rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/mu tig stong ldan rgyal mtshan dag gis bskor/_/'jig rten mgon po ljon pa skye ba yi/_/yul ni thar par dad par byed ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dgu bcu rtsa dgu yab ni spos bzang yin/_/dbang po 
[\[273b.6\]]'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po bde dga' drag shul rim gro pa/_/lha grags zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bla na med par sems pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/lha yi gnas kyi pha mthar phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu lnga lnga 
[\[273b.7\]]yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/'gog par phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bzhi stong bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad dgu pa gcig_/rgyal mtshan mchog dang gtsug gi nor bus brgyan/_/rgyal ba gti mug rab zad skye ba 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]yi/_/yul ni mkhas par snang bar byed ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad stong yod yab ni khyad par 'phags/_/gzi ldan dga' ni rgyal yum sras po ni/_/shing rta dga' yin sprin ldan rim gro pa/_/tog gi 'od ces bya ba 
[\[274a.2\]]mkhas pa ste/_/sgra mchog ces ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu gsum kun la'ang /_/nga rgyal rgyal mtshan chur ni lhung ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni drug cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri bdun stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/
[\[274a.3\]]lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag_/rgyas 'gyur zhing rnams rnam par gang bar 'gyur/_/sems can snying po dpag tu med pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mi zad mdzod ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/dung phyur 
[\[274a.4\]]phrag brgyad yab ni lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/dag pa'i 'od ni rgyal yum sgra gcan 'dzin/_/sras ni lha yi dbang po rim gro pa/_/mthu rtsal stobs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/kun tu gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu kun la yang /_/thos pa'i mdzod ldan 
[\[274a.5\]]rgya mtsho 'dra mtshungs pa/_/de dag ther 'bum ther 'bum 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni lnga khri yin/_/dam chos lo grangs chig khri chig stong gnas/_/rdul bral mchod rten dpag tshad brgyad pa ste/_/rin chen brgya yi lda ldis mdzes byas shing /_/nor bu'i dra ba 
[\[274a.6\]]dag gis kun tu brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bzang po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni zla ba'i 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni sgron ma yin/_/lha yi 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lha legs brtan pa rim gro 
[\[274a.7\]]pa/_/mthu rtsal stobs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mchog gi rgyal po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/dgra bcom yid bzhin du ni rdzogs pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/rnam 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]grol thob pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs stong du gnas par 'gyur/_/'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag_/rgyas 'gyur zhing rnams kun tu gang bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas spobs pa mtha' yas tog skye ba'i/_/yul ni yul 'khor kha lo sgyur zhes bya/_/rgyal 
[\[274b.2\]]ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni yon tan don/_/don ldan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po bden byin legs 'byor rim gro pa/_/mthong dga' zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bkod pa gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs 
[\[274b.3\]]mtha' yas kun la yang /_/byang chub mchog la nges par gyur pa po/_/de dag thams cad bye ba dpag tu med/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong yin/_/bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs bdun 'bum bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 
[\[274b.4\]]'gyur la/_/rin chen bdun po dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs bstar ba yi/_/skye yul bsam pa bzhin du sbyin zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgyad brgya yab ni yon tan 'od/_/dga' ba'i 'od ces 
[\[274b.5\]]bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po bram ze rab sdug rim gro pa/_/glang po'i stabs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gnas pa khyad par 'phags pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/g.yo med yid ldan legs par gnas pa po/_/de dag ther 'bum 
[\[274b.6\]]phrag ni bcu bcu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug khri drug stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri bdun stong bar du gnas/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad lnga pa gcig_/nor bu rin chen lda ldi stong gis spras/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i mchod 
[\[274b.7\]]pa'i gnas dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni yul 'khor mchog ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga brgya yab ni tog [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/byas pa gdon mi za ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po skal bzang thub dka' rim gro pa/_/ye shes dga' zhes bya ba 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]mkhas pa ste/_/yul du rnam par grags pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu kun la yang /_/zhi ba mi slob 'bras la mngon dga' ba/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri sum stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de 
[\[275a.2\]]yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/_/rin chen brgya yi lda ldis mdzes par byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan rgal ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rtag par dga' zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs 
[\[275a.3\]]yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/dgu bcu rtsa gnyis drang srong chen po yab/_/don gyi 'gros zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lha min lha ni rim gro pa/_/grags pa'i tog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/rnam par grol bar gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs 
[\[275a.4\]]sum cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/lha yi gnas pa'i pha mthar phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri drug stong yin/_/dngos po med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba yongs su mya ngan 
[\[275a.5\]]'das nas kyang /_/thugs rje chen po'i sku gdung rgyas par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba dgyes pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni yid 'ong dga' zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni brtul zhugs don/_/dge ba'i blo gros zhes bya 
[\[275a.6\]]rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lta byed tshangs byin rim gro pa/_/seng ge'i nga ro zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/'brug sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang /_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu dang /_/gzhan yang sa ya phrag ni drug drug yod/_/
[\[275a.7\]]mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/_/lnga pa gcig ste rin chen bdun las byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i blo gros kyi/_/skye ba'i 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]yul ni lha yi 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tu med do shin tu byang chub yab/_/chos kyi dbang phyug ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mchod pa skar mkhan rim gro pa/_/dpag med 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/don yod mtha' yas pa ni 
[\[275b.2\]]rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/'jig rten chos brgyad dag dang bral ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni stong phrag bcu bcu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas 
[\[275b.3\]]par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad bdun pa khor yug bla rer ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par gshegs pa yi/_/skye yul rin chen mchog tu gnas zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad 
[\[275b.4\]]stong yod yab ni grogs bzang yin/_/byams mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mchod pa legs dbang rim gro pa/_/blo gros gsal zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mthong ba brtsegs zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/
[\[275b.5\]]gti mug med pa'i pha mthar phyin 'phags pa/_/bye ba phrag ni drug cu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug khri drug stong yin/_/grags pa mtha' yas pa yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/khams 
[\[275b.6\]]gsum mchod rten bzang pos gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs mdzes skye ba yi/_/yul ni 'jig rten sgron ma zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni spos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/spos mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/
[\[275b.7\]]sras po spos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]me tog rim gro pa/_/mchod par 'os zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/legs bsgrubs grags pa zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/ri yi rgyal po lta bur mi g.yo ba/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag bcu bcu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]bdun khri bzhi stong yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs sum khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/gser gyi rgyal mtshan mchog stong snyed kyis brgyan/_/'jig rten mgon po ud pal skye 
[\[276a.2\]]ba yi/_/yul ni me tog phung po zhes kyang bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bye ba mtha' yas yab ni phan 'dod yin/_/zla ba'i 'gros zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po kha sgyur tog ldan rim gro pa/_/zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bden 
[\[276a.3\]]par smra ba'i dbyangs ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu kun la yang /_/'jig rten mi khom chos las grol ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni drug cu drug cu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug khri drug stong yin/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/brgyad cu rtsa lnga'i 
[\[276a.4\]]bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad bcu pa ste/_/gser gyi rgyal mtshan stong gis 'khor bar bskor/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dul gnas me tog gi/_/skye yul rin chen sgron ma zhes kyang bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bdun 
[\[276a.5\]]cu rtsa gsum yab ni zla bzang yin/_/pad ma'i 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po seng ge 'byor pa rim gro pa/_/yon tan mchod rten zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/bkod pa gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu lnga kun la'ang /_/rnam thar brgyad 
[\[276a.6\]]thob pa yi bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/_/de yi dam chos lo grangs brgyad khrir gnas/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gsum pa/_/gcig tu zad de rin chen mchog ma yi/_/dra ba dag gis rnam par 
[\[276a.7\]]spras par 'gyur/_/bde gshegs spobs pa mtha' yas 'od zer gyi/_/skye yul seng ge rnam par bsgyings zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad stong yod bdag nyid chen po yab/_/brtul zhugs drag ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po thar 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]dga' yon tan rim gro pa/_/dga' mchog ces ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/rin chen gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs lnga bcu kun la yang /_/seng ge lta bu'i 'jigs pa med thob pa/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu re re yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs chig khri bzhi stong 
[\[276b.2\]]yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/khams gsum rin po che yis gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gsal ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni 'phags 
[\[276b.3\]]pas bsngags zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun stong yab ni sgron ma yin/_/lha yi rgyal mtshan zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mthu rtsal rab rtsal rim gro pa/_/dgra bcom pa yis bstod pa mkhas pa ste/_/bkod pa gnas 
[\[276b.4\]]zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu gnyis kun la'ang /_/srid pa'i kun las rgal ba'i yid ldan pa/_/bye ba stong phrag sum cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong yin/_/grags pa mtha' yas mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam 
[\[276b.5\]]chos lo grangs stong du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/zhing rnams kun du mchod rten dag gis gang /_/sangs rgyas yon tan brtson 'grus skye ba yi/_/yul ni yon tan rin chen 'phro zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/
[\[276b.6\]]dpag tshad sum stong yab ni legs zhi yin/_/phan par sems zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po sgom byed rab zhi rim gro pa/_/pad ma'i 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bkod pa mdzes zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang /_/dgra dag 
[\[276b.7\]]choms pa de dag 'dus pa'i grangs/_/'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa ni dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/dgu bcu rtsa brgyad bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gsum pa/_/bai dUr+ya yi 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]rgyal mtshan dag gis bskor/_/'jig rten mgon po snying po skye ba yi/_/yul ni mthu rtsal blo gros zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni tshangs 'od yin/_/zhi ba'i 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po 
[\[277a.2\]]sprin ldan lag 'gro rim gro pa/_/bdud rtsi'i 'byung gnas zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/rnam smin sna tshogs pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu bzhi bzhi dang /_/gzhan yang 'bum phrag bcu drug bcu drug yod/_/mi tshe lo 
[\[277a.3\]]grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/chags pa med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/zhing rnams kun du mchod rten dag gis gang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi bdag po yi/_/skye ba'i 
[\[277a.4\]]yul ni 'jig rten gsal zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/stong gsum tsam yod yab ni lha bzang yin/_/lha yi zla ba zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lha yin kun rgyal rim gro pa/_/ye shes stobs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/rnam par grags pa'i 
[\[277a.5\]]sgron ma rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs mtha' yas kun la yang /_/thams cad byang chub dag las mi ldog pa/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag brgya brgya yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs chig khri nyis stong yin/_/byang chub tu ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba bcu 
[\[277a.6\]]gnyis gnas/_/sku gdung rgyas 'gyur mchod rten bzang po kun/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag gsum zhig 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mthon po yi/_/skye yul mthong na dga' bar byed ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad 'bum yod yab 
[\[277a.7\]]ni blo gros can/_/mi yi dbang phyug ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po legs mthong rgyal rigs rim gro pa/_/ye shes 'gros zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/rnam par grags par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu brgyad kun la'ang /_/nyon mongs bag 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]chags dri las grol ba po/_/ther 'bum phrag ni drug cu drug cu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug khri lnga stong yin/_/dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/drug cu rtsa lnga'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad brgya pa gcig_/rin chen pad ma dag 
[\[277b.2\]]gis 'khor bar bskor/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba skye ba yi/_/yul ni lha rnams dad par byed ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa gcig yab ni mthu rtsal yin/_/zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po 'jigs med 
[\[277b.3\]]chags med rim gro pa/_/rlung ltar 'gro zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/the tsom rnam par grol ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu bzhi kun la'ang /_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis dang /_/gzhan yang bye ba 'bum phrag lnga lnga yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri 
[\[277b.4\]]bzhi stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/lha mi dag la phan dang bde ba'i phyir/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skal ldan shing rta can/_/skye yul bden la dad par 
[\[277b.5\]]byed ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod gnas pa'i dbang po yab/_/'phags pa'i don ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po dad byed dpa' bo rim gro pa/_/bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'byor par gnas zhes bya 
[\[277b.6\]]ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/dgra bcom thams cad zag pa zad pa po/_/ther 'bum phrag ni lnga lnga 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug khri drug stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs drug khri 
[\[277b.7\]]drug stong bar du gnas/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad gsum pa gcig_/gser gyi rgyal mtshan dag gis 'khor bar bskor/_/sems can snying po bsod nams blo gros kyi/_/skye yul lha rnams dad par byed ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]dpag tshad ther 'bum yab ni phan 'dod yin/_/'phags las nyan zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po des pa gzugs bzang rim gro pa/_/bsod nams 'gros zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/kun du sgron ma zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun 
[\[278a.2\]]la yang /_/thams cad rgyags dang dregs 'gros rab zhi ba/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag bcu bcu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri chig stong yin/_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba'i bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bzang po grangs ni bdun 'bum ste/_/
[\[278a.3\]]bkod pa thams cad rin chen brgya snyed yin/_/'jig rten mgon po sbyin sreg 'od 'phro yi/_/skye yul mchod rten snang bar byed ces bya/_/de yi rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad stong yod yab ni me tog bzang /_/sA la'i bdag ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po zla 
[\[278a.4\]]ldan zhi ldan rim gro pa/_/blta na sdug ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/legs mthong dbyangs zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu gnyis kun la yang /_/byang chub mchog la nges par gyur pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni brgya brgya 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs lnga 
[\[278a.5\]]khri lnga stong yin/_/dngos po med par phyin pa de yi chos/_/byang chub yongs smin bya phyir dam chos kun/_/lo grangs bye ba phrag ni gsum du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/yon tan mtha' yas gzi brjid phung po yi/_/skye yul chos kyi yon tan 
[\[278a.6\]]'byung gnas yin/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/lnga bcu rtsa drug yab ni lha dbang yin/_/thar pa'i 'gros zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po skar mkhan 'od ldan rim gro pa/_/byams pa'i nga ro zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/lha yi gzhal med 'dod pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[278a.7\]]'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu kun la yang /_/ri dbang rgyal po mi g.yo spa ba bzhin/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong yin/_/snang ba med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs bzhi khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]mchod rten dpag tshad ni/_/bco lnga pa gcig shin tu rnam par spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs dag gi_/skye ba'i yul ni mthong bas mchod ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni phan 'dod yin/_/nor lha'i 
[\[278b.2\]]bu 'od ces bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po tog ldan 'od 'phro rim gro pa/_/seng ge blo gros zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/rnam par sgrogs pa'i dbyangs ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang /_/byang chub mchog rab chos la nges gyur pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu 
[\[278b.3\]]bcu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri bzhi stong yin/_/byang chub tu ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/dam chos lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten stong phrag mtha' yas rnam par spras/_/'jig rten mgon po 
[\[278b.4\]]mi g.yo skye ba yi/_/yul ni bsod nams rab tu gnas zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad ther 'bum yab ni yon tan don/_/lha yi dbang phyug ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po snang ldan 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/rgyan byin pa ni blo gros can yin 
[\[278b.5\]]te/_/sgron ma khyad par 'phags pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu kun la yang /_/dgra bcom zhi ba dag la gzhol ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong yin/_/dam chos lo grangs nyi khri'i bar du gnas/_/rgyal 
[\[278b.6\]]ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/'phang du dpag tshad gcig srid 'phags pa la/_/rin chen nor bu gser gyi lda ldis spras/_/'jig rten mgon po rab gsal skye ba yi/_/yul ni 'jigs pa med par mthong zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi 
[\[278b.7\]]shu rtsa gnyis yab ni bstod pa'i 'od/_/'od gsal ba zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lha min rgyal byin rim gro pa/_/dgra bcom 'gros zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/sgrib pa med pa'i tog ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/dri ma kun dang bral 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]bas bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri chig stong yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs sum khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten 
[\[279a.2\]]bye ba stong phrag brgya yang 'byung /_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od ni spyod pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rtag tu dga' zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug cu yab ni myos med yin/_/bsod nams mchog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lha 
[\[279a.3\]]ldan sdom pa rim gro pa/_/bsod nams dpal zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'khrug pa med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu gsum kun la yang /_/chags pa med par gyur pa'i bsam gtan pa/_/ther 'bum ther 'bum dag ni 'dus par 'gyur/_/
[\[279a.4\]]mi tshe lo grangs drug khri bzhi stong yin/_/dam chos lo grangs chig khri sum stong gnas/_/sku gdung mchod rten dag ni gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad brgyad pa rgyan gyis brgyan byas shing /_/rtse mo rin po che yis rab tu brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbyangs skye ba yi/_/yul 
[\[279a.5\]]ni klu yis mchod pa byas zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni rgya chen yin/_/klu yi dbyangs zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rdzu 'phrul seng ge rim gro pa/_/dga' bas mchod ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/ston pa zhes bya 
[\[279a.6\]]rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang /_/lha yi gnas pa mchog dag thob pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri bzhi stong yin/_/chags pa med par gyur pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas 
[\[279a.7\]]par 'gyur/_/thugs rje chen po mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glu dbyangs skye ba yi/_/yul ni dbyangs kyi mchog ma zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni blo gros 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]can/_/dge ba'i blo gros zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po byams ldan grogs bzang rim gro pa/_/chu bo spong zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gzi brjid rnam par nges pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang /_/mtshungs med chu dang mtshungs 
[\[279b.2\]]pa'i bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/srid pa'i mthar phyin pa yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/mchod rten rin po che yis rab tu brgyan/_/ba dan dag gis shin tu 
[\[279b.3\]]mdzes par byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor lo 'dzin pa yi/_/skye yul thub pa med pa'i sde zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni lha dbang yin/_/tshogs rgyal 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras 
[\[279b.4\]]po 'byor pa lhas byin rim gro pa/_/thub pa med pa'i 'od ni mkhas pa ste/_/bkod pa khyad par 'phags pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu gnyis kun la yang /_/mnyam grol rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i dgra bcom pa/_/ther 'bum ther 'bum dag ni 'dus par 'gyur/_/
[\[279b.5\]]mi tshe lo grangs sum khri drug stong yin/_/rnam par grol bar phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs sum khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/thugs rje chen po mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig gi mchog dag gi/_/
[\[279b.6\]]skye ba'i yul ni rkang pa brgyan zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad khri yod yab ni phan 'dod yin/_/dga' ba'i 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po zla ba zla [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/mun dang bral zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/chags dang bral 
[\[279b.7\]]bar gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bcu gcig kun la yang /_/lha yi mthu can rnam grol dga' ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug khri chig stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/_/bcu gsum pa gcig gser gyi bla rer ldan/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag la dga' ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mdangs kyi 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/
[\[280a.2\]]dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni rgya mtsho yin/_/lha yi blo gros zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mi pho brang skyes rim gro pa/_/grags chen zhes ni bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/kha lo sgyur bar grags pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/the tsom yid 
[\[280a.3\]]gnyis dag ni mthar byed pa/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bdun cu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri bzhi stong yin/_/'jig rten phan phyir dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs brgyad khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/mtshungs pa med pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung 
[\[280a.4\]]dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi zla ba yi/_/skye yul chos kyi bstan pa zhes kyang bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni thabs ldan yin/_/shes rab brtan zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lha ldan brtan 
[\[280a.5\]]pa rim gro pa/_/chos brtan rab tu gnas pa shes rab can/_/bden pa ci yi gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/dam pa'i chos ni mkhyen rab gnas pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu re re yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/_/
[\[280a.6\]]rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bye ba'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba de yi sku gdung rgyas par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas dga' ba mtha' yas grags pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni lha yi 'od ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag 
[\[280a.7\]]tshad brgya yod yab ni lha bzang yin/_/lha yi 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po sa ldan dga' byed rim gro pa/_/sgra snyan pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bde ba'i stabs zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/nyon mongs thams cad 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]mthar ni byed pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri bzhi stong yin/_/dngos med phyin pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/dam chos lo grangs stong du gnas par 'gyur/_/thugs rje chen po mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni 
[\[280b.2\]]rgyas par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi tog dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni chos snang byed ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad 'bum yod yab ni yon tan 'od/_/blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po shes byin legs 
[\[280b.3\]]shes rim gro pa/_/yon tan tshogs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mya ngan 'das stegs bzang po rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu kun la yang /_/tshangs par gnas pa'i pha mthar phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri 
[\[280b.4\]]bzhi stong yin/_/dngos po med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab 'gros dag gi/_/skye ba'i yul 
[\[280b.5\]]ni ye shes gzhol zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum stong drug brgya yab ni stegs bzang yin/_/shes rab dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mchog ma sprin ldan rim gro pa/_/bdud 'joms pa ni blo gros can yin te/_/gnas pa 
[\[280b.6\]]mtha' yas pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu drug kun la'ang /_/byang chub mchog gi pha rol phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/mya ngan 'das nas dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bdun khri drug 
[\[280b.7\]]stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad lnga pa nor bu bla rer ldan/_/'jig rten mgon po spos bzang skye ba yi/_/yul ni spos kyis rnam par brgyan zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]yab ni legs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po skar mkhan 'byor pa rim gro pa/_/yon tan 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pa ni mkhas pa ste/_/bkod pa mtha' yas pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/
[\[281a.2\]]mtsho bran rgya mtsho gang ba 'dra ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri bzhi stong yin/_/zhi bar phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad brgyad pa 
[\[281a.3\]]thams cad rnam par brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings skye ba'i/_/yul ni rdzu 'phrul snang bar byed ces bya/_/rdul bral rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/stong gsum tsam yin bde ba'i dbang po yab/_/dga' ba'i sgra dbyangs rgyal yum me tog sras/_/
[\[281a.4\]]ku mu da zhes bya ba rim gro pa/_/seng ge'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/dbyangs snyan mchog ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs mtha' yas kun la yang /_/brtan rnams byang chub dag la gzhol ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni dpag tu med pa yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs 
[\[281a.5\]]ther 'bum phrag gsum yin/_/byang chub tu ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/dam chos lo grangs ther 'bum phrag gsum gnas/_/grags pa mtha' yas mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po lha yi skye ba yi/_/yul ni ngang 
[\[281a.6\]]tshul kun du sdud zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/stong khams gnyis tsam yab ni sgron ma yin/_/spobs pa'i blo gros zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lha gsal 'byor byed rim gro pa/_/mig legs pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/shin tu sbyangs pa'i lus 
[\[281a.7\]]ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu bzhi kun la'ang /_/sems can mchog ma byang chub 'dod pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni khri phrag dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni 'bum yang yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong phrag brgyad khri'i bar du gnas/_/
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]mig sbyin mdzad pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi rgyal po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni lha yis mchod ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/stong khams gcig tsam yab ni lha bzang yin/_/
[\[281b.2\]]lha yi dbang phyug ma ni rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lha yin lha ni rim gro pa/_/tshangs pa 'phags zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/lha dbang gtso bo zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/gzungs thob byang chub dag ni 'dod pa po/_/khri phrag dag ni 
[\[281b.3\]]dgu bcu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bye stong dgu bcu dgu/_/byang chub tu ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/dam chos lo grangs brgyad 'bum bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bzang pos zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[281b.4\]]pa nor bu gsal ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni rin chen gsal zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad khri yod yab ni gsal ba yin/_/rin chen mchog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po dga' ldan legs mthong rim gro pa/_/mig sdug pa zhes bya ba 
[\[281b.5\]]mkhas pa ste/_/rtag pa mthong zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/dgra bcom zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin/_/'gog par phyin pa'i dam pa'i 
[\[281b.6\]]chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad brgya pa gcig_/gser dang nor bu'i lda ldis mdzes par byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bzang skye ba yi/_/yul ni bsod nams rnam par brgyan ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od 
[\[281b.7\]]kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu stong rab tu dge ba yab/_/thar pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po ston brtsegs rgyal ba rim gro pa/_/ye shes nga ro zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/mdzes par gnas zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/ngar 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]mi 'dzin pa yang srid zad pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri drug stong yin/_/nub par phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba de yi sku gdung rgyas 'gyur te/_/zhing 
[\[282a.2\]]rnams dag tu rnam par gang bar 'gyur//_//'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_mtshungs pa med pa sgron ma skye ba yi/_/yul ni bsod nams sgron ma zhes kyang bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od 
[\[282a.3\]]kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad sum stong rnam par gnon pa yab/_/gzi brjid 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po gzi byin sgron ma rim gro pa/_/sgron ma byed ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten snang bar byed pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang /_/
[\[282a.4\]]dgra bcom de dag tshogs par 'gyur ba'i grangs/_/bdun 'bum bdun 'bum dag ni 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri chig stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/'jig rten phan phyir sku gdung rgyas 
[\[282a.5\]]'gyur la/_/rin chen brgya yi dra bas rnam par spras/_/rgyal ba rin chen nga ro dbyangs dag gi_/skye ba'i yul ni dbyangs dang ldan zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya stong yab ni lha lus yin/_/rin chen 'gros zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rgyal 
[\[282a.6\]]byin rgal gyur rim gro pa/_/nga rgyal bcad ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/nyon mongs gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/tshul bzhin chos kyi pha rol phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri'i 
[\[282a.7\]]bar du gnas/_/mya ngan 'das nas dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad brgyad pa gcig_/rin chen bye ba dag gis rab tu brgyan/_/rgyal ba skye dbang rgyal po skye ba yi/_/yul ni drag shul snang bar byed ces bya/_/
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni khyad par 'phags/_/rgya mtsho'i blo gros zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po rgya mtsho mtsho chen rim gro pa/_/bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i stegs bzang rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus 
[\[282b.2\]]pa lan grangs drug cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/dngos med phyin pa gti mug med zhi ba/_/bye ba phrag ni drug cu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug khri chig stong yin/_/dri ma spangs pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs drug khri chig stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku 
[\[282b.3\]]gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bzang pos zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan sbed pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni sgron ma'i mdangs zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni yon tan 'phrul/_/rdzu 
[\[282b.4\]]'phrul 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po 'phrul can bkod pa rim gro pa/_/blo dang ldan zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'khrul pa med par sems pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/dgra bcom thams cad zag pa med pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni 
[\[282b.5\]]nyi shu nyi shu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri chig stong yin/_/'gog par phyin pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang /_/lo grangs nyi khri chig stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te/_/dpag tshad bdun pa rin po che yis spras/_/'jig rten mgon po dge ba mdzad 
[\[282b.6\]]pa yi/_/skye yul gzi brjid 'jigs pa med ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug cu yab ni don brtan yin/_/mchog tu brtan zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po kha sgyur drang po rim gro pa/_/yon tan che phra 'dzin pa mkhas pa ste/_/sgron ma gnas zhes bya ba 
[\[282b.7\]]rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang /_/'jig rten dad pa dgra bcom chags med pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/snang ba med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/thugs 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]rje chen po mya ngan 'das nas kyang /_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i blo gros kyi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mdangs snang byed ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni yid 'ong yin/_/lha 
[\[283a.2\]]dga' zhes ni bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po ston byed mdzes can rim gro pa/_/mchod par 'os zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/dad par byed ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu kun la yang /_/lha yi gnas pa'i pha rol phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu drug drug yod/_/
[\[283a.3\]]mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri chig stong yin/_/dam chos lo grangs bye ba'i bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/_/bcu gcig pa gcig gser gyi bla rer ldan/_/rin chen mchog ma bye bas rnam par spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa yi/_/skye ba'i 
[\[283a.4\]]yul ni gser gyi sgron zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu gsum yab ni lha bzang yin/_/snyan par grags zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po legs 'ongs blo ldan rim gro pa/_/yon tan tshogs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gti mug med 
[\[283a.5\]]par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu gcig kun la'ang /_/thams cad gnas pa med pa'i lam thob pa/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/_/chags pa med par gyur pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong bar 
[\[283a.6\]]du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/zhing rnams kun du mchod rten bzang pos gang /_/sems can snying po don ni mdzad pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni lha yis bkod ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga brgya yab ni spong pa yin/_/grags tog ma zhes 
[\[283a.7\]]bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po byang chub chos ldan rim gro pa/_/yon tan gnas zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/rnam grol gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/dgra dag choms pa de dag 'dus pa'i grangs/_/bye ba phrag ni 'bum 'bum 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]tshe lo grangs bdun khri chig stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/_/bcu gnyis pa gcig gser gyi bla rer ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad mtha' gzigs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul 
[\[283b.2\]]ni mdzes par sbyangs zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad drug cu rnam par dag pa yab/_/byas pa nges zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po bzang ldan grags byin rim gro pa/_/mchod rten dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gsal ba gti mug med pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[283b.3\]]'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/dgra dag choms pa de dag kun gyi grangs/_/bye ba phrag ni brgya brgya 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni 
[\[283b.4\]]rgyas 'gyur la/_/stong gsum mchod rten bzang pos gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i me tog gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni grags pa bsgrags zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa lnga yab ni srid mtha' yin/_/blo gros nyi ma zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/
[\[283b.5\]]nor lha'i bu sras zla nyi rim gro pa/_/dgra bcom dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'phags pa dad par byed pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/nga med nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri 
[\[283b.6\]]nyis stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri chig stong bar du gnas/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gsum pa/_/gcig ste rin chen bkod pas rab tu brgyan/_/'jig rten mgon po mdzod spu ldan pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni stegs mchog 
[\[283b.7\]]ces kyang bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/sum cu rtsa gsum yab ni rab gsal yin/_/brtul zhugs grub ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po zla sdug rab dga' rim gro pa/_/thar pa'i 'gros zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mya ngan med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]'dus pa lan grangs nyi shu drug kun la'ang /_/ri yi rgyal po lta bur mi g.yo ba/_/bye ba phrag ni nyi shu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku 
[\[284a.2\]]gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu byung /_/sangs rgyas spobs pa mtshungs med rgyal po yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni sna tshogs mdzes zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bzhi bcu yab ni skyon med yin/_/yon tan mthong 
[\[284a.3\]]zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/yon tan can sras blo ldan rim gro pa/_/rgyal mtshan mchog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/nor lha'i bu tog ces bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu kun la yang /_/chu dang nam mkha' lta bur gsal ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gnyis 
[\[284a.4\]]gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri nyis stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu khri chig stong bar du gnas/_/'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag_/rgyas par 'gyur te zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro yi/_/
[\[284a.5\]]skye ba'i yul ni rnam grags lha zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yab ni ngos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/mtshan ldan ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/bsod nams 'dod sras gtso bo rim gro pa/_/brtul zhugs grub ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/chags pa med par 
[\[284a.6\]]gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu gsum kun la'ang /_/dri bral 'jig rten dri ma'i dri med pa/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri bzhi stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs sum khri chig stong bar du 
[\[284a.7\]]gnas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad ni/_/drug cu pa gcig gser gyi bla rer ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mche ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni bro ba'i mchog ces bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/bye ba phrag gsum glang chen dbang po yab/_/thar pa'i 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]dbyangs ni rgyal yum lta byed sras/_/na tshod bzang po zhes bya rim gro pa/_/yon tan tshogs zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/rnam par grol ba'i bkod pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu kun la yang /_/spyod pa 'khrul pa med par gyur pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni drug cu bdun bdun yod/_/
[\[284b.2\]]mi tshe lo grangs drug khri bzhi stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs drug khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur te/_/zhing rnams mchod rten dag gis gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par gshegs pa yi/_/skye ba'i 
[\[284b.3\]]yul ni bden pa gsal zhes bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/dgu bcu rtsa bzhi yab ni bkod pa yin/_/gzi brjid chen mo zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po des pa bzang po rim gro pa/_/yid 'jam pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/byang chub drang po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa 
[\[284b.4\]]lan grangs nyi shu lnga kun la'ang /_/legs dul yid ldan glang po 'dra ba po/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu dgu dgu yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri bzhi stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig 
[\[284b.5\]]yin te/_/dpag tshad bzhi pa bkod pa yid du 'ong /_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams sgron ma yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni sgron ma'i tog ces bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni lha bzang yin/_/grags mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras 
[\[284b.6\]]po 'phrul can mthu rtsal rim gro pa/_/mchod rten grags zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gzungs kyi rgyal po zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu kun la yang /_/srid pa kun las rnam grol yid ldan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni drug cu lnga lnga yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri nyis stong yin/_/
[\[284b.7\]]yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag_/rgyas par 'gyur te zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur/_/sems can snying po bkra shis ldan pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid gsal zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad khri yod yab ni lha dbang yin/_/spyod pa can zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po yid 'ong snang ldan rim gro pa/_/chos kyi 'od ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/yon tan mchog la gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs dgu bcu 
[\[285a.2\]]gsum kun la'ang /_/srid pa'i mdud pa thams cad rnam grol ba/_/bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu lnga lnga yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad brgyad pa gcig_/
[\[285a.3\]]gser dang nor bu'i lda ldis mdzes par byas/_/rgyal ba yul 'khor mya ngan med pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mya ngan sel zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad dgu bcu yab ni dul ba yin/_/nyes pa spong zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po tshal 'dor drag shul 
[\[285a.4\]]rim gro pa/_/yon tan mig ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/grags pa rnam par sprul pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/dul ba'i yid ldan bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can/_/bye ba phrag ni brgya brgya 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri sum stong yin/_/
[\[285a.5\]]dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni/_/brgyad cu rtsa gsum bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag_/rgyas par 'gyur te zhing rnams gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni yid tshim byed ces bya/_/rgyal 
[\[285a.6\]]ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad stong yod rdzu 'phrul lha ni yab/_/yid gnyis 'dod ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lta byed des pa rim gro pa/_/shes rab 'phags zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/mchog rgyal brtul zhugs zhes bya rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs 
[\[285a.7\]]brgyad cu gcig kun la'ang /_/bag chags pha mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan pa/_/bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri lnga stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]tshad bcu gnyis pa/_/gcig ste nor bu bzang po'i dra bas spras/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo dang ldan pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni shes rab gsal zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/thar pa'i brtul zhugs zhes bya rgyal 
[\[285b.2\]]ba'i yum/_/sras po tog ldan legs sems rim gro pa/_/bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/bkod pa gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang /_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha mthar phyin pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu gnyis gnyis yod/_/mi tshe lo 
[\[285b.3\]]grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/snang ba med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gsum pa/_/rin chen mang po'i dra bas mdzes par byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma spyan/_/skye ba'i yul ni 
[\[285b.4\]]chos kyi rgyal mtshan yin/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni blo gros can/_/zla mchog ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po zlas byin 'jam pa'i rim gro pa/_/spobs pa sems ni blo gros can yin te/_/'khrugs pa med par gnas pa rdzu 
[\[285b.5\]]'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu bzhi kun la'ang /_/nga rgyal sred pa'i dra ba 'jig pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni drug cu lnga lnga yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug khri drug stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs drug khri lnga stong bar du gnas/_/thugs rje can gyi sku 
[\[285b.6\]]gdung rgyas 'gyur la/_/rin chen bye ba dag gis rab tu brgyan/_/'jig rten mgon po shin tu gzigs pa yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid sgron zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad lnga brgya yab ni zhum med yin/_/blo brtan 'dzin ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras 
[\[285b.7\]]po blo ldan blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rim gro pa/_/rnam par snang byed ces bya mkhas pa ste/_/'jig rten sgra la 'jug pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu drug kun la'ang /_/dug rtsa bcad dang mtshungs pa'i dgra bcom pa/_/bye ba phrag ni drug cu gsum gsum yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs drug 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]khri sum stong yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs drug khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/'jig rten phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag_/rgyas 'gyur khams gsum dag tu gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shugs kyis 'dor ba yi/_/
[\[286a.2\]]skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba gsal zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bcu yod yab ni legs byin yin/_/mchog sbyin 'jug ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po zla ldan zlas byin rim gro pa/_/rdo rje'i 'gros zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/'byor pa gsal 
[\[286a.3\]]zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang /_/dri med tshul 'chos med pa'i dgra bcom pa/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu bzhi bzhi yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du 
[\[286a.4\]]gnas par 'gyur/_/'gro la phan phyir byams ldan rgyal ba yi/_/sku gdung rgyas 'gyur rnam par gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs can skye ba yi/_/yul ni gdul bar dka' ba zhes kyang bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad 
[\[286a.5\]]sum cu yab ni zhum med yin/_/bsod nams can zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po skrun byed gnyi ga rim gro pa/_/nor bu rkang zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/gser sgron zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/de na 'dus pa lan grangs drug cu ste/_/thams cad dag la bye ba dag ni phrag_/dgu bcu 
[\[286a.6\]]rtsa ni bzhi bzhi tshang bar 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri brgyad stong yin/_/'khrugs pa med par phyin pa'i dam chos dag_/lo grangs dgu khri nyis stong bar du gnas/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad rangs pa gcig_/nor bu'i gdugs dang bkod pa bla rer ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa
