[\[286a.7\]]shes rab me tog gi/_/skye ba'i yul ni mkhas pa gsal zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad sum stong yab ni dben med yin/_/'brug sgra zhes ni bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po sgom byed dul ba rim gro pa/_/yon tan 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]lha yi gzhal med mtshungs pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs lnga bcu kun la yang /_/dgra bcom bdud rnams 'joms par byed pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni lnga bcu lnga lnga yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs brgyad khri lnga stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs 
[\[286b.2\]]bzhi khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la/_/mchod rten bzang pos stong gsum gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa'i dbyangs skye ba'i/_/yul ni drag shul sgra dag 'byung zhes bya/_/rgyal ba'i rigs ni rgyal rigs 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag 
[\[286b.3\]]tshad dgu stong yab ni gnas pa mchog_/gser gyi mdog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/'jig rten lam sras sgron ma rim gro pa/_/yon tan mchog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/ku mu da yi snying po rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs drug cu gnyis kun la'ang /_/bag chags rtsa nas bton pa'i dgra bcom 
[\[286b.4\]]pa/_/bye ba phrag ni drug cu brgyad brgyad yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs drug khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag_/rgyas 'gyur zhing rnams rnam par gang bar 'gyur/_/sems 
[\[286b.5\]]can snying po bde dang ldan pa yi/_/skye yul gzi brjid yid du 'thad ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad/_/dgu bcu rtsa dgu ljon pa'i dbang po yab/_/me tog sgron ma zhes bya rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po tsam ka mchog ma rim gro pa/_/brtul zhugs lha zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste/_/
[\[286b.6\]]bkod pa mi 'khrugs pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu rtsa lnga la/_/dgra bcom thams cad tha ba spangs pa po/_/sa dag dang ni mtshungs pa sha stag go/_/mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri sum stong yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs 
[\[286b.7\]]brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dpag tshad bcu gcig pa/_/rin chen brgya yi dra bas mdzes par byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don dag gsung ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni smra ba gsal zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]tshad/_/dpag tshad nyis stong yab ni zla [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/sprin gyi 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po glog ldan snang ba rim gro pa/_/snang ba byed ces bya ba blo can te/_/yid 'ong gsal zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa dag ni lan grangs ther 'bum phrag_/bcu ste 
[\[287a.2\]]thams cad la yang bsam gtan pa/_/ther 'bum ther 'bum dag ni 'dus par 'gyur/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni 'bum yang yin/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs stong snyed kho nar gnas par 'gyur/_/'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag_/rgyas 'gyur 
[\[287a.3\]]zhing rnams rnam par gang bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa gsal ba yi/_/skye ba'i yul ni dga' byed mchog ces bya/_/rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad 'bum yod mi 'khrugs pa ni yab/_/bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po bdud 
[\[287a.4\]]rtsi rnam grol rim gro pa/_/seng ge'i nga ro zhes bya mkhas pa ste/_/gnas pa mi 'khrugs pa ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs sum cu drug kun la'ang /_/thams cad gnas shes pa la mkhas pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni sum cu lnga lnga yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs sum khri drug stong yin/_/
[\[287a.5\]]yongs su mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs drug khri drug stong bar du gnas/_/sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad gsum pa gcig_/rin chen mchog gi dra bas mdzes par byas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i zhal skye ba'i/_/yul ni smra ba'i mchod rten zhes kyang 
[\[287a.6\]]bya/_/de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad stong yod yab ni gzi brjid bzang /_/gos la dga' zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po kha sgyur legs gnas rim gro pa/_/ye shes zil gyis gnon pa mkhas pa ste/_/mya ngan med par gnas pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/
[\[287a.7\]]'dus pa lan grangs bdun cu kun la yang /_/gti mug med pa'i pha mthar phyin 'phags pa/_/bye ba phrag ni bdun cu brgyad brgyad yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri bzhi stong yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa de yi dam chos dag_/lo grangs bdun khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]'gro ba'i don dang phan phyir rgyal ba yi/_/sku gdung dag ni rnam par rgyas par 'gyur/_/mi yi 'dren pa gtsug phud skye ba yi/_/yul ni rin chen brtsegs pa zhes kyang bya/_/de'i rigs bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tshad bdun cu yab ni tog [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yin/_/snang ba sbyin zhes bya ba 
[\[287b.2\]]rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po lha legs sgra gcan rim gro pa/_/spobs pa dran pa blo gros can yin te/_/rnam par sprul pa'i tog ni rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu drug kun la'ang /_/'jigs pa med pa'i gnas mchog thob pa po/_/bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu bdun bdun 
[\[287b.3\]]yod/_/mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'das nas dam chos dag_/lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba thugs rje chen po mtshungs med pa'i/_/sku gdung dag ni rnam par rgyas par 'gyur/_/mi yi 'dren pa snang ba mdzad pa yi/_/
[\[287b.4\]]skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid grags zhes bya/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad/_/dpag tu med pa yab ni legs mthong yin/_/blta bar 'os zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum/_/sras po mthu rtsal mngar can rim gro pa/_/snang bar byed pa blo gros can yin te/_/chags med 
[\[287b.5\]]gti mug med pa rdzu 'phrul can/_/'dus pa thun mong ma yin dpag tu med/_/mi rnams dag gi tshe tshad dpag tu med/_/sangs rgyas dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi/_/mdzad pa ji snyed pa kun des mdzad 'gyur/_/'jig rten phan phyir sems can snying po dag_/mya ngan 'das nas 
[\[287b.6\]]dam chos gnas 'gyur ba'i/_/lo grangs stong phrag dag ni mtha' yang yas/_/rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[287b.7\]]'das legs so legs so/_/bskal pa bzang po pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang dang gang dag la dang por byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bkur sti 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]bgyis nas/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag lung bstan du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i phyir legs par rab 
[\[288a.2\]]tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta legs so zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[288a.3\]]'khor ba 'jig gis ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi yi zla de la/_/gser las byas pa'i gdugs dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs de la/_/sna ma'i me tog 
[\[288a.4\]]dag gi phreng ba phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od srung bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa'i mchog de la/_/ska rags dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/nga ni sngon tshe sman par gyur pa 
[\[288a.5\]]na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub de la/_/'jams gang zhig ni dbul bar byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor los sgyur ba yi/_/rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces byar gyur pa na/_/bde gshegs mthu chen 
[\[288a.6\]]gdugs tshod dag la spyan drangs nas/_/dang por bla med byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dag gis ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro snyan de la/_/phyag dar khrod kyi lhan pa thal mo tsam/_/phul nas dang por byang chub sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[288a.7\]]rab gsal tshong par gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od de la/_/nor bu rin po che dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa dag gis ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'thad gzigs de la/_/mu tig dag 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs me tog grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur de la/_/la du dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[288b.2\]]me tog gnyis pa yis/_/bde gshegs mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal de la/_/tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan legs khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs par sgra sgrogs 
[\[288b.3\]]la/_/khang pa brtsegs pa dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon dag gis ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa mthong de la/_/tsan dan dmar po'i khri'u dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[288b.4\]]bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lag chen rol mo mkhan gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog grags grong khyer du/_/bde gshegs de la gling bus mchod nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs stobs chen spos 'tshong bur gyur tshe/_/bde 
[\[288b.5\]]gshegs seng blo grong khyer gshegs pa na/_/a ga ru yi rdog ma phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rgyu skar rgyal po phyugs rdzi'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs byin de la ni/_/kha la'i me tog dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang 
[\[288b.6\]]chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rtsi sman shing rta mkhan gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim de la ni/_/ting lo mar me bcas pa phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs snyan pa tha ga par gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me'i glog 
[\[288b.7\]]'gyu la/_/ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs tog zhing par gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i 'od zer la/_/me tog sil ma dag gis gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]gshegs 'od chen grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma chen po ste/_/drang srong de la mar me phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs grol phung lham mkhan gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs 
[\[289a.2\]]de la/_/mchil lham zung cig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rnam snang 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis 'joms de la/_/ta li ba ti brgyad khri bzhi stong phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[289a.3\]]bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nyi snying bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas la/_/ko sha ta ka'i me tog phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zla ba gser mgar bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 
[\[289a.4\]]zhal de la/_/rin po che yi sdong bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od 'phro grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od de la/_/rtswa yi sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[289a.5\]]gshegs 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nags tshal srung gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong gzi brjid la/_/tsam pa ka yi me tog phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mya ngan med pa tshong dpon bus/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis rnam 'jig la/_/
[\[289a.6\]]kar ni ka yi me tog phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skar rgyal khyim bdag bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams sgron de la/_/nor bu rin chen mchil lham zung cig phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[289a.7\]]gshegs rab gsal rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong de la/_/tsan dan dmar po'i gzims khri phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs phreng thogs khyim bdag bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]'ong gzi brjid la/_/ka ka ni ya'i bdug spos gsol nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan 'od ni gser rtog tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa med de la/_/me tog gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang 
[\[289b.2\]]chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs don gzigs 'khor los sgyur rgyal tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mdzod la/_/khang pa brtsegs pa stong snyed phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mar me spos 'bru mar 'tshongs 
[\[289b.3\]]bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rol par snang ba gang /_/bye ba drug cu'i 'khor bcas dag la khrus khang gcig_/phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mthu ldan gos 'tshong gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa rgyas de la/_/
[\[289b.4\]]ras bcos leb leb pho dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sman pa sman pa'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan bral de la/_/spos kyi ri lu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[289b.5\]]gshegs des pa 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags 'joms mdzad de la/_/mar me kha cig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mdzod spu phreng rgyud mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs 
[\[289b.6\]]de la/_/ud pal dmar po dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs brtan ldan stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub de la ni/_/rin po che las byas pa'i gdan khri grangs brgyad cu/_/rtsa bzhi 
[\[289b.7\]]phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha dpal rgya mtsho'i tshong par gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po'i 'od de la/_/nor bu rin chen bla re dpag tshad gcig snang ba/_/phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]gshegs gdul dka' shing 'tshong gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan par gshegs de la/_/tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal mtshan chu'i/_/sbyin bdag 
[\[290a.2\]]gyur tshe bde gshegs yid 'ong grags/_/de la chu snod dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sgra gcan phreng rgyud mkhan bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs de la/_/gser gyi mchil lham zung cig phul nas 
[\[290a.3\]]kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshogs can khrus par gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rab dang ba la/_/khrus kyi chal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyangs 
[\[290a.4\]]phyugs rdzir gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan dang por mngon rdzogs par/_/sangs rgyas gyur pa'i tshe na de la phye bre gang /_/phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshigs brtan 'gron bu 'tshong ba'i bur/_/gyur tshe bde gshegs mi 
[\[290a.5\]]g.yor gshegs pa la/_/'gron bu spar gang gtor de phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mi 'gying rgyal bu dga' 'dod tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa mtha' yas la/_/glu dbyangs dag gis mchod pa byas nas kyang /_/
[\[290a.6\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od mdzad 'khor lo sgyur rgyal tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid brtsegs 'od la/_/na bza' rin po che dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen 
[\[290a.7\]]po yis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gnas de la ni/_/me tog mya ngan 'tshang ba bdun phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rdo rje lha dbang brgya byin du/_/gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa la/_/me tog man dA ra ba'i char phab nas/_/
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sdom can 'dzam gling gi/_/rgyal por gyur tshe bde gshegs thar dgyes la/_/gser las byas pa'i bla re phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mi bsnyengs rol mo mkhan 
[\[290b.2\]]gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs sbyin de la/_/rol mo'i bkur stis rnga chen brdungs nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen blo mchog gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi mdzod de la/_/spos kyis bsgos pa'i phreng 
[\[290b.3\]]ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs pad ldan 'khrul 'khor mkhan gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs de la/_/khri'u [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[290b.4\]]gshegs stobs bde rgyal po'i sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhon pa che ldan la/_/skyu ru ra yi 'bras bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs me tog 'od zer gser mgar gyi/_/bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs kun gzigs la/_/
[\[290b.5\]]rin po che yi phreng ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shes dgyes byis pa'i rgyan byed tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yul phyogs kun mchod la/_/mig dang bdug pa dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[290b.6\]]gshegs gzi chen tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab dpal de la/_/na bza'i bla re dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshangs pa bag chos mkhan gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa bla ma la/_/sha kha 
[\[290b.7\]]ra yi ri lu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od dpag med pa gla mi'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i 'od de la/_/gdugs gcig cig ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]gshegs pa klu sbyin phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam bsgyings la/_/me tog dag gi chun po phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs brtan gshegs nor bu mkhan gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis spong de la/_/
[\[291a.2\]]rin po che yi dra ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs don yod mthong ba nad pa'i gsos sman la/_/sbyor mkhan bur gyur tshe na dge slong dge 'dun dag_/spyan drangs nad sman sbyar nas bde gshegs legs mthong la/_/dang po kho nar byang chub tu ni 
[\[291a.3\]]sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs brtson 'grus sbyin pa 'khor los sgyur rgyal tshe/_/tsan dan dmar po dag las gtsug lag khang brgya stong /_/byas te ras bcos g.yogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/bdud rtsi'i stabs la dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[291a.4\]]gshegs bzang skyong gis ni bde gshegs zla ba'i 'od/_/nyan thos bcas pa'i dge 'dun 'khor bcas khri phrag bcu/_/zhag bdun bar du zhal zas ro ni brgya ldan pas/_/tshim par mdzad de dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dga' bo rtsal chen bram ze'i 
[\[291a.5\]]bur/_/gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mchog grags la/_/yu ba nor bus spras pa'i rnga yab gcig_/phul nas dang por byang chub sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'chi med rgyal po yi/_/pho nyar gyur tshe bde gshegs dbang sbas la/_/pan tsa li yi 'bras bu 
[\[291a.6\]]phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i rgyal mtshan zhing pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro gsal de la/_/skyu ru ra yi 'bras bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rgyal ba 
[\[291a.7\]]tshal gyi las byed tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med 'khor lo la/_/a ru ra yi 'bras bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos ldan dpa' bo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i nga ro la/_/rgyal 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]mtshan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mchog dga' rgyal po spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mchod rten la/_/phye ma spar gang phul te gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[291b.2\]]gshegs kha lo sgyur ba byis pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul la/_/pa la ba ta gsum zhig phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dga' gshegs rgyal po'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po la/_/
[\[291b.3\]]dngul gyi me tog dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chu lha tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog dpag med la/_/lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[291b.4\]]yon tan lag ni rtse ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen de la ni/_/'chag sa khru brgyad khor yug bkram nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spos glang spos 'tshong bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa rnam grol gyi/_/'chag sa 
[\[291b.5\]]spos kyi chu yis chag chag btab/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rnam gzigs gos 'tshong gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa sgrib med la/_/me tog gi ni gdugs dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[291b.6\]]gshegs 'brug sgra rdza mkhan gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs de la/_/spos dang ril ba gcig cig phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs legs sems khye'u lo gsum lon pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam 
[\[291b.7\]]gzigs la/_/pad ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yid bzang tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal sbyin de la ni/_/sna ma'i me tog phreng ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]do/_/bde gshegs dri med tha ga par gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs mthong de la ni/_/'ba' sha ka gcig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zla ba glang chen 'dul ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[292a.2\]]gzugs bzang de la ni/_/me tog phreng ba khru gang phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs grags chen grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros grags de la/_/me tog dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub 
[\[292a.3\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gtsug na nor bu khye'u yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bkod de la/_/sa rdul spar gang dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul lha'i bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[292a.4\]]pa spa ba'i 'od de la/_/lha yi gzhal med khang gcig phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng stabs gdugs mkhan gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar par bzhud de la/_/tsha ba'i dus tshe lo ma'i gdugs phul nas/_/dang 
[\[292a.5\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa phyugs rdzi'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bkod de la/_/lam gyi shing drung dag tu be'u ras phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rnam rgyal ba lang rdzi yi tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[292a.6\]]gshegs pa nges pa'i blo de la/_/lhung bzed 'o mas bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shes rab brtsegs pa dge slong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog de la/_/nyin gcig rangs par chos kyi gdan phul 
[\[292a.7\]]nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs legs gnas lham mkhan gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo'i blo de la/_/mchil lham rim pa gcig pa phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]pa blo gros las byed tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i blo gros la/_/ro dang ldan pa'i btung ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yan lag skyes ni mi 'dzin tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs bzang de la ni/_/khrus ras dag ni dbul 
[\[292b.2\]]ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo mtha' yas pa ni/_/lam ston gyur tshe bde gshegs bden smra la/_/shing drung gnas mal dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs 
[\[292b.3\]]bzang sde dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skad dbyangs de la ni/_/me tog ud pal lnga zhig phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mkhyen ldan dgon gnas dge slong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong de yi/_/'chag sa byi dor 
[\[292b.4\]]dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od zer shing rta mkhan gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas la/_/nyal khri stong ri ba dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[292b.5\]]brtul zhugs brtan pa ni/_/phreng rgyud mkhan tshe bde gshegs yid 'ong sems/_/de la me tog bla re phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis shing thun tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i shing rta la/_/bu yug langs tshe 
[\[292b.6\]]snang ma bltam nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden tog khrus pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan me tog la/_/kha gdong bkru ba dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs pad ma tshong 
[\[292b.7\]]dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od zer la/_/pad ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sred med bu ni spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdul bar dka' zhes bya ba de'i/_/khang pa brtsegs 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]pa tsan dan dmar pos byugs nas kyang /_/dang po kho nar byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rgyal po'i pho nya'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan sgrogs par mdzad pa gang /_/'khor bcas bye ba dag la chos gos gsum 
[\[293a.2\]]phul nas/_/dang po kho nar byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas ni/_/tshan po cher gyur g.yul ngor chas pa'i tshe/_/bde gshegs legs mthong la ni rgyal mtshan gcig_/phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin 
[\[293a.3\]]gshegs pa 'od 'phro sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo'i mchod rten la/_/spos kyi reng bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs byin lam ston tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen zhes bya ba/_/de la lam 
[\[293a.4\]]dag mtshon pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen 'byung gnas mnyan pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brdzi ba med gshegs de/_/nyan thos 'khor bcas bye ba bsgral nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[293a.5\]]gshegs lha yi me tog nor bu mkhan/_/gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal la/_/nor bu rin chen spras pa'i gdugs phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs don legs sems pa rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung snyan de la 
[\[293a.6\]]ni/_/nor bu rin chen spras pa'i bla re phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chos kyi dbang phyug shing mkhan gyi/_/bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs skar 'od kyi/_/gshegs zam dag ni bsham pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[293a.7\]]bde gshegs blo grags kun dga' ra srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i sgron de la/_/mon sran gre'u yi me tog phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spobs brtsegs tshong pa'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog de 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]la/_/sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pas spyan drangs nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan ni/_/tshal gyi las byed tshe na de bzhin gshegs/_/bsod nams bkod de la ni a mra phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de 
[\[293b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa phan bzhed grong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od ces bya ba las/_/nyin gcig srog gcod spong ba'i bslab gzhi mnos nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rnam rol grong rdal byis pa'i tshe/_/de 
[\[293b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas la/_/lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mun dang bral ba yis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' gzigs de la/_/mon sran gre'u 'bru mar me bzhag phul 
[\[293b.4\]]nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sgra gcan lha ni grong rten tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bar gzigs de la/_/ha sta ba sha ka dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ri bo'i rgyal mtshan tshogs ldan 
[\[293b.5\]]gyi/_/khye'ur gyur tshe bde gshegs mtha' yas 'od/_/de la me tog chun po phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshogs can 'od ni phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong dbyangs de la/_/me tog las byas bla re phul nas kyang /_/
[\[293b.6\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen snying po khrus pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung ba la/_/kha gdong bkru ba dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shin tu mthor gshegs grong khyer 
[\[293b.7\]]rten pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims stabs de grong khyer du/_/gshegs pa'i tshe na gdan dag bshams te bting nas kyang /_/dang po kho nar byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skar rgyal da nur mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor lha 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]de la/_/zhal zas bca' ba rnams ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ru [{]rings [,]ring [}]gzhan gyi khol gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dga' de la/_/lhung bzed 'jams kyis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang 
[\[294a.2\]]chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan grags pa bsod snyoms tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas la/_/gos kyi ras ma sor bzhi tsam phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zlas bde gshegs srid sbyin 
[\[294a.3\]]de/_/'khor bcas bye ba sum cu dag la gtsug lag khang /_/bzang por longs spyod phyir dang dpag tshad bcu pa'i gos/_/gding ba phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nyi 'od gzhan gyi khol gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po che de la/_/
[\[294a.4\]]lcags kyi snod dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skar mkhan tshong pa'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs gsal de la ni/_/nor bu rin chen dpag tshad gcig 'od ldan/_/phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni 
[\[294a.5\]]sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng tog ded dpon gyi/_/bur gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/blo gros bzang la phreng ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen rgyal po ni/_/snyan dngags mkhan tshe bde 
[\[294a.6\]]gshegs tsam mchog la/_/tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po yis/_/gzhan gyi dge 'dun bshos gsol yi rang nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la/_/dang 
[\[294a.7\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs srid mtha' gzigs pa tshal dag gi/_/las byed tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/khyad par sems la chab gtsang phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs glog 'od rngon pa'i bur gyur tshe/_/de 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo'i sems de la/_/rtswa yi stan dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ges byin pa khyim bdag gi/_/bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs pad snying la/_/sna ma'i me tog yod pa'i sa gzhi phul/_/dang por 
[\[294b.2\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan gyis/_/'jigs bcas lam du 'dron pa'i bsel byas nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sred med bu de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mchog dga' grags pa bu ram shing /_/
[\[294b.3\]]'tshir gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/blo rnam 'byed la bu ram bcud khu phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs brtson 'grus brtan pa bram ze'i bur/_/gyur tshe bde gshegs 'od zer mtha' yas la/_/khrus rkyen 'dag pa'i tshal dag phul nas kyang /_/
[\[294b.4\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs grags rdzogs chang 'tshong bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro la/_/lo ma'i snod nas chu dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsnyengs bral rgyal po'i bur gyur tshe/_/
[\[294b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po'i nga ro la/_/lo ma'i snod nas bar sha'i me tog phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mchod 'os lha ni blon mchog gyur pa'i tshe/_/bde gshegs yid 'ong blo 'od dag la dpag tshad gcig_/khor yug tsam gyi skyed 
[\[294b.6\]]mos tshal phul a ga ru'i/_/bdug pas bdugs te dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sgron chen mi bkren gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od de la/_/rtswa yi sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 
[\[294b.7\]]do/_/bde gshegs 'jig rten 'od ni lha'i bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la/_/me tog man dA ra ba'i gdugs phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spos dri zhim pa gyad gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag mdzes de 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]la/_/khrus ras dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan mchog 'dzin sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med don la/_/bdug pa dang ni dar yug phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub 
[\[295a.2\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mun dad rnam bral rgyal po yi/_/mdun 'don bur gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs/_/dgra bcom gzi la mu tig rgyan phreng phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'gram pa yis/_/de bzhin 
[\[295a.3\]]gshegs pa don grub blo de la/_/'dam rdzab dag tu shing zam btsugs phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen grags pa spos 'tshong gi/_/bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs dbyangs mnga' la/_/phye ma spar gang dag ni gtor phul 
[\[295a.4\]]nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skyon rab zhi ba rgyal bu'i tshe/_/gsad bya btson dag 'bros su btang nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa mchog de la ni/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bdud rtsi 'chang ba grong 
[\[295a.5\]]dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni/_/bai dUr+ya yi gdugs stong phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mi zla phreng rgyud mkhan bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges par sems de la/_/ud pa la yi phreng ba phul nas kyang /_/
[\[295a.6\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gzigs pa ni/_/'dun dpon tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/bden par gsung ba de la phreng ba phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rab brgyan grong khyer la rten pa'i/_/bur gyur tshe 
[\[295a.7\]]na bde gshegs mdangs 'od kyi/_/grong khyer sgo dag mdzes par byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nor 'od brgya byin gyur pa'i tshe/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid me tog rgyas pa la/_/dpag tshad khor yug me tog char phab nas/_/dang por 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis/_/bde gshegs grags tog shes rab pha rol phyin/_/gsung tshe legs gsungs zhes ni yi rang phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs don nges ldan pa tha ga par/_/
[\[295b.2\]]gyur tshe bde gshegs yon tan gsal ba la/_/ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshems sbyin blo chen bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron de la/_/bsil yab dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang 
[\[295b.3\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen 'byung gnas gzhu mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal rab dpal de la/_/me tog snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skye dbang mtshungs pa rdza mkhan 
[\[295b.4\]]tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhal sdug sde bdag la/_/snod dag chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs stabs gshegs zhing pa'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs bzhud la/_/zam stegs dag ni 
[\[295b.5\]]gzugs pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs blo gnas shing srungs bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo'i mchod rten la/_/se'u 'bru dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[295b.6\]]gdugs mdzes blon po'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i blo de la/_/tsam pa'i me tog phreng ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo gser mgar tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i snying po la/_/
[\[295b.7\]]bdug pas bdugs pa'i me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shin tu 'phags dpal spos 'tshong bur/_/gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs sde yi/_/'chag sa spos chus chag chag btab nas kyang /_/dang 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i sgra ni rnga mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i rgyal po la/_/rnga bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rnam rol ldan pa dung 'bud mkhan/_/
[\[296a.2\]]gyur tshe bde gshegs nyi ma'i snying po de/_/grong khyer gshegs tshe dung dag bus nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//_//'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[296a.3\]]klu 'od zla ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub dga' de la/_/rnga bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs me tog ri bo gar mkhan bur/_/gyur tshe bde gshegs dbang po zhi de yi/_/spyan sngar bro gar dag gis mchod 
[\[296a.4\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs klu dga' gar mkhan bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la/_/rol mo'i sgra dag bsgrags pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spos kyi dbang phyug 
[\[296a.5\]]rgyal po yi/_/sras mor gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/pad dkar spos la mu tig rgyan phreng phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shin tu grags pa tshong dpon gyi/_/chung mar gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/lhun po'i 'od zer spyi bor bla re 
[\[296a.6\]]phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs stobs lha grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal de la/_/bshos dron lhung bzed bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 
[\[296a.7\]]phreng ldan gyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsgyings ldan bzhud de la/_/sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal thal mo lan gsum sbyar/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu lag grong khyer gyi/_/sgo srungs tshe na phyag dar byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]gshegs pa phyogs rnams lta de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mig brgyan rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'od de la/_/chu dang skyu ru ra dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[296b.2\]]tshul khrims gsal de snga dro zhig_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs par sbyangs pa'i blos/_/dga' bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zil gnon ye shes kyis/_/ngan 'gror 'gro ba tshul khrims la 
[\[296b.3\]]bkod nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas blo de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mtha' yas spyan ni gos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs de la/_/ras bcos bla re dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu 
[\[296b.4\]]ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bden gsung khyim bdag bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus brtan de la/_/me tog dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nyi 'od bca' ba mkhan bu'i tshe/_/
[\[296b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa lha yis mchod de la/_/la du dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des blo bzo mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas blo de la/_/gding ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por 
[\[296b.6\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mtha' yas gzugs ni shing rta mkhan/_/gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi la/_/pa la shi ka dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad khar ba mkhan/_/gyur tshe 
[\[296b.7\]]bde gshegs mi yi gzi byin la/_/me long gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen tog ni nor bu mkhan gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams stegs bzang la/_/nor bu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs the tsom spangs pa rgyal po yi/_/btsun mor gyur tshe bde gshegs brtson brtan la/_/me tog skyed mos tshal dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'jig rten 
[\[297a.2\]]'das pa ma mi khar/_/gyur tshe bde gshegs thub par grags de la/_/dbu zhu gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs don yod rnam gnon mi mjed bdag_/tshangs tshe bde gshegs grags pa rgyal mtshan la/_/chos 
[\[297a.3\]]kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs par mdzad pa pos/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 'od de la/_/spos kyi ri lu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[297a.4\]]gshegs me tog rgyal mtshan rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gsal de la/_/rtswa yis bkab pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ri dbang rgyal po 'dreg mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 
[\[297a.5\]]che de yi/_/dbu skra legs par breg pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid chen po 'bru mar mkhan/_/gyur tshe bde gshegs dgra bcom mchod 'os kyi/_/gtsug lag khang du spos bsgos 'bru mar phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni 
[\[297a.6\]]sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs don mdzad gzigs pa ta la ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi mchog de la/_/lhang tsher leb leb po dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas 'khor los sgyur rgyal tshe/_/
[\[297a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa don grub sems dpa' de la ni/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gdugs stong phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lha ni 'dzam gling gi/_/rgyal por gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]mchod la/_/
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]'bras bu'i skyed mos tshal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don gnas mkhyen pa chang 'tshong gi/_/bur gyur tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sbed/_/srang du gshegs tshe thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas/_/dang po 
[\[297b.2\]]nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo rdzogs rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu dang ba la/_/me tog dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mya ngan med pa dpa' bo'i tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[297b.3\]]gshegs pa blo gros sems pa de/_/'jigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis spyan drangs nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma bral ba yis/_/sems can kun la yud tsam byams bsgoms nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges byung blo de la/_/dang 
[\[297b.4\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs lha shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i dbyangs de la/_/bu ram shing gi sdong bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa yi dbang phyug ni/_/dge 
[\[297b.5\]]slong gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/sna tshogs gsung ba'i chos gdan bting nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs me tog spyan ni rgyal po yi/_/mir gyur tshe na bde gshegs 'brug sgra la/_/ud pal dmar po dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por 
[\[297b.6\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rnam 'byes sku ni btso blag mkhan/_/gyur tshe bde gshegs 'od chen phung po yi/_/na bza' dag ni bkru bshal byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'od kyis ni grong dag dang /_/
[\[297b.7\]]yul 'khor rnams su pha rol phyin drug sgra bsgrags nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ni brtsegs pa de la yang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs kun gzigs stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe/_/gtsug lag khang mchog bye ba drug cu byed 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]bcug nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med par dga' de la/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan 'od gsal phyag dar par/_/gyur tshe bde gshegs yul 'khor lha de la/_/rdo leb gdan dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/
[\[298a.2\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla zhal bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dga' ba'i dbyangs de la/_/kan ta ra yi me tog dag ni gtor nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen 'od ni ded 
[\[298a.3\]]dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas de la/_/rin po che yi sgron ma phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen tog ni lcags mgar tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na dga' de la/_/ljags bzhar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/
[\[298a.4\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags bla chang tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma'i rgyal po la/_/'dzam bu'i ro bro ba dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od byed tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[298a.5\]]pa dpal gyi tog de la/_/mu shi kag sha'i me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid dpag med phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su rnam grags la/_/pad ma 'dab brgya pa dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni 
[\[298a.6\]]sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen gos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan sdug de la ni/_/ras yug dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i sku ni spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i tog de la/_/spos kyi phur 
[\[298a.7\]]ma dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mkhas blo tshong dpon khol po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med sbyin de la/_/me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal dka' lha'i bu'i tshe/_/
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po la/_/me tog man dA ra ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po ni/_/sAl chen lta bu'i bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba lha de la/_/phreng phul dang por byang chub 
[\[298b.2\]]sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla tog spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de yi/_/khang pa brtsegs par spos byug phyir phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu thob shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[298b.3\]]grags pa che de la/_/dgun shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mthu rtsal mtha' yas tshong dpon gyi/_/bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs la/_/se 'bru dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[298b.4\]]bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zla ba bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ston par dgyes de la/_/ud pal chang pa gang zhig phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri med tshong dpon gyi/_/bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[298b.5\]]grags bla la/_/me tog bar shig skye ba'i sa gzhi phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs don kun gzigs pa ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi rgyal po la/_/mu tig dag gi phreng ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 
[\[298b.6\]]do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dmar ser 'od de la/_/tsan dan dag gi gdan khri phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'byor ldan tshong 'dus pa yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar 'dud de 
[\[298b.7\]]la/_/snyun rkyen gsos sman mar dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsod nams ba lang rdzi yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems de la/_/snod dag zho yis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]bde gshegs sgron ma tshal gyi las byed tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig gsal de la ni/_/a mra'i 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od 'phro ni/_/ro bro 'tshong tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/
[\[299a.2\]]skyon zhi de la kha ra'i dum bu phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs kun rgyu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po la/_/lo ma dag gi ri lu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs legs skyes rgya mtsho'i 
[\[299a.3\]]tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs dang bral de la/_/na bza' stong phrag brgya ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor lha shing 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal de la ni/_/rtswa bam sgron me dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang 
[\[299a.4\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yid gnyis spong ba gser mgar tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis sel mdzad la/_/gser gyi me tog dag ni gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'dzin pa dpag med gser 
[\[299a.5\]]rtog tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i dpal de la/_/gser ni spar gang gtor te phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog srid sde dpon gyi/_/bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa gtso mchog la/_/gser las byas pa'i gdugs dag phul 
[\[299a.6\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa choms med lcags mgar tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la/_/a ha ta ka dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mi gnas grong khyer rten 
[\[299a.7\]]pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs de la/_/me tog rangs pa dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa der gnas thags mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gzigs de la/_/sku regs dag ni dbul ba 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshogs chen gtso bo mgon med bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud zil gnon pa de la ni/_/mon sran gre'u yi 'bru mar mar me phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[299b.2\]]bde gshegs 'gro ba'i 'od zer 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe/_/bde gshegs shing rta chen po 'khor bcas bye stong la/_/rgyal po'i zhal zas dag ni brim pa byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phal chen 'khor los 
[\[299b.3\]]sgyur ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stobs kyis gshegs de la/_/dpag tshad bcu gnyis khyon tsam skyed mos tshal phul nas/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rgyal ni 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer 
[\[299b.4\]]tshim de la/_/zhabs bsku ba dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas khrus pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sbed pa de la ni/_/'dag pa'i chal gyis snod dag bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/
[\[299b.5\]]dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs don gyi blo gros nad pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don grub mthu rtsal la/_/kha ra'i dum bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sman pa'i rgyal po phye 'tshong 
[\[299b.6\]]tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la/_/phye yi bsod snyoms dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tha ba spangs pa sman pa'i tshe/_/dge 'dun dag la mar khu phul nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa'i 
[\[299b.7\]]phung po la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rims med shing bzo mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam dag blo de la/_/shing rta dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs byin 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can mya ngan 'das pa na/_/mar me'i phreng ba dngar ba stong snyed phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags byin grong khyer mchod rten la/_/rten pa'i tshe na de 
[\[300a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa nor bu gsal/_/grong khyer dag tu gshegs kar me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog byin pa ni/_/nor bu mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/yon tan 'od la nor bu'i bla re phul/_/dang 
[\[300a.3\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skyes bus byin pa thags mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i sgron de la/_/ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i sde ni phreng rgyud kyi/_/bu mor 
[\[300a.4\]]gyur tshe bde gshegs 'byor ldan 'od zer la/_/me tog mya ngan 'tshang dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs phal chen byin ni gar mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ston par dgyes de la/_/tshigs su bcad pa gcig 
[\[300a.5\]]gis bstod nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zhi ba'i blo gros rgyal po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs par don sems la/_/bar shi me tog dri ldan gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[300a.6\]]pa spos glang gdugs mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs de la/_/gro ba dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sred med bu ni khyim bdag tshe/_/'brog dgon dag tu dge slong dge 'dun 
[\[300a.7\]]btung chu phul/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rgyal mtshan de la ni/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des pa dman las byed bu'i tshe/_/bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dag las gzung ba byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par gnas 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]pa de la ni/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mi tshugs nad pa mgon med bor ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po de yi lam/_/lag mthil tsam zhig phyag dar legs par byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[300b.2\]]bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla gau tam tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas mchog pad spyan la/_/dbyar gnas dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog tog rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'i tshe/_/khru brgyad 
[\[300b.3\]]kyis bskor spug las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od zer de la ni/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa las byed tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba mtha' yas la/_/las btang byas 
[\[300b.4\]]pas rnyed pa phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs de la/_/a mra dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[300b.5\]]gshegs ye shes nyi ma rdza mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi gdugs de la/_/lhung bzed dang ni gun d+he phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don grub sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od zer la/_/spos kyi reng 
[\[300b.6\]]bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lhun brtsegs khral mi'i tshe/_/bde gshegs yul 'khor kha lo sgyur de la/_/lhags pa'i dus su shing khur gcig phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[300b.7\]]pa dgra 'dul ya nga ba'i/_/dpyad mkhan tshe na bde gshegs legs mthong dag_/'brog dgon bzhugs tshe lhang tsher gdugs phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bshes gnyen bzhed de la/_/pad ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom grags pa ni/_/nor bu mkhan tshe bde gshegs skal bzhed la/_/nor bu rin chen me shel gcig phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes 'gros ni klu rgyal tshe/_/
[\[301a.2\]]bde gshegs nyi zhal sos ka'i dus dag tu/_/lam du zhugs tshe char pa phab nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nyon mongs bral ba gar mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med spyan de la/_/me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub 
[\[301a.3\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'dam bu dbul po'i bur gyur tshe/_/dgon par bde gshegs seng ge'i stabs de la/_/bshos dron dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[301a.4\]]gshegs pa sgron ma che de la/_/lo ma dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yul 'khor rangs ni shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhon par mdzad de la/_/bsil yab dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub 
[\[301a.5\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha grags grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gsal de la/_/so ras na bza' dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs srid mtha' gzigs pa lam ston tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[301a.6\]]bsod nams snying po yi/_/lam srang dag ni mtshon pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos de 'chag pa'i tshe/_/dus kyi rjes 'brang spos ni zho gcig phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[301a.7\]]bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan las mi'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' de la ni/_/phyag 'khar gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen zla ba rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med dgyes 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]de la/_/ta la pa ta dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i rgyal mtshan rdza mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rgyal mtshan la/_/sum pa ka yi lhung bzed phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[301b.2\]]bsam gtan dgyes pa grong khyer gyi/_/pho nya'i tshe na bde gshegs mdangs 'od la/_/me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs ldan rngon pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zlas byin de la ni/_/mig mi 'dzums par blta ba 
[\[301b.3\]]byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam rol rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dbyig de la/_/dpag tshad khor yug me tog chal bkram phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan rin 
[\[301b.4\]]chen ljongs gtso'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas 'od de la/_/me tog tsam pa ka dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dgra bcom grags pa mnyan pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des pa po de ni/_/gru dag gis ni bsgral ba 
[\[301b.5\]]byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs pa dngos 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i tog de la/_/dri zhim zhabs bsku ba dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mdzod spu ldan pa tshong 
[\[301b.6\]]pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med nga ro la/_/lhung bzed zho yis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spos grags tshong pa'i khol po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu yon tan la/_/lan tsha srang 'ga' zhig ni phul nas kyang /_/
[\[301b.7\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje nor bu yis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i tog de la/_/tshod sngon chang pa gang zhig bsod snyoms phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshe dpag med ni sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]gshegs pa sred med bu de la/_/mig sman ri lu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nor bu bkod pa khye'u'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gsal ba yi/_/lam srang dag tu me tog dkar po phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni 
[\[302a.2\]]sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang chen gyad kyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dgongs de la/_/ko dra ba yi 'bru dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan 'byung gnas bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs sems de 
[\[302a.3\]]la ni/_/ril pa gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po grags pa yis/_/phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun dag la rdzing phul nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bzang po la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[302a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bcu pa lha bu'i tshe/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid mtha' yas byang chub snying por ni/_/snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe na sor mo lnga bsregs nas/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ma smad shing rta mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng 
[\[302a.5\]]ge'i phyag de la/_/lo ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs glang po'i 'gros ni grong khyer du/_/rten pa'i tshe na bde gshegs blo snang la/_/sha ma ka dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[302a.6\]]gshegs yid 'thad gnag lhas srung ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi rgyal po la/_/dar ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen zla ba lam ston tshe/_/bde gshegs bden pa'i tog gi lam dag tu/_/gos kyi gdan dag 
[\[302a.7\]]gding ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs par gnas de la/_/ud pa la yi bkru sman phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rab gsal rgyal po 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]spong brtson pa'i/_/dge slong tshe na bde gshegs dpag med pa'i/_/lha la a yo ga dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs kha lo sgyur ba ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i me tog la/_/tsan dan dmar po'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phul nas kyang /_/
[\[302b.2\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dga' ba'i dbang phyug phyug po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbyin chen po la/_/rol mo'i sgra yis mchod pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gtsug na rin chen rtsis pa yi/_/khye'u tshe de 
[\[302b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa tog chen la/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i phye ma gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs bral rtswa 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la/_/ka pid ta yi phur ma phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[302b.4\]]bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sgra gcan lha ni shing 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od de la/_/rtswa las byas pa'i mchil lham phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs na tshod bzang po grong srungs tshe/_/grong khyer dag gi sgo ni phye nas kyang /_/
[\[302b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rma bya'i nga ro la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam rgyal la/_/shi ri sha yi me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen phung po 
[\[302b.6\]]smad 'tshong ma'i/_/gtso mo'i tshe na bde gshegs 'byor 'od la/_/na ba ma la'i me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mdzes gshegs tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ni mtha' yas la/_/ud pa la ni gcig cig phul nas 
[\[302b.7\]]kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng phyogs btso blag mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par dgyes de yi/_/na bza' bkru bshal dag ni byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shin tu mthor gshegs glang po che'i/_/
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]rdzi'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bde gshegs kyi/_/gdan ni 'ba' ti shing drung bting nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skye dbang grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i lha de la/_/tre ka ni yi me tog phul nas kyang /_/
[\[303a.2\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs blo gros bzang po grong dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gshegs de la/_/a mra'i lcug ma dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'jig rten 'od ni spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[303a.3\]]gshegs pa yul 'khor lha de la/_/spos rnams dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen gzi brjid bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo zab de la ni/_/bal dang 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[303a.4\]]bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skal ldan shing rta rtswa 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sde yi 'gros de la/_/me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs kun rgyal 'khrul 'khor mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la/_/dar gyi 
[\[303a.5\]]lda ldi dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dga' ba bkod pa tshong dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po la/_/'o mar bcas pa'i 'bras can phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stegs 
[\[303a.6\]]ni mdzad pa po/_/shing rta mkhan tshe bde gshegs dgyes chung la/_/shing las byas pa'i mchil lham phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spos kyi glang po khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po la/_/rma bya'i bsil yab dag ni 
[\[303a.7\]]phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs blo gros 'od 'phro rgyal po yi/_/btsun mo'i tshe na bde gshegs rgyal sde la/_/me tog par shi chang pa gang phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ri bo rgyal mtshan khye 'u'i tshe/_/
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa don grub gshegs de la/_/lag pa 'dag pa'i chal dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tshong dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sdug de la/_/me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang /_/
[\[303b.2\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chos brtan nor bu mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro la/_/rin po che yi gdugs dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid drag shul gser mgar tshe/_/
[\[303b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa gsal de la/_/gser gyi me tog dag ni gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chos kyi nor bu ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes phung po la/_/mu tig dmar po dag ni gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang 
[\[303b.4\]]chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bzang byin grong khyer rten pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid me tog la/_/bshos dron bsod snyoms dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zla ba phreng rgyud mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[303b.5\]]pa gzi brjid phung po la/_/ud pal lnga zhig gtor ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshangs dbyangs lag bla byed pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul 'od de la/_/tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu 
[\[303b.6\]]ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i zla ba rgyal po yi/_/pho nya byed tshe bde gshegs gzi mtha' yas/_/de la mchil lham dag ni dbul byas nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dpal ni tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 
[\[303b.7\]]zer mtha' yas la/_/gser gyi phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs skyes gser mgar tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po la/_/rin po che yi sdong bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]bskyed do/_/bde gshegs thub med tshogs ni 'dun dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad grags pa la/_/sbrang rtsir byas pa'i 'o ma dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs grags pa'i bshes 
[\[304a.2\]]gnyen tshong dpon gyi/_/bur gyur tshe na bde gshegs bden tog la/_/me tog dag gi phreng ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag shul la/_/me tog chang pa gang zhig phul nas kyang /_/
[\[304a.3\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dka' thub chen po tshong dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i tog de la/_/'khor rnams thams cad dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lhun po'i 'od zer 'khor sgyur rgyal po'i tshe/_/
[\[304a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po de la ni/_/rin chen yu bar bcas pa'i gdugs 'bum phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan brtsegs pa ded dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa bkod pa de la ni/_/rin chen snam 
[\[304a.5\]]bu lda ldi dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mchod grags sAl chen lta bu'i bram ze tshe/_/'khor ni bye bar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/'jig rten rnam par grags la khrus kyi yo byad phul/_/dang po nyid du byang chub 
[\[304a.6\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos grags lam ston tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul byin pa yi/_/'chag sa dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin 'od dpa' bo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog 
[\[304a.7\]]tu grags de la/_/rgyal mtshan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog 'byin grong dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don grub mthu rtsal la/_/gding ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yis mchod de la/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i 'bras chan phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'tsho byed lha ris pa yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[304b.2\]]pa bden pa po de yi/_/gtsug lag khang ni phyag dar byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs na tshod bzang po rtswa 'tshong tshe/_/bde gshegs zil gyis mi non grags pa la/_/rtswa yi sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[304b.3\]]bde gshegs legs pa'i tshogs can 'khor sgyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 'od de la/_/na bza' rin po che dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rnam nges blo gros tshong dpon gyi/_/bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa sgron chen la/_/
[\[304b.4\]]mu ka tsan tra ka dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid mtha' nor bu'i spos/_/rim gro pa tshe bde gshegs blo spyod la/_/chos kyi gdan dag bsham pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rgyal 
[\[304b.5\]]bas dgyes pa gos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal can de la/_/chos gos gsum dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i 'od zer lam ston tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med gshegs pa po/_/lam du zhugs 
[\[304b.6\]]tshe bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad rin po che/_/rtog shes tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/yid gnyis spong ba'i 'chag sa bshams nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[304b.7\]]grags mchog spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs che de la/_/sna ma'i me tog chun po phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs thugs rab gzhungs pa phyag dar ba'i/_/bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa lha gsal la/_/mngon sum dag tu 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]bstod pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nor bu'i zla ba lha bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrul med gshegs de la/_/lha yi gzhal yas khang dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[305a.2\]]gshegs drag shul 'od zer dgon pa yi/_/dge slong tshe na bde gshegs yul 'khor lha/_/de la chos gos snam sbyar phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs brtul zhugs thub med rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par dgyes de la/_/
[\[305a.3\]]gdugs dang dar yug dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gros mchod gdol bu'i tshe/_/nyi ma 'ga' zhig bslab pa lnga mnos nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpal de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[305a.4\]]bde gshegs nor bu'i tshogs ni brgya byin tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs sbyin de la/_/gser gyi shing rta rkyen bcas stong snyed phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'jig rten bla ma bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' de la ni/_/ma d+hu 
[\[305a.5\]]ka yi me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs glang chen seng ge long ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i 'od de yi/_/'chag sa dag ni chag chag btab nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[305a.6\]]pa zla ba rgyal po'i bur gyur tshe/_/zla ba bzhir ni dge slong dge 'dun na ba yi/_/gsos sman dag la spyan drangs bde gshegs 'od 'phro la/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen 'od zer 'khor los sgyur ba yi/_/btsun mo'i tshe na bde gshegs 
[\[305a.7\]]yon tan 'byung gnas la/_/yu ba nor bus spras pa'i rnga yab dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sgra gcan sbed pa tshan chen tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i blo de ni/_/lam du zhugs tshe bsil ba'i rlung yab byas/_/
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho grong rdal gyi/_/byis pa'i tshe na bde gshegs byang chub 'od/_/de la tshems shing dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od zer ldan pa tshong dpon gyi/_/bu tshe de 
[\[305b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho la/_/mar me'i kha ni stong snyed phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rab tu zhi stabs gyad kyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub dgyes de la/_/nor bus spras pa'i mchil lham phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub 
[\[305b.3\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'jig rten bzang po spos 'tshong bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha chen de la phye ma yis/_/bkang ba'i na bza' dang ni pad ma phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mya ngan med pa gos 'tshong khye'u yi 
[\[305b.4\]]tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo ni zab mo de la yang /_/rdzi char byung ba'i tshe na me tog gdugs phul nas/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shugs bcu rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug can/_/lam du zhugs tshe gdan 
[\[305b.5\]]dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs stobs dgyes rol mo mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtso chen de la ni/_/dung sgra dag ni bud pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mthu dpal rol mo'i 
[\[305b.6\]]glu mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems de las/_/gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba mnos nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu thob mnyan pa'i tshe/_/chu bo dag la zam pa btsugs nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 
[\[305b.7\]]de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen khrus pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa 'khrul med la/_/khrus ras dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan snying po tshong 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]dpon gyi/_/bu tshe bde gshegs bsod nams 'phags pa la/_/d+ha nu ska ra'i me tog phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden spyod spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor lha'i bu grags la/_/spos kyi ri 
[\[306a.2\]]lu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge mchog rgyal po rgyal po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod chen sangs rgyas de la sogs/_/dge slong dag gi dge 'dun spyan ni drangs nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[306a.3\]]bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal shing mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ldan pa/_/bde gshegs de la thal sbyar phyag byas nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od zer chen po tshal gyi las/_/byed tshe bde gshegs lha yi 'od 
[\[306a.4\]]zer la/_/ljon pa'i tshon dag sbyar te phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog 'od rdza mkhan tshe/_/bde gshegs 'od gsal de la zla ba bzhir/_/bum pa chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[306a.5\]]bde gshegs yon tan rgya chen nad pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dgyes de la/_/lcags kyi snod dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin po che ni tshong dpon gyi/_/bu tshe bde gshegs seng ge'i blo gros la/_/mu 
[\[306a.6\]]tig dag gi chun phreng phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'od spos 'tshong gi/_/bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa sa gtso la/_/phye mas bkang ba'i ud pal na bza' phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs go cha 
[\[306a.7\]]bgos pa lha'i bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od de la/_/bstod pa dag gis bstod pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i phyag ni tshal gyi las/_/byed tshe bde gshegs 'od zer bzang po la/_/me tog dag gi phur ma phul 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs me tog bzang po yig mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la/_/gro ba'i glegs ma dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen mthon po shal 
[\[306b.2\]]khyer tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sdug de la/_/mar me dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rgya mtsho rol mo mkhan gyi tshe/_/rnga bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gdugs de la/_/
[\[306b.3\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sa 'dzin mgar ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs de la/_/mtshon cha dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs don blo lha'i bu nyi ma'i tshe/_/de 
[\[306b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa gos pa med de la/_/me tog man da ra ba gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan bsags pa sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags bla bzhud pa na/_/'dam rdzab dag tu rdo leb zam btsugs nas/_/
[\[306b.5\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan tshogs ni sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal de la/_/skyu ru ra yi 'bras bu gcig phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen me ni ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin
