[\[306b.6\]]gshegs pa klu yi lha de la/_/bai dUr+ya'i snod chu yis bkang ste phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'jig rten 'das pa tshong 'dus pa/_/byed tshe dge 'dun dag la 'od sgron phul/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po la/_/dang por byang chub 
[\[306b.7\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'jig rten zla ba 'khor sgyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan blo de la/_/gtsug lag khang ni stong snyed phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan rgyal po bram ze'i tshe/_/phyogs 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]bzhi'i dge 'dun dag gi bsam gtan khang brtsigs nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mchog ma de la ni/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshangs tog bram ze'i bu yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dga' de la/_/
[\[307a.2\]]ku sha'i na bza' dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshogs can gtso bo bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpag med la/_/ril ba chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[307a.3\]]bde gshegs seng stabs gling gcig rgyal po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i tog de la/_/ras bcos gding ba dpag tshad gcig pa phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs drag shul byin ni tshong dpon gyi/_/chung ma'i tshe na bde gshegs 
[\[307a.4\]]nyi 'od la/_/phye ma spar gang dag gis gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chos kyi dbang phyug phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od de la/_/me tog chal par bkram pa kun phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[307a.5\]]bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid 'od ni lha'i bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ston par dgyes pa po/_/byang chub snying por bzhugs la rtswa gdan phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od zer chen po khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[307a.6\]]pa gsang bar dgyes de la/_/ras bcos bye ba snyed ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen grags pa rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig gi 'od zer la/_/bla re spos can dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni 
[\[307a.7\]]sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshogs can gsal ba rin chen 'tshong ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'byung gnas de la ni/_/rin po che dag spar ba bkang ste gtor nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]ded dpon gyi/_/bu tshe bde gshegs me tog dpal de la/_/na bza' bla re dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od zer don yod rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phyag ldan de la ni/_/mu tig dmar 
[\[307b.2\]]po spar ba bkang ste gtor nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha yi drang srong drang srong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma la/_/lo ma dag gi gdugs ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[307b.3\]]gshegs skye dbang 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od zer la/_/gling bzhi dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dge 'dun brtan pa mtha' 'khob rgyal po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs 
[\[307b.4\]]pa'i dbyangs can de la ni/_/me tog stong snyed bkram pa'i 'chag sa phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bzang gser 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la/_/gser gyi glegs ma bkram pa'i 'chag 
[\[307b.5\]]sa phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tog ni gser mgar khye'u yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i nyi ma la/_/mar me bzang po bshams te phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yul 'khor 
[\[307b.6\]]me tog rtswa 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus brtan po yi/_/'chag sa rtswa yis khebs par bkram nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chos kyi bla gros tshong dus pa yi tshe/_/tshong dus bar srang dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang /_/
[\[307b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa blo yi 'od ldan de la ni/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rlung shugs ltar gshegs d+hing ta khye'u yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa de la ni/_/bsil yab dag gis g.yab pa dag ni byas nas kyang /_/
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs legs bsams grags pa gtar mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i blo de la/_/nor bu skar 'od dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs snang 
[\[308a.2\]]ldan rgyal po'i pho nya'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa dpag med la/_/lan gsum bskor ba dag ni byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha tshogs 'khor sgyur blon mchog tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mche ba la/_/
[\[308a.3\]]gser dang byi ru dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan bsrungs pa 'dron po'i tshe/_/lam srang dag tu rdo stegs btsugs nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mthu rtsal la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 
[\[308a.4\]]do/_/bde gshegs don gyi blo gros lnga mngon shes pa po/_/bram ze'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa lha mchog gi/_/zhabs la mgo bo dag gi phyag dag 'tshal nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsnyengs med chu rka srung ba'i tshe/_/nyin zhag 
[\[308a.5\]]bdun du byams pa bsgoms nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs gnas la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grogs brtan gos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi mchod rten la/_/khang brtsegs mon dar dag gis 
[\[308a.6\]]bkab pa phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od gnas mtshungs pa dge slong tshe/_/dam chos yongs su gzung phyir spro bskyed nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog gi 'od zer la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nor 
[\[308a.7\]]zhabs tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dgyes de la/_/me tog ud pal chang pa gang gtor nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs thar pa'i gzi brjid grong dpon bu mo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]de la ni/_/bsod snyoms dang po dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ngos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phyugs rdzi'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od de la/_/zhun mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por 
[\[308b.2\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs blo [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phyug po'i bu tshe sangs rgyas kyi/_/dge slong kha ton 'don par bza' ba byin nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog ma de la ni/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs kun 
[\[308b.3\]]gzigs rab byung zhag bdun dge slong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi ngad ldan bcom ldan gyis/_/legs par gsungs la rjes su yi rang phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes mchog ni dge slong tshe/_/ting 'dzin 
[\[308b.4\]]'di la yi rang byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mthu rtsal la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs gnas rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros khyad par la/_/yan lag lnga ldan sil snyan dag gis 
[\[308b.5\]]mchod/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gsal de la/_/lhung bzed 'o mas bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo 
[\[308b.6\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sgron de la/_/a ru ra yi 'bras bu dgu phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs stobs byin tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'bar ba yi/_/gtsug lag 
[\[308b.7\]]khang dag skyong nul byugs nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge stabs ni rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa tha ma de la ni/_/byi ru spar ba bkang ste gtor ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs me tog tog ni rgyal rigs gzhon nu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig la dgyes pa de la ni/_/rin po che yi phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes 
[\[309a.2\]]'byung gnas phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa mdzes de la/_/pad ma'i rdzing bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs me tog byin pa gnas rten tshe/_/bde gshegs yon tan dpal gyi snying po yi/_/'chag 
[\[309a.3\]]sar 'ji ba'i gong bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan snying po drang srong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa gsal de la/_/rgyang ma nas ni thal sbyar phyag byas te/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[309a.4\]]rin chen grags pa shing rtog tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs stobs de la ni/_/a ti mug ta'i me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs grags pa rmad byung rdza mkhan gyi/_/bu tshe bde gshegs rnam dag spyan de la/_/chu yi sbyin pa dag 
[\[309a.5\]]ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mi tshugs dmangs rigs khye'u yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtul zhugs la/_/ba ru ra yi 'bras bu gcig phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[309a.6\]]bsnyengs med rgyal chen rnam thos bu yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs dag brtan pa de la ni/_/lha rdzas dag gi tsan dan dag gis gtor nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyal po yi/_/mdun 'don byed tshe bde gshegs 
[\[309a.7\]]'phags spyan de/_/zhag bdun bar du gdugs tshod gsol nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshangs rab gshegs pa mnyan pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa dgyes de la/_/chu bo'i 'gram dag bstan cing mtshon nas kyang /_/dang 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha yi mthu rtsal tshong dpon tshe/_/phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun sgo gang phub nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs chen de la ni/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes dgyes pa rdo mkhan tshe/_/de 
[\[309b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor mchog de la/_/lha yi zhal zas dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha bden sman rtsa 'tshong ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs par spyod pa'i 'od de ni/_/snyun gyi gsos sman dag la rtag 
[\[309b.3\]]tu spyan drangs nas/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nor bu'i snying po nya ba yi/_/khye'u tshe bde gshegs sa ri las de la/_/me tog bzhi zhig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan grags pa dka' 
[\[309b.4\]]spyod tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gsal de la/_/zhugs ling dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes dpal ni bca' ba mkhan bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad grags de la/_/lhung 
[\[309b.5\]]bzed bca' ba dag gis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bcings med rten bcas gcig pu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i mchog de la/_/gdugs tshod gsol te sbrang ma bskrad nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub 
[\[309b.6\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs brtul zhugs brtan pa blon chen tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par gzigs de la/_/khang pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha yi gzi brjid dam chos nub pa'i tshe/_/
[\[309b.7\]]dge slong chos smros shig smros shig ces brjod nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba lta bur gsung de la/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshangs par thub pa rgyal po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bla ma'i dbyangs de la/_/grong khyer dag 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dal bzhud dge slong rkyen pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dpal de la/_/so bi ra ka'i btung ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[310a.2\]]bde gshegs brtul zhugs dka' thub phyag dar pa yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu ba mkhyen pa po de yi/_/lam srang khru bcu srid du phyag dar byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od zer phung po khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[310a.3\]]gshegs pa mtshan gyi rgyal po de/_/'jigs pa med pas dgon par spyan drangs nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid chen po rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rims nad med pa yi/_/blo mnga' de la rgyan dag phul nas kyang /_/
[\[310a.4\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tsam pa ka ni rgyal phran tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa dul ba la/_/mu sni ka dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mdzad bram ze'i tshe/_/
[\[310a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi lha de la/_/ril ba spyi blugs dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshogs can bzang po lha bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bdud rtsi des/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor tshe legs pa phul/_/
[\[310a.6\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mchod sdong srung ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa grong khyer du/_/gshegs pa'i tshe na mchod sdong dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin 
[\[310a.7\]]gshegs pa dgyes chen sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i phung po la/_/sman gyi reng bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sna ma'i me tog 'od ni gar mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ldan de la ni/_/
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]sna ma'i me tog dag gi phreng ba phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshogs can 'od ni chang 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra de la ni/_/phye mas bsgos pa'i me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[310b.2\]]bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skrun mdzad shing lha'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i nyi ma la/_/me tog kar ni ka dag gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mdangs 'gro shing rta mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi bsnyengs 
[\[310b.3\]]thob de la/_/bzhugs khri'u dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs don legs nges ni rdza mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa dgyes de la/_/zhag gcig bzhugs pa'i gnas ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub 
[\[310b.4\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs khyu mchog blon che'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo mi 'khrul de la/_/seng ge'i gdan khri dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//_//'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya 
[\[310b.5\]]ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu lnga pa/_bde gshegs lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]thams cad byed pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba dga' de la/_/gos kyi dum bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od zer chen po lag 
[\[310b.6\]]bla'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi mchog de la/_/skyu ru ra dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsam pas byin ni khrus pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul mchog de la/_/phyag dag bkru ba'i chal dag 
[\[310b.7\]]phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsod nams 'od ni dbul po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi gdugs de la/_/bshos dron bcud dang ldan pa phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]rin chen dbyangs ni ri mo mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan dag ni bris nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu yi 'od ldan de la ni/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rdo rje'i sde ni bcings pa med pa po/_/ral pa 
[\[311a.2\]]can gyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/mthu rtsal drag shul can la rdo leb phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gzi brjid la/_/tsam pa ka yi phreng ba phul nas kyang /_/
[\[311a.3\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i stobs ni phyag dar pa yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i mtha' ni gzigs pa po/_/bcom ldan de ni phrag la blangs te 'dam rdzab bsgral/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[311a.4\]]pa spyan ni 'dri mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khrel yod bzang po la/_/ka la man dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od srung sbyangs gnas dge slong tshe/_/bde gshegs rgya chen gzugs kyi 'chag sa dag_/
[\[311a.5\]]lhung bzed 'bru mar bkang bas chag chag btab/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi spyan de la/_/'od zer me tog dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[311a.6\]]bde gshegs ye shes 'gros ni rgya mtsho'i tshong pa'i tshe/_/nyam thag tshe na sangs rgyas dag la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/tshig tu brjod nas bde gshegs tshogs kyi 'od zer la/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid drag shul mgar ba'i tshe/_/
[\[311a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mchog de la/_/dngul las byas pa'i lhung bzed phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od zer chen po tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par bzhag pa'i bdag nyid de/_/nyin gcig 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]bzhugs pa'i gnas ni byas te phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nyi 'od grong rdal byis pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tog de yi/_/ras kyi gdan dag gding ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 
[\[311b.2\]]do/_/bde gshegs dri med 'od ni mdun 'don tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye dbang mtshungs de la/_/mchod sbyin dag gi ra ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid rnam 'byes chang 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs 
[\[311b.3\]]med bshes gnyen la/_/kha ra'i btung ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs khengs med rtsis pa'i khye'u yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu ba'i blo mnga' la/_/ci tse'i phub ma phrag sta gang phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni 
[\[311b.4\]]sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sbrang rtsi'i zhal ni lham mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra thul de la ni/_/me tog ud pal dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zla 'od rten bcas nad pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[311b.5\]]zam pa'i 'od de la/_/mon sran gre'u rul pa dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glog sbyin rgyal po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo brtsegs pa la/_/yid 'thad khang pa brtsegs pa phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu 
[\[311b.6\]]ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rab zhir gshegs pa shing 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtse gcig 'od de la/_/chu dron snod dag bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mi 'khrugs pa yis dge slong dag la ni/_/ji srid 'tsho 
[\[311b.7\]]bar gnod sems med par 'dzin bcug nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sred med bu yi mthu rtsal la/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dgra bcom grags pa rdza mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i zhabs de la/_/spos kyi za ma tog ni phul nas 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chos kyi yon tan phywa mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dgyes de la/_/khang pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zhing bzang 
[\[312a.2\]]lha yi brtul zhugs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsal de la/_/gu gul bdug pa dag gis bdugs nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bkod pa'i rgyal po 'khor sgyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la/_/bai dUr+ya 
[\[312a.3\]]yi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mngon 'phags lha la dad pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam bsgyings la/_/me tog dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[312a.4\]]bde gshegs sbyin sreg 'od 'phro ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rnyog med la/_/bkad sa dag ni byas te phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs pad dpal phyug po'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa 
[\[312a.5\]]gsal ba po/_/bde bar gshegs la pad ma'i me tog gtor/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen bkod pa khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo de la/_/khron pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni 
[\[312a.6\]]sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shin tu bzang po lam ston bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gti mug spangs pa de la ni/_/ljon po'i lcug ma nyi shu snyed ni phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen mchog ni shing rta 
[\[312a.7\]]mkhan gyi tshe/_/bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po de'i/_/gtsug lag khang gi sgo dag byas te phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs thugs ni shin tu gzhungs pa phyugs rdzi'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]ba'i blo ni mnga' ba de/_/lam srang dag tu gshegs tshe gos dag bting nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rgya mtshos byin ni mdun 'don tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skal ldan shing rta la/_/me tog dag gi gzhal med khang pa phul/_/
[\[312b.2\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs tog zhing pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i mthu rtsal la/_/mo sran gre'u 'bru spar gang gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zla gdugs nir yu ha ka'i 
[\[312b.3\]]tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la/_/byug pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od 'phro spos 'tshong gyur pa'i tshe/_/bde gshegs phyogs rnams gzigs pa sangs rgyas kyi/_/gtsug lag 
[\[312b.4\]]khang dag spos kyis bdugs nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri med rgyal po ni/_/ri mo mkhan tshe bde gshegs stobs gsal de'i/_/sgo gang dag ni ri mo bris nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[312b.5\]]bde gshegs ye shes grags pa gos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges par rtogs bzod la/_/chos gos sra brkyang dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs kun rgyal tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[312b.6\]]pa chos kyi gdugs de la/_/rin chen se mo do dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan 'od ni mthing mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyis mi thub la/_/mthing phor gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang 
[\[312b.7\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra sgrogs gos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi me tog la/_/sku regs dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zla rgyas phyugs rdzi'i dpon po'i 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi pad ma la/_/chur ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs pad ma'i 'od zer bram ze yi/_/rgya mtsho'i bu tshe bde gshegs kun gzigs la/_/hi dim ba ra dag ni phul 
[\[313a.2\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs brtul zhugs bzang po snod spyad mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ldan de la ni/_/'bras drus snyim pa gang dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[313a.3\]]bde gshegs sgron rgyal bca' ba mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i tshogs can la/_/snum khur dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs glog gi tog ni ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don ni dgongs 
[\[313a.4\]]pa la/_/na bza' phrugs gcig cig ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od zer rgyal po rdza mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi rgyal po la/_/khrus rkyen bum pa dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[313a.5\]]gshegs skar mkhan tshal gyi las byed tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i zhal de la/_/lo ma'i gding ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs grags rdzogs nor bu 'tshong ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par dgongs de la/_/
[\[313a.6\]]rin po che yi bla re phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs pad snying stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa'i rgyal mtshan de la ni/_/dri bsung ldan pa'i skyed mos tshal dag phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[313a.7\]]bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rgyal ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dag de la ni/_/rin chen gdugs ni bye ba stong snyed phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spyan mdzes grong dpon bu mo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mthu rtsal la/_/me long dang ni bla 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]re phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rnyog pa med don shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi gtso de la/_/tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs drag shul sde ni khye'u yi 
[\[313b.2\]]tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos ngad zhim po la/_/phyag dar snyim pa gang zhig phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsod nams gzi brjid lci 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pas bsngags de la/_/lhung bzed bkru phyir lci ba'i 
[\[313b.3\]]gong bu phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mthu rtsal can ni rtswa 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mu stegs la/_/rtswa khur dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs thogs med blo ni mgar 
[\[313b.4\]]ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab 'od de la/_/mtshon cha dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sgra gcan lha ni lcags mgar gyi/_/khye'u yi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/ye shes go cha la ni khab phul nas/_/dang por 
[\[313b.5\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes phung po 'dreg mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs stobs skye ba yi/_/sreg shang dag cig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs kha lo sgyur ba dbul po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[313b.6\]]pa gzi brjid drag shul la/_/mchil lham rim gcig pa dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skye dbang mtshungs ni grong khyer na/_/rten tshe bde gshegs sangs rgyas dgyes de la/_/mon sran gre'u dag gis gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni 
[\[313b.7\]]sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs me tog tog ni rgyal gtso yi/_/khye'u yi tshe na bde gshegs gsal rgyal la/_/mchil ma'i snod ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sgra gcan 'dzin ni 'dreg mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa po/_/
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]bcom ldan de yi sen mo bcad nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rtsi sman chen po thags mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis rnam gnon la/_/ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[314a.2\]]rgyu skar rgyal po tshong 'dus pa yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don ni legs par dgongs de la/_/bum pa mar gyis bkang ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sman pa'i rgyal po tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po de la 
[\[314a.3\]]ni/_/lha yi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsod nams glang po 'bru mar gyi/_/mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags dul la/_/zhabs bsku ba dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[314a.4\]]bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gcod mdzad smad 'tshong bu mo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa gsal de la/_/me long dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rnam grags rgyal po'i khrus pa yi/_/khye'u tshe bde gshegs bsdu ba'i blo 
[\[314a.5\]]mnga' la/_/'dag pa'i chal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer dge slong dbyar gnas pa'i/_/rim gro pa tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan pa/_/de la khrus chu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub 
[\[314a.6\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos mdzod dka' thub can gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen gnas su phyin pa la/_/mtshan mo mar me dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs blo gros bzang po sman pa'i tshe/_/
[\[314a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro la/_/a ru ra dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan dbang mtshungs rtswa thun tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rin chen la/_/b+had tra ka ri dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rdo rje'i sde ni tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten kun dga' la/_/lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shes rab brtsegs ni 
[\[314b.2\]]rngon pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa b+har ga rdo rje yi/_/lam srang dag ni mtshon pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs gnas bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i dbyangs de la/_/bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i 
[\[314b.3\]]gdugs phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo sbyangs phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i skabs de la/_/sna ma'i me tog bdun zhig phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshangs dbyangs 
[\[314b.4\]]lam ston khye'u yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpon de la ni/_/gser gyi me tog dag ni gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan mchog ni zhing pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi yi zla ba la/_/bal sran sngon po spar gang gtor nas 
[\[314b.5\]]kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'brug sgra dbyangs ni rtsis pa yi/_/khye'u tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bkod chen la/_/phreng ba'i chun po dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mngon shes tog ni rigs gtso'i tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[314b.6\]]gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la/_/dar dang bdug pa dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tog 'od rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes dang ldan pa de'i/_/zhabs gnyis dag ni bkru ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang 
[\[314b.7\]]chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba khyim bdag tshe/_/bde gshegs srid mtha' nor bu'i spos de la/_/dgun smad sbyar thug dag ni gsol nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshangs pa mthing 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]bu 'tshong ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi bar gnas de la/_/mthing bu'i nor bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skyes mchog tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa bsdus de la/_/gur kum 
[\[315a.2\]]dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spyan sdug spos 'tshong khye'u yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas mchod de la/_/spos kyi phye ma spar gang gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs klus 
[\[315a.3\]]sbyin rdza mkhan chung ma'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro chen po la/_/chu yis bkang ba'i snod dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden tog tshong dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa dgyes de la/_/gser gyi khri stan dag ni 
[\[315a.4\]]phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brgyan pa spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa gsal de la/_/spos kyi phur ma dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zhum med dbyangs ni lcags 
[\[315a.5\]]mgar tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas la/_/lcags las byas pa'i snod dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen 'od ni ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i 'od zer la/_/spos kyi rdo gu dag gis bdugs 
[\[315a.6\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs ni byin pa yis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lta na bzod de la/_/dpyid ka chab rom gong bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge dag ni mgar ba'i tshe/_/
[\[315a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa me tog chen po la/_/de la khab dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od zer sna tshogs sha na mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid de la ni/_/sha na dag las byas pa'i na bza' phul 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes dpa' bo grong rdal gyi/_/khye'u tshe de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal la/_/la du dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs pad ma'i snying po rtsis pa 
[\[315b.2\]]yi/_/khye'u tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas blo la/_/me tog snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs me tog rgyas pa lag bla'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor sbyin de la ni/_/dus ma yin par bcud ldan btung ba phul/_/dang por 
[\[315b.3\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mthu rtsal stabs ni ral pa can/_/sbyin sreg mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/zhum med dbyangs la zhugs ling phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsod nams phung po tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[315b.4\]]gshegs pa kun du gzigs de la/_/lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzugs mchog grong khyer srung ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bzang po la/_/btung ba byin gyis brlabs pa phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub 
[\[315b.5\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar mkhan spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i gzugs de la/_/spos kyi rgyu dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zla ba'i sgron ma slongs mo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[315b.6\]]rnal 'byor sems dpa' la/_/'gron bu nyi shu dag ni gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid phung po rtswa thun tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zab mor gnas de la/_/rtswa las byas pa'i gdugs dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni 
[\[315b.7\]]sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs byang chub rgyal po shing rta yi/_/mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'od la/_/shing rta dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mi zad shing rta mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gdul dka' 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]la/_/bzhugs khri'u dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mngon rtogs spyan ni sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs de la/_/bldag sman dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni 
[\[316a.2\]]sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yan lag rgyas pa phyugs rdzi'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i sgron de la/_/lhung bzed dar bas bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yul 'khor shes rab mar 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal 
[\[316a.3\]]ba'i dpal de la/_/zhun mar srang brgyad dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog ni bong rdzi'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gdugs de la/_/bzhugs pa'i rdo gdan dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[316a.4\]]bde gshegs gzi brjid tshim mdzad rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i mu stegs la/_/se'u 'bru dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shes rab byin ni mar 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal de la/_/mar 
[\[316a.5\]]khu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs rdza mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog de la/_/ril ba chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mgon po 
[\[316a.6\]]rigs bu'i tshe/_/bde gshegs bzang po ngo tsha mkhyen pa la/_/'chag sa dag ni byas te phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chags med mdzod ni mi bkren tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bzod de la/_/tshod ma'i kong bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang 
[\[316a.7\]]chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gtso bos byin ni lha yi bu/_/dbang phyug che tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/seng ge'i nga ro de la bstod nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po la/_/
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]spos lo'i ril bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes mthu rtsal shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal de la/_/ko bi da ra'i me tog phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[316b.2\]]'od 'phro dge slong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyi snod de la/_/bu ram chu dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal de la/_/skyed mos tshal dag dbul ba byas 
[\[316b.3\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shugs 'chang tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par gnas pa po/_/de la gdugs dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal 'khor 
[\[316b.4\]]los sgyur ba'i tshe/_/bde gshegs kun gyi blo de 'khor bcas ther 'bum dag_/dbyar gnas tshe na phongs pa med pas spyan drangs nas/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bzang tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po la/_/sbrang rtsi ci 
[\[316b.5\]]bzhed pa dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs grags byin 'dzam gling rgyal po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i tog de yi/_/gtsug lag khang ni bye ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs 
[\[316b.6\]]bzang spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs brtan de la/_/spos ni srang gi bzhi cha phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po gser rtog tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yis mchod de la/_/khron pa zlum po dag ni phul nas kyang /_/
[\[316b.7\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don grub bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thal bar rlog de la/_/mchod sbyin chen po dag ni byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i sde ni dbang blon gyi/_/bu tshe de bzhin gshegs 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]pa grags mchog la/_/skyed mos tshal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nor lha'i bu ni tshong dpon bu mo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa po/_/de la zhabs bkru ba dag dbul ba byas 
[\[317a.2\]]nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs grags pa rgyal po'i btsun mo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo brtan de la ni/_/rang gi rgyan rnams dag gis gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rgyal ba rgyal po'i bu mo'i tshe/_/
[\[317a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od zer can/_/de la thod dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rgya chen snying po tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs chen de la ni/_/mu tig dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/_/dang por 
[\[317a.4\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsod nams 'od zer lcags srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs gsal de la ni/_/sog ma dag las byas pa'i phreng ba phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs smrang 'don 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe/_/
[\[317a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa stobs chen de la ni/_/lhung bzed 'bru mar dag gis bkang ba phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sgron rgyal rtsis pa'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po la/_/me tog 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang 
[\[317a.6\]]chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes brtsegs ni ljongs dag gi/_/pho nya tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po/_/bdud rtsi gsal la sbrang rtsi'i btung ba phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha mchog shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang 
[\[317a.7\]]chub mthu rtsal la/_/ma tu lung ga dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs [(]pas [,]pa sa [)]bdag khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra mchog sems pa la/_/khang brtsegs gos kyis g.yogs pa dag phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]bskyed do/_/bde gshegs grol brnyes btso blag mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros drag shul la/_/ras yug khra bo dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gtsug gser tshong dpon khye'u yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chu lha'i 
[\[317b.2\]]mthu rtsal la/_/gser gyi bum pa dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sgra gcan bzang po slong ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs chen po la/_/rtswa yi sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[317b.3\]]gshegs thub dka' go ri ka yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer 'bar ba yi/_/gshegs zam dag ni byas te phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thub gsal dung 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs med blo la/_/dung dag 
[\[317b.4\]]spar ba bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zla ba'i 'od zer tshong dus pa'i/_/khye'u'i tshe bde gshegs seng ge'i dbyangs de la/_/kham phor mar khus bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gser 
[\[317b.5\]]'od tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dgyes de la/_/mu tig chun phreng dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha yi yon tan dbang po blon che'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs par rab tu gnas pa la/_/dpag tshad gcig 
[\[317b.6\]]pa'i skyed mos tshal dag phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos gdugs bram ze'i tshe/_/ri yi rtse mo nas ni bdag mchongs nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsod 
[\[317b.7\]]nams lag ni tshong dpon bu mo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i sgron ma de la ni/_/me tog mya ngan 'tshang dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chags med spos 'tshong khye'u yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub stabs de la/_/
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]sran gre'u phul gsum zhig ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes gya nom rgyal po yi/_/pho nya'i tshe na bde gshegs rgyal ba yi/_/bshes gnyen de la lan cig bskor byas nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[318a.2\]]bde gshegs blo zhib rgyal po'i btsun mo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs par gzigs de la/_/bum pa chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzi byin thams cad ded dpon tshe/_/dge 'dun mang por zhal zas gsol nas 
[\[318a.3\]]kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnyog pa med don la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi sman lag bla'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs pa'i mchog de la/_/skyu ru ra dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[318a.4\]]gshegs rnam grol tog ni rten bcas tshe/_/'dam rdzab dag tu zam pa btsugs nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi yi zla ba la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzod zhing pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni/_/me tog dmar 
[\[318a.5\]]po dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes rgyal po 'bras sa lu/_/khur khyer tshe na bde gshegs kun 'od la/_/me tog kar ni ka dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs mdzad dpa' 
[\[318a.6\]]bo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la/_/rgyal mtshan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chu bo spong ni grong rdal byis pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rnam par bsgyings pa yi/_/stobs la me tog ud pal 
[\[318a.7\]]dag gis gtor nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs thogs med grags pa slong ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' de la ni/_/mo tsa na dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bden pa'i 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]phung po chang 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang mtshungs de la/_/rdza rnga dang ni lo ma phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan rtswa 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stabs chen de la ni/_/rtswa spyil dag ni byas te phul nas kyang /_/
[\[318b.2\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ri dbang mtshungs ni rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs/_/de la gdugs dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chos brtsegs lha yi bsnyen bkur ba/_/
[\[318b.3\]]byed tshe bde gshegs bsod nams brtsegs pa la/_/me tog chang pa gang ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs thar pa'i gzi brjid rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu zla ba la/_/tsug kra ru ka'i 'bras bu brgyad phul nas/_/dang por byang chub 
[\[318b.4\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs legs mdzad gar mkhan bu mo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan sdug de la ni/_/ras bal dag gi phreng ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rab zhi sku ni 'phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par 
[\[318b.5\]]grags de la/_/tsam pa ka yi phreng ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yid 'ong gsung ni dmag mi'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal de la/_/ras yug dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 
[\[318b.6\]]do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo sbyangs sman pa'i tshe/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i mche ba dgongs mal du/_/'bru mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chu lha gdugs mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 
[\[318b.7\]]mchod 'os la/_/dus su bsil yab dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i logs ni ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim 'od de la/_/ston mo chen mo dag ni byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]bde gshegs chos kyi mthu rtsal rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra zhir gyur pa la/_/dngul las byas pa'i gdan khri phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skal ba bzang po ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i sde de 
[\[319a.2\]]la/_/gser las byas pa'i bla re phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mi 'khrugs mdog ni rdza mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo de la/_/rdze'u phru dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[319a.3\]]gshegs gzi brjid rgyal po grong dpon tshe/_/grong khyer dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid go bgos la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs mdzad lag bla'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges par rtogs bzod la/_/ka 
[\[319a.4\]]ra bI ra'i me tog phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spyan legs phyugs rdzi'i dpon po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla mchog dpal de la/_/lhung bzed mo ra nas bkang phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs don 
[\[319a.5\]]gnas blo ni nad pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glang po'i stabs de yi/_/nyin mo bzhugs pa'i gnas khang phyags nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs snang ba'i 'od zer lha 'bangs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa'i gtso de la/_/mar me'i snying po 
[\[319a.6\]]dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos gzi rgyal po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa dgyes de la/_/ud pal sngon po gcig cig phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs kun dga' mdzad 
[\[319a.7\]]pa shing rta mkhan/_/byed tshe bde gshegs ud pal dri de la/_/snam phyi sa dag byas te phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs don yod gshegs pa lag bla'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi dbang phyug la/_/lo ma'i spyil bu byas te phul nas 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs khro bcom tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa'i mchog de la/_/rdzing bu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzugs mchog tha ga pa yi tshe/_/
[\[319b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs snyoms pa la/_/dbyar gnas dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs legs gshegs rol mo mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa'i dpal de la/_/rol mo'i rnga chen brdungs te mchod 
[\[319b.3\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rab sbyin grags pa la ku sa byed tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid chen po de la ni/_/'dag pa'i chal dag sbyar te dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gtsang 
[\[319b.4\]]khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la/_/bu yug langs tshe 'jams dang btung ba phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha nyi phyugs rdzi'i dpon po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dam las rgal ba la/_/zhun mar ci dgos pa ni phul nas 
[\[319b.5\]]kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shes rab byin ni phub mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas spyan de la/_/phub dag byas te dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mnyam gzhag bdag nyid khyim bdag tshe/_/
[\[319b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa blo 'bar de la ni/_/til 'bru spar ba bkang ste gtor phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzi mdangs 'bru mar spos can mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'os pa'i dpal de la/_/sna ma'i me tog yod pa'i 'bru mar srang 
[\[319b.7\]]brgyad phul/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal rigs lam ston tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs dbyangs de la/_/lam srang dag ni mtshon pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skal ldan shing rta 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]bu ram chang mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dmigs pa byin de la/_/skyu ru ra yi bcud khu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser mchog tsha 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang 
[\[320a.2\]]mar gnas de dag_/zla ba gsum du tshwa la spyan drangs nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rnam par grol gtsug zhing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim spos de la/_/rgun 'bru'i bcud khu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[320a.3\]]bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chos ldan yur ba mkhan gyi tshe/_/yur ba dag ni brkos te byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spos gnas tshong dpon chung ma'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo'i phung po la/_/
[\[320a.4\]]dbyar gnas dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dregs spangs sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog de la ni/_/'bru mar btung ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye 
[\[320a.5\]]shes mdzod ni thags mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog de la/_/ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshangs gshegs tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'os de la/_/me tog 
[\[320a.6\]]'bar shi'i chun phreng phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang brtsegs pa la/_/ba so dag las byas pa'i gdan khri phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mya ngan 
[\[320a.7\]]med pa gser mgar tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni/_/dngul las byas pa'i me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i 'od zer ni/_/a ba ka rar gyur tshe de bzhin gshegs/_/snang ba'i gtso la a ba kan phul 
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yul 'khor tog ni tshong pa'i tshe/_/bde gshegs sna tshogs dbyangs brgyan de la ni/_/ba so'i khang pa brtsegs pa phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs pad ma'i snying po 
[\[320b.2\]]dge slong tshe/_/'ji ba dag las gzugs ni byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa don la dgyes de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid mtha' yas chang 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa gsal de la/_/bkru ba dag ni dbul ba byas 
[\[320b.3\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha yi 'od zer dge slong tshe/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i tshe na chos kyi sbyin byas nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan spong de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shes rab me tog spug 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[320b.4\]]gshegs pa mngon shes 'od de la/_/spug gi nor bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa 'bras 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs kyi stobs de la/_/'bras kyis spar ba bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang 
[\[320b.5\]]chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byor ldan ni/_/shing rta mkhan tshe bde gshegs gsal ba'i dpal/_/de yi rlung skyabs dag ni byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyig shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[320b.6\]]gshegs pa mthong bar grags de la/_/ga na ko dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs phyag na rin chen rgyal po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grol 'od zer de'i/_/na bza' dag ni kha dog bsgyur nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni 
[\[320b.7\]]sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dbang ldan tshal gyi las byed tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis rnam gnon la/_/khar dzu ra yi 'bras bu brgyad phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rdzogs par gsung ba shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]gshegs pa dus mkhyen rgyal po la/_/star ga dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gsung shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nags kyi me tog la/_/'go ta ra na'i me tog gtor 
[\[321a.2\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod 'os rgyal bu'i tshe/_/rdzing bu dag ni byas te bshams nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpal de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nyi ma blon po chen po'i 
[\[321a.3\]]tshe/_/bde gshegs rnam par smin pa chen po la/_/rdo las byas pa'i khang pa phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'dam las rgal ba skud 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po la/_/skud pa srang gcig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/
[\[321a.4\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes brnyes pa chang 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gshegs par dgyes de la/_/bcud khu'i btung ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa grong dpon 
[\[321a.5\]]tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi rnam gnon la/_/grong gi mchog ma bcu zhig phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rma bya 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i phung po la/_/me tog 'bar shis bsgos pa'i 'bru mar 
[\[321a.6\]]phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos sbyin rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dbyangs de la/_/sil snyan brgya yis mchod pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phan bzhed 
[\[321a.7\]]mgar ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi me tog la/_/dra gri dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes ldan pa dung 'bud tshe/_/dung sgra dag ni bud pa byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam dag 'od de 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ston ka'i nyi ma la/_/nor bu bai dUr+ya dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od zer dra ba lo ma'i khur khyer tshe/_/de 
[\[321b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa snang ba blta na sdug de la/_/hi min dza la'i me tog dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bai dUr+ya snying shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa'i blo de la/_/a mra dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang 
[\[321b.3\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa'i me tog la/_/tang ga'i me tog dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha yi rgyal po ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[321b.4\]]gshegs pa 'bar ba'i dbyangs de la/_/skyed mos tshal ni bcu snyed phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mgar ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i go cha la/_/ril ba spyi lugs dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por 
[\[321b.5\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dran 'od lcags mgar tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra de la/_/snar blugs pa yi spyad dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge 'od dge slong tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[321b.6\]]gshegs pa dge ba'i lha de la/_/nor bu'i sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan mchog ma kun gyi 'od/_/tshong pa'i tshe na bde gshegs dbyangs mchog la/_/shing na ga yi me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang 
[\[321b.7\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che yi dpal/_/phyag dar pa tshe bde gshegs dpal dgyes la/_/gtsug lag khang dang phreng ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skyes bu zla ba bram ze'i tshe/_/gcong 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]rong dag tu zam pa byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i grags pa la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi me tog gi/_/gdan dag yud tsam gding ba 
[\[322a.2\]]byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bdud rtsi'i 'od ni gzhan bran tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la/_/nyin mo bzhugs pa'i gnas su gdan bting nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[322a.3\]]'jig rten mchog ma tshong dpon gyi/_/bu tshe bde gshegs 'jig rten bla ma la/_/d+ha nu ska ri'i me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od ded dpon tshe/_/bde gshegs blo mchog lam du zhugs pa na/_/mtshan 
[\[322a.4\]]mo rtswa sgron dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zhi ba'i stabs ni rgyal po'i bu/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dzeg tshe bde gshegs lhun 'od la/_/me tog dag gi chun po phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[322a.5\]]gshegs ye shes rgya mtsho mi bkren tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od gzi la/_/skyu rum dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ri dbang phreng rgyud bu mo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub gzi brjid 
[\[322a.6\]]la/_/me tog phreng ba khru gang phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rab zhi sman pa'i khye'u yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa sbyangs pa la/_/snyun gyi gsos sman dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 
[\[322a.7\]]do/_/bde gshegs yon tan mthu stobs spyad rdzi'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi 'od de la/_/tsan tsa tika dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha dbang rtsis pa'i khye'u yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra thul de la 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]ni/_/me tog mya ngan 'tshang gi chun po phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i me tog gi/_/bzhugs khang spos kyi byug pas byugs nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub 
[\[322b.2\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ngos bzang rtsal chen bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa chen po la/_/'dun khang dag ni byas te phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don gnas mi bkren tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[322b.3\]]gshegs pa phan par dgongs de la/_/snod dag chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan gzi brjid dpal ni khyim bdag tshe/_/dge 'dun dag la rnyed pa snum bag phul nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[322b.4\]]byang chub dam pa de la ni/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mkhyen ldan zla med rtsis pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yis mchod de la/_/gur kum byug pa lag gis phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[322b.5\]]bde gshegs nga ro dpag med phyugs rdzi'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dam las rgal ba la/_/ha ri ni ka'i me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[322b.6\]]srid pa gsal ba la/_/kun tu ra ka'i bdug pas bdugs nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shin tu thugs gzhungs mi bkren tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi me tog la/_/thal mo sbyar ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas/_/
[\[322b.7\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don dgongs gti mug bral/_/'khor los sgyur tshe bde gshegs dpal chen la/_/grong khyer dpag tshad bcu pa phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dbyangs kyi 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]yan lag khyad par 'phags/_/shing srungs tshe na bde gshegs 'od byed la/_/pha gu'i 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mchog tu mdzes gshegs rtsis pa yi/_/bran mo'i tshe na 
[\[323a.2\]]bde gshegs me 'od la/_/me tog kar ni ka ras gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zhi don rgyal po'i pho nya tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blta na sdug pa la/_/lan grangs brgya snyed bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/
[\[323a.3\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyon med rten bcas tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang bar dgyes pa la/_/mon sran sde'u yi 'bras bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs blo sbyangs dge 
[\[323a.4\]]ba shing 'tshong tshe/_/sgo gang dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dbyangs de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs pad ma'i mdzod ni dge slong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbyin byin pa la/_/sku yi 
[\[323a.5\]]khrus dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od zer bzang po dbul po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i mthu rtsal la/_/bsod snyoms dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[323a.6\]]bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spobs pa'i mdog ni shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med blo de la/_/shu ti'i me tog dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stegs bzang sgo ba'i tshe/_/bde gshegs 
[\[323a.7\]]mdangs 'od grong khyer gshegs pa na/_/thal mo sbyar te phyag dag byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshogs dbang tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i snying po la/_/rna rgyan phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs bral bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od de la/_/me tog ta ra ni yis gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes bzhed pa dbul po'i 
[\[323b.2\]]tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po de/_/phongs pa med pas spyan dag drangs nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spos can dka' thub can gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i 'od de la/_/lo ma'i spyil bu dag ni phul 
[\[323b.3\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo mchog tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mchog de la ni/_/a ga ru yi bdug pa phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba shing thun 
[\[323b.4\]]tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od de la/_/ba ru ra yi 'bras bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen zla 'od tshong pa'i tshe/_/bde gshegs yid gnyis las ni 'das pa la/_/nor bu rin chen me shel phul nas 
[\[323b.5\]]kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsnyengs med mdun 'don bur gyur tshe/_/bde gshegs 'khrul pa med pa'i blo ldan la/_/sin d+hu ba ri'i me tog phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzigs 
[\[323b.6\]]pa chen po rtswa thun tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs 'byor de la/_/a ga ru yi 'bras bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyangs sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag mdzes pa la/_/rgya 
[\[323b.7\]]shug 'bras bu'i phye ma phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dbyangs bzang lha ris pa yi tshe/_/bu yug langs tshe khang pa phyags nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med dgyes pa la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]bde gshegs shes rab che stegs nad pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grangs dbyangs de la/_/pi pi ling gi 'bras bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs blo gros zla med tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[324a.2\]]dbyangs ni chen po de/_/nyi ma 'ga' zhig bzhugs par gsol nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rdo rje mkhregs ni byis pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'byed ldan la/_/til dang 'dres pa'i 'bras dag phul nas kyang /_/
[\[324a.3\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs byang chub blo gros rdza mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa chen po la/_/me tog bar shi ka dag gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ljon shing dbang po rgyal po yi/_/
[\[324a.4\]]pho nya'i tshe na bde gshegs gzugs gsal la/_/sku regs gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdangs snyan 'dron po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po de/_/'jigs pa med pas lam kar 
[\[324a.5\]]spyan drangs nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsod nams stobs ni tshong dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar gzigs de la/_/zhun mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[324a.6\]]pa mthu dpal dge slong tshe/_/bzod pa dag ni bsgom pa byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa gnod pa spangs pa la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'phags dgyes dgon pa'i dge slong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba gsal de la/_/sran 
[\[324a.7\]]gyi phyed tsam dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu stobs phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rims med blo ldan la/_/'bras bu sar pa mchog dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]gshegs skar dgyes bca' ba mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom stegs de la/_/snod dag sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sprin gyi rnga sgra spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo ldan legs 
[\[324b.2\]]bsags la/_/u shi ra yi phye ma phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan dag sdug pa'i zhal/_/phyag dar pa tshe rnga chen brdungs nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gsal de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[324b.3\]]gshegs ye shes bzang ldan shing dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gzi brjid la/_/snod dag 'o mas bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ldan rten bcas tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi mchod gnas la/_/
[\[324b.4\]]la du dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan phung po kun rgyu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi dbyangs de la/_/kr-iSh+Na sa ra'i pags pa phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gsal 
[\[324b.5\]]ba rgyal po'i bu mo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa me tog nyi ma la/_/gser gyi phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chos kyi rgyal mtshan slong ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs gnas zhabs de la/_/gos kyi ras ma sor bzhi tsam 
[\[324b.6\]]phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes nga ro tshong dpon gyi/_/bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tog de la/_/tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' shing thun tshe/_/
[\[324b.7\]]bde gshegs sna ma'i me tog gsal de la/_/rgya shug dag gi 'bras bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mchod sbyin nga ro rten bcas tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi 'od de la/_/bal sran gre'u dang sbyar ba'i 'bru mar phul/_/dang por 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shes rab rnam 'god nga ro ni/_/ral pa can tshe bde gshegs yon tan bzhed/_/de la dka' thub gnas dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan 'od zer gzi 
[\[325a.2\]]brjid bzang mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi me tog de yi ni/_/chos gos snam sbyar dag ni drub pa byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs drang srong dbang po bsod snyoms tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mdzes pa la/_/
[\[325a.3\]]khab ral dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs blo ldan phyugs rdzi'i dpon po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba snang mdzad la/_/lhung bzed 'o mas bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[325a.4\]]gshegs spobs pa'i tshogs ni rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od de la/_/tsam pa ka yi tshal dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mchod sbyin bzang po shing thun tshe/_/bde gshegs kun du yon tan mchog de la/_/shing 
[\[325a.5\]]bil ba dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla zhal mar 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid rnam rgyal la/_/zhun mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[325a.6\]]shin tu gzigs pa da nur mkhan/_/byed tshe de bzhin gshegs pa lhas mchod la/_/bag chos dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//_//'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu drug pa ste 
[\[325a.7\]]tha ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral 'dreg mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi dbyangs de la/_/spu gri dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan tshogs ni khrus pa'i tshe/_/bde gshegs 'khrul pa med par sbyor 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]ba la/_/khrus khang dag ni byas te phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tog ldan khyim bdag tshe na de bzhin gshegs/_/brtson 'grus chen po 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba dag_/dbyar gnas zla gsum zhal zas ro brgya pa gsol nas/_/dang po nyid 
[\[325b.2\]]du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yul 'khor spobs pa dbul po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong dbyangs de la/_/mar me'i snying po dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen rab sbyin byi bo byed pa'i tshe/_/nyi ma 
[\[325b.3\]]'ga' zhig tshangs par spyod pa mnos nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun du dbyangs can de la ni/_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zla ba dgyes pa rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam sbyangs pa la/_/sge'u gsher me tog dag gis gtor nas kyang /_/
[\[325b.4\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs khengs med bca' ba mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha 'dod de la ni/_/mar khur dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i stobs ni bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[325b.5\]]gshegs pa shes rab stobs de la/_/a mra'i 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dbang sgyur rgyal po'i khyim bdag gi/_/bu tshe bde gshegs kun du gzigs de la/_/sle tres lo ma dag gis gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu 
[\[325b.6\]]ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bdud rtsi gsal ba mchongs mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas mchod de la/_/gser snam dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsam gtan snyoms pa shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[325b.7\]]gshegs pa thub pa'i me tog la/_/me tog dag gis dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'khrug med tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i blo de la/_/nor bu rin chen glegs ma phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dri ma rab zhi phyug po yi/_/bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rlabs 'joms la/_/gdu bu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs phyogs ma bslad pa khyim bdag gi/_/bu tshe 
[\[326a.2\]]bde gshegs shes rab rdzogs pa la/_/mar khur dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mdzes pa bu ram shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsher ma dkrugs pa la/_/bu ram shing dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang 
[\[326a.3\]]chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 'dul de la ni/_/mu tig dmar po dag gis gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shugs gnas ye shes rdza mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[326a.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom dgyes pa la/_/bum pa chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gsung dbang bca' ba mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims mchog gnas la/_/bca' ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/
[\[326a.5\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid chen po sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs mnyam dgongs pa la/_/skyu ru ra yi 'bras bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs blo gros zab mo khyim bdag tshe/_/de 
[\[326a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa bsnyengs med la/_/mu tig 'brum bu gsum dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bdud rtsi gzhan gyi khol po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus gsal ba de'i/_/'chag sar ljon shing rig byed bskrun 
[\[326a.7\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chos stobs tshal gyi las byed tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba rgya chen la/_/'od ma'i tshal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod ldan rgan po'i 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsan pa'i blo ldan la/_/rtswa yi ro bcud dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs me tog 'od ni lam ston tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib med dgongs pa de'i/_/lam dag nye bar mtshon pa byas nas 
[\[326b.2\]]kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs khams gsum mchod gnas gser rtog tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs med 'od zer la/_/gser srang gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[326b.3\]]sgra gcan nyi ma'i snying po phye 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i dbyangs can de la ni/_/kAr ShA pa ni ri ba'i phye dag phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lhas mchod rtsal chen bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa legs 
[\[326b.4\]]par gsungs pa de yi ni/_/'khor gyi khyams dag gser gyi snam bu bting nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs thar pa'i rgyal mtshan ras bal mkhan/_/byed tshe bde gshegs mkhas pa mchog de la/_/ras bal dag ni gtor ba byas nas kyang /_/
[\[326b.5\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bdud rtsi'i 'od ni gtsang sbra can gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po de la ni/_/su dar sha na'i me tog gtor ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bkren 
[\[326b.6\]]tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po sbas pa la/_/rgya sran dag gi phye dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtan pa phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i bsam gtan la/_/sab ta pa rna'i me tog gtor nas kyang /_/
[\[326b.7\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs snang ldan chen po lam du zhugs pa na/_/bde gshegs rin chen phung po 'gron po byed pa yis/_/nam gyi gung thun dag la mel tshe byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mdzes 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]gshegs rtsis pa'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan spos de la/_/tsam pa ka yi me tog phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nyi ma ltar gshegs mar 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs 
[\[327a.2\]]pa gsal de la/_/mar khu'i btung ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dag pa'i 'od ni dge slong tshe/_/bde gshegs mngon 'phags stegs de'i 'chag sa dag_/chag chag phyag dar byas te stan bting nas/_/dang por 
[\[327a.3\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od shugs tshong dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blta na sdug de la/_/snang sgron dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan gtsug ni tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[327a.4\]]gshegs pa dpag med blo de la/_/tsan dan dang ni 'bras bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dpal rdzogs btso blag mkhan gyi tshe/_/bde gshegs nyi ma stong ldan gzi brjid la/_/sos ka tsha ba'i dus su skyem phul nas/_/dang
