[\[327a.5\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng stabs rgyal po'i bu mo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khur bor de la ni/_/chos kyi gdan dag gding ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gyen du 'phags pa shing srungs tshe/_/
[\[327a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar grags de la/_/yungs kar spar ba bkang ste gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs me tog byin pa shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su rnam grags la/_/e raN+Da yi 'bras bu phul nas 
[\[327a.7\]]kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'gyed tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur rgyal po la/_/mu tig spar ba bkang ste gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma zhing 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas blo de la/_/lhung bzed lo thog sar pas bkang ste phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes dgyes pa tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer yangs pa la/_/bu ram 
[\[327b.2\]]gong bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bkod pa mdzes pa shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa gsal de la/_/so'u gan d+hi dag snyim pa bkang ste gtor/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 
[\[327b.3\]]do/_/bde gshegs gti mug med gnas bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mchog de la ni/_/mig mi 'dzums pas blta ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rma med lham mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[327b.4\]]gshegs pa thar pa'i brtul zhugs la/_/mchil lham dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tog gi rgyal mtshan grong rdal gyi/_/khye'u tshe bde gshegs yid 'ong gzigs de la/_/me tog bar shi'i phreng ba 
[\[327b.5\]]phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bde bar dgongs pa shing thun tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni/_/ud pal dmar po dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[327b.6\]]gshegs gti mug med rgyal 'khor sgyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs chen de la ni/_/na bza' rin po che dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs cho ga mkhyen pa blon che'i tshe/_/'obs su stegs dag 
[\[327b.7\]]gzugs pa byas nas kyang /_/bde gshegs 'od phung gzi brjid chen po la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dag pa'i rgya mtsho tshong dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tog gi 'od de la/_/khrus khang dag ni byas te phul nas kyang /_/dang 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen mnga' ba rtsis pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom mchod gnas la/_/mchil lham dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[328a.2\]]gshegs mi dma' ba ni shing srungs tshe/_/bde gshegs yon tan gzi brjid phung po la/_/rgun chab dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skye bo dga' mdzad dge slong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 
[\[328a.3\]]gsal de la ni/_/spos ni srang gi bzhi cha phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rma bya'i nga ro rtsis pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro chen po la/_/skyed mos tshal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu 
[\[328a.4\]]ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ma zhum pa ni rngon pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom gsal de la/_/skyo ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs srid sred dri spangs shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[328a.5\]]gshegs pa dgongs pa legs gnas la/_/shing sha pa yi me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spyod pa'i stegs ni tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stegs ni bzang po la/_/sran chung dang ni 'bras chan gzegs ma 
[\[328a.6\]]phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha mang snyan bsgrags rim gro pa/_/byed tshe bde gshegs ye shes 'byung gnas la/_/rdo yi gdan khri dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin 
[\[328a.7\]]chen stobs ni zhing pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rin chen la/_/gro yis spar ba bkang ste gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs pad bsnams btso blag mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i phung po de'i/_/
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]na bza' dag ni bkru bshal byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ni khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa'i stegs de la/_/bzhugs gdan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 
[\[328b.2\]]do/_/bde gshegs dgra rgyal bram ze'i chung ma'i tshe/_/bde gshegs khro 'joms byang chub snying por ni/_/gshegs tshe sbrang rtsir bsres pa'i 'o ma phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'byor ldan grags pa slong ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[328b.3\]]gshegs pa seng ge'i sku de la/_/u dum bA ra'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yul 'khor bzang po phreng rgyud bu mo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bshes gnyen grags pa'i 'od de la/_/shing 'dzam bu yi 'bras bu dbul 
[\[328b.4\]]ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs me tog 'od ni phyugs rdzi'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro rnam dag la/_/lhung bzed dar bas bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i nga ro 
[\[328b.5\]]bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po bzhed de la/_/bstod pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zla ltar shar ba tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab zhi bdag po la/_/dngul las byas pa'i lhung bzed phul 
[\[328b.6\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'joms pa'i mchog ni tshong dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dul ba'i gzi brjid kyi/_/gtsug lag khang ni tsan dan dmar pos byugs/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 
[\[328b.7\]]g.yo phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid legs mchod la/_/me tog bla re dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs phan ldan gshegs pa tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten 'od de la/_/dngul las byas pa'i 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsod nams sgron ma rgyal po'i 'khor sgyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dag gi mchod rten de'i/_/gdugs tshod lo grangs bdun stong bar du sbyar nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni 
[\[329a.2\]]sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sgra dbyangs skul ba ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa dag pa de'i/_/gtsug lag khang ni tsan dan dmar pos byas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gau tam ni lam ston tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stegs bzang gzi brjid 
[\[329a.3\]]la/_/gdugs tshod dag ni sbyar te gsol nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mdangs stobs bram ze'i khye'u ya tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mchog de yi ni/_/lam srang dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde 
[\[329a.4\]]gshegs blo gnas rang bzhin shing rta mkhan/_/byed tshe bde gshegs mthu rtsal chen po la/_/shing rta dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zla ba bzang po mi bkren tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i gzugs de la/_/mar me kha cig gcig ni 
[\[329a.5\]]phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub yan lag me tog ni/_/shing tog 'tshong tshe bde gshegs shes rab mnga' ba la/_/a mra'i 'bras bu gsum ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bkra 
[\[329a.6\]]shis spos 'tshong bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan stegs de la/_/tsam pa ka yi me tog phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs legs par ston pa 'khor los sgyur ba yi/_/blon po'i tshe na bde gshegs lhun po'i 'od de yi/_/'chag sa dag ni bai dUr+ya 
[\[329a.7\]]las byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gzi brjid stobs/_/shing srungs tshe na bde gshegs zhi ba yi/_/blo gros de la se'u 'bru gcig phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dge ba'i sgron ma tshong pa'i 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal che de la/_/ba so'i gzims khri dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mthu rtsal brtan po bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcas brtan pa la/_/a mra'i khu ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub 
[\[329b.2\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha sgra tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don grub de la ni/_/pa la shi ka dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab zhi gos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phan par dgyes de la/_/na 
[\[329b.3\]]bza' dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nyi ma'i zhal ni khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yis mchod de la/_/rdzing bu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs thar pa'i brtul 
[\[329b.4\]]zhugs mi bkren tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spong ba'i shugs de la/_/pri yang ku yi bsod snyoms phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshul khrims 'od ni dbul po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtong de la/_/tshod ma'i khu ba dag ni phul nas 
[\[329b.5\]]kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs brtul zhugs gnas pa khyim bdag gi/_/bu mo'i tshe na bde gshegs ye shes shugs/_/de la ud pal lda ldi phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rdul med phreng rgyud bu mo'i tshe/_/de 
[\[329b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa zam pa de la ni/_/pad ma 'dab brgya pa dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs snying po 'phags pa tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa bzang po la/_/ras yug gcig gis dgab pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang 
[\[329b.7\]]chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mig sman lam ston tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs ni rnam gnon la/_/a mra'i 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phel mdzad rgyal po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]pa gzi brjid snang ba la/_/gser gdugs yu ba bai dUr+yas byas pa/_/phul nas dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spos 'od tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i stobs de la/_/byug pa dag ni dbul ba byas 
[\[330a.2\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dus mkhyen 'od ni rdza mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dpal de la/_/kham pa dag las byas pa'i lhung bzed phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dran pa'i dbang po tshong dpon 
[\[330a.3\]]tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od de yi/_/lam du zam pa dag ni btsugs nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ni sdug de la/_/me tog ku mu da ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang 
[\[330a.4\]]chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs thogs med rgyal mtshan 'dreg mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ldan dbyangs de yi/_/phyag gi sen mo dag ni bcad nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs byang chub mchog bgrod lam ston tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[330a.5\]]gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i gzugs de yi/_/spyan sngar lam dag mtshon pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spyod gsal tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros la/_/mu tig do shal dag ni gtor nas kyang /_/dang por 
[\[330a.6\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen dgyes pa phyag dar pa/_/byed tshe bde gshegs zla ba chen po la/_/mchod phyir gling bu dag ni bus nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chos kyi dbang phyug dge slong tshe/_/chos rnams yang dag 
[\[330a.7\]]gzung phyir sems btud nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med dbyangs de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha thams cad pa gser rtog tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi me tog la/_/gser gyis spar ba bkang ste gtor nas kyang /_/dang por 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bshes gnyen chen po shing rta mkhan/_/byed tshe bde gshegs snyoms par gzigs de la/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag ni byas te phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bshes gnyen bzang po tshong 
[\[330b.2\]]pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba chen po la/_/snod dag chu yis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rab tu zhi stabs lam ston tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams bzhed de la/_/rtsa ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/
[\[330b.3\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bdud rtsi'i bdag po shing tog khyer ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phung po bcu pa de la ni/_/lhung bzed a mra dag gis bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lhun po'i 
[\[330b.4\]]'od ni rgyal po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs 'od de yi/_/grong khyer dag ni bla res g.yogs nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'phags pas bstod pa lam ston tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa klu yis byin pa de'i/_/lam srang 
[\[330b.5\]]dag ni mtshon pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang ldan khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dbyangs de la/_/gser las byas pa'i pad ma phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[330b.6\]]gzi brjid 'bar ba rtswa thun tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mthu rtsal la/_/rtswa stan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs snang gzigs rtsis pa'i khye'u yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan sems de la/_/rin chen dra 
[\[330b.7\]]ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs legs spyad rnam smin bca' ba mkhan/_/byed tshe bde gshegs sprin gyi dbyangs de la/_/lhung bzed bca' bas bkang ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]legs par dgyes pa dpa' bo'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dbyangs de la/_/rgyal mtshan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mya ngan bral ba rtsis pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song 
[\[331a.2\]]spong ba la/_/me tog rna rgyan dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen 'od ni dge slong bsnyen bkur ba/_/byed tshe de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi me tog la/_/mar me dag ni rab tu dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub 
[\[331a.3\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyod ldan khyim bdag tshe/_/bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dag ni bzung nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mdzes ldan pa la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsod nams stobs ni khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[331a.4\]]gshegs pa sgron ma chen po la/_/mal stan shing bal can ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho shing rta mkhan/_/byed tshe bde gshegs brtul zhugs chen po de'i/_/gnas khang dag ni byug pas byugs nas kyang /_/
[\[331a.5\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rmad byung snang ma pa yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa brtan de la/_/snang ma dag ni bltam ste phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nga spong rgyal po'i btsun mo'i tshe/_/de 
[\[331a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa myos pa spong de la/_/me tog lda ldi dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bdud brlag mdzad pa dmag mi'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi me tog la/_/mchil lham dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang 
[\[331a.7\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bag chags rgal stabs tshong pa'i tshe/_/bde gshegs bsam gyis mi khyab 'od de la/_/phreng ba dag las byas pa'i bla re phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mi phyed blo mnga' shan pa'i tshe/_/de 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa kun du 'od de la/_/shir sha'i phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho drang po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de yi/_/spyan sngar glu dbyangs dag ni blangs nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub 
[\[331b.2\]]tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dag mdzad grong dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'ong zla ba la/_/gser gyi me tog dag gis gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs tshogs can grong rgyal tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[331b.3\]]pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs de la/_/kha gzar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dga' 'od pad ma mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog de la/_/ka ran ta ka dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[331b.4\]]bskyed do/_/bde gshegs byang chub rgyal mtshan mdun 'don tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la/_/chos la dgab pa'i na bza' phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes rin chen phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[331b.5\]]pa me tog snying po la/_/me tog dag las byas pa'i rgyal mtshan phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shin tu bsil ba khyim bdag gi/_/bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yid gtod la/_/nor bu rin chen mchil lham phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang 
[\[331b.6\]]chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs rgyal ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbyin byin pa la/_/gser las byas pa'i gos dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes dgyes pa shing rta mkhan/_/
[\[331b.7\]]byed tshe bde gshegs yid bzhin 'byor pa la/_/bzhugs khri'u dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rdzu 'phrul tog ni gar mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa dgyes de yi/_/spyan sngar bro gar dag ni byas nas kyang /_/dang por 
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skye dbang mtshungs pa tshong dpon gyi/_/bu tshe dad pas bde gshegs stabs 'jog la/_/gser skud dag gis gtor ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sa yi dbang phyug 
[\[332a.2\]]rngon pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra dag 'dul ba la/_/rtswa las byas pa'i mchil lham phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nyi ma dgyes pa phye ma mkhan/_/byed tshe bde gshegs yul med spong ba la/_/ud pal zhal spos 
[\[332a.3\]]dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sgra gcan zla ba gzhan bran tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od de la/_/rtswa yi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byas te phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[332a.4\]]me tog 'od ni dge slong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ngar mi sems pa la/_/mchil snod dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sman pa'i bdag po bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag sgra sgrogs la/_/
[\[332a.5\]]bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs mnga' bzang kan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med spyan de la/_/na bza' dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[332a.6\]]bde gshegs bsod nams dgyes pa bram ze'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs dpa' bo la/_/me tog zad mi shes pas gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dga' stobs rnga mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[332a.7\]]'od 'bar de la ni/_/rnga bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan phyug po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tshogs de la/_/gling bu dag ni bud pa byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]do/_/bde gshegs chos kyi dbang phyug bram ze'i bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs de la/_/ku sha dag las byas pa'i na bza' phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyangs zhing pa'i 
[\[332b.2\]]tshe/_/bsod nams 'dod phyir khron drung chu tom bzhag_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa chen po la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spyod bzang ba lang rdzi yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i lha de la/_/snod dag zho yis bkang ste phul 
[\[332b.3\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'khrul med blo ni gling bu mkhan/_/byed tshe bde gshegs sems spyod bdud rtsi la/_/yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dag bsgrags nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs chen 
[\[332b.4\]]khyim bdag tshe/_/gtsug lag khang ni stong snyed byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros gsal ba la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs snyan grags tshong dpon bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma mchog de la/_/phreng ba brgyus pa dag 
[\[332b.5\]]ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tog ldan shing thun tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros brtan pa la/_/ud pal gsum zhig gtor ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gzi brjid rnam 
[\[332b.6\]]grags tshong dpon gyi/_/bu tshe bde gshegs mthu rtsal stobs de la/_/me tog dag gi phur ma phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'gro ba'i dbang phyug ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad 'dab spyan de la/_/nor bu'i sgron ma 
[\[332b.7\]]dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ljon pa dbul po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub 'od de la/_/ma Sha'i sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs gti mug 
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]rab zad bya ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs mchog de la/_/sha srang gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dpag med lha ris pa yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon shes drug sgra 
[\[333a.2\]]la/_/tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs zla ba bzang po dge slong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs stobs de la ni/_/gding ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed 
[\[333a.3\]]do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mtha' yas tog_/tshong dpon bu tshe bde gshegs mi yi grangs/_/mar me'i phreng ba dngar te phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs brtul zhugs bstar ba tshong pa'i tshe/_/bde gshegs 
[\[333a.4\]]rgyal ba'i me tog tshogs de yi/_/sku la tsan dan dmar pos byugs nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mchod gnas lha yi rim gro pa/_/byed tshe de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug chen la/_/me tog rnyis pa dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang 
[\[333a.5\]]por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mya ngan rgal ba smyig ma mkhan/_/byed tshe bde gshegs lha yi bdag po la/_/ta la mu tig dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dge dgyes 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe/_/bde 
[\[333a.6\]]gshegs bag mi tsha bar gnas pa la/_/'bru mar srang gcig cig ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'gro ba'i bla gros 'bru mar mkhan/_/byed tshe bde gshegs dgra bcom byang chub la/_/yungs mar srang brgyad snyed ni phul nas 
[\[333a.7\]]kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes gshegs rgyal bu'i tshe/_/bde gshegs mya ngan mun pa sel ba la/_/rma bya dag las byas pa'i bsil yab phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs mdzes ded 
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo rnam dag la/_/mu tig dag gis gtor ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ud pal brgya byin tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la/_/sku tshe'i 'du byed gzung bar gsol btab 
[\[333b.2\]]nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dul gnas me tog gser rtog tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' ba'i sems de la/_/gser dag gis ni gtor ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spobs pa 
[\[333b.3\]]mtha' yas 'od zer pad ma mkhan/_/byed tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i shes rab la/_/shing las byas pa'i lhung bzed dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs drang srong gsal ba phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo'i 
[\[333b.4\]]sems de la/_/me tog dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan brtson 'grus khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa'i sgron ma la/_/'jams gang zhig ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por 
[\[333b.5\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snying po mar 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod gnas dpal de la/_/zhun mar srang brgyad snyed ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha bdag ka ran dza byed tshe/_/de bzhin 
[\[333b.6\]]gshegs pa blo gros legs sems la/_/bak+sha ka dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen mthon po rgyal bu'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal de la/_/spos dang phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por 
[\[333b.7\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo dad pa la/_/sbrang rtsi bldag par bya ba phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skal ldan shing rta can/_/lham mkhan tshe na bde 
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]gshegs blo mchog la/_/mchil lham dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsod nams blo gros phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab dgyes gsal ba la/_/me tog dag gi chun po phul nas kyang /_/dang por 
[\[334a.2\]]byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sbyin sreg 'od 'phro thags mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag nyid snang ba la/_/ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yon tan mtha' yas gzi brjid phung po ni/_/
[\[334a.3\]]tshong pa byed tshe bde gshegs mi yi pad ma la/_/ras yug zung du sbyar te dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i stabs ni shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos dri zhim pa la/_/se'u 'bru'i bcud khu dag ni phul nas kyang /_/
[\[334a.4\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa mchog de la/_/a ti mug ta'i me tog gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rab gsal sman pa'i tshe/_/de 
[\[334a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs la/_/mar khur dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'od spyod khyim bdag bur gyur tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i dpal de la/_/phreng ba brgyus pa dag ni phul nas kyang /_/
[\[334a.6\]]dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs glu dbyangs shing rta mkhan gyi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' mtshungs de la/_/gzims khri dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa glu dbyangs 
[\[334a.7\]]sman pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 'od zer la/_/me tog sil ma dag ni gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 'khor lo 'dzin pa phreng rgyud tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i lha de la/_/me tog sil ma dag 
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]gis gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dbyig mchog ral pa can gyi tshe/_/bde gshegs bsam gyis mi khyab stegs de la/_/rtswa yi mal stan dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs 
[\[334b.2\]]'jig rten dga' ba tshong dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la/_/phreng ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chos kyi zla ba lag bla'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po la/_/shing mchog dag ni dbul ba 
[\[334b.3\]]byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mtha' yas grags pa phyugs rdzi yi/_/dpon po'i tshe na bde gshegs stobs chen la/_/'o ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin tog gos 
[\[334b.4\]]'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor ye shes la/_/ras yug dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shes rab 'gros ni khyim bdag tshe/_/'khor gyi khyams dag phyag dar byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[334b.5\]]pa drag shul blo gros la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dbul po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang blo de la/_/mar me'i snying po dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nam mkha'i 
[\[334b.6\]]dbyangs ni tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag mdzes pa la/_/na bza' phrugs gcig cig ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha ni lha ris pa yi tshe/_/phyag dar dag ni bya ba byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 
[\[334b.7\]]gyi mchog de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs lha rgyal phyugs rdzi'i dpon po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi bshes gnyen la/_/'o ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs nor bu 
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]gsal ni dka' thub can/_/byed tshe bde gshegs yid gnyis spong ba po/_/de la gdugs dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]spos 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ldan de la/_/
[\[335a.2\]]kAr ShA pa ni gcig ri'i 'bru mar dang /_/spos phul dang por byang chub sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma gau tam tshe/_/dbyar gnas pa dag dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi dpal de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin 
[\[335a.3\]]gshegs pa rin chen nga ro dbyangs/_/tshong 'dus pa tshe bde gshegs dgra bcom gnas/_/de la zhun mar bre gang phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs skye dbang rgyal po tshong dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gnas de la/_/kun 
[\[335a.4\]]dga' ra ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs sgra gcan sbed pa shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus cher dgongs la/_/sge'u gsher dag gi dum bu phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/
[\[335a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dge mdzad chu chun tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od ni 'bar ba la/_/chu grang dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i blo gros khyim bdag tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal sdud pa la/_/
[\[335a.6\]]me tog blta na sdug pa phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs rin chen grags pa shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa zab bsgoms la/_/sgra dbyangs dag gi mchod pa phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems 
[\[335a.7\]]bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don mdzad phyug po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos sreg de la ni/_/rnga bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mdzad mtha' gzigs pa khyim bdag tshe/_/gtsug lag khang 
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]dag byas te phul nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs srid pa'i me tog khrus pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'byed blo la/_/khrus ras dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni 
[\[335b.2\]]sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mdzod spu ldan pa drang srong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog de la/_/ku sha dag las byas pa'i na bza' phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs spobs pa mtshungs med rgyal po ri mo mkhan/_/byed tshe de bzhin 
[\[335b.3\]]gshegs pa yon tan bkod pa po/_/de la me tog dag gi phreng ba phul nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro 'gron po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs seng ge de yi ni/_/lam srang dag tu gos ni gding ba byas 
[\[335b.4\]]nas kyang /_/dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng ge'i mche ba dge slong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes blo gros la/_/lhung bzed chung ngu skyu ru ras bkang phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs mdzes par gshegs pa 
[\[335b.5\]]ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan lhun po la/_/seng ge'i gdan khri dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bsod nams 'khor los sgyur rgyal tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nga ro sbyangs pa la/_/rin po che las byas pa'i 
[\[335b.6\]]bla re phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chos sgron gdugs ni tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu ba rnam 'byed la/_/lhung bzed rin po che dag phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs bkra shis ldan 
[\[335b.7\]]pa tshong dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal de la/_/kun dga' ra ba dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs yul 'khor mya ngan med pa po/_/tshong dpon bu tshe stan [{]rings [,]ring [}]phul nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]zla ba snang ba la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs blo gros sems dpa' khyim bdag tshe/_/gnas dang zas kyi rkyen ris bcad nas kyang /_/bde gshegs yon tan phung po 'od de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[336a.2\]]pa blo ldan 'ug pa'i tshe/_/gos dang shing leb dag ni bzhag nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs de la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs chos sgron spyan ni dbul po'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros ldan de la/_/rgya sran drus pa dag ni phul 
[\[336a.3\]]nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shugs 'dor bu ram chang mkhan tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grags rgyal po la/_/bu ram shing gi bcud khu btung ba phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs stobs chen tshong pa'i 
[\[336a.4\]]chung ma'i tshe/_/phye khal gsum ni gnyug mar bzhag nas kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba la/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs shes rab me tog ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa stabs kyi mchog ma de'i/_/lam srang dag ni 
[\[336a.5\]]phyag dar byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs brtan pa'i dbyangs ni ded dpon tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od zer la/_/gos kyi bla re dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bde 
[\[336a.6\]]ldan smad 'tshong tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi sems pa la/_/shi yi bur ma dag ni phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don gsung tshong pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can rab mchog la/_/ka sha'i gdan dag 
[\[336a.7\]]dbul ba byas nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs dgyes gsal grong rdal ba yi tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug phud dgyes de la/_/kha ra dag dang sbyar ba'i btung ba phul/_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/bde gshegs seng 
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]ge'i zhal ni phreng rgyud tshe/_/bde gshegs kha dog zil gyis mi non la/_/me tog khal bcu dag gis gtor nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug phud shing srungs tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal ba la/_/spos dang a mra'i 'bras bu 
[\[336b.2\]]phul nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad slong ba'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po yi/_/bshos dag bdag nyid btsongs te sbyar nas kyang /_/dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/_/sangs rgyas stong gi sngon gyi smon 
[\[336b.3\]]lam gyi tshul rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/de ltar sangs rgyas dag la chung ba yi/_/yon phul rnam par smin pa 'di dag yin/_/'khor tshe de yi 'bras bu de 'dra na/_/mkhas pa su zhig byang 
[\[336b.4\]]chub sems mi skyed/_/nam mkha' dag ni tshad dag gzung ba dang /_/rgya mtsho chen po mthar gyis bgrang nus kyi/_/sangs rgyas dag la dad pa shas tsam gyi/_/bsod nams tshad gzung bar ni nus par dka'/_/ji srid mya ngan 'das bde ma reg par/_/de srid mi khom sdug 
[\[336b.5\]]bsngal myong mi 'gyur/_/de bas rgyal ba bsod nams zhing thob nas/_/bag yod mi yis bkur sti mchod pa gyis/_/sangs rgyas dag la lhag par mos pa'i tshe/_/bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung la/_/mchod pa chung shas byed pa'i yon tan mtha'/_/bsam par 
[\[336b.6\]]nus ma yin na de lta zhog_/byang chub sems kyis rgyal la yon phul dang /_/gang dag tshad med chos 'di bzhi po dang /_/nam mkha'i khams dang sems can khams rnams dag_/ston pa ma gtogs shes par nus pa med/_/gang phyir sems can thams cad rjes gzung phyir/_/
[\[336b.7\]]byang chub sems bskyed gnas pa ji lta bar/_/dbul pos dpag tshad khor yug gcig tsam gyi/_/gter dag rnyed pa de ltar dga' ma yin/_/sangs rgyas byang chub phyir ni rgyal ba yi/_/rnam par rol pa brgyad dang stobs bcu dang /_/sems can sdud pa lnga brgya dga' 
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]mdzad bzhi/_/rtogs byed 'jug pa dag ni brgyad khri dang /_/rtogs par dka' ba brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang /_/bla na med pa'i sgo mo drug khri dang /_/sa rnam 'byed dang ye shes bdun cu drug_/sangs rgyas mtshon pa spyod pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_/
[\[337a.2\]]pha rol gnon pa lnga dang brtan pa bcu/_/spyod yul ther 'bum phrag ni bcu gcig dang /_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas dag gi yon tan gang /_/mtshan dang dpe byad dag dang spyod lam dag_/rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul lam min na/_/nyan thos sgra rjes 'brang ba'i 
[\[337a.3\]]smos ci dgos/_/mtshungs pa med pa 'dra ba yod min pas/_/des na sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab ces brjod/_/gang dag byang chub mchog rab sems yod pa/_/de dang de dag mi dman mtshungs med spyod/_/de dag de ring 'jig rten nor chen rnyed/_/de dag 
[\[337a.4\]]'jig rten legs par 'tsho bas 'tsho/_/bdud rnams bcom ste bdud rtsi reg byas nas/_/char sprin lhun sdug lta bur tshim par byed/_/gang de byang chub la zhugs 'jig rten skyob/_/de dag nor bdun dag gis sdud par byed/_/gal te sdug bsngal brgya mang bzod 
[\[337a.5\]]byed pa/_/de bas byang chub gang zhugs skyo mi 'gyur/_/de yis yon tan de dag myur 'thob la/_/'jig rten kun gyi mchog ma dag tu'ang 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i rgyu yis sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur/_/gang gi rnam par smin pas ngan 'gror lhung bar 
[\[337a.6\]]'gyur/_/mtho ris 'gro dang byang chub yon tan don gyi phyir/_/mkhas pa su zhig byis pa dag dang 'gal bar byed/_/byis pa 'gal byed mkhas pa 'gal mi byed/_/mi shes 'khrul yin shes ldan dran pa thob/_/blun po 'dam bying mkhas pa thang la gnas/_/gang 
[\[337a.7\]]dag chos spyod pa ni de la bzod/_/de bas rigs pa can min spang bya zhing /_/gang dag shes yul rigs ldan bsten par bya/_/dpal dang grags pa rnyed pa spangs nas kyang /_/ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni rnal 'byor bya/_/sangs rgyas re re'i yon tan dran pa yang /_/bskal 
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]pa khri phrag tshad med bzod byed na/_/sangs rgyas yon tan bsam med smos ci dgos/_/de bas sdug bsngal nyam thag dang du long /_/bzod dang ting 'dzin dag gi go bgos la/_/brtson 'grus rgyal mtshan tshul khrims shing rta zhon/_/sbyin stobs shes rab mda' 
[\[337b.2\]]yis bdud bcom ste/_/pham byas byang chub dag la reg par gyis/_/byams pa'i grogs dang bsgrub pa'i bshes gnyen dang /_/dbyer med pha rol phyin pa spro byed dang /_/stong pa'i gnas bcas shugs kyi zas sten tshe/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan thob par 
[\[337b.3\]]gyis/_/de bas ji skad 'dir gsungs rnam nges la/_/bag dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyor bar gyis/_/mkha' la ngang pa skad 'byin dga' ba ltar/_/thams cad mkhyen pa myur du thob par gyis/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_de 
[\[337b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'khor ther 'bum snyed dang bcas pa zhig byung bar gyur te de ting nge 'dzin 'di ston to/_/de ting nge 'dzin 'di ston pa na de'i tshe rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya ba zhig byung bas thos nas/_des btsun mo stong dang sras 
[\[337b.5\]]stong la smras pa/_ting nge 'dzin zad par snang ba 'di'i don kyang mi shes so/_/ma shes pas rtogs par byar yang mi nus so/_/de lta yin gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa la bdag cag gis rjes su yi rang bar ni bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[337b.6\]]legs par gsungs shing bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba byas pas/_de dag rjes su yi rang ba'i mod la bskal pa brgyad khrir 'khor ba bsnyil nas de las kha phyir phyogs par gyur to/_/khyim can zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob par gyur to/_/byang 
[\[337b.7\]]chub ji skad bstan pa la yang the tshom med par gyur to/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des na sangs rgyas sum 'bum dag mnyes par byas par gyur to/_/thams cad du yang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur to/_/log par ltung ba dang /_mi khom pa dag tu nam yang ltung bar ma gyur 
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]to/_/rgyu de kho nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya ba de khyod kyis gzhan yin no snyam pa 
[\[338a.2\]]de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya bar gyur to/_/bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni de'i tshe de'i dus na sras stong du gyur to/_/de ltar rjes su yi rang ba tsam gyis 
[\[338a.3\]]kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di mthu che ba yin na klog pa dang /_lung 'bogs pa dang /_bsgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba 'khor 'bum snyed dang bcas pa zhig byung 
[\[338a.4\]]bar gyur te/_de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs zhes bya bas khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gser gyi 'od dang ldan pa tsan dan dmar po'i chus btab pa/_a ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs pa zhig phul lo/_/longs spyad pa'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la yang 
[\[338a.5\]]de kho na dang 'dra ba zhig phul bar gyur to/_/de dag thams cad la yang skyed mos tshal re re yang phul bar gyur to/_/des bcom ldan 'das de las ting nge 'dzin bstan pa 'di yang thos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi rim gro pa mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog 
[\[338a.6\]]shes rab rdzogs zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa de la des 'di skad du/_'di ltar bdag gis ting nge 'dzin 'di shes par bya na khyim na gnas pas ni 'di rtogs par dka' yis/_ci nas kyang bdag gis skra dang kha spu bregs la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya gor 
[\[338a.7\]]ma chag go zhes smras so/_/de nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas/_gos ngur smrig bgos te/_khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/_sras khri dang /_btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu rab tu byung ste/_ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rnam 
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]pa dag zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das des de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas/_ting nge 'dzin 'di zhag bdun gyi bar du rgya cher yang dag par bstan to/_/de dag gis thos nas kyang /_gcig la gcig 'di skad du/_kye ma ting nge 'dzin 'di mthong bar dka' 
[\[338b.2\]]mod kyi/_'on kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di legs par bris te bcang bar bya'o zhes 'dzer to/_/de dag thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di bris nas kyang mchod pa byas so/_/bzung ngo /_/lung yang phog go/_/de nas de dag thams cad dus las 'das nas/_slar de 
[\[338b.3\]]dag tshogs par gyur pas sangs rgyas drug 'bum mnyes par byas par gyur to/_/thams cad du ting nge 'dzin 'di thos par gyur to/_/thams cad rab tu byung nas/_ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur to/_/smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kho nas thams cad 
[\[338b.4\]]kyis byang chub rab tu thob par gyur to/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs de khyod kyis gzhan yin no snyam pa de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de/_de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los 
[\[338b.5\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de ni/_dge slong rim gro pa shes rab rdzogs zhes bya bar gyur to/_/gang dag sras khri po de dag ni bskal pa 'di nas bzung ste/_bskal pa drug cu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'tshang rgya 
[\[338b.6\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa grags pa chen po zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_bskal pa gcig po de la de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag blon po brgyad khri po de dag ni/_bskal pa grags pa chen po 
[\[338b.7\]]'das nas/_bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de la blon po brgyad khri po de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]skar ma lta bu 'das nas/_bskal pa sum brgya ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[339a.2\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de ltar 'bras bu che ba yin no/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rdzogs pa/_lus dang srog la mi lta bar gyur 
[\[339a.3\]]pas/_ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal bar bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_ting nge 'dzin 'di la rnal 'byor du bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[339a.4\]]bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas byang chub don du gnyer ba gang /_/de dag rgyal po de yi rjes su slob/_/yang dag bsgrub la gnas pa ma gtogs par/_/gzhan gyis byang chub mchog ni 'thob mi 'gyur/_/de ltar 'dir ni dad pa chung bskyed kyang /_/de 
[\[339a.5\]]bzhin rnam smin gya nom 'thob par 'gyur/_/de bas g.yo med lhag pa'i bsam pa yis/_/'dir ni ci rigs bkur stis rnal 'byor gyis/_/rgyal ba gang de bdag gis 'dir bsgrags pa/_/de dag gang zhig mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_/bstan pa rgya cher 'chad 
[\[339a.6\]]par 'dod pa dag_/ji skad bstan bzhin 'di la rnal 'byor gyis/_/yi rang nyid kyis phun sum tshogs 'gyur na/_/'chang dang klog pa lta zhig ci smos te/_/yon tan mtha' ni 'gro bas bsam mi nus/_/'di thos su zhig rnal 'byor sbyor mi byed/_/
[\[339a.7\]]byang chub so so yang dag rig mtshan dang /_/ston dang pha rol sems ni gleng ba dang /_/sgrub dang snang ba gang dag sangs rgyas chos/_/ting nge 'dzin 'di las ni btsal bar bya/_/las sbyong de bzhin bdud rnams 'joms pa dang /_/lta sbyong de bzhin srid pa 
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]zad byed dang /_/rnam par rol dang zhing bkod 'byor pa dag_/'di dang rab tu ldan la dkon ma yin/_/de bzhin rnam grol spobs pa phun tshogs dang /_/bya ba thams cad sbyong byed gzugs dag dang /_/bsam pa ji bzhin byang chub 'tshang rgya ba/_/
[\[339b.2\]]de dag thams cad 'dir gnas mod pa yin/_/nga yis de snyed tshig gis rjod nus rnams/_/de lta bas na de dag 'dir sgrubs shig_/kun mkhyen chos la dga' bar ma byas na/_/phyi dus dag na 'gyod par gyur ta re/_/pha rol phyin pa ji snyed ngas bstan 
[\[339b.3\]]dang /_/gang dag ye shes rgya mtsho sbyor lam dag_/lus rten byis pa'i spyod la gnas pa yis/_/shes par bya ba dag tu nus ma yin/_/dus ngan pa dang sems can ma rungs dang /_/chos nub mtha' dang ngan song 'phel ba na/_/mkhas pas 
[\[339b.4\]]shin tu yid byung byas nas kyang /_/bag yod [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du skrag par 'gyur/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po/_byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis bskal pa stong du thabs mkhas pa ma gtogs par/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dag la spyad pa bas 
[\[339b.5\]]ni/_ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rjes su yi rang bar byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la/_bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_dpe'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/_byang 
[\[339b.6\]]chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i tshogs brgyad 'bum snyed kyang /_
[\[339b.7\]]rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go_/lha de dag chos kyi mig rnam par dag pas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag me tog gis chal par bkram 
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/bar snang las kyang lha'i rnga sgra dag bsgrags so/_/mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba snyed 
[\[340a.2\]]thams cad kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri 
[\[340a.3\]]zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing ha dang /_lots+tsha ba 
[\[340a.4\]]ban de dpal gyi dbyangs kyis bsgyur/_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//shu b+ha mastu sarba dza ga tAM//_//
[\[340a.5\]]ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha wA he dun+te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya bad ta/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e wAM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/_mag la b+ha ban+tu//_//
